XXratnml_u:3548: tatas te saṃtatiś caivaṃ varddhiṣyati kramāt tathā /
XXratnml_u:3549: tadāpi bhṛśato muktaḥ sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_10.45{45} //
XXratnml_u:3555: evaṃ putrābhilāsī sa sadā ca santatīchayā /
XXratnml_u:3556: devatārādhanaṃ kṛtvā tasthau nityaṃ samutsukaḥ // Rm_10.48{48} //
XXratnml_u:3558: na putro duhitā vāpi nodapādi cirād api // Rm_10.49{49} //
XXratnml_u:3561: tataḥ kaścit suhṛt sādhuḥ saṃbuddhopāsakaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:3562: taṃ gṛhastham upāgatya tathaivaṃ paryyabodhayat // Rm_10.51{51} //
XXratnml_u:3563: sādho kin te viṣādena tad dhīraṃ samupāśraya /
XXratnml_u:3564: yadi te santatau vāṃchā tan me śrutvā tataś cara // Rm_10.52{52} //
XXratnml_u:3565: kim evaṃ devatāḥ pūjya yācase putram ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:3566: yatra daivādhikāratvaṃ tatra kiṃ devatā valaṃ // Rm_10.53{53} //
XXratnml_u:3567: vaṃśārthe yadi te bhaktir asty evaṃ devatāsu tat /
XXratnml_u:3570: nūnaṃ te satsutaḥ śīghram utpatsyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_10.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:3572: puṇyam utpatsyate nūnaṃ tena sadgatim āpnuyāt // Rm_10.56{56} //
XXratnml_u:3573: ye buddhaśaraṇaṃ yānti te labhanti śubhāśayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3574: ye viśuddhāśayā loke saddharmaṃ te śṛṇvanti hi // Rm_10.57{57} //
XXratnml_u:3575: ye saddharmānuśṛṇvan to bodhicittaṃ labhanti te /
XXratnml_u:3576: pralabdhabodhicittā ye te caranti guṇārthinaḥ // Rm_10.58{58} //
XXratnml_u:3577: guṇakāmāś ca ye loke te bhajanti jinātmajān /
XXratnml_u:3579: bodhicaryāratā ye ca na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:3581: evaṃ matvā jinaṃ smṛtvā saddharmaṃ samupāśrayeḥ /
XXratnml_u:3582: tatas te saṃbhaved bhadram ihāmutrāpi sarvataḥ // Rm_10.61{61} //
XXratnml_u:3584: tatheti pratisaṃśrutya saṃbuddhaṃ smartum aichata // Rm_10.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:3586: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā vaṃśam evam ayācata // Rm_10.63{63} //
XXratnml_u:3587: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:3589: tan māṃ karuṇāya dṛṣṭyā draṣṭum arhasi sarvathā // Rm_10.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:3591: tvayā mahyaṃ hitārthāya satputraṃ dātum arhasi // Rm_10.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:3592: ity evaṃ sa gṛhī sādhuḥ putrābhilaṣitaḥ sadā /
XXratnml_u:3593: sabhāryyaḥ sugataṃ smṛtvā tathā nityaṃ samutsukaḥ // Rm_10.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:3594: tadaiva samaye kaścid devaputro divaś cyutaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3596: tataḥ svāpannasatvābhūt sā bhāryā gṛhiṇaḥ satī /
XXratnml_u:3598: pravṛddhagarbhā sā dṛṣṭvā svayaṃ ca garbham ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:3599: dakṣapārśvagataṃ satvaṃ matvā caivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_10.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:3600: nūnaṃ me jāyate garbhe satvo buddhānubhāvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:3601: yad ayaṃ dakṣiṇe vartti tena putro bhavet khalu // Rm_10.70{70} //
XXratnml_u:3602: iti niścitya sā nārī putrotpatyāśayā mudā /
XXratnml_u:3603: svasvāmino pure sthitvā rahasyaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_10.71{71} //
XXratnml_u:3604: dṛṣṭyāryyaputra varddhasva yad ahaṃ garbhiṇī bhave /
XXratnml_u:3605: nūnam ayaṃ bhavet putro yat sthito dakṣiṇodare // Rm_10.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:3606: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3607: daksiṇaṃ vāhum unnamya nandann evam udānayat // Rm_10.73{73} //
XXratnml_u:3609: jātaḥ syān nāmajātā me kulavaṃśasthitir bhavet // Rm_10.74{74} //
XXratnml_u:3610: kṛtyāni ca prakurvīta bibhṛyād bharaṇaṃ prati /
XXratnml_u:3612: yad asmākaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ karma dānādikaṃ śubhaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3613: etat puṇyānubhāvena bhavet kuśalam etayoḥ // Rm_10.76{76} //
XXratnml_u:3614: tatas tena sadā bharttā saha saṃmodacāriṇī /
XXratnml_u:3616: tataḥ sā samaye sūta putraṃ divyātisuṃdaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:3620: tataḥ sā jananī tasya vālakasya karadvayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3624: sakhībhir veditaṃ śrutvā vismito draṣṭum āyayau // Rm_10.81{81} //
XXratnml_u:3626: darśayitvā sutaṃ putraṃ śaṃkitaivaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_10.82{82} //
XXratnml_u:3627: svāmiṃ paśya mahāścaryyam asya hemānvitau karau /
XXratnml_u:3628: tac chubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vā darśayitvā vicāraya // Rm_10.83{83} //
XXratnml_u:3629: iti bhāryyoditaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā taṃ vālakaṃ ciraṃ /
XXratnml_u:3630: dīnāraṃ bhujayoḥ paśyaṃ tasthau savismayānvitaḥ // Rm_10.84{84} //
XXratnml_u:3631: tatas tasya gṛhastho 'sau nimittaṃ jñātum ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:3632: naimittikaṃ samāhūya dārakaṃ tam adarśayat // Rm_10.85{86} //
XXratnml_u:3634: tan nimittaṃ parijñāya tat phalaṃ vaktum arhatha // Rm_10.86{86} //
XXratnml_u:3635: ity ukte tena te sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ śubhaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3636: dīnāre bhujayoś cāpi parijñāyaivam abravīt // Rm_10.87{87} //
XXratnml_u:3637: sādho gṛhapate hy asya dārakasya karadvayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3638: suvarṇalakṣaṇopetaṃ tat te bhadraṃ bhavet khalu // Rm_10.88{88} //
XXratnml_u:3639: tavāyaṃ dārako dātā maheśākhyo bhavet kila /
XXratnml_u:3641: apanīya svayaṃ hastād idaṃ dīnāram arpayet /
XXratnml_u:3642: apanīte punar anyat prādur bhavet tato 'dhikaṃ // Rm_10.90{90} //
XXratnml_u:3643: ity evaṃ taiḥ samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā saṃharṣito gṛhī /
XXratnml_u:3644: tato jātimahaṃ kṛtvā jñātīn evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.91{91} //
XXratnml_u:3647: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayas tathā /
XXratnml_u:3648: dṛṣṭvā tasya nimittāni saṃmatenaivam abruvan // Rm_10.93{93} //
XXratnml_u:3650: tan nāmnā prasiddho 'stu hiraṇyapāṇir ity ayaṃ // Rm_10.94{94} //
XXratnml_u:3652: tatheti tasya putrasya cakre nāmavyavasthitaṃ // Rm_10.95{95} //
XXratnml_u:3654: aṣṭāsu yo 'pi dhātrīṣu tena pitrā samarpitaḥ // Rm_10.96{96} //
XXratnml_u:3656: varddhito 'bhūt kramād āśu hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_10.97{97} //
XXratnml_u:3660: tataḥ sa śikṣituṃ vidyāḥ sadguruṃ samupāśrayat /
XXratnml_u:3661: kramāt teṣāṃ prasādāc ca vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghuḥ // Rm_10.99{99} //
XXratnml_u:3663: svahastaṃ saṃprasāryyaiva dadau dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_10.100{100} //
XXratnml_u:3664: gurubhyo brāhmaṇebhyaś ca yācakebhyaḥ sa dārakaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3665: svahastaṃ saṃprasāryyaiva dadau hemaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_10.101{1} //
XXratnml_u:3667: arthino dhanalubdhāś ca saṃpratīyuḥ samaṃtataḥ // Rm_10.102{2} //
XXratnml_u:3670: tadā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa dṛṣṭvaitān arthino mudā /
XXratnml_u:3671: sarvopakaraṇaiś cāpi sarvāṃs tān samatoṣayat // Rm_10.104{4} //
XXratnml_u:3672: tatas te yācakāḥ sarve tenaiva paritarpitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:3673: yathechayā sukhaṃ bhuktvā pracerur dharmamānasā // Rm_10.105{5} //
XXratnml_u:3674: tathā vīthigataś caivaṃ hastadvayaṃ prasārya saḥ /
XXratnml_u:3675: hemarāśiṃ samutthāpya sarvebhyaḥ pradadau mudā // Rm_10.106{6} //
XXratnml_u:3676: tathā sarve 'pi te lokā dhanāḍhyāḥ sukhino 'bhavan /
XXratnml_u:3677: naiko 'bhūt kṛpano duḥkhī no 'pi kaścid daridritaḥ // Rm_10.107{7} //
XXratnml_u:3680: tadā tasyaiva tat kīrttiḥ sarvatra bhuvaneṣv api /
XXratnml_u:3683: tad yaśaḥ pratilabdhaṃ sa manasaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_10.110{10} //
XXratnml_u:3684: yad asya bhujayor hema cintāmaṇisamaṃ khalu /
XXratnml_u:3687: tad ahaṃ prārthanāṃ kṛtvā pratigṛhṇīya tat maṇiṃ // Rm_10.112{12} //
XXratnml_u:3688: ity asau manasā dhyatvā lobhākṛṣṭo tvarānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3690: taṃ hiraṇyabhujaṃ pretya tad dīnāraṃ samayācata // Rm_10.113{13} //
XXratnml_u:3691: jayo 'stu te sadā sādho dīrghāyuś ca sumaṃgalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3692: tathaiva tvaṃ sadā bhūyā arthināṃ kalpapādapaḥ // Rm_10.114{14} //
XXratnml_u:3694: tadarthaṃ pūrayitvā me cittaṃ harṣaya sarvataḥ // Rm_10.115{15} //
XXratnml_u:3696: dṛṣṭvā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa taṃ vipraṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_10.116{16} //
XXratnml_u:3697: sādhu vipra prasīda tvaṃ yadarthaṃ samupāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:3698: tadarthaṃ saṃpradatvādya harṣayiṣyāmi te manaḥ // Rm_10.117{17} //
XXratnml_u:3699: tac chaṃkā mā kṛthā hy atra yad yat te hṛdi rocate /
XXratnml_u:3700: tat tan nūnaṃ pradāsye te tad vadasva yad īhitaṃ // Rm_10.118{18} //
XXratnml_u:3702: svastīty āśīrvaco datvā tad dīnāram ayācata // Rm_10.119{19} //
XXratnml_u:3704: tad dīnāraṃ pradatvā me cittaṃ saṃharṣayārthadaḥ // Rm_10.120{20} //
XXratnml_u:3705: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā tat pitāsau suvismitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3706: savandhujñātimitras taṃ putram evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.121{21} //
XXratnml_u:3707: śṛṇu putra mayā proktaṃ tavaiva hitakāraṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3708: yadi te svāminī prītis tat karttavyaṃ hi sarvathā // Rm_10.122{22} //
XXratnml_u:3709: tvaṃ hi putra mayā labdhaḥ saṃbuddhasyānubhāvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:3710: tat saṃbuddhaśāsane kāryyam eva dātu samarhasi // Rm_10.123{23} //
XXratnml_u:3711: yac cedan bhujayor jātaṃ dīnāraṃ maṇisaṃnibhaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3712: tad api sugatasyaiva prabhāvān manyatāṃ khalu // Rm_10.124{24} //
XXratnml_u:3713: yac cedaṃ te karodbhūtaṃ jīvitaṃ sahajendriyaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3714: tat svakarāt samuddhṛtya kathaṃ dadyā dvijātaye // Rm_10.125{25} //
XXratnml_u:3715: yadīdaṃ dāsyate hastāt samuddhṛtya valād api /
XXratnml_u:3716: tadā te jīvitaṃ vāpi sahānena vrajaṃ khalu // Rm_10.126{26} //
XXratnml_u:3717: tasmād evaṃ parijñāya yadi te jīvita priyaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3718: tad evaṃ sahajaṃ hema mā pradāhi dvijātaye // Rm_10.127{27} //
XXratnml_u:3719: tad anyad dīyatāṃ tasmai yad yad vastu samīchitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3720: idaṃ tu sarvathānyasmai dātavyaṃ naiva yatnataḥ // Rm_10.128{28} //
XXratnml_u:3722: tena yadā paribhraṣṭas tadā kiṃ tena manyase // Rm_10.129{29} //
XXratnml_u:3723: yenāpi ca tvayā sarve yācakāḥ saṃpratarpitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:3725: tac cintāmaṇisāmānyaṃ kathaṃ dātuṃ samichasi // Rm_10.130{30} //
XXratnml_u:3726: yat tvayā sukṛtaṃ karma prakṛtvā puṇyam ācitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3727: nūnaṃ tasya vipākatvaṃ bhuṃjayos te pratiṣṭhitaṃ // Rm_10.131{31} //
XXratnml_u:3728: tasmād idaṃ mahāratnaṃ kasmiñcin mā pradīyatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:3729: datvā tv idaṃ mahāratnaṃ kim anyal labdham ichasi // Rm_10.132{32} //
XXratnml_u:3730: yadi tv idaṃ mahāratnaṃ dātum evaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3731: saṃpradehi jinendrāya tat puṇyam akṣayaṃ vahuṃ // Rm_10.133{33} //
XXratnml_u:3733: puṇyena dīyate kīrttiṃ nirvṛtiṃ ca samāpnuyāt // Rm_10.134{34} //
XXratnml_u:3734: yadi puṇye 'sti te vāṃchā tad buddhaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:3735: dehi buddhānuśāsinyā tad dānaṃ hi mahatphalaṃ // Rm_10.135{35} //
XXratnml_u:3736: tato nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā kṛtvā saṃbodhisādhanaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3737: kramād bodhicariṃ prāpte nirvṛtiṃ vā samāpnuyāḥ // Rm_10.136{36} //
XXratnml_u:3738: iti pitrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāsau hemabhṛt sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:3739: tatheti niścayaṃ kṛtvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.137{37} //
XXratnml_u:3740: satyaṃ tāta tvayādiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ hitam eva me /
XXratnml_u:3741: tasmāt tathā cariṣyāmi tvadājñāṃ śirasā vahan // Rm_10.138{38} //
XXratnml_u:3742: kiṃ tu satyaṃ mayā proktām idaṃ dātuṃ dvijātaye /
XXratnml_u:3743: tat katham anyathā kṛtvā puṇyam eva samāpnuyāt // Rm_10.139{39} //
XXratnml_u:3744: tat satyaṃ pūraṇe tāta pradadyāmi mamātmanaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3745: atha na dāsyate hy atra kiyat kālaṃ hi jīvitaṃ // Rm_10.140{40} //
XXratnml_u:3747: tathaivaṃ sahajīvena vinakṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_10.141{41} //
XXratnml_u:3749: tathaivaṃ saṃpradatvāsmai punaḥ prāpsyāmi te 'dhikaṃ // Rm_10.142{42} //
XXratnml_u:3751: tathā satyānubhāvena punar anyaj janiṣyate // Rm_10.143{43} //
XXratnml_u:3752: dharmeṇa tuṣyate buddho mūlaṃ dharmasya satyavāk /
XXratnml_u:3753: tat satyapāraṇārthena dāsyāmy aham idaṃ maṇiṃ // Rm_10.144{44} //
XXratnml_u:3754: satyaṃ vinā na phullante puṇyāni prakṛtāny api /
XXratnml_u:3756: satyena varddhate dharmaṃ dharmeṇa pālyate naraḥ /
XXratnml_u:3757: dharmiṣṭhaḥ sadgatiṃ yāti tasmāt satyaṃ mahadvalī // Rm_10.146{46} //
XXratnml_u:3759: sarvathāsmai pradāsyāmi mā kṛthās taṃ nivāraṇaṃ // Rm_10.147{47} //
XXratnml_u:3761: iti putravacaḥ śrutvā pitā sa vismayānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3762: tathety abhyanumoditvā tasthau tūṣṇī vilokayan // Rm_10.148{48} //
XXratnml_u:3764: tad dīnāraṃ sahasotkṛtya viprāya pradadau mudā // Rm_10.149{49} //
XXratnml_u:3765: tat pradattam asau vipraḥ pratigṛhya pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3766: datvāśīrvacanaṃ tasmai svagṛhaṃ sahasā yayau // Rm_10.150{50} //
XXratnml_u:3770: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sarve te lokā āśu suvismitāḥ // Rm_10.152{52} //
XXratnml_u:3771: tato hiraṇyapāṇiḥ sa evaṃ lokān praharṣayan /
XXratnml_u:3774: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ draṣṭuṃ vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_10.154{54} //
XXratnml_u:3780: natvā pādau munes tasya purastāt samupāśrayan // Rm_10.157{57} //
XXratnml_u:3785: bhadanta dātum ichāmi saṃghebhyo bhojanaṃ khalu /
XXratnml_u:3786: tad ājñāṃ dehi me śāsta yadi te 'sti kṛpā mayi // Rm_10.160{60} //
XXratnml_u:3788: sa ānaṃdaḥ samālokya dārakaṃ taṃ samādiśat // Rm_10.161{61} //
XXratnml_u:3789: sādhu vatsa mahābhāgyād bhadram ālocitaṃ tvayā /
XXratnml_u:3790: yady atra dāsyate bhojyaṃ kārṣāpaṇaṃ pradīyatāṃ // Rm_10.162{62} //
XXratnml_u:3791: evaṃkṛte tu te vatsa maṃgalaṃ sarvadā bhavet /
XXratnml_u:3792: ataś ca durgatiṃ hitvā sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_10.163{63} //
XXratnml_u:3794: svayaṃ hastau prasāryyaiva hemarāśiṃ vyadhāt punaḥ // Rm_10.164{64} //
XXratnml_u:3795: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavaḥ sarve vismitāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:3797: taddravyaiḥ sādhayāmāsa bhojyāni surasāni ca // Rm_10.165{65} //
XXratnml_u:3798: tataḥ sa dārako bhojyais taiḥ praṇītasusādhitaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:3801: sarvasaṃghaṃ praṇamyaivaṃ punas tasthau kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_10.167{67} //
XXratnml_u:3803: āryyasatyaṃ samāyuktaṃ dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_10.168{68} //
XXratnml_u:3807: saṃbuddhasagaṇaṃ natvā svagehaṃ harṣito yayau // Rm_10.170{70} //
XXratnml_u:3808: tatra sarvaṃ sa tadvṛttaṃ pitror ākhyāya harṣitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3811: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me hitaṃ mayi yadīcchatha // Rm_10.172{72} //
XXratnml_u:3812: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā svātmajaṃ sa pitāvadat /
XXratnml_u:3813: mā kṛthā sahasā putra pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ // Rm_10.173{73} //
XXratnml_u:3815: tvaṃ vṛddhimān mahādātā tat pravrajyāṃ kutaś careḥ // Rm_10.174{74} //
XXratnml_u:3816: kiṃ vāpyate vivāhas tvaṃ daharaś ca kumārikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3817: pravrajyā duṣkaraṃ sthānaṃ tat kathaṃ pracaret sutaḥ // Rm_10.175{75} //
XXratnml_u:3818: tat tāvat tvaṃ yuvā putra vivāhitvā kulastriyaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3819: bhuktvā saukhyaṃ yathākāmaṃ gṛhe dharmaṃ samācara // Rm_10.176{76} //
XXratnml_u:3821: kuladharmaṃ pratisthāpya tataḥ pravraja vārddhikaḥ // Rm_10.177{77} //
XXratnml_u:3822: yadā vṛddho daridraś ca pravrajyāṃ hi tadā caret /
XXratnml_u:3823: yāvad yuvā samṛddhaś ca tāvat tvaṃ pravraja kathaṃ // Rm_10.178{78} //
XXratnml_u:3825: tadetadā kathaṃ putra pravrajyāvratam ācareḥ // Rm_10.179{79} //
XXratnml_u:3826: ity etad duṣkaraṃ matvā pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3827: sarvathā tvaṃ vinirvārya kuladharmaṃ samācara // Rm_10.180{80} //
XXratnml_u:3828: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ imu putra bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3832: bodhayan pitaraṃ dharme punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_10.182{82} //
XXratnml_u:3833: satyam eva tathā tāta yad etad bhāṣyate tvayā /
XXratnml_u:3834: tathāpi śrūyatāṃ tāta yad abhiprāyakaṃ mama // Rm_10.183{83} //
XXratnml_u:3835: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi bhaṃguraṃ /
XXratnml_u:3836: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca kṣaṇasaṃpad ghanopamaṃ // Rm_10.184{84} //
XXratnml_u:3838: pravrajyāvratam āśritya prāptum ichāmi nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_10.185{85} //
XXratnml_u:3839: api ca dullabhaṃ janma mānuṣaṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ /
XXratnml_u:3840: sarveṣām api jantūnāṃ maraṇaṃ sarvathā dhruvaṃ // Rm_10.186{86} //
XXratnml_u:3842: vinā dharmānubhāvena kathaṃ sadgatim āpnuyāt // Rm_10.187{87} //
XXratnml_u:3843: saṃbuddho 'pi sasaṃgho 'yaṃ sthāsyati na sadeha ca /
XXratnml_u:3844: anyatrāpi vrajen nūnaṃ nirvṛtiṃ vā gamiṣyati // Rm_10.188{88} //
XXratnml_u:3848: sarvalokāś ca kāmāṃdhā bhaveyuḥ kleśamāninaḥ // Rm_10.190{90} //
XXratnml_u:3849: tada dharmānusaṃvṛttau matiḥ kasyāpi no caret /
XXratnml_u:3850: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhartuṃ kaḥ samartho bhaviṣyati // Rm_10.191{91} //
XXratnml_u:3852: aviśodhitacittātmā na yāyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_10.192{92} //
XXratnml_u:3854: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dharttuṃ ichāmi tāta sāṃprataṃ // Rm_10.193{93} //
XXratnml_u:3855: tad yadi me hitaṃ draṣṭum ichasi tāta sarvadā /
XXratnml_u:3856: tad anujñāṃ samādātum arhasi mātra cāraye // Rm_10.194{94} //
XXratnml_u:3857: iti puroditaṃ śrutvā pitā sa paribodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3859: tadā tajjananī cāsau dṛṣṭvā taṃ sutam ātmajaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3860: snehād aśru vimocantī nivārayitum abravīt // Rm_10.196{96} //
XXratnml_u:3861: hā putra katham ekānte māṃ vihāya kva yāsyase /
XXratnml_u:3862: mā putra sahasā gacha kiṃcit kālaṃ vinodaya // Rm_10.197{97} //
XXratnml_u:3863: yāvaj jīvāmy ahaṃ tāta tāvan mā gāḥ kuhāpi ca /
XXratnml_u:3865: mṛtāyāṃ mayi bho putra tadā vrajasva vāṃchite // Rm_10.198{98} //
XXratnml_u:3866: acireṇaiva māṃ mṛtyur grahīṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3867: tāvad eva gṛhe sthitvā dānaṃ kurvan sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_10.199{99} //
XXratnml_u:3869: natvā tāṃ jananīm evaṃ bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_10.200{100} //
XXratnml_u:3870: yat tvayāmve rudanty evaṃ mṛtyunāma prakīrtitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3871: tena me coditaṃ cittaṃ pravrajyāvratasādhane // Rm_10.201{1} //
XXratnml_u:3872: dhruvaṃ janmavatāṃ mṛtyur mṛtānāṃ janma ca dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3873: parivarttini saṃsāre mṛtaḥ ko hi na jāyate // Rm_10.202{2} //
XXratnml_u:3874: dharmiṣṭho vīryāvāṃś cāpi maraṇaṃ yāti sarvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:3875: pāpiṣṭho nighnitaś cāpi maraṇaṃ yāti sarvataḥ // Rm_10.203{3} //
XXratnml_u:3876: dharmiṣṭhaḥ satsukhaṃ bhuktvā mṛto yāty eva sadgatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:3877: pāpiṣṭho duḥkhatāṃ bhuktvā mṛto gachati durgatiṃ // Rm_10.204{4} //
XXratnml_u:3879: tadā saṃtyajyate sarvair vaṃdhumitrajanair api // Rm_10.205{5} //
XXratnml_u:3880: tadā na vidyate ko 'pi hitakārī sahānugaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3881: dharma ekaḥ sahāyaḥ syāt sarvatrāpi hitārthakṛt // Rm_10.206{6} //
XXratnml_u:3882: tasmāt mātaḥ prayatnena karttavyaṃ dharmam ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:3883: dharmeṇa rakṣyate sarva ihāmutra sahāpi hi // Rm_10.207{7} //
XXratnml_u:3885: dharmeṇa sudhṛtāḥ satvā nimagnā duḥkhasāgare // Rm_10.208{8} //
XXratnml_u:3886: dharmeṇa jīyate duṣṭo dharmeṇa jīyate kaliḥ /
XXratnml_u:3887: dharmeṇa jīyate rāgo mṛtyur dharmeṇa jīyate // Rm_10.209{9} //
XXratnml_u:3888: dharmeṇa sukule janma lakṣmī dharmeṇa sthīyate /
XXratnml_u:3889: vidyāyaśo 'rthamoksāś ca prāpyante dharmataḥ khalu // Rm_10.210{10} //
XXratnml_u:3892: yam āśritya mahāsatvā jitvā kleśagaṇān laghuḥ /
XXratnml_u:3893: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya vrajanti nirvṛtiṃ parāṃ // Rm_10.212{12} //
XXratnml_u:3894: iti matvā hi te sarve bhikṣavo bhavanispṛhāḥ /
XXratnml_u:3897: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā me nātra kāryo viṣāditaḥ // Rm_10.214{14} //
XXratnml_u:3899: yadi na dīyate 'nujñā tad api no viyogataḥ /
XXratnml_u:3900: akasmān mṛtyunā ghrāya grasiṣyati puro hi naḥ // Rm_10.215{15} //
XXratnml_u:3901: tadā kiṃ te kariṣyāmi mamāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi /
XXratnml_u:3902: kṛtvānuśocanāṃ caiva yāsyāmo maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_10.216{16} //
XXratnml_u:3903: iti mātaḥ parijñāya tad anujñāṃ pradehi me /
XXratnml_u:3904: viṣādaṃ mā kṛthā atra prasādīnī bhavet prabhu // Rm_10.217{17} //
XXratnml_u:3905: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityam ihāmutrāpi saṃbhavet /
XXratnml_u:3906: ahaṃ ca saugataṃ dharmaṃ dhṛtvā nirvṛtim āpnuyāṃ // Rm_10.218{18} //
XXratnml_u:3910: tayoś ca caraṇe natvā sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_10.220{20} //
XXratnml_u:3914: āśu jetavanaṃ gatvā vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_10.222{22} //
XXratnml_u:3916: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_10.223{23} //
XXratnml_u:3917: namas te bhagavac chāsta bhavatāṃ caraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:3918: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ datvā brahmacaryaṃ pradehi me // Rm_10.224{24} //
XXratnml_u:3920: ehi bhikṣo kumāra tvaṃ brahmacaryaṃ carehi sa // Rm_10.225{25} //
XXratnml_u:3921: iti prokto munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
XXratnml_u:3926: vyāyacchad ghaṭamānaś ca samādhiṣu samāhitaḥ // Rm_10.228{28} //
XXratnml_u:3927: tad idaṃ paṃcagaṃdaṃ ca bhavacakraṃ calācalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3929: bhiṃdan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ prāpya vidyāḥ śubhaṃkarāḥ /
XXratnml_u:3938: pūjyo mānyo 'bhivaṃdyaś ca babhūva sa hiraṇyabhṛt /
XXratnml_u:3939: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ yatiṃ // Rm_10.234{34} //
XXratnml_u:3940: vismitāḥ śrīghanaṃ natvā paprachus tasya karmatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:3941: bhagavan kena dharmeṇa hiraṇyapāṇir ayaṃ sudhīḥ // Rm_10.235{35} //
XXratnml_u:3942: sarvārthino hi saṃtarpya sākṣād arhan bhavaty api /
XXratnml_u:3943: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān tān tathābravīt // Rm_10.236{36} //
XXratnml_u:3945: anena yat kṛtaṃ karma tan mayā kathyate 'dhunā // Rm_10.237{37} //
XXratnml_u:3949: bodhicaryāṃ samādiśya kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat // Rm_10.239{39} //
XXratnml_u:3951: tadā rājā kṛkī nāma matvā taṃ nirvṛtiṃ gataṃ // Rm_10.240{40} //
XXratnml_u:3953: tatas taddhāturatnāni garbha āropya sādarāt // Rm_10.241{41} //
XXratnml_u:3954: hemaratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kārayām āsa sa prabhuḥ /
XXratnml_u:3955: tat susiddhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sadvidhānair mahotsavaiḥ // Rm_10.242{42} //
XXratnml_u:3956: mahaś cāpi tadā tatra sthāpayitvā bhajan nṛpaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3959: tataḥ sa pādayor natvā praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_10.244{44} //
XXratnml_u:3961: yat puṇyaṃ ca vipākena jāyeyaṃ sukule sadā // Rm_10.245{45} //
XXratnml_u:3963: evaṃvidhaṃ ca śāstāram ārogya samupāśritaḥ // Rm_10.246{46} //
XXratnml_u:3964: etad dharmaṃ samāsādya prāpnuyāṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:3966: hiraṇyapāṇir ayaṃ dātā bhavaty arhaṃ sa sāṃprataṃ /
XXratnml_u:3967: evaṃ sarve 'pi saṃsāre bhuṃjate karmajaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_10.248{48} //
XXratnml_u:3969: yenaivaṃ yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhuṃjyate phalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3970: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_10.249{49} //
XXratnml_u:3971: śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ vāpi bhuktaṃ tu kṣīyate khalu /
XXratnml_u:3972: nāgnibhir dahyate karma klidyate nodakair api // Rm_10.250{50} //
XXratnml_u:3973: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate nāpi bhūmiṣu kṣīyate na hi /
XXratnml_u:3974: anyathāpi bhaven naiva saṃsāre karmaṇo gatiḥ // Rm_10.251{51} //
XXratnml_u:3975: śubhasya śubhataiva syāt kṛṣṇasya kṛṣṇataiva hi /
XXratnml_u:3976: miśrasya miśritaiva syād anyathā na sadā bhavet // Rm_10.252{52} //
XXratnml_u:3977: evaṃ matvātha saṃsāre caritavyaṃ sadā śubhaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3978: na praṇasyaṃti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_10.253{53} //
XXratnml_u:3979: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti prāṇināṃ khalu /
XXratnml_u:3980: ity asau bhagavān buddhaḥ satkarmadeśanāmataiḥ // Rm_10.254{54} //
XXratnml_u:3981: tarpayan sa kalāṃl lokān tato viśrāntam ādadhau /
XXratnml_u:3982: iti śāstroditaṃ śrutvā sarve te bhikṣusāṃghikāḥ // Rm_10.255{55} //
XXratnml_u:3983: śubheṣv eva sadā nityaṃ saṃpraceruḥ samāhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:3984: mahārāja tvayāpy evaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_10.256{56} //
XXratnml_u:3985: bodhayitvā prajāñ caivaṃ sthāpanīyāḥ śubhe sadā /
XXratnml_u:3986: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhavet khalu /
XXratnml_u:3987: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya saṃbodhipadam āpuṇyāḥ // Rm_10.257{57} //
XXratnml_u:3988: iti tena samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa nṛpatīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:3990: śṛṇvanti ye śrāvayantīha yaś ca hiraṇyapāṇer avadānam etat /
XXratnml_u:3991: te kleśamuktāḥ sugatānubhaktāḥ prayānti nūnaṃ sugatālayeṣu //
XXratnml_u:3994: XI Hastakāvadāna athāśoko mahīpālaḥ kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:3995: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā bhūyo 'py evam abhāṣata // Rm_11.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:3996: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:3997: yathā te guruṇākhyātaṃ tathā me vaktum arhasi // Rm_11.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:3999: upagupto mahābhijñas taṃ nṛpaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_11.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:4000: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4001: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tad anumodanāṃ kuru // Rm_11.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:4006: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ upāsakaiś ca cailakaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:4007: bodhisatvair mahāsatvais tadanyaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // Rm_11.7{7} //
XXratnml_u:4009: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ prayayur bodhikāminaḥ // Rm_11.8{8} //
XXratnml_u:4011: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇo janāḥ // Rm_11.9{9} //
XXratnml_u:4012: amātyāḥ sādhavaḥ paurā dhaninaś ca mahājanāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4013: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca tathānye sarvajātikāḥ // Rm_11.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:4015: taṃ buddhaṃ sugataṃ nāthaṃ pūjayitvā samaṃtataḥ // Rm_11.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:4018: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:4023: āsīd gṛhapatiḥ prāḍhyaḥ kuveravat samṛddhimān // Rm_11.15{15} //
XXratnml_u:4029: tasyāsau ramaṇī bhāryā saṃvṛttā garbhiṇī satī /
XXratnml_u:4030: asūta samaye putraṃ prāsādikaṃ manoharaṃ // Rm_11.18{18} //
XXratnml_u:4031: sa ca jātismaro vālo jātamātraḥ svakau bhujau /
XXratnml_u:4033: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
XXratnml_u:4034: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.20{20} //
XXratnml_u:4036: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sā mātā trāsitā vismitābhavat // Rm_11.21{21} //
XXratnml_u:4037: kim etad iti saṃtrastā dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:4038: bharttāraṃ sahasāhūya agram enam adarśayat // Rm_11.22{22} //
XXratnml_u:4039: tadāsau dārakaś cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ janakaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:4040: hastau dṛṣṭvā tathāliṃgya cuṃvayitvā caivam abravīt // Rm_11.23{23} //
XXratnml_u:4041: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
XXratnml_u:4042: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:4043: iti saṃdarśayaṃ hastāv evaṃ cāpy avadac chiśuḥ /
XXratnml_u:4044: dārako 'sau punaḥ supto nidrāṃ bheje yad ichayā // Rm_11.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:4045: tato 'sau janako 'py etad dṛṣṭvā śrutvā pravismitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4046: kiṃ etad iti sāśaṃkā jñātin āhūya cābravīt /
XXratnml_u:4048: tan nimittaṃ nirīkṣyaitat satyaṃ me vaktum arhatha /
XXratnml_u:4049: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayo mudā /
XXratnml_u:4050: tat putraṃ dārakaṃ draṣṭuṃ tat koṣṭhaṃ samupādiśat /
XXratnml_u:4051: tathāsau dārakaś caivaṃ tān dṛṣṭvā samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:4053: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā /
XXratnml_u:4054: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:4055: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata sarvadā /
XXratnml_u:4056: evaṃ saṃdarśayaṃ hastau vacanaṃ saṃvadaṃ śiśuḥ /
XXratnml_u:4057: dārako 'sau punaḥ supto nidrāṃ bheje yad ichayā /
XXratnml_u:4058: etat te jñātayo dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sarve 'pi vismitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4059: kim etad iti bhāṣanto vabhūvuḥ parisaṃkitāḥ // Rm_11.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:4060: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve vijñāya tasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4061: saṃmīlya tam upāmaṃtrya gṛhasthaḥ pratiharṣitaḥ // Rm_11.27{27} //
XXratnml_u:4062: tasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā punar evam avocata /
XXratnml_u:4066: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te jñātayas tataḥ // Rm_11.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:4067: saṃmīlya saṃmataṃ kṛtvā taṃ gṛhasthaṃ samabruvan /
XXratnml_u:4068: yad ayaṃ te suto vālo jātamātraḥ svakau bhujau // Rm_11.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:4069: paśyan āliṃgyā cuṃvitva mudā caivaṃ prabhāṣate /
XXratnml_u:4070: tad ayaṃ dārako nāmnā hastaka iti viśrutaḥ // Rm_11.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:4073: tena nāmnā prasiddhena prathayām āsa taṃ sutaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4076: tatas tāsāṃ prayatnaiḥ sa pathyopacāraṇaiḥ kramāt /
XXratnml_u:4077: dine dine pravṛddho 'bhūd hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_11.34{34} //
XXratnml_u:4078: evaṃ sa hastakas tābhiḥ pālyamānaḥ pravarddhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4079: kumāraḥ sakhibhiḥ sārddhaṃ krīḍāsthānaṃ gato 'ramat // Rm_11.35{35} //
XXratnml_u:4080: tatra teṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ ca hastako 'sau puraḥsthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4081: hastāv āliṃgya saṃrakṣya cuṃvitvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_11.36{36} //
XXratnml_u:4082: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
XXratnml_u:4083: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.37{37} //
XXratnml_u:4085: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit // Rm_11.38{38} //
XXratnml_u:4086: iti saṃrakṣitau hastau tenaivaṃ ca prabhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4089: guruṃ samyag upāśritya vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghu // Rm_11.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:4090: tatra teṣāṃ guruṇāṃ ca hastako 'sau puraḥsthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4091: hastau dṛṣṭvā samāliṃgya cuṃvitvā caivam abravīt // Rm_11.41{41} //
XXratnml_u:4092: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
XXratnml_u:4093: aho labdhav imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā // Rm_11.42{42} //
XXratnml_u:4094: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:4095: kharāṃ vācaṃ ca mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit // Rm_11.43{43} //
XXratnml_u:4096: iti dṛṣṭvā ca saṃśrutya sarve te guravo 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:4097: sarve śiṣya gaṇāś cāpi vabhūvur vismayānvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4098: yasmiṃś ca samaye tatra deśe bhayaupakrame /
XXratnml_u:4101: tadāsau hastako 'py evaṃ samudbhrāntaḥ svakau bhujau /
XXratnml_u:4103: aho vatādya me hastau sucireṇa samudbhavau /
XXratnml_u:4104: aho labdhāv imau hastau sucireṇa mayādhunā /
XXratnml_u:4105: bhavanto 'rhatsu mā cittaṃ dūṣayata kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:4106: kharāṃ vācaiva mārhatsu niścārayata keṣu cit /
XXratnml_u:4107: evaṃ hastau susaṃrakṣya tenaivaṃ ca prabhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4108: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca te sarve lokā āsan suvismitāḥ // Rm_11.44{44} //
XXratnml_u:4116: pādau tasya muner natvā dharmaṃ śrotuṃ puro 'viśat // Rm_11.48{48} //
XXratnml_u:4123: saṃbuddhasugataṃ natvā svagehaṃ sahasā yayau // Rm_11.52{52} //
XXratnml_u:4127: tad anujñāṃ pradattaṃ me hitaṃ mayi yadīchatha // Rm_11.54{54} //
XXratnml_u:4129: mā kṛthāḥ sahasā putra pravrajyāsādhane manaḥ // Rm_11.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:4130: pravrajyā duṣkaraṃ sthānaṃ tad anyadvratam ācara /
XXratnml_u:4133: kiṃcid duḥkhe 'nabhijñāya tat pravrajyāṃ careḥ kathaṃ // Rm_11.57{57} //
XXratnml_u:4134: tad yāvad yauvanaṃ dehaṃ yāvat saṃpac ca te gṛhe /
XXratnml_u:4135: tāvad gehe sukhaṃ bhuktvā gṛhī dharmaṃ samācara // Rm_11.58{58} //
XXratnml_u:4136: yadā vṛddho daridro ca pravrajyāyāṃ tadā cara /
XXratnml_u:4138: yāvad yuvā samṛddhaś ca tāvat tvaṃ pravrajeḥ kathaṃ // Rm_11.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:4140: tad etasmiṃ kathaṃ putra pravrajyāvratam ācareḥ // Rm_11.60{60} //
XXratnml_u:4141: ity etad duṣkaraṃ matvā pravrajyācaraṇe manaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4143: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityam ihāmutrāpi sarvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4145: iti vākyaṃ pituḥ śrutvā hastako 'sau viśaṃkitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4146: pitarau bodhayan dharme punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_11.63{63} //
XXratnml_u:4147: satyam etat tathā tāta tvayaivaṃ satyam ucyate /
XXratnml_u:4148: atrāpi śrūyatāṃ tāta mamābhiprāyam ucyatāṃ // Rm_11.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:4149: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi caṃcaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:4150: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca saṃpac cāpi ghanopamā // Rm_11.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:4152: pravrajyāvratam ādhāya prāptum ichāmi sadgatiṃ // Rm_11.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:4153: api ca janma mānuṣyaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ /
XXratnml_u:4154: tatrāpi maraṇaṃ nityaṃ purataḥ sarvasaṃmukhaṃ // Rm_11.67{67} //
XXratnml_u:4156: vinā dharmānucāreṇa sadgatiṃ katham āpnuyāṃ // Rm_11.68{68} //
XXratnml_u:4158: ato 'nyatrāpi yāyād vā nirvṛtiṃ cāvrajet khalu // Rm_11.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:4159: saṃbuddhe nirvṛtiṃ yāte saddharma lapsyate kutaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4162: sarve satvāś ca kāmārttā bhaveyuḥ kleśabhāginaḥ // Rm_11.71{71} //
XXratnml_u:4163: tadā dharmānucāreṣu buddhiḥ kasya kathaṃ caret /
XXratnml_u:4164: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ sthātuṃ kaḥ samartho bhavet tadā // Rm_11.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:4165: na ca saṃśuddhyate cittaṃ pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ vinā /
XXratnml_u:4166: aviśodhitacitte hi naiva yāyāc chivāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_11.73{73} //
XXratnml_u:4167: tac cittapariśuddhyarthaṃ nirvṛte ca yad āptaye /
XXratnml_u:4168: pravrajyāvratam ādātum ichāmi tāta sāṃprataṃ // Rm_11.74{74} //
XXratnml_u:4169: yad atra yadi me tāta hitaṃ kartuṃ samichasi /
XXratnml_u:4170: pravrajyāsādhane 'nujñāṃ dātuṃ me prārhasi drutaṃ // Rm_11.75{75} //
XXratnml_u:4173: tathety abhyanumoditvā tad anujñāṃ vyasṛjata // Rm_11.76{76} //
XXratnml_u:4174: tac chrutvā jananī cāsau dṛṣṭvā taṃ putram ātmajaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4176: hā putra katham ekānte māṃ vihāya kva yāsyasi /
XXratnml_u:4177: sahasā putra mā kārṣī pravrajyācaritaṃ manaḥ // Rm_11.78{78} //
XXratnml_u:4178: yāvaj jīvāmy ahaṃ jīva tāvan mā pravrajātmaje /
XXratnml_u:4179: mṛtāyāṃ mayi putra tvaṃ pravrajasva yathechayā // Rm_11.79{79} //
XXratnml_u:4180: acireṇa hi me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4181: tāvad eva gṛhe dharmaṃ kurvan bhuktvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_11.80{80} //
XXratnml_u:4182: iti mātur vacaḥ śrutvā putro 'sau paricoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4183: mātaraṃ tāṃ praṇatvaivaṃ bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_11.81{81} //
XXratnml_u:4184: yat tvayāmve rudanty evaṃ mṛtyunāmātra kīrttyate /
XXratnml_u:4185: tena me preritaṃ cittaṃ pravrajyāvratadhāraṇe // Rm_11.82{82} //
XXratnml_u:4187: jāto na mriyate ko hi mṛtaḥ kaś ca na jāyate // Rm_11.83{83} //
XXratnml_u:4188: gṛhastho dharmakṛc cāpi yāty evaṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4189: brahmacārī vanastho 'pi yāty evaṃ maraṇaṃ khalu // Rm_11.84{84} //
XXratnml_u:4191: kṛcchreṇa sādhayan dharmaṃ mṛto yāti surālayaṃ // Rm_11.85{85} //
XXratnml_u:4192: yāvad dharmaphalaṃ svarge tāvad bhuktvā sukhaṃ vaset /
XXratnml_u:4193: tato dharmaphale hīne svargāc cyuto yated adhaḥ // Rm_11.86{86} //
XXratnml_u:4195: vividhāni ca duḥkhāni bhuktvā jīvaṃ ciraṃ vaset // Rm_11.87{87} //
XXratnml_u:4196: yāvan na jāyate tasya puṇyānumodanā matau /
XXratnml_u:4197: tāvat karmajaduḥkhāni prabhuktvā narake caret // Rm_11.88{88} //
XXratnml_u:4198: yadā tu jāyate tasya triratnasmaraṇe matiḥ /
XXratnml_u:4201: tadā taṃ sugataṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmākaraiḥ parispṛśet // Rm_11.90{90} //
XXratnml_u:4204: tatrāpi yadi dharmeṣu caran nityam ataṃdritaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4205: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya prayāyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_11.92{92} //
XXratnml_u:4206: evaṃ māta gṛhastho hi kṛtvāpi dharmam ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:4208: sukhaduḥkhāni saṃbhuktvā saṃsāre carate bhraman // Rm_11.93{93} //
XXratnml_u:4212: tan mamātra tvayā māta naiva kāryā nivāraṇā // Rm_11.95{95} //
XXratnml_u:4213: yadi puṇye 'sti te vāṃchā tad anujñāśu dīyatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:4214: yadi na dīyate 'nujñā tad api nau viyogatā // Rm_11.96{96} //
XXratnml_u:4215: akasmāt mṛtyur āgatya bhaviṣyati purāpi nau /
XXratnml_u:4216: tadā te kiṃ kariṣyāmi kiṃ mamāpi kariṣyasi // Rm_11.97{97} //
XXratnml_u:4218: iti mātar viditvā tvaṃ tadanujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_11.98{98} //
XXratnml_u:4219: vighnatāṃ mā kṛthā hy atra dharme bhavānumodinī /
XXratnml_u:4220: tathā cec chubhatā nityam ihāmutrāpi te bhavet // Rm_11.99{99} //
XXratnml_u:4221: ahaṃ ca saugatiṃ caryāṃ kṛtvā yāsyāmi nirvṛtīṃ /
XXratnml_u:4222: iti putroditaṃ śrutvā matāsau paribodhitā // Rm_11.100{100} //
XXratnml_u:4225: tayoḥ pādān praṇatvaivaṃ sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_11.102{2} //
XXratnml_u:4227: sarvān atithivargāṃś ca vāṃchitārthaiḥ pratoṣayan // Rm_11.103{3} //
XXratnml_u:4229: jetavanaṃ pragatvā sa vihāraṃ samupāviśat // Rm_11.104{4} //
XXratnml_u:4232: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:4233: tat pravrajyāṃ vrataṃ dehi cariṣye brahmasaṃvaraṃ // Rm_11.106{6} //
XXratnml_u:4234: iti tenārthite buddho bhagavān tam abhāṣata /
XXratnml_u:4235: ehi bhikṣo kumārātra cara brahmavrataṃ varaṃ // Rm_11.107{7} //
XXratnml_u:4236: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
XXratnml_u:4237: samyak pravrājayitvāśu svasaṃghe taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_11.108{8} //
XXratnml_u:4241: vyāyaccha ghaṭamānaś ca samādhiṣu samāhitaḥ // Rm_11.110{10} //
XXratnml_u:4242: tad idaṃ paṃcagaṃḍaṃ ca bhavacakraṃ calācalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4244: bhindan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ prāpya vidyāgaṇāḥ śivāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4246: pratisaṃvidguṇāḥ prāpya jitvā kleśagaṇāṃ yatiḥ // Rm_11.112{12} //
XXratnml_u:4254: sahasā kleśagaṇāñ jitvā sākṣād arhan bhavaty api // Rm_11.116{16} //
XXratnml_u:4255: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ yatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:4256: vismitāḥ śrīghanaṃ natvā paprachus tasya karmatāṃ // Rm_11.117{17} //
XXratnml_u:4258: yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tat samādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_11.118{18} //
XXratnml_u:4259: iti te bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:4260: tān svaśiṣyān yatīn bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryābravīt tathā // Rm_11.119{19} //
XXratnml_u:4261: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarve yūyaṃ hi vismayānvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4262: yad anena kṛtaṃ karma tan mayā vaḥ pracakṣyatāṃ // Rm_11.120{20} //
XXratnml_u:4263: purāsīd bhagavān buddhaḥ kāśyapo nāma sarvavit /
XXratnml_u:4270: śāsane dvau yatī bhikṣū saṃśītikau vabhūvatuḥ // Rm_11.124{24} //
XXratnml_u:4274: sa jñāto 'rhan mahāpuṇyaḥ sarvalokaiḥ prapūjitaḥ // Rm_11.126{26} //
XXratnml_u:4276: sa kena cit pūjito naivaṃ yathā so 'rhaṃ yatiḥ sudhīḥ // Rm_11.127{27} //
XXratnml_u:4277: yadā so 'rhan mahābhijño yatra yatra nimaṃtritaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4281: gantukāmas tadā tatra paścācchramaṇam aicchata // Rm_11.129{29} //
XXratnml_u:4282: tad āgamanam anviṣya naiva pratyalabhat kvacit /
XXratnml_u:4283: tatas taddarśanābhāvād anyam āhūya bhikṣukaṃ // Rm_11.130{30} //
XXratnml_u:4284: taṃ paścācchramaṇaṃ kṛtvā dātur gṛham upācarat /
XXratnml_u:4286: tam arhantam apaśyan sa tasthau tūṣṇī nirāśitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4287: tathaivaṃ taṃ niṣīdantaṃ dṛṣṭvā te bhikṣavo narāḥ // Rm_11.132{32} //
XXratnml_u:4289: bhadanta paśyatādyāyaṃ tenāhato na nīyate // Rm_11.133{33} //
XXratnml_u:4291: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ proktaṃ śrutvāsau pratibheditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4293: yad adya māṃ parityajya samāhūyānyato harāt /
XXratnml_u:4294: gachata bhojanaṃ bhoktuṃ tad ahasto bhavatv asau // Rm_11.135{35} //
XXratnml_u:4295: tadāsau bhojanaṃ bhuktvā tenaivaṃ bhikṣuṇā saha /
XXratnml_u:4296: svāśramaṃ samupāyātas tam adrākṣīd ruṣākulaṃ // Rm_11.136{36} //
XXratnml_u:4297: ity evaṃ śapitaṃ vāpi matvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:4298: dṛṣṭvā taṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā tūṣṇībhūtvā vyaciṃtayat // Rm_11.137{37} //
XXratnml_u:4299: aho ayaṃ mahāmūḍha īdṛg mayi prabhāṣate /
XXratnml_u:4300: etat karmaphalaṃ ghoraṃ kathaṃ bhokṣyati nārake // Rm_11.138{38} //
XXratnml_u:4301: yad ayaṃ mama doṣeṇa krodhenaivaṃ khalīkṛtaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4302: tad etat karmavaipākyaṃ mayaiva paripācyatāṃ // Rm_11.139{39} //
XXratnml_u:4303: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā sa mahārhaṃ kṛpānidhiḥ /
XXratnml_u:4305: tataḥ so 'py ayatir bhikṣur dṛṣṭvā taṃ dhyānasaṃsthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4308: procitaṃ pātakaṃ ghoraṃ tad bhavān kṣantum arhati // Rm_11.142{42} //
XXratnml_u:4311: tadatyayaṃ bhavāñ chāstaḥ pratihartuṃ samarhati // Rm_11.143{43} //
XXratnml_u:4312: adyāgreṇa sadā cāpi bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:4313: tan me yad aparādhatvaṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣantum arhati // Rm_11.144{43!} //
XXratnml_u:4314: punar naitat kariṣye 'haṃ akarttavyaṃ yady atra hi /
XXratnml_u:4315: avaktavyaṃ ca yat kiṃ cin na tad vakṣyāmi sarvathā // Rm_11.145{44} //
XXratnml_u:4316: abhāvyaṃ cāpi yat kiṃcid bhāvayiṣye na tat punaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4317: yad eva taṃ prakarttavyaṃ tad eva hi karomy ahaṃ // Rm_11.146{45} //
XXratnml_u:4318: vaktavyam eva vakṣye 'haṃ bhāvyam eva prabhāvaye /
XXratnml_u:4319: etat sarvaṃ samāsena samādeṣṭuṃ samarhati // Rm_11.147{46} //
XXratnml_u:4320: bhavadājñāṃ śirodhṛtvā satyam evaṃ caret sadā // Rm_11.148{47!} //
XXratnml_u:4321: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa samādheḥ samutthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4322: taṃ bhikṣuṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā paśyann evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_11.149{48} //
XXratnml_u:4323: śṛṇu vatsa samādhāya tvām atrāhaṃ prabodhaye /
XXratnml_u:4324: yathā me gaditaṃ śrutvā tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // Rm_11.150{49} //
XXratnml_u:4326: strīṇāṃ saṃgānurāgaṃ ca akarttavyaṃ kadā cana // Rm_11.151{50} //
XXratnml_u:4328: saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ ca pāruṣyaṃ ca kadā cana // Rm_11.152{51} //
XXratnml_u:4329: mithyādṛṣṭir abhidhyā ca vyāpādaṃ ca tathā sadā /
XXratnml_u:4330: bhikṣubhir manasā naiva ciṃtanīyā kadā cana // Rm_11.153{52} //
XXratnml_u:4332: tasmād evaṃ parijñāya tyaktavyāni sukhārthibhiḥ // Rm_11.154{53} //
XXratnml_u:4334: saddharmāṇāṃ pratikṣepaṃ kartavyaṃ na kadā cana // Rm_11.155{54} //
XXratnml_u:4335: tathā vāryāpavādatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ na kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:4336: paṃcānaṃtaryapāpāni naiva kāryāṇi kena cit // Rm_11.156{55} //
XXratnml_u:4338: patanto narakeṣv eva kleśāndhāni ca santi hi // Rm_11.157{56} //
XXratnml_u:4339: tasmād etāni karmāṇi mānasāpi ca mā kṛthā /
XXratnml_u:4342: āryāṣṭāṃgikamārge ca caritvā vratam ādarāt // Rm_11.159{58} //
XXratnml_u:4345: pravaraṃ vratam ākhyātaṃ sarvair api munīśvaraiḥ // Rm_11.160{59} //
XXratnml_u:4348: evam etat parijñāya vrataṃ kṛtvā samācaran /
XXratnml_u:4349: tatas te kramataḥ pāpaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ kṣiṇuyād drutaṃ // Rm_11.162{61} //
XXratnml_u:4350: tataś ca kramaśaḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣitvātra samāhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4352: tatas tvaṃ kramaśaś caivaṃ śodhayitvā trimaṃḍalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4355: tatheti ca parijñāya tadvrataṃ kartum aichata // Rm_11.165{64} //
XXratnml_u:4356: tathā tasyārhataḥ śāstuḥ sadaivaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4357: kramāc chikṣāś ca śikṣitvā tad upoṣadham ācarat // Rm_11.166{65} //
XXratnml_u:4360: bhikṣavo jñāyatām eṣa yo 'sau bhikṣuḥ pṛthagjanaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4361: yad anenārhate śāstre śapitaṃ ruṣṭacetasā // Rm_11.168{67} //
XXratnml_u:4363: yac cānenārhataḥ śastur gatvā ca śaraṇaṃ sadā // Rm_11.169{68} //
XXratnml_u:4365: tenāyaṃ śāsanenātra pravrajyārhaṃ bhavaty api // Rm_11.170{69} //
XXratnml_u:4366: iti hi bhikṣavo matvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā /
XXratnml_u:4367: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāṃti kṛṣṇena durgatiṃ sadā // Rm_11.171{70} //
XXratnml_u:4369: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tasyaiva karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ // Rm_11.172{71} //
XXratnml_u:4370: tenaiva bhujyate loke nānyena spṛśyate kvacit /
XXratnml_u:4371: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_11.173{72} //
XXratnml_u:4372: bhuktaṃ tu kṣīyate karma śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:4373: nāgnibhir dahyate kena vāyubhiś ca na śuṣyate // Rm_11.174{73} //
XXratnml_u:4374: klidyate nodakaiś cāpi kṣīyate naiva bhūmiṣu /
XXratnml_u:4375: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api // Rm_11.175{74} //
XXratnml_u:4376: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti prāṇināṃ khalu /
XXratnml_u:4377: evam etat prabhaṣitvā jinendro 'sau mahāmuniḥ // Rm_11.176{75} //
XXratnml_u:4378: bodhayan sakalāṃl lokān samādhiṃ vidadhe tataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4379: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve ca sāṃghikāḥ // Rm_11.177{76} //
XXratnml_u:4380: śubheṣv eva sadā raktāḥ pracerire samāhitāḥ // Rm_11.178{77} //
XXratnml_u:4381: ity evaṃ me samākhyātaṃ guruṇā śāṇavāsinā /
XXratnml_u:4383: tathaivaṃ te mayā khyātaṃ śrutvā caivaṃ śubhe cara // Rm_11.179{78} //
XXratnml_u:4386: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4387: kramād bodhipathaḥ prāpya saṃbodhim āpnuyāḥ khalu // Rm_11.181{80} //
XXratnml_u:4389: śrutvā tatheti vaṃditvā prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_11.182{81} //
XXratnml_u:4390: ye śṛṇvantīdam evaṃ pramuditamanaso hastakākhyāvadānaṃ ye cāpi śrāvayanti pratidinam aniśaṃ bodhicaryābhiraktāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4391: te sarve kleśamuktāḥ suvimalamanaso bodhisatvā guṇāḍhyā bhuktvā saukhyaṃ prakāmaṃ munivaranilayaṃ saṃprayāṃti pramodāḥ //
XXratnml_u:4394: XII Sārthavāhāvadāna athāśoko mahīpālaḥ kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:4395: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:4396: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4397: yathā te guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathā me khyātum arhasi // Rm_12.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:4399: upagupto yatiś caivaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Rm_12.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:4400: śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4401: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tac chrutvā mudito bhava // Rm_12.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:4408: śrāvakair bhikṣubhiḥ sārddham upāsakaiś ca cailakaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:4409: bodhisatvagaṇaiś cāpi tathānyaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ // Rm_12.8{8} //
XXratnml_u:4411: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ prāyayur bodhivāṃchinaḥ // Rm_12.9{9} //
XXratnml_u:4413: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ // Rm_12.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:4414: amātyā dhaninaḥ paurāḥ sādhavaś ca mahājanāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4415: vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca tathānye sarvajātikāḥ // Rm_12.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:4417: saṃbuddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā pūjayitvā samaṃtataḥ // Rm_12.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:4420: athāsau bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupāśritān /
XXratnml_u:4424: tadaiva samaye tasyāṃ śrāvastyāṃ puri saṃsthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4429: tato 'sau svāṃ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4430: svasahāyāś ca tāṃ sarvāṃ samāhūya samabravīt // Rm_12.18{18} //
XXratnml_u:4431: bhavaṃto śrūyatāṃ sarve yad abhilaṣitaṃ mama /
XXratnml_u:4432: atrāsti yadi vo vāṃchā tan me svāgantum arhatha // Rm_12.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:4434: tat prāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ yadi saṃpattim ichatha // Rm_12.20{20} //
XXratnml_u:4435: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te ratnalobhitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4436: sahasā gaṃtum ichante ratnākare mahodadhau // Rm_12.21{21} //
XXratnml_u:4437: tato 'sau sārthabhṛc chīghraṃ sarve sārthagaṇaiḥ saha /
XXratnml_u:4440: sarve te pracaranto vai tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.23{23} //
XXratnml_u:4441: tato bhāṃḍāni naukāyām āropyāruhya ca svayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4446: tataḥ pratyāgatā abdhes tīrāntikaṃ samāyayuḥ // Rm_12.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:4448: bhidyate vahanaṃ teṣāṃ hṛdayaiḥ sā sahāśu tat // Rm_12.27{27} //
XXratnml_u:4452: kecid vāhuvalādhānaṃ samuttīrya sthalaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:4454: utpravanto nimajjantaḥ kheditā nidhanaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:4455: tatas te vaṇijaḥ sarve ye viśiṣṭā viṣāditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4456: te yaśodhanavibhraṣṭāḥ śūnyahastā gṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:4458: etad vṛttaṃ svabhāryāyāḥ kathitvaivaṃ vyacintayat // Rm_12.32{32} //
XXratnml_u:4459: hā hā me mandabhāgyatvāj jāyate mīdṛśī vipat /
XXratnml_u:4461: atrāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yato bhāgyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_12.33{33} //
XXratnml_u:4462: bhāgyavān puruṣo dhīro bhāgyavān kuśalī sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:4463: bhāgyena labhyate saṃpad yaśaḥ saukhyaguṇānvitaḥ // Rm_12.34{34} //
XXratnml_u:4465: etadādyā guṇāḥ sarve śobhanti bhāgyam āśritāḥ // Rm_12.35{35} //
XXratnml_u:4467: etadādyādiguṇāḥ sarve na prasiddhyaṃti sarvataḥ // Rm_12.36{36} //
XXratnml_u:4468: tad atra kiṃ kariṣye 'haṃ kva yāsyāmi dhanāptaye /
XXratnml_u:4469: dhanahīnā na śobhante gṛhasthāḥ sādhavo 'pi hi // Rm_12.37{37} //
XXratnml_u:4470: varaṃ prāṇaparityāgaṃ na tu dravyair vinā gṛhe /
XXratnml_u:4471: paśuvan nirasaṃ bhuktvā sthāsyāmy evaṃ nirutsavaṃ // Rm_12.38{38} //
XXratnml_u:4472: bhāgyena labhyate dravyaṃ bhāgyaṃ dharmeṇa labhyate /
XXratnml_u:4473: dharme hi jāyate sveṣṭadevatāyāḥ prasādataḥ // Rm_12.39{39} //
XXratnml_u:4475: samyag ārādhayitvaivaṃ yāyāṃ ratnākaraṃ punaḥ // Rm_12.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:4478: namas te devate nityaṃ bhaje 'haṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4480: itthaṃ sā devatā samyag ārādhya saṃpramoditā /
XXratnml_u:4481: sarvasārthān samāhūya punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.43{43} //
XXratnml_u:4482: bho bhavanto vijānīdhvaṃ vayaṃ sarve vaṇigjanāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4483: tad atra bhavatām agre kathyate me samīhitaṃ // Rm_12.44{44} //
XXratnml_u:4485: tat tathaiva gṛhe sthitvā naiva śobhāṃ vrajemahi // Rm_12.45{45} //
XXratnml_u:4488: dhanahīnā na śobhante gṛhasthā hi kuṭuṃvinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4491: dhairyyam ālamvya sarvaiś ca karttavyaṃ dhanasādhanaṃ // Rm_12.48{48} //
XXratnml_u:4493: dhanena sādhayed dharmaṃ dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ vrajet // Rm_12.49{49} //
XXratnml_u:4495: arjanīyaṃ prayatnena dhanaṃ dānāya bhuktaye // Rm_12.50{50} //
XXratnml_u:4498: dānaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ dānaṃ śāntikaraṃ sadā // Rm_12.51{51} //
XXratnml_u:4499: asmād dānaṃ sadā kartuṃ bhoktuṃ saukhyaṃ yathechayā /
XXratnml_u:4500: bhūyo ratnākaraṃ gaṃtum arhāmahe dhanārjane // Rm_12.52{52} //
XXratnml_u:4502: yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā dānaṃ kṛtvā vasemahi // Rm_12.53{53} //
XXratnml_u:4503: yadi daivo vipattiḥ syāt samudre patitā vayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4504: tīrtharāje mṛtāḥ sarve yāsyāmaḥ svargatiṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.54{54} //
XXratnml_u:4505: yadi bhāgyād athāsmākaṃ devānāṃ ca prasādataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4506: yātrāsiddhir bhaven nūnaṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ tadā // Rm_12.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:4508: tat prāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ yadi saṃpattim ichatha // Rm_12.56{56} //
XXratnml_u:4509: iti tasyoditaṃ śrutvā te sarve vaṇijo mudā /
XXratnml_u:4510: tathā tena sahaichānta gantuṃ ratnākaraiḥ punaḥ // Rm_12.57{57} //
XXratnml_u:4511: tato 'sau sārthabhṛc chīghraṃ dhṛtvā svastyayanaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:4512: sarve sārthagaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ pratasthe svapurād vahi // Rm_12.58{58} //
XXratnml_u:4514: pracarantaś ca te sarve tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:4515: tatra sarve 'pi te sārthā bhāṇḍāni vahane kramāt /
XXratnml_u:4520: tataḥ pratyāgatāś cābdhes tīrāntikam upāyayuḥ // Rm_12.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:4522: sā naukā bhidyate caivaṃ teṣāṃ vai hṛdayaiḥ saha // Rm_12.63{63} //
XXratnml_u:4525: tatra te vilayaṃ prāptā nirālaṃvā nirāśrayāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4526: unmajjanto nimajjantaḥ preritās tīram ūrmibhiḥ // Rm_12.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:4528: kecid vāhuvalādhānaiḥ samuttīryya sthalaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:4530: utplavantā nimajjantaḥ kheditā nidhanaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.67{67} //
XXratnml_u:4531: tatas teṣāṃ ca sārthānāṃ ye 'vaśiṣṭā sujīvinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4533: yaśoratnaviyuktās te śūnyahastā gṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_12.68{68} //
XXratnml_u:4535: etad vṛttaṃ svavaṃdhūnāṃ kathitvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_12.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:4536: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenedrig jāyate vipat /
XXratnml_u:4537: dvidhāpi siddhyate naiva yato bhāgyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_12.70{70} //
XXratnml_u:4538: pāpair na siddhyate karma atra yatnasya kiṃ valaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:4539: dharmeṇa siddhyate karma tasmād dharmo valottamaḥ // Rm_12.71{71} //
XXratnml_u:4541: dravyena sādhayet karma sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_12.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:4542: karma tu siddhyate samyak kulavṛttiṃ ca cāriṇāṃ /
XXratnml_u:4543: kulavṛttiṃ parityajya yo 'nyavṛttau caret kudhīḥ // Rm_12.73{73} //
XXratnml_u:4544: sa ihāpi paribhraṣṭaḥ paratra durgatiṃ vrajet /
XXratnml_u:4545: yenaivaṃ sadgatiprāptis tadaiva karmma sādhayet // Rm_12.74{74} //
XXratnml_u:4546: yato 'pi durgatiṃ prāptis tat karma tarhitaṃ budhaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:4547: tad atra kiṃ kariṣye 'haṃ kva yāsyāmy artham arjituṃ /
XXratnml_u:4548: arthaṃ vinā kathaṃ dharmaṃ karttavyaṃ hi kuṭuṃvibhiḥ // Rm_12.75{75} //
XXratnml_u:4549: vinā dharmaṃ hi saṃsāre janma jīvaṃ ca nisphalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4550: kiṃ te na pauruṣeṇāpi yena dharmaṃ na sādhyate // Rm_12.76{76} //
XXratnml_u:4551: dhig dhig me janma saṃsāre jīvituṃ na tathotsahe /
XXratnml_u:4552: varaṃ prāṇaparityāgaṃ na tv evaṃ cirajīvitaṃ // Rm_12.77{77} //
XXratnml_u:4553: avaśyaṃ jantubhir mṛtyur gantavyaṃ ekadhā dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4554: tato 'tra martum ichāmi na tv evam uṣituṃ gṛhe // Rm_12.78{(78)} //
XXratnml_u:4556: kathaṃ me śāmyate duḥkhaṃ yenāhaṃ parikheditaḥ // Rm_12.79{(78)} //
XXratnml_u:4557: kiṃ karttavyaṃ kva gantavyaṃ yatnaṃ cātra na vidyate /
XXratnml_u:4558: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi ko me 'sti rakṣako janaḥ // Rm_12.80{79} //
XXratnml_u:4562: vinā dharmmaṃ yaśodravyaḥ kiṃ saukhyaṃ gṛhavāsināṃ // Rm_12.82{81} //
XXratnml_u:4563: vinā dharmayaśodravyair yo gṛhasthaḥ paśuḥ khalu /
XXratnml_u:4566: puṇyenaiva pralabhyante caturvargā api dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.84{83} //
XXratnml_u:4568: tad eteṣāṃ mamaiko 'pi na vidyate kathaṃ cana /
XXratnml_u:4569: hā hato 'smi svadaivena kiṃ karomi vikheditaḥ // Rm_12.85{84} //
XXratnml_u:4571: evaṃ teṣāṃ svavaṃdhūnāṃ vilapītvā sa sārthapaḥ // Rm_12.86{85} //
XXratnml_u:4573: evaṃ vyavasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ te sarve 'pi vāṃdhavāḥ // Rm_12.87{86} //
XXratnml_u:4575: sādho sārthapate satyaṃ tat sarvaṃ yat tvayocyate // Rm_12.88{87} //
XXratnml_u:4576: tad evaṃ dhairyyam ālaṃvya prodyamasva gṛhe vasan /
XXratnml_u:4577: sādho kutrāpi mā dhāva nirmāṇasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_12.89{88} //
XXratnml_u:4579: yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi naiva tad anyathā // Rm_12.90{89} //
XXratnml_u:4581: avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā na bhaveyus tathā yadi // Rm_12.91{90} //
XXratnml_u:4582: pitrā tyaktaḥ kathaṃ rāmo rājyabhraṣṭo vanaṃ yayau /
XXratnml_u:4583: tatrāpi vasatas tasya bhāryā śītā pativratā // Rm_12.92{91} //
XXratnml_u:4585: tato rāmeṇa vīryeṇa hatvāsau rāvaṇas tataḥ // Rm_12.93{92} //
XXratnml_u:4586: pratyānīya punaḥ śītā tyaktā bharttrā svayaṃ kathaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4587: punar ṛṣeḥ samānīya sabhāmadhye parikṣitā // Rm_12.94{93} //
XXratnml_u:4588: tataḥ pṛthyā svayaṃ gṛhya sītānītā rasātalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4590: nadyāṃ prāṇasvayaṃ tyaktvā janaṃ sārddhaṃ divaṃ yayau /
XXratnml_u:4592: rājyabhraṣṭā vane gatvā vibhramus te 'pi daivataḥ // Rm_12.96{95} //
XXratnml_u:4594: uttamā adhamā madhyā saṃti te 'pi svadaivataḥ // Rm_12.97{96} //
XXratnml_u:4595: kecid gṛhe mṛtāḥ kecij jāyamānā mṛtā api /
XXratnml_u:4596: kecid vālye mṛtāḥ kecit kaumāratve mṛtās tathā // Rm_12.98{97} //
XXratnml_u:4597: yauvane 'pi mṛtāḥ kecin mṛtā vṛddhe vadanti me /
XXratnml_u:4598: sarve 'py evaṃ mṛtā lokāḥ svasvadaivapramāṇataḥ // Rm_12.99{98} //
XXratnml_u:4601: kecid vālye sukhaṃ bhuktvā yauvane duḥkhabhāginaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4602: kecic ca yauvane saukhyaṃ bhuktvā vṛddhe suduḥkhitāḥ // Rm_12.101{100} //
XXratnml_u:4604: kecic ca duḥkhitā vālye yauvane saukhyabhāginaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4605: vṛddhatvasya sukhībhūtā bhavaṃti te 'pi hi daivataḥ // Rm_12.102{1} //
XXratnml_u:4606: sarve 'pi sukham ichanti duḥkhaṃ nechati kaś cana /
XXratnml_u:4607: tathā sukhāni saṃprāptuṃ yatnaṃ kurvanty anekaśaḥ // Rm_12.103{2} //
XXratnml_u:4608: keṣāṃ cit siddhyate yatnaṃ keṣāṃ cid vā na siddhyati /
XXratnml_u:4609: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yāti tat sarvaṃ daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.104{3} //
XXratnml_u:4610: tathā ca rogiṇāṃ rogā vaidyopacāraṇair api /
XXratnml_u:4611: varddhyante naiva śāmyante tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.105{4} //
XXratnml_u:4612: keṣāṃ cid rogiṇāṃ rogā vinā vaidyopacāraṇe /
XXratnml_u:4613: śāmyaṃte yatnato cāpi tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.106{5} //
XXratnml_u:4614: tathā cald maṃtriṇāṃ maṃtrāḥ siddhyante yatnato laghuḥ /
XXratnml_u:4615: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yānti tad api daivakāraṇāt // Rm_12.107{6} //
XXratnml_u:4616: tathaivaṃ vaṇijāṃ lābhoḥ siddhyante yatnato 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:4617: keṣāṃ cin naiva yatnena tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.108{7} //
XXratnml_u:4618: tathā vīrā raṇe śatruṃ vinā yatnaṃ jayaṃty api /
XXratnml_u:4619: kecit tu ripunā yuddhe hanyamānā mṛtāḥ pare // Rm_12.109{8} //
XXratnml_u:4621: tyaktvā dehaṃ gatāḥ svargaṃ tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.110{9} //
XXratnml_u:4622: evaṃ sāṃyātrikā ratnaṃ prāptuṃ ratnākaraṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4623: kecid ratnāni saṃgṛhya svasti pratyāgatā gṛhaṃ // Rm_12.111{10} //
XXratnml_u:4624: kecid ratnam alabdhaṃ vai śūnyahastā gṛhāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4625: kecic ca nidhanaṃ yātās tatraiva makarālaye // Rm_12.112{11} //
XXratnml_u:4626: kecid yatnāt samuttīrya jīvanto gṛham āgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4627: kecic ca jāṃgale caurair nihatā maraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.113{12} //
XXratnml_u:4628: kecic ca jaṃtubhir mārge hiṃsyamāne mṛtā vane /
XXratnml_u:4629: keṣāṃ cit siddhyate yātrā mahallābhasamanvitāḥ // Rm_12.114{13} //
XXratnml_u:4630: keṣāṃ cid vighnatāṃ yānti tathāpi daivayogataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4631: kaiś cid gṛhe nidhiḥ prāptaḥ kaiś cid deśāntare vane // Rm_12.115{14} //
XXratnml_u:4632: kaiś cid dūre bhramadbhiś ca naiva kiṃ cit kva cid dhanaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4633: keṣāṃ cid varddhate saṃpad yatnāyāsaṃ vinā laghu // Rm_12.116{15} //
XXratnml_u:4634: keṣāṃ cid dhīyate saṃpad rakṣitāpi prayatnataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4635: keṣāṃ cit susthirā saṃpat keṣāṃ cid vala asthirā // Rm_12.117{16} //
XXratnml_u:4636: keṣāṃ cij jāyate naiva nānopāyārjanair api /
XXratnml_u:4637: evaṃ nānāprakāraiś ca satvās traidhātukodbhavāḥ // Rm_12.118{17} //
XXratnml_u:4640: sukhasyānte hi duḥkhāni duḥkhasyānte sukhāni ca // Rm_12.119{18} //
XXratnml_u:4641: bhuṃjante jaṃtavaḥ sarve bhramante ṣaḍgatiṣv api /
XXratnml_u:4642: tathā bhavanti mitrāṇi dviṣo 'pi hitakāriṇaḥ // Rm_12.120{19} //
XXratnml_u:4643: mitrāṇy api dviṣo duṣṭā bhavaṃti daivayogataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4644: tathāmṛtaṃ viṣībhūtaṃ viṣaṃ cāpy amṛtī bhavet // Rm_12.121{20} //
XXratnml_u:4645: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahad varaṃ // Rm_12.122{21} //
XXratnml_u:4646: tathā ca brahmaṇaḥ śīrṣaṃ nikṛttaṃ śūlapāṇinā /
XXratnml_u:4647: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.123{22} //
XXratnml_u:4648: tathā cakrī suvīro 'pi vyādheṣu nihato mṛtaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4649: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahad valaṃ // Rm_12.124{23} //
XXratnml_u:4650: yaś ca bhūtādhipaś ceśaḥ so 'py umatto digaṃvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:4651: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ maheśvaraḥ // Rm_12.125{24} //
XXratnml_u:4652: caṃdro 'pi ca kalaṃkāṅko māse māse 'pi hīyate /
XXratnml_u:4653: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahadvalaṃ // Rm_12.126{25} //
XXratnml_u:4655: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.127{26} //
XXratnml_u:4657: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalī // Rm_12.128{27} //
XXratnml_u:4659: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalaṃ // Rm_12.129{28} //
XXratnml_u:4660: tathā ca parśurāmeṇa mātāpi nihatā krudhā /
XXratnml_u:4661: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahāvalaḥ // Rm_12.130{29} //
XXratnml_u:4663: vaṃdhane māritaṃ caivaṃ tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.131{30} //
XXratnml_u:4664: tasmāc ca brahmadattena dharmapālo sa nandanaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4665: māritaḥ pramadātuṣṭyai tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.132{31} //
XXratnml_u:4666: rājñī ca durpatī mātā svātmajasyāpi rohitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4667: pītvaiva nirdayā tuṣṭā tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.133{32} //
XXratnml_u:4669: asinā ghātito 'raṇye tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.134{33} //
XXratnml_u:4671: nirvāsito vane bhrāntas tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.135{34} //
XXratnml_u:4672: evam anye 'pi rājāno hatvā jñātī svavāṃdhavān /
XXratnml_u:4673: bhuṃjate prāpya rājyāni tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.136{35} //
XXratnml_u:4674: evaṃ pitrā sutās tyaktvā mātrā ca svātmajā api /
XXratnml_u:4676: bhāryāpi svāminā tyaktvā bharttāpi bhāryyayā tathā /
XXratnml_u:4678: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.138{37} //
XXratnml_u:4679: putreṇāpi pitā tyaktaṃ mātāpi jananī tathā /
XXratnml_u:4680: dhātrī cāpi parityaktās tathā pautrapitāmahaḥ // Rm_12.139{38} //
XXratnml_u:4681: tathā pitāmahas tyaktaḥ putraiś cāpy atinirdayaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:4682: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.140{39} //
XXratnml_u:4683: tathā rājñā svabhṛtyāś ca sevakā api sajjanāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4684: aparādhaṃ vinā tyaktās tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.141{40} //
XXratnml_u:4686: parityaktvā nihaṃty ante tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.142{40*} //
XXratnml_u:4687: tathā śiṣyān gurur hanti śiṣyo hanti gurum api /
XXratnml_u:4688: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.143{41} //
XXratnml_u:4689: tathāpi ghnanti bharttāraṃ svāminaṃ sevakānn api /
XXratnml_u:4690: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattaraṃ // Rm_12.144{42} //
XXratnml_u:4691: tathā ca svayam ātmānaṃ ghnanti kecid ruṣānvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4692: tad api daivayogena tasmād daivaṃ mahattamaḥ // Rm_12.145{43} //
XXratnml_u:4693: kecic chastraiḥ svayaṃ hatvā kecid bhuktvā viṣādikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4694: kecid agnau jale svabhre prapātāt patitā mṛtāḥ // Rm_12.146{44} //
XXratnml_u:4695: kecit pāśaiḥ svayaṃ badhya mṛtāḥ kecic ca vaṃdhane /
XXratnml_u:4696: kecit pānāśanādīṃś ca tyaktvā yāṃti yamālayaṃ // Rm_12.147{45} //
XXratnml_u:4697: evaṃ kṛtvāpi yānty eva kecid vāpi surālayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4698: kecic ca narake yānti tat sarvaṃ daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.148{46} //
XXratnml_u:4700: devatāś ca dadanty evaṃ phalaṃ daivaniyogataḥ // Rm_12.149{47} //
XXratnml_u:4701: pare 'pi svajanā iṣṭāḥ sahajā api ca dviṣaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4702: bhavanti tat kṣaṇād eva tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.150{48} //
XXratnml_u:4703: evaṃ traidhātukotpannāḥ sarve satvāś ca jaṃtavaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4704: ṣaḍgatiṣu bhramantas te caranti daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.151{49} //
XXratnml_u:4705: kecid vīrā guṇāḍhyāś ca suṃdarā bhāgyamāninaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4707: kecic ca nirguṇāḥ prāḍhyāḥ kecin nirguṇinaḥ śaṭhāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4708: kecic ca vikalāṃgāś ca guṇasaṃpattibhāginaḥ // Rm_12.153{51} //
XXratnml_u:4709: kecic ca suṃdarā mūrkhā nirdhanā nirguṇāḥ śaṭhāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4710: kecic ca guṇinaḥ prāḍhyā nīcakarmānucāriṇaḥ // Rm_12.154{52} //
XXratnml_u:4715: kṛpaṇā vikalāṃgāś ca nirdayāś ca durāśayāḥ // Rm_12.156{54} //
XXratnml_u:4716: kecid vīrā hy alābhijñāḥ kulīnāḥ sādhavo 'pi ye /
XXratnml_u:4717: te 'pi jātinihīne 'pi bhajaṃti śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.157{55} //
XXratnml_u:4719: pretavad bhujyamānāś ca caraṃti bhikṣukā bhuvi // Rm_12.158{56} //
XXratnml_u:4720: kecic ca nirguṇā vāpi vaṃcakā duṣṭamānasāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4721: mānyante sādhuval loke tad api daivayogataḥ // Rm_12.159{57} //
XXratnml_u:4725: kenāpi śakyate naiva vaśe netuṃ kathaṃ cana // Rm_12.161{59} //
XXratnml_u:4727: sraṣṭā bharttā ca harttā ca traidhātuvāsinām api // Rm_12.162{60} //
XXratnml_u:4729: tat tasya śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaktyā nityaṃ samarcaya // Rm_12.163{61} //
XXratnml_u:4730: tasmiṃ tuṣṭe vidhau devaiḥ parituṣṭaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4731: tato daivaprasādena sarvatra maṃgalaṃ bhavet // Rm_12.164{62} //
XXratnml_u:4733: viruddhe tu na siddhyante yatnaiḥ saṃsādhitāny api // Rm_12.165{63} //
XXratnml_u:4737: tatas te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvakāryyeṣu saṃbhavet // Rm_12.167{65} //
XXratnml_u:4740: tathā cet sarvathā nityaṃ yātrāyaṃ maṃgalaṃ bhavet /
XXratnml_u:4741: anyad vā cintitaṃ kāryaṃ sarvāpy evaṃ prasatsyate // Rm_12.169{67} //
XXratnml_u:4742: yadi vāṃchāsti te bhūyo gantuṃ ratnākaraṃ prati /
XXratnml_u:4743: tathābhyarcya vidhātāraṃ gachet svasti bhavet khalu // Rm_12.170{68} //
XXratnml_u:4744: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sārthavāhas tatheti saḥ /
XXratnml_u:4745: pratijñāya samabhyarcya brahmāṇaṃ prārthayat tadā // Rm_12.171{69} //
XXratnml_u:4746: namas te bhagavan brahmaṃ yātrāsiddhiṃ kuruṣva me /
XXratnml_u:4747: evaṃ vidhiṃ samārādhya sa sārthādhipatis tataḥ // Rm_12.172{70} //
XXratnml_u:4748: ratnaṃ prāptyai punaḥ sārthān samāhūyābravīt tathā /
XXratnml_u:4750: bhavantaḥ śrūyatāṃ vākyaṃ yan mayā samudīritaṃ // Rm_12.173{71} //
XXratnml_u:4751: atrāsti yadi vo vāṃchā tathā kartuṃ samudyatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:4752: ahaṃ ratnākaraṃ bhūyo gantuṃ ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.174{72} //
XXratnml_u:4753: tad yadīchatha ratnāni tathā yāta mayā saha /
XXratnml_u:4754: kiṃ cāpy atra vayaṃ sarve sārthavāhakulodbhavāḥ // Rm_12.175{73} //
XXratnml_u:4755: tad gṛhe paśuvad bhuktvā kathaṃ śobhī vrajemahi /
XXratnml_u:4756: saṃsāre sarvajaṃtūnāṃ ekadhā maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.176{74} //
XXratnml_u:4757: tat kiṃ no maraṇe bhītyā mṛtyuṃ kena nivāryyate /
XXratnml_u:4758: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syād asmākaṃ karmmadoṣataḥ // Rm_12.177{75} //
XXratnml_u:4760: yadi bhāgyāc ca no yātrā siddhā svastimatī bhavet /
XXratnml_u:4761: tadā jīvaṃ sukhaṃ dānaṃ kṛtvā svargaṃ vrajemahi /
XXratnml_u:4764: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve te vaṇijo mudā // Rm_12.179{77} //
XXratnml_u:4765: tatheti ca samutsāhaṃ kṛtvā gaṃtuṃ samudyatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:4766: tataḥ sarve 'pi te sārthā dhṛtvā svastyayanaṃ vidhiṃ // Rm_12.180{78} //
XXratnml_u:4767: paṇyam ādāya tenaiva saha sārthabhṛtā yayuḥ /
XXratnml_u:4768: tatas te prasthitāḥ sarve grāmāraṇyavanasthalīḥ // Rm_12.181{79} //
XXratnml_u:4769: samuttīryya kramād yātās tīraṃ prāpur mahodadheḥ /
XXratnml_u:4772: tatas teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ daivayogānuyogataḥ // Rm_12.183{81} //
XXratnml_u:4774: tadā sarve 'pi te sārthā dṛṣṭvā naukāṃ vibheditāṃ // Rm_12.184{82} //
XXratnml_u:4776: tatas te vaṇijaḥ sarve vipaṃnāśā viṣāditāḥ // Rm_12.185{83} //
XXratnml_u:4779: kheditātmā gṛhe tasthau mūkavad dhi natotsavaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4781: dṛṣṭvā taṃ vikalībhūtaṃ samupetyābravīt punaḥ // Rm_12.187{85} //
XXratnml_u:4782: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthāḥ svāminn atra dhairyyaṃ samāśrayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4783: dharmiṣṭhe śaraṇaṃ gatvā kuruṣva dharmasādhanaṃ // Rm_12.188{86} //
XXratnml_u:4786: śuddhacitto viśuddhātmā puṇyātmā bhāgyam āpnuyāt // Rm_12.189{87} //
XXratnml_u:4787: tato bhāgyavataḥ puṃso yad yat karmaṇi sādhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4788: tat tat sarvaṃ prasiddhyeta tasmād dharmaṃ carottamaṃ // Rm_12.190{88} //
XXratnml_u:4789: dharmam eva suhṛd mitram ihāmutra sahānugaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4790: dharmmeṇa pālyate sarvaṃ tasmād dharmo jagatsuhṛt // Rm_12.191{89} //
XXratnml_u:4792: sarveṣām api dharmāṇāṃ dayā dharme viśiṣyate // Rm_12.192{90} //
XXratnml_u:4797: tasmāt tasya munīndrasya sadbhaktyā śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
XXratnml_u:4798: saddharmaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityam upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.195{93} //
XXratnml_u:4799: tatas te naśyate pāpaṃ maṃgalaṃ ca bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4800: tadaiva sarvakāryāṇi sametsyaṃte na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_12.196{94} //
XXratnml_u:4801: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
XXratnml_u:4803: namas te bhagavan nātha pāpistho 'haṃ sudurbhagaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4804: bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gache tan māṃ dṛṣṭvāśu rakṣatāṃ // Rm_12.198{96} //
XXratnml_u:4805: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kāritaṃ vānumoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4806: tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tan me dehi śubhāṃ gatiṃ // Rm_12.199{97} //
XXratnml_u:4807: bhavatāṃ sarvadā nātha śaraṇaṃ yāmy upāsakaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4808: anyo me śaraṇaṃ nāsti tan māṃ rakṣa sadā bhaje // Rm_12.200{98} //
XXratnml_u:4809: tridhāpi me jagannātha yātrā bhagnā svadaivataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4810: gṛhasthaḥ sārthavāho 'haṃ tan me dehi susaṃpadaḥ // Rm_12.201{99} //
XXratnml_u:4811: yanv ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ nātha bhavataṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
XXratnml_u:4812: bhūyo ratnākaraṃ gantuṃ ichāmi ratnalabdhaye // Rm_12.202{100} //
XXratnml_u:4813: yadi yātrā bhavet siddhi yāval lābhaṃ ca lapsyate /
XXratnml_u:4815: ity evaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaṃ saṃsmaran muhuḥ /
XXratnml_u:4816: tāṃ bhāryyāṃ bhadrikāṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.204{2} //
XXratnml_u:4817: bhadre tvayā yad ādiṣṭaṃ tathā kartuṃ samutsahe /
XXratnml_u:4818: adyāgreṇa jagannāthaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāsyāmy upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.205{3} //
XXratnml_u:4820: bhadre nāmnā jinendrasya yāsye ratnākare punaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4821: yadi yātrā bhavet siddhi yāval lābhaṃ ca lapsyate // Rm_12.206{4} //
XXratnml_u:4823: yathārhaṃ pūjayiṣye 'ham iti saṃkalpitaṃ mayā // Rm_12.207{5} //
XXratnml_u:4824: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syāt saṃbuddhanāma saṃsmaran /
XXratnml_u:4826: tad atra yadi me kāryyaṃ śubhaṃ kartuṃ samichasi /
XXratnml_u:4827: tad viṣādaṃ parityajya dhairyyaṃ kṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_12.209{7} //
XXratnml_u:4828: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryyā bhadrikā satī /
XXratnml_u:4829: tatheti pratisaṃmodya svāminaṃ taṃ samabravīt // Rm_12.210{8} //
XXratnml_u:4830: yady evaṃ te samīhāsti kṛtv etaṃ niścayaṃ prabho /
XXratnml_u:4831: saṃbuddhasmaraṇaṃ dhṛtvā gacha svastiṃ samācara // Rm_12.211{9} //
XXratnml_u:4833: tathāvaśyaṃ sa saṃbuddhaḥ paśyan tvāṃ cāpy acet khalu // Rm_12.212{10} //
XXratnml_u:4834: tadā te maṅgalaṃ nityaṃ yātrā svastimatī bhavet /
XXratnml_u:4835: tatas te janma saṃsāre sāphalyaṃ ca bhavet khalu // Rm_12.213{11} //
XXratnml_u:4837: gacha yātrā susiddhāstu svasti pratyāgatāśu ca // Rm_12.214{12} //
XXratnml_u:4838: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
XXratnml_u:4839: bhūyaḥ sārthagaṇān sarvān samāhūyābravīt tathā // Rm_12.215{13} //
XXratnml_u:4840: bhavanta śrūyatāṃ vākyaṃ yan mayātra samīhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4841: ahaṃ ratnākaraṃ bhūyo gantum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.216{14} //
XXratnml_u:4842: tad asti yadi vo vāṃchā yaśaḥsaṃpatsukhāptaye /
XXratnml_u:4843: samāyāta mayā sārddhaṃ ratnākaraṃ vrajemahi // Rm_12.217{15} //
XXratnml_u:4844: yadi bhāgyād dhi no yātrā siddhā svastimatir bhavet /
XXratnml_u:4845: yāvajīvaṃ sukhaṃ dharmaṃ kṛtvā svargaṃ vrajemahi /
XXratnml_u:4846: atha vā syād vipattir naḥ sarvatīrthajalāśraye /
XXratnml_u:4847: mṛtāḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyāmo hy avaśyaṃ maraṇe sati // Rm_12.218{16} //
XXratnml_u:4848: paśuvat kiṃ gṛhe sthitvā sukhaṃ vā kiṃ yaśo vinā /
XXratnml_u:4849: yaśonvitā mṛtā ye hi tatpumāṃso narottamāḥ // Rm_12.219{17} //
XXratnml_u:4850: yad artham eva jīvāmas tad arthaṃ yan na vidyate /
XXratnml_u:4851: kiṃ tena jīvitenāpi kevalaṃ duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Rm_12.220{18} //
XXratnml_u:4852: varam evādya me mṛtyur na vyarthaṃ cirajīvitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4854: yasmāc ciram api sthitvā mṛtyur kena nivāryyate // Rm_12.221{19} //
XXratnml_u:4858: bodhyamānā vaṇiksaṃghāḥ kiṃ cin naiva samūcire // Rm_12.223{21} //
XXratnml_u:4859: abhadro 'yaṃ pumāṃ cāpi yato yātrā na siddhyati /
XXratnml_u:4860: iti tena mahāṃbhodhau naiko 'pi gantum aichata // Rm_12.224{22} //
XXratnml_u:4861: atha sārthapatir dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān viratotsavān /
XXratnml_u:4862: eko 'pi vā svayaṃ gantum aichad ratnākaraṃ prati // Rm_12.225{23} //
XXratnml_u:4864: svastyayanavidhiṃ kṛtvā pratasthe bhārakaiḥ saha // Rm_12.226{24} //
XXratnml_u:4866: purād vahi vinirgatya kramād deśāṃtaraṃ yayau // Rm_12.227{25} //
XXratnml_u:4868: parikraman samullaṃghya prāpus tīraṃ mahodadheḥ // Rm_12.228{26} //
XXratnml_u:4869: tatrāsau sārthabhṛd dṛṣṭvā taṃ samudraṃ mahāmbudhiṃ /
XXratnml_u:4870: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā prārthayac charaṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_12.229{27} //
XXratnml_u:4872: tvadāsayā samāyāmi tad āśāṃ me prapūraya // Rm_12.230{28} //
XXratnml_u:4876: tat svasti cārayan naukāṃ yātrāsiddhiṃ prasādhaya // Rm_12.232{30} //
XXratnml_u:4879: yathā mātā ca garbhasthaṃ vālakaṃ saṃprarakṣate /
XXratnml_u:4880: tathā mām eva garbhasthe nauke mātaḥ prarakṣatāṃ // Rm_12.234{32} //
XXratnml_u:4881: tataś ca sugataṃ smṛtvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:4883: namas te bhagavan nātha yathā trāsi jagattrayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4884: tathā māṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā pāhi vraje ratnākare // Rm_12.236{34} //
XXratnml_u:4885: ity evaṃ sārthavāho 'sau praṇatvā sugataṃ smaran /
XXratnml_u:4887: bhāṇḍāny āropya naukāyaṃ samārohaj janaṃ saha // Rm_12.237{35} //
XXratnml_u:4890: yat tatra sārthavāho 'sau saṃsmaran sugataṃ muhuḥ /
XXratnml_u:4891: tena puṇyabalenaiva sā naukā svastim ācaran // Rm_12.239{37} //
XXratnml_u:4892: tathā kramāc caranty evaṃ dvīpalokāntarāṇi ca /
XXratnml_u:4895: tato ratnāni saṃgṛhya pratasthe vahanāsthitaḥ // Rm_12.241{39} //
XXratnml_u:4899: grāmāṃ deśāṃ parikramya śrāvastyāṃ puram āyayau // Rm_12.243{41} //
XXratnml_u:4900: tato gṛhe praviṣṭo 'sau bharyyayā saha moditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4902: tataḥ sadyar gṛhastho 'sau bhāryyayā saha naṃditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4903: bhāṇḍam udghāṭya ratnāni pratyavekṣitum ārabhat // Rm_12.245{43} //
XXratnml_u:4905: dṛṣṭvā harṣaṃ samāsādya punar evaṃ vabhāṣate // Rm_12.246{44} //
XXratnml_u:4909: tasmād yathāpratijñātaṃ śraddhayā sāṃprataṃ mayā // Rm_12.248{46} //
XXratnml_u:4911: tad upārddhaṃ kathaṃ cānudātavyaṃ munaye 'rhate // Rm_12.249{47} //
XXratnml_u:4912: yadi rājā vijānīyād etad arddhaṃ hare mama /
XXratnml_u:4913: ratnalubdho nareśo yaṃ daṇḍaṃ vā praṇayaṃ mayi // Rm_12.250{48} //
XXratnml_u:4914: tadā me syād vipattiś ca tat kathaṃ kriyate mayā /
XXratnml_u:4915: aho daivād vipattir mām adyāpi ca na muṃcati /
XXratnml_u:4916: tat kathaṃ vā pratijñātaṃ pūrayituṃ na manyate /
XXratnml_u:4917: namas te bhagavan nātha sarvajño 'si munīśvaraḥ // Rm_12.251{49} //
XXratnml_u:4919: ity asau sugataṃ smṛtvā taccintāvyathitāśayaḥ // Rm_12.252{50} //
XXratnml_u:4920: kapolaṃ svakare dhṛtvā tasthau koṣṭhe nirutsavaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4922: tathaivaṃ sthitam ālokya svāmi naṃ taṃ viṣāditaṃ // Rm_12.253{51} //
XXratnml_u:4923: sā bhāryā bhadrikopetya puraḥ sthitvābravīt tathā /
XXratnml_u:4924: svāmiṃ bharttaḥ kim eva tvaṃ sthito 'si duḥkhito yathā // Rm_12.254{52} //
XXratnml_u:4925: kiṃ vā te jāyate duḥkhaṃ tad vaca cet priyāsmi te // Rm_12.255{53} //
XXratnml_u:4926: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatiḥ punaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4927: tāṃ bhāryyāṃ samupāmaṃtrya punaś caivam abhāṣata // Rm_12.256{54} //
XXratnml_u:4928: bhadre yaj jāyate duḥkhaṃ tat pravakṣye śṛṇu priye /
XXratnml_u:4929: yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ pūrayituṃ kathaṃ tathā // Rm_12.257{55} //
XXratnml_u:4931: etad arddhaṃ hared rājā lobhān me daṇḍayed api // Rm_12.258{56} //
XXratnml_u:4933: tan me nātra pratīkāro kathaṃ kartuṃ na manyate // Rm_12.259{57} //
XXratnml_u:4934: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryā punar abravīt /
XXratnml_u:4935: viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ svāmiṃ śṛṇu yan me samīhitaiḥ // Rm_12.260{58} //
XXratnml_u:4936: tāvad imāni saṃkalpaḥ paścāt tat samayāgate /
XXratnml_u:4937: pūjayā saha bhojaiś ca sasaṃghāyārhate 'rcayet // Rm_12.261{59} //
XXratnml_u:4938: evaṃ kṛte tathā svāmin pratijñā tena setsyate /
XXratnml_u:4939: bhītiś cāpi na vidyeta tasmād evaṃ kuru prabho // Rm_12.262{60} //
XXratnml_u:4940: iti bhāryāvacaḥ śrutvā sa sārthādhipatir mudā /
XXratnml_u:4941: tatheti pratisaṃśrutya punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_12.263{61} //
XXratnml_u:4942: tāvad imāni sarvāṇi ratnāni te samarppaye /
XXratnml_u:4943: paścāt kāle sasaṃghaṃ taṃ pūjayiṣye munīśvaraṃ // Rm_12.264{62} //
XXratnml_u:4945: ity uktvā sarvaratnāni bhāryāyāṃ sa nyadhāpayet // Rm_12.265{63} //
XXratnml_u:4947: gatvā jetavane vihāre tatra dvāre sthito gurum adhūpayet // Rm_12.266{64}
XXratnml_u:4949: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā saṃsmaran prārthayat tathā // Rm_12.267{65} //
XXratnml_u:4951: tadyathā me pratijñātaiḥ pūrayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_12.268{66} //
XXratnml_u:4955: yena sa dhūpa ākāśe prābhyudgamya purīṃ ca tāṃ /
XXratnml_u:4957: tatrāsau sārthabhṛd dṛṣṭvā prātihāryaṃ tad adbhutaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4959: naitan me pratirūpaṃ syād yad ayaṃ sugato jinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4960: mayā nābhyarcito ratnair dhig me cittabhayād drutaṃ // Rm_12.272{70} //
XXratnml_u:4961: yanv ahaṃ sāṃprataṃ nāthaṃ prārthayitvā sasāṃghikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4962: saratnaiḥ pūjayiṣyāmi bhojanaiś ca svake gṛhe // Rm_12.273{71} //
XXratnml_u:4963: ity asau niścayaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:4966: bhavatāṃ pūjanāṃ kartum ichāmi me prasīdatu // Rm_12.275{73} //
XXratnml_u:4967: ity evaṃ prārthite tena sa saṃbuddho munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:4970: praṇatvā ca muneḥ pādau sahasā svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_12.277{75} //
XXratnml_u:4971: tatra sa bhāryyayā sārddhaṃ vaṃdhumitra janair api /
XXratnml_u:4972: praṇītaṃ bhojyapūjāṃgaṃ sādhayām āsa satvaraṃ // Rm_12.278{76} //
XXratnml_u:4974: vihāre sahasā gatvā natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_12.279{77} //
XXratnml_u:4976: tad bhavān sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ samāgantuṃ samarhati // Rm_12.280{78} //
XXratnml_u:4977: ity evaṃ prārthite tena sa saṃbuddhaḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4978: pratasthe sūryyavan mārge prātihāryaṃ pradarśayan // Rm_12.281{79} //
XXratnml_u:4979: tataḥ kramāt purīṃ prāpya tad gṛhaṃ samupāviśat /
XXratnml_u:4980: tad datte pādyaṃ ādāya śuddhāsane nyaṣīdata // Rm_12.282{80} //
XXratnml_u:4981: tatas tān sāṃghikān sarvān saṃbuddhapramukhān kramāt /
XXratnml_u:4985: tataś ca bhojanānte sa śodhayitvā bhujādikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:4987: apanīya ca pātrāṇi tāmbūlādīn aḍhaukayat // Rm_12.285{83} //
XXratnml_u:4989: etaiḥ sarvaṃ suratnais taṃ saṃbuddhaiḥ samavākiran // Rm_12.286{84} //
XXratnml_u:4991: muner upari khe gatvā chatrībhūtvā sthitā vabhau // Rm_12.287{85} //
XXratnml_u:4992: tatas taṃ sa gṛhī dṛṣṭvā dviguṇasaṃpramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:4993: pādau tasya muner natvā praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_12.288{86} //
XXratnml_u:4997: bhītān āśvāsya saṃbodhau sthāpayiṣyāmi nirvṛtau // Rm_12.290{88} //
XXratnml_u:4999: saṃbodhau nihitaṃ cittaṃ jñātvā smitaṃ vyadhāt tathā // Rm_12.291{89} //
XXratnml_u:5002: tatas te bhāsvarāḥ sarve pravisṛtāḥ samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5003: kecid ūrddhaṃ gatāḥ kecin madhyaṃ kecid rasātale // Rm_12.293{91} //
XXratnml_u:5004: kecid adho gatā yās te sarve te narakeṣu ca /
XXratnml_u:5007: ye śītanarakās teṣu nyapatad uṣṇikāś ca te // Rm_12.295{93} //
XXratnml_u:5008: ye ye taiḥ kiraṇaiḥ spṛṣṭās te te sarve sukhānvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5009: yadā te sukhasaṃprāptās tadā te vismayānvitāḥ // Rm_12.296{94} //
XXratnml_u:5010: aho naḥ sukham adyaivaṃ katham etad vyacintayan /
XXratnml_u:5011: kiṃ nu vayam itaś cyutvā kutra yātāsma sāṃprataṃ // Rm_12.297{95} //
XXratnml_u:5012: āhosvid upapannāḥ syur anyatra bhuvaneṣv api /
XXratnml_u:5013: iti saṃdehināṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paribodhane // Rm_12.298{96} //
XXratnml_u:5014: bhagavān nirmite buddhaṃ preṣayan narakān prati /
XXratnml_u:5015: dṛṣṭvā taṃ nirmitaṃ muniṃ vismitā harṣitāś ca vai // Rm_12.299{97} //
XXratnml_u:5016: te sarve narakā lokāḥ saṃmīlya saṃvabhāṣire /
XXratnml_u:5017: na bhavanta itaś cyutvā gatāsmānyatra bhūmiṣu // Rm_12.300{98} //
XXratnml_u:5018: kiṃs tv ayaṃ nu mahāsatvaḥ hy apūrvadarśanaḥ pumān /
XXratnml_u:5020: nūnam asyānubhāvena duḥkhāni samitāni ca // Rm_12.301{99} //
XXratnml_u:5021: tad vayam enam ānamya vaṃde mayā pramuktaye /
XXratnml_u:5022: iti saṃbhāṣya te sarve natvā tac charaṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_12.302{100} //
XXratnml_u:5024: iti te nirmite tasmin prasādya cittam āratāḥ // Rm_12.303{1} //
XXratnml_u:5026: evaṃ te bhānavaḥ sarve sarvatra narakeṣv api // Rm_12.304{2} //
XXratnml_u:5027: prodyante nārakān sarvān pratyāyayur muneḥ puraḥ /
XXratnml_u:5028: tathā tad bhānavaś caivam upariṣṭāṃ gatā api // Rm_12.305{3} //
XXratnml_u:5030: avabhāsya kramāt sarvān devalokān abhāsayan // Rm_12.306{4} //
XXratnml_u:5032: evaṃ sarvāś ca tān sarvān avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ // Rm_12.307{5} //
XXratnml_u:5033: gāthāḥ prodghoṣayantaś ca pralayaṃ saugate vṛṣe /
XXratnml_u:5034: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaśūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ // Rm_12.308{6} //
XXratnml_u:5035: tasmāt māraṃ parityajya gachadhvaṃ śaraṇaṃ muneḥ /
XXratnml_u:5038: yo 'py asmin dharmavinaye hy apramattaś cariṣyati // Rm_12.310{8} //
XXratnml_u:5040: atha te bhānavaḥ sarve traidhātubhuvaneṣv api /
XXratnml_u:5041: sarvān satvān samuddhṛtya punaḥ pratyāyayur muneḥ // Rm_12.312{10} //
XXratnml_u:5042: atha te bhānavaḥ sarve bhagavantaṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:5043: pradakṣiṇatrayaṃ kṛtvā mūrddhni cāntardadhur muneḥ // Rm_12.313{11} //
XXratnml_u:5045: tat tadadbhutam ālokya vabhūvur vismayoddhatāḥ // Rm_12.314{12} //
XXratnml_u:5047: bhagavantaṃ guruṃ natvā papracha smitakāraṇaṃ // Rm_12.315{12!} //
XXratnml_u:5049: vinirgatā diśaḥ sarvān avabhāsya śatā punaḥ // Rm_12.316{13} //
XXratnml_u:5050: bhavān hi sugato śāstā saṃbuddho bhagavañ jinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5053: tad bhava bhagavaṃ kasmāt smitaiḥ karoti sāṃprataṃ /
XXratnml_u:5054: dṛṣṭvaivaṃ taṃ smitaṃ sarve ime lokāḥ pravismitāḥ // Rm_12.318{15} //
XXratnml_u:5056: darśayanti smitaṃ kecit tat kena bhavataḥ smṛtaṃ // Rm_12.319{16} //
XXratnml_u:5057: tad etad dhetum ichanti śrotuṃ sarve ime janāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5058: tad etat kāraṇaṃ śāstaḥ samādeṣṭuṃ samarhati // Rm_12.320{17} //
XXratnml_u:5060: tatheti pratisaṃmodya tam ānaṃdaṃ vabhāṣata // Rm_12.321{18} //
XXratnml_u:5061: evam etat tathānaṃda yathaiva bhāṣasi tvayā /
XXratnml_u:5062: tat smitaṃ yadarthaṃ me tad vakṣye śṛṇutādarāt // Rm_12.322{19} //
XXratnml_u:5064: ebhī ratnaiś ca satkṛtya kṛtā pūjā svabhaktitaḥ // Rm_12.323{20} //
XXratnml_u:5066: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāpya pūryya pāramitā daśa // Rm_12.324{21} //
XXratnml_u:5068: saṃbodhiṃ samavāpyaivaṃ jitvā māragaṇān api // Rm_12.325{22} //
XXratnml_u:5070: dharmarājo jagaṃnātho loke śāstā bhaviṣyati // Rm_12.326{23} //
XXratnml_u:5074: dharnio hi jagatāṃ mitram ihāmutra samantataḥ // Rm_12.328{25} //
XXratnml_u:5076: tasmād dharmaṃ samādhāya saṃcaradhvaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_12.329{26} //
XXratnml_u:5077: tena vā maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvabhāvī bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.330{27} //
XXratnml_u:5079: tatheti moditas taṃ ca guruṃ natvā sa naṃdataḥ // Rm_12.331{28} //
XXratnml_u:5080: so 'pi sārthapatiś caiva svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ kila /
XXratnml_u:5083: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ vyatijñapat // Rm_12.333{30} //
XXratnml_u:5086: bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhavāmy aham upāsakaḥ // Rm_12.334{31} //
XXratnml_u:5087: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kāritaṃ cānumoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5088: tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tan me dehi śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_12.335{32} //
XXratnml_u:5090: kṣamasva me 'parādhatvaṃ tan māṃ rakṣa mudā tathā // Rm_12.336{33} //
XXratnml_u:5091: evaṃ tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa saṃbuddho 'bhyadhāt punaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5092: yathā te 'bhihitaṃ sādho tathā saṃsetsyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.337{34} //
XXratnml_u:5095: tatas tvaṃ kramato hy evaṃ pūrya pāramitā drutaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5096: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhaved bodhim avāpnuyāt // Rm_12.339{36} //
XXratnml_u:5098: tena te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_12.340{37} //
XXratnml_u:5099: jayo 'stu te sadā bodhau siddhyatu praṇihitaṃ drutaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5100: ciraṃ jīvaṃ hitaṃ loke dharmaṃ dhṛtvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_12.341{38} //
XXratnml_u:5101: ity asau bhagavān buddhas tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ śubhāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5102: saṃghaiḥ saha samutthāya svaṃ vihāraṃ yayau tataḥ // Rm_12.342{39} //
XXratnml_u:5105: tathā sarve 'pi satvāś ca śrutvā tasya pravṛttitāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5107: etat me guruṇākhyātaṃ saṃśrutaṃ yathā mayā /
XXratnml_u:5108: tathātraivaṃ tava prītyā kathyate saṃprabudhyatāṃ // Rm_12.345{42} //
XXratnml_u:5109: tathā rājan tvayāpy evaṃ svayaṃ dhṛtvā vṛṣaṃ śubhe /
XXratnml_u:5110: bodhayitvā prajāś cāpi sthāpanīyāḥ sadā śubhe // Rm_12.346{43} //
XXratnml_u:5111: evaṃ cet te sadāpy evaṃ sarvatrāpi sumaṃgalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5112: bhaven nūnaṃ mahārājan satyam etan na saṃśayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5113: dharmeṇa nirjitaṃ pāpaṃ dharmeṇa jīyate kudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:5114: dharmeṇa nirjitā mārā dharmeṇa bodhim āpnuyāt /
XXratnml_u:5117: tathā taṃ kramaṇo rāja bodhicaryyāhitāya ca /
XXratnml_u:5121: śrutvā rājo tathety evaṃ pratyanandan sapārṣadaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5129: yaḥ śrīmāñ chrīghano loke saddharmaiḥ samupādiśat /
XXratnml_u:5130: śāsanāni trilokeṣu jayantu tasya sarvadā // Rm_13.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:5131: avadānatatvaṃ vakṣyāmi natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ guruṃ /
XXratnml_u:5134: ekasmin samaye tatra sa rājā svajanaiḥ saha // Rm_13.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:5135: paurikaiś ca sabhāṃ kṛtvā saddharmaṃ śrotum aicchata /
XXratnml_u:5136: tadā sa saugato bhikṣur upagupto jināṃśajaḥ // Rm_13.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:5140: athāśoko mahīpālaḥ sa maṃtripaurikaiḥ saha // Rm_13.6{6} //
XXratnml_u:5142: sthitvā bhūmau svajānubhyām uttarāsaṅgam udvahan // Rm_13.7{7} //
XXratnml_u:5143: kṛtāñjaliḥ puṭo natvā punar evam abhāṣata /
