XXratnml_u:5144: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi saddharmaṃ sukhasaṃpradaṃ // Rm_13.8{8} //
XXratnml_u:5145: yathoktaṃ śrīmunīndreṇa tathā deṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati /
XXratnml_u:5146: evaṃ tena mahīndreṇa prārthite sa yatīśvaraḥ // Rm_13.9{9} //
XXratnml_u:5148: sādhu suṣṭhu mahārāja śṛṇu saddharmam ādarāt // Rm_13.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:5149: yathā me guruṇā khyātaṃ tathā vakṣyāmi te hite /
XXratnml_u:5150: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śakyasiṃho śubhākaraḥ // Rm_13.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:5164: śrāvakair bhikṣubhiḥ sārddhaṃ bodhisatvair upāsakaiḥ // Rm_13.18{18} //
XXratnml_u:5167: evaṃ tatra sabhāsīnaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ dharmabhāṣiṇaṃ // Rm_13.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:5168: dṛṣṭvā dharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarvalokāḥ samāyayuḥ // Rm_13.20{19!} //
XXratnml_u:5169: daivā daityāś ca siddhāś ca yakṣagaṃdharvakinnarāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5170: grahā vidyādharāḥ sādhyā nāgeṃdrā garuḍā api // Rm_13.21{20} //
XXratnml_u:5171: sarve 'pi lokapālāś ca munayaś ca maharṣayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5172: yatayo yoginaś cāpi tīrthikāś ca tapaśvinaḥ // Rm_13.22{21} //
XXratnml_u:5173: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś cāpi vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca maṃtriṇaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5174: amātyāḥ koṭṭavārāś ca sārthavāhā mahājanāḥ // Rm_13.23{22} //
XXratnml_u:5175: śilpino vaṇijaś cāpi gṛhasthāḥ paurikā janāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5176: tathā jānapadāś cāpi grāmyāḥ kārpaṭikā api // Rm_13.24{23} //
XXratnml_u:5180: tatra sarve praviṣṭās te dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ jinaṃ // Rm_13.26{25} //
XXratnml_u:5181: vanditvānanditāḥ sarve pūjāṃ cakrur yathākramaṃ // Rm_13.27{26!} //
XXratnml_u:5183: dharmmaṃ śrotuṃ puraskṛtya tasthuḥ sāñjalayo mudā // Rm_13.28{27} //
XXratnml_u:5184: atha sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃl lokān dharmavāñchinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5187: dharmaṃ prakāśayaṃ loke tasthau dīptāṃśumān iva // Rm_13.30{29} //
XXratnml_u:5193: ādāya ratisaṃrakto reme nityaṃ yathāsukhaṃ // Rm_13.33{32} //
XXratnml_u:5195: tataḥ pravṛddhagarbhā sā pāṇḍuvarṇā vyarājata // Rm_13.34{33} //
XXratnml_u:5196: tataḥ sā garbhasaṃjātaṃ putraṃ tasyām upāśritaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5197: putraṃ matvābhinaṃdaṃtī bharttāram evam abravīt // Rm_13.35{34} //
XXratnml_u:5198: svāmin garbhe prajāto me yat kukṣau dakṣiṇāśritaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5199: dārako 'yaṃ bhavet putraḥ nūnaṃ tasmāt pramodaya // Rm_13.36{35} //
XXratnml_u:5200: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ praharṣitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5201: garbhe sa vyāśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā mudaivaṃ samudānayat // Rm_13.37{36} //
XXratnml_u:5202: vata me jāyate putras tad ahaṃ bhāgyavān bhave /
XXratnml_u:5203: putramukhaṃ hi paśyeyaṃ vaṃśasthitir bhaved api // Rm_13.38{37} //
XXratnml_u:5205: tenānayor dvayor astu jananīputrayoḥ śivaṃ // Rm_13.39{38} //
XXratnml_u:5206: evaṃ proktvā gṛhasthaḥ sa śraddhayā saṃpramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5207: bhikṣvarthibrāhmaṇebhyaś ca dadau dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_13.40{39} //
XXratnml_u:5210: tac chubhaṃ prārthayan nityaṃ tasthau putrasamutsukaḥ // Rm_13.41{40} //
XXratnml_u:5212: asūta samaye putraṃ suṃdaraṃ lakṣaṇānvitaṃ // Rm_13.42{41} //
XXratnml_u:5213: tataḥ sa janakaḥ śrutvā saṃprajātaṃ sutaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:5214: sahasā samupāsritya dadarśa taṃ sasuṃdaraṃ // Rm_13.43{42} //
XXratnml_u:5216: dṛṣṭvāpi suciraṃ paśyann eva tasthāv atṛptitaḥ // Rm_13.44{43} //
XXratnml_u:5217: tato jātimahaṃ kṛtvā tasya pitrā prasādinā /
XXratnml_u:5218: vaḍika iti nāmnā prakhyāpito 'bhūt sa dārakaḥ // Rm_13.45{45!} //
XXratnml_u:5221: tathā sa vaḍiko vālo 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:5222: pālyamānaḥ pravṛddho 'bhūt hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_13.47{47} //
XXratnml_u:5225: tatra sa sadguruṃ natvā kramāl lipīn mudāgrahīt /
XXratnml_u:5227: tataḥ sa gurubhiḥ samyac chiṣyamāṇaḥ subuddhimān /
XXratnml_u:5228: adhītya sarvaśāstrāṇi vidyāpāraṃ yayau laghu // Rm_13.50{50} //
XXratnml_u:5230: dehe kasmāt samutpanno mahāvyādhiḥ parākramat // Rm_13.51{51} //
XXratnml_u:5234: krandantaṃ sa pitā dṛṣṭvā kṛpayaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_13.53{53} //
XXratnml_u:5236: asahyavedanākrānto bhoktum api na vāñchati // Rm_13.54{54} //
XXratnml_u:5237: avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ yāyāt kathaṃ jīved abhuktavān /
XXratnml_u:5238: mṛte putre mariṣye 'haṃ snehaduḥkhaṃ kathaṃ sahe // Rm_13.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:5240: tam eva svātmajaṃ paśyaṃs tasthau snehābhivandhitaḥ // Rm_13.56{56} //
XXratnml_u:5245: sarve te rogiṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā snehārttā evam abruvan // Rm_13.58{58} //
XXratnml_u:5246: kiṃ bho svasthaṃ na te dehe bhoktuṃ kiṃ vā na vāñchasi /
XXratnml_u:5247: bhuṃkṣva yathepsitaṃ pathyaṃ tiṣṭha dhairyaṃ samāśrayan // Rm_13.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:5248: iti prokte 'pi taiḥ sarvaiḥ sa vaḍiko jvarānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5249: dṛṣṭvaiva tān muhuḥ paśyan naiva kiñcid abhāṣata // Rm_13.60{60} //
XXratnml_u:5250: tataḥ sarve 'pi te dṛṣṭvā taṃ vaḍikaṃ rujāturaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5253: sahasā vaidyam āhūya darśayasva samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:5254: upadiṣṭaṃ yathā tena vaidyena sudhiyā tathā /
XXratnml_u:5257: kramād asya śarīrastho rogaḥ śāntiṃ vrajed dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:5259: svakuladharmam ādhāya sukhaṃ jīvec chubhe caran // Rm_13.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:5260: iti matvā mahābhāga mā kṛthās tad viṣādanaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5261: dhairyam ālamvya devāṃś ca smṛtvā bhuktvā sukhaṃ vasa // Rm_13.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:5262: ity evaṃ samupādiśya tad gṛhasthāt samutthitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5263: sarve te snehaduḥkhārttāḥ svasvageham upācarat // Rm_13.67{67} //
XXratnml_u:5264: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛt tasya putrasya rogaśāṃtaye /
XXratnml_u:5266: tasya roganimittaṃ sa vaidyo dṛṣṭvā samīkṣya ca /
XXratnml_u:5268: tathāpi tasya tadrogaḥ parivṛddho dine dine /
XXratnml_u:5269: kenāpi hy upacāreṇa naiva śāntim upāyayau // Rm_13.70{70} //
XXratnml_u:5270: tadrogaṃ varddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakaḥ sa viṣāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5272: tataḥ sa bhūtiko dṛṣṭvā tasya rogapraśāntaye /
XXratnml_u:5273: sa bhūtadevatābhyaś ca valiṃ prādād yathāvidhi // Rm_13.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:5275: kiñcid api viśeṣeṇa naiva śāntim upāyayau // Rm_13.73{73} //
XXratnml_u:5276: tataḥ sa janako dṛṣṭvā tad rogaṃ parivarddhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5281: tathā sa janakas tasya rogiṇo grahaśāntaye /
XXratnml_u:5283: tathāpi tasya tadrogo varddhito na śamaṃ yayau /
XXratnml_u:5284: daivena samupāghrāte tadupāye na siddhyate // Rm_13.77{77} //
XXratnml_u:5285: tathā sa janakas tasya putrasya rogavṛddhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5286: dṛṣṭvā nirāśayā bhinnacitto mūrcchām upāyayau // Rm_13.78{78} //
XXratnml_u:5287: tadā sā supriyā bhāryā bharttāraṃ taṃ vimohitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5289: svāmin dhairyyaṃ samālambya tyaja citte vimohatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5290: kim asmākaṃ prayatnena daivasyātra pramāṇike // Rm_13.80{80} //
XXratnml_u:5292: yad abhāvi na tad bhāvi bhāvi cen na tad anyathā // Rm_13.81{81} //
XXratnml_u:5296: kuladevaṃ samabhyarcya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.83{83} //
XXratnml_u:5297: prasīda me kuleśa tvaṃ kṣamasva hy aparādhatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5298: tavaiva śaraṇastho 'haṃ tan me putraṃ prarakṣatāṃ // Rm_13.84{84} //
XXratnml_u:5300: tasya rogo vivṛddho 'bhūn naiva śāmyam upākramat // Rm_13.85{85} //
XXratnml_u:5301: tathā brahmādidevāṃś ca sarvān lokādhipān api /
XXratnml_u:5307: tathāpi tasya rogo na śamito 'bhūt pravarddhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5308: tatas taṃ janako dṛṣṭvā nirāśā mūrchito 'patat // Rm_13.89{89} //
XXratnml_u:5309: tadā sa vaḍiko rogī pitaraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5310: pṛthivyāṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śanair nīcasvaro 'vadat // Rm_13.90{90} //
XXratnml_u:5311: hā hā me jāvate pāpaṃ yenāyaṃ patitaḥ pitā /
XXratnml_u:5314: hā tātottiṣṭha māṃ paśya mā tyajātmajaṃ āturaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5315: dhairyyam ālamvya saṃdhāya rakṣa māṃ samupasthitaḥ // Rm_13.92{92} //
XXratnml_u:5316: ity asau vilapan putraḥ pitaraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5317: dṛṣṭvā bhojanakety aśru muñcaṃs tasthau nirāśritaḥ // Rm_13.93{93} //
XXratnml_u:5318: tadā sā supriyā bhāryyā bharttāraṃ taṃ vimūrchitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5320: svāmin dhairyaṃ samālaṃbya paśya māṃ te priyaṃ satīṃ /
XXratnml_u:5321: tyaktvā dainyaṃ samādhāya paśyan rakṣātmakaṃ priyaṃ // Rm_13.95{95} //
XXratnml_u:5322: iti bhāryoditaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhastho samutthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5323: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ supriyāṃ bhāryāṃ putraṃ caivam abhāṣata // Rm_13.96{96} //
XXratnml_u:5324: hā daiva kiṃ mayā pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ dāruṇaṃ purā /
XXratnml_u:5325: yenāyaṃ sukṛtī putraḥ tyaktvā māṃ kva prayāsyati // Rm_13.97{97} //
XXratnml_u:5326: hā hā me saṃpadaś caitāḥ samṛddhāḥ samupārjitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5327: ko nu bhoktā bhaved āsāṃ vyarthaṃ nakṣyanti sarvaśaḥ // Rm_13.98{98} //
XXratnml_u:5328: kim atrāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yāsyāmi śaraṇaṃ ca kaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5329: ko nu māṃ sahasā rakṣed datvā putrasya jīvitaṃ // Rm_13.99{99} //
XXratnml_u:5330: kim atrāsya rujaḥ śāntyai kariṣyāmi pratikriyāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5331: na jāne parimūḍho 'smi cetanā me na vidyate // Rm_13.100{100} //
XXratnml_u:5334: yad ime tīrthikā vijñā bhagavanto vicakṣaṇāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5335: sarvajñāḥ sadguṇādhārāḥ śāstāro me hitaṃkarāḥ // Rm_13.102{102} //
XXratnml_u:5336: tat tān sarvān samāmaṃtrya gṛhe bhokṣyaiḥ samarcayan /
XXratnml_u:5337: imaṃ putraṃ puraḥ sthāpya darśayeyaṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_13.103{103} //
XXratnml_u:5338: tat sudṛṣṭiprasādena nūnam asya bhavec chuvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5339: tato hi kramaśo rogāḥ śāmyeyuḥ sarvathā laghu // Rm_13.104{104} //
XXratnml_u:5340: tadāyam ātmajaḥ puṣṭo na rogī sutanuḥ sukhī /
XXratnml_u:5341: kṛtī śubharato bhogī kuladharme samācaret // Rm_13.105{105} //
XXratnml_u:5342: iti niścitya sa śreṣṭhī tatra tīrthyāśrame gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5343: tān sarvāṃs tīrthikān natvā prārthayed evam ādarāt // Rm_13.106{106} //
XXratnml_u:5344: namo vo brahmavijñebhyo bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:5345: vijñapyate yad arthaṃ tad anugrahītum arhata // Rm_13.107{107} //
XXratnml_u:5348: sarve taṃ samupāmaṃtrya pramodayitum abruvan // Rm_13.108{108} //
XXratnml_u:5349: sādhu vada mahāsādho yat te kāryaṃ samīhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5350: tat sarvaṃ sarvathāsmābhiḥ kṛtam evaṃ kariṣyate // Rm_13.109{109} //
XXratnml_u:5351: iti tais tīrthikaiḥ prokte sa śreṣṭhī saṃprasāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5352: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_13.110{110} //
XXratnml_u:5354: tat sarvaṃ pratijānīta yad arthaṃ samupācare // Rm_13.111{111} //
XXratnml_u:5355: tathāpi cārthayiṣye 'tra yan me kaṣṭaṃ pravarttate /
XXratnml_u:5356: tad vo vijñāpanaṃ kartuṃ bhavataḥ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.112{112} //
XXratnml_u:5357: yan mayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tena me svātmajādhunā /
XXratnml_u:5359: nānāsvastividhānair hi tasya rogo na śāmyati /
XXratnml_u:5360: bhiṣajāṃ kṛtayatnāni na siddhyanti kathaṃ cana // Rm_13.114{114} //
XXratnml_u:5361: anekā devatāś cāpi prābhyarcya prārthito mayā /
XXratnml_u:5362: tathāpi śāmyate naiva tasya rogo vivarddhitaḥ // Rm_13.115{115} //
XXratnml_u:5364: tathā tathā na tadrogaḥ praśāmyati pravarddhyate // Rm_13.116{116} //
XXratnml_u:5365: kim upāyaṃ kariṣyāmi kena śāmyeta tadgadaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5366: tad upāyaṃ pradātavyaṃ yenāśu śāmyate kramāt // Rm_13.117{117} //
XXratnml_u:5367: iti vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:5368: tan me 'nukampayāsu no rogaśāntir vidhīyatāṃ // Rm_13.118{118} //
XXratnml_u:5370: tan me sukṛpayā dṛṣṭyā paritrātuṃ samarhata // Rm_13.119{119} //
XXratnml_u:5371: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te tīrthikā api /
XXratnml_u:5372: śreṣṭhinaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samabruvan // Rm_13.120{120} //
XXratnml_u:5373: śṛṇu sādho yad asmābhir hitārthaṃ te pracakṣyatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5374: tat satyaṃ naḥ parijñāya pramāṇīkriyatāṃ kila // Rm_13.121{121} //
XXratnml_u:5376: tasmād atra viṣādatvaṃ mā kṛthā dhairyam āśraya // Rm_13.122{122} //
XXratnml_u:5377: adyaiva sahasā gatvā vayaṃ dṛṣṭvā tavātmajaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5378: niḥpāpaṃ nīrujaṃ svāsthyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ sujīvitaṃ // Rm_13.123{123} //
XXratnml_u:5379: apy etad vacanaṃ satyaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā pramāṇaya /
XXratnml_u:5381: anyathā na bhavet kvāpi hy asmākaṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ // Rm_13.124{124} //
XXratnml_u:5382: iti tais tīrthikaiḥ proktaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasattamaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5383: tatheti pratiharṣitvā natvā tān svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_13.125{125} //
XXratnml_u:5384: tatra sa gṛha āsādya dāsidāsajanaiḥ saha /
XXratnml_u:5386: tasminn eva kṣaṇe tatra sarve te tīrthikā mudā /
XXratnml_u:5388: tathā tān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā śreṣṭhī sa moditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5390: tataś ca bhojanānte sa vaḍikaṃ taṃ priyātmajaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5392: te sarve tīrthikā dṛṣṭvā vaḍikaṃ taṃ rujānvitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5395: tatpātakavimuktyai tu dātavyaṃ dānam ādarāt // Rm_13.131{131} //
XXratnml_u:5398: yady etad dīyate dānaṃ tvayā gṛhapate tathā /
XXratnml_u:5403: tataḥ sarve 'pi rogāś ca vinakṣyanti kramād drutaṃ // Rm_13.135{135} //
XXratnml_u:5404: tato rogair vimukto 'yaṃ kuśalī svāsthyam āpnuyāt /
XXratnml_u:5405: tataḥ puṣṭo viśuddhāṅgaḥ suśīlaḥ sukṛtī sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:5407: iti matvā tvayā sādho dātavyaṃ dānam ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:5408: anyathā na bhavet svasti tavāsya naṃdanasya ca // Rm_13.137{167} //
XXratnml_u:5409: iti tair gaditaṃ śrutvā sa śreṣṭhī paribodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5410: tasyātmajasya trāṇārthaṃ tathā dātum udācarat // Rm_13.138{[138]} //
XXratnml_u:5411: tataḥ sa punar abhyarcya tān sarvāns tīrthikān patīn /
XXratnml_u:5413: tatas te tīrthikāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā tāni pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5414: sarvāny api pratigṛhya tathāśīrvacanaṃ daduḥ // Rm_13.140{140} //
XXratnml_u:5415: svasty astu te sadā sādho kalyāṇam astu sarvathā /
XXratnml_u:5417: nīrogī suciraṃ jīvyā jayo 'stu te samantataḥ // Rm_13.141{141} //
XXratnml_u:5418: etad eva samādiśya sarve te tīrthikās tataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5419: tāni sarvāṇi vastūni pratigṛhyāśramaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_13.142{142} //
XXratnml_u:5420: tathāpi tasya rogā na śamitā varddhitāḥ kramāt /
XXratnml_u:5422: tatas taj janako dṛṣṭvā svātmajaṃ taṃ rujāturaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5423: nirāśāmūrchito bhūmau nipataṃ vyalapat tathā // Rm_13.144{144} //
XXratnml_u:5424: hā daiva kiṃ mayā pāpaṃ dāruṇaṃ prakṛtaṃ purā /
XXratnml_u:5425: yato 'yaṃ svātmajaḥ putraḥ puro me maraṇaṃ vrajet // Rm_13.145{145} //
XXratnml_u:5427: sarvāṇy etāni matpāpair nisphalāni bhavanti hi // Rm_13.146{146} //
XXratnml_u:5428: kiṃ mayātrāpi karttavyaṃ ko 'tra me hitam ādiśet /
XXratnml_u:5429: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi ko 'pi trātā na vidyate // Rm_13.147{147} //
XXratnml_u:5430: kasyātra śaraṇaṃ yāsye ko no rakṣed dayādṛśā /
XXratnml_u:5431: sarve vayaṃ vinaṣṭāsma hā daiva śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.148{148} //
XXratnml_u:5432: ity evaṃ vilapaṃtaṃ taṃ janakaṃ vaḍiko 'pi saḥ /
XXratnml_u:5433: dṛṣṭvā śanaiḥ samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_13.149{149} //
XXratnml_u:5434: bho tāta kiṃ tvayātrāpi karttavyaṃ hi mayāpi ca /
XXratnml_u:5435: sarveṣām api jantūnāṃ daivagatiḥ pramāṇikā // Rm_13.150{150} //
XXratnml_u:5436: iti matvā viṣādatvaṃ hṛdaye mā kṛthās tyaja /
XXratnml_u:5437: saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityam anusmaran // Rm_13.151{151} //
XXratnml_u:5440: tad evaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā saddharmaṃ samupāśrayan /
XXratnml_u:5441: saṃghānāṃ bhajanaṃ kṛtvā cinu puṇyaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.153{153} //
XXratnml_u:5442: triratne sādhitaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇuyāt kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:5443: yadi daivād vipattiḥ syāt puṇyaṃ tu labhate varaṃ // Rm_13.154{154} //
XXratnml_u:5444: puṇyena rakṣyate lokaḥ puṇyena sadgatiṃ vrajet /
XXratnml_u:5445: tasmāt puṇyaṃ mahāratnaṃ cinu dhairyaṃ samāśrayan // Rm_13.155{155} //
XXratnml_u:5447: iti matvāpi taṃ buddhaṃ smṛtvā bhaja samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.156{156} //
XXratnml_u:5448: tathāhaṃ vā tam evātra saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajan /
XXratnml_u:5449: saṃsmṛtvā bhajanaṃ kurvan vrajeya maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.157{157} //
XXratnml_u:5450: yadi tasya jinendrasya kṛpāsti mayi pāpini /
XXratnml_u:5454: sarvathā durgatiṃ tyaktvā sadgatiṃ punar āpnuyāṃ // Rm_13.159{159} //
XXratnml_u:5455: evaṃ jñātvā tvayā tāta mā kriyatāṃ viṣādatā /
XXratnml_u:5456: saṃsāre 'vaśyaṃ marttavyaṃ sarveṣām api janmināṃ // Rm_13.160{160} //
XXratnml_u:5457: ity uktvā sa rujārtto 'pi vaḍiko dhairyyam āśrayan /
XXratnml_u:5458: saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā smṛtvā tasthau samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.161{161} //
XXratnml_u:5459: tathā sa gṛhabhṛc chreṣṭhī śrutvaitad ātmajoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5460: satyam etat parijñāya buddhaṃ smṛtvā tathāvadat // Rm_13.162{162} //
XXratnml_u:5461: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ca sadā smare /
XXratnml_u:5462: adyārabhya sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje // Rm_13.163{163} //
XXratnml_u:5463: yadi vo 'sti kṛpā loke rakṣantu naḥ suduḥkhinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5464: sarvathā kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭvāśu trātum arhati // Rm_13.164{164} //
XXratnml_u:5466: tathāsmān kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_13.165{165} //
XXratnml_u:5468: kṛpayānugrahaṃ kṛtvā putraratnaṃ prayaccha me // Rm_13.166{166} //
XXratnml_u:5470: bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitvā caratu vratam ādarāt // Rm_13.167{167} //
XXratnml_u:5471: ity evaṃ smaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaśaraṇaṃ vrajan /
XXratnml_u:5472: sa śreṣṭhī taṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau mohavinoditaḥ // Rm_13.168{168} //
XXratnml_u:5473: tasminn eva kṣaṇe lokāṃ trātuṃ sa bhagavān muniḥ /
XXratnml_u:5474: saṃpaśyan kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā prādrākṣīt tān saduḥkhinaḥ // Rm_13.169{169} //
XXratnml_u:5475: tathā tān duḥkhino dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa jineśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:5476: sahasā tān paritrātuṃ buddharasmiṃ vyamuñcata // Rm_13.170{170} //
XXratnml_u:5478: samantāt samatikramya tad gṛham avabhāsitaṃ // Rm_13.171{171} //
XXratnml_u:5479: tato maitryaṃśavaś cāpi tena bhagavatā punaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5480: samutṣṛṣṭās tanau tasya paryaspṛśan prasāditāḥ // Rm_13.172{172} //
XXratnml_u:5481: tatas tasya tanus taiḥ saṃspṛṣṭamātre samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5483: tataḥ sa vaḍikaḥ svāsthyaṃ prāpya nirmalamānasaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5484: vismitaḥ pitaraṃ paśyan samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_13.174{174} //
XXratnml_u:5486: aho saṃghaprabhāvatvaṃ paśya tāta muneḥ prabhāṃ // Rm_13.175{175} //
XXratnml_u:5489: dhanyo 'yaṃ bhagavān buddho jayatv evaṃ sadā sthitaḥ // Rm_13.176{176} //
XXratnml_u:5491: pāpaiś cāpi vimukto 'ham iti satyaṃ pramanyate // Rm_13.177{177} //
XXratnml_u:5492: tasmāt tam eva śāstāraṃ saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:5494: evaṃ buddhaguṇān smṛtvā vaḍikaḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5495: kṛtāñjaliḥ smaran bhūyaḥ praṇatvaivam ayācata // Rm_13.179{179} //
XXratnml_u:5496: namas te bhagavan nātha bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:5497: yāvadbhavaṃ triratnānāṃ bhaveyaṃ sevakaḥ sadā // Rm_13.180{180} //
XXratnml_u:5498: ity evaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā vaḍikaḥ so 'bhibodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5499: bhūyo bhūyaḥ smaran natvā tasthau svāsthyatvam āgataḥ // Rm_13.181{181} //
XXratnml_u:5500: tadā sa bhagavān buddho dṛṣṭvā taṃ śuddhamānasaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5501: saddharmaṃ samupādeṣṭuṃ tad dvāre samupāsarat // Rm_13.182{182} //
XXratnml_u:5503: dṛṣṭvaiva vismito dvāsthaḥ sahasā gṛham āviśat // Rm_13.183{183} //
XXratnml_u:5504: tatra gṛhapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā vaḍikaṃ taṃ ca sādaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:5507: tad atra sahasopetya samāmaṃtrya praveśaya // Rm_13.185{185} //
XXratnml_u:5508: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā vaḍikaḥ sa prasāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5509: utthitaḥ sahasopetya taṃ munīndraṃ mudānamat // Rm_13.186{186} //
XXratnml_u:5510: natvā taṃ sugataṃ gehe prajñapya svāsanaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:5512: svāgataṃ bhagavan vāṃche bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ mune /
XXratnml_u:5514: iti tenodite buddho bhagavān sa samāviśan /
XXratnml_u:5515: svāsane samupāsīno vaḍikaṃ taṃ tathāvadat // Rm_13.189{1691} //
XXratnml_u:5516: kiṃ te vaḍika duḥkhatvaṃ vādhakaś ca kathaṃ vada /
XXratnml_u:5517: iti bhagavatā pṛṣṭo vaḍikaḥ sa tathāvadat // Rm_13.190{190} //
XXratnml_u:5518: kāyikaṃ jāyate duḥkhaṃ cetasikaṃ ca me mune /
XXratnml_u:5519: tad bhavān kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā śamayet tat prabādhanaṃ // Rm_13.191{191} //
XXratnml_u:5520: iti tad vijñāpitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:5524: anena te manodāhaṃ praśāmyeta sadāpi hi // Rm_13.193{193} //
XXratnml_u:5525: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa punar evaṃ vyaciṃtayat /
XXratnml_u:5528: ādāya kṣīrikāṃ nāma mahauṣadhīm upānayat // Rm_13.195{195} //
XXratnml_u:5529: tatra so surarājas taṃ bhagavantaṃ praṇamya tāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5530: mahauṣadhīm upasthāpya pura evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_13.196{196} //
XXratnml_u:5533: ity ukte tena śakreṇa dṛṣṭvā tāṃ bhagavān muniḥ /
XXratnml_u:5534: gṛhītvā vaḍikāyaivaṃ pradatvā caivam ādiśat // Rm_13.198{198} //
XXratnml_u:5536: anayā te śarīre saṃskriyatām upacāraṇaiḥ // Rm_13.199{199} //
XXratnml_u:5538: tatheti tāṃ samādāya yathādiṣṭam upācarat // Rm_13.200{200} //
XXratnml_u:5539: tatas tasya tanū rogair vimuktā paripuṣṭitā /
XXratnml_u:5541: tataḥ śāstrā yathādiṣṭaṃ vaḍikena tathā hṛdi /
XXratnml_u:5542: maitrī prabhāvitā loke svātmaje supriye yathā // Rm_13.202{202} //
XXratnml_u:5543: tadā tasya mahadduḥkhaṃ cetasikaṃ śaśāma tat /
XXratnml_u:5545: tataḥ sa vaḍikaḥ svasthaḥ pariśuddhendriyaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:5546: bhagavantaṃ tam ānamya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.204{104} //
XXratnml_u:5547: vande 'haṃ bhavatāṃ pādau sarvadā śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:5548: tathā ca sarvadā nātha kṛpayā trātum arhati // Rm_13.205{105} //
XXratnml_u:5549: yady evaṃ bhavatāṃ śāstaḥ kṛpādṛṣṭir na vidyate /
XXratnml_u:5550: mṛto 'haṃ narake 'dyāpi gato duḥkhāny avāpnuyāṃ // Rm_13.206{106} //
XXratnml_u:5551: yad evaṃ svasthito jīve tat te kṛpāmbubhāvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5552: tathā me 'nugrahaṃ kartuṃ nityam arhati sarvadā // Rm_13.207{107} //
XXratnml_u:5553: ity evaṃ prārthanāṃ kṛtvā bhūyaḥ sa vaḍiko mudā /
XXratnml_u:5554: sāñjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā paśyaṃs tasthau munīśvaraṃ // Rm_13.208{108} //
XXratnml_u:5556: triratne śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃbuddhaṃ taṃ samarcayat // Rm_13.209{109} //
XXratnml_u:5558: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛc chreṣṭhī dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:5559: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.210{210} //
XXratnml_u:5560: vande te caraṇau śāstaḥ sarvadā śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:5561: evaṃ no 'nugrahaṃ kartuṃm arhati kṛpayā sadā // Rm_13.211{211} //
XXratnml_u:5562: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhas tathāstv iti samādiśat /
XXratnml_u:5563: ṛddhyākāśaṃ samutplutya svam āśramam upāyayau // Rm_13.212{212} //
XXratnml_u:5564: tatra sa bhagavān prāptaḥ sabhāmadhye samāśritaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5565: etad vṛṣṭi samākhyāya tasthau dharmaṃ samādiśat // Rm_13.213{213} //
XXratnml_u:5566: tadā sa vaḍiko bhūyo buddhaguṇān anusmaran /
XXratnml_u:5567: sa saṃghaṃ sugataṃ bhojyaiḥ pūjayituṃ samaichata // Rm_13.214{214} //
XXratnml_u:5568: tadā sa nṛpate rājñaḥ prasenajita ānataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5569: etat sarvaṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ nivedyaivam abhāṣata // Rm_13.215{215} //
XXratnml_u:5571: tat triratnakṛpādṛṣṭer jīve rogair vimocitaḥ // Rm_13.216{216} //
XXratnml_u:5572: tan mayā sa munīndro 'pi sarvasaṃghaiḥ sahādhunā /
XXratnml_u:5573: samāmaṃtrya gṛhe bhojyaiḥ pūjayituṃ samicchyate // Rm_13.217{217} //
XXratnml_u:5577: vaḍikaṃ taiḥ samālokya praśaṃsyaiva samādiśat // Rm_13.219{219} //
XXratnml_u:5578: vaḍika tvaṃ mahāsādhus tad buddhaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5579: tathānuśraddhayā nityaṃ bhaja ratnatrayaṃ sadā // Rm_13.220{220} //
XXratnml_u:5580: iti rājñābhyanujñātaṃ śrutvā sa vaḍiko mudā /
XXratnml_u:5581: nṛpatiṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ svagṛhaṃ samupāyayau // Rm_13.221{221} //
XXratnml_u:5583: śāstu nimaṃtraṇāṃ kartuṃ vihāre samudācaran // Rm_13.222{222} //
XXratnml_u:5584: tatra sa samupāviṣṭo dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:5585: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.223{223} //
XXratnml_u:5587: tathāpy atra bhavadagre prārthaye 'nugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_13.224{224} //
XXratnml_u:5588: yad ahaṃ roganirmuktaḥ puna janma ivāptavān /
XXratnml_u:5589: tad bhavatāṃ kṛpādṛṣṭeḥ prasādād itin manyate // Rm_13.225{225} //
XXratnml_u:5590: tad ahaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvasaṃghānāṃ bhojanair gṛhe /
XXratnml_u:5591: pūjayituṃ samiche tad anugrahītum arhati // Rm_13.226{226} //
XXratnml_u:5593: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
XXratnml_u:5596: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau natvāśu svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_13.228{228} //
XXratnml_u:5597: tatra sa sahasā gehe vandhumitrajanaiḥ saha /
XXratnml_u:5600: prajñapya śuddhite bhūmau maṃdayitvā samantataḥ // Rm_13.230{230} //
XXratnml_u:5601: tatas taṃ śrīghanaṃ buddhaṃ sasaṃghaṃ svajanaiḥ saha /
XXratnml_u:5602: āmaṃtrituṃ vihāre sa sahasā samupācarat // Rm_13.231{231} //
XXratnml_u:5603: tatra sa samupāviṣṭo dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:5604: sasaṃghaṃ sāṃjalir natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_13.232{232} //
XXratnml_u:5606: tad bhavāṃ sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhati // Rm_13.233{233} //
XXratnml_u:5607: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā tatheti sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:5609: tatra mārgeṣu sarvatra nagare ca samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5610: prakāśayan prātihāryaṃ tad gṛhaṃ samupāviśat // Rm_13.235{235} //
XXratnml_u:5611: tatra gṛhe samāsādya pādārghaṃ pratigṛhya saḥ /
XXratnml_u:5612: svāsane samupāviśya kramāt tasthau sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_13.236{236} //
XXratnml_u:5613: tadā sa vaḍiko dṛṣṭvā taṃ buddhaṃ svāsane sthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5615: tataś ca surasair bhojyaiḥ supraṇītaiḥ suhādhitaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:5617: tataś ca bhojanānte sa pātrādīny apanīya ca /
XXratnml_u:5618: mukhādīṃ śodhayitvā ca pūgauṣadhīn praḍhaukayat // Rm_13.239{269} //
XXratnml_u:5619: tataḥ sa prāñjalir natvā sasaṃghaṃ sugataṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:5620: purastho manasā hy evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ vyadhāt smaran // Rm_13.240{270} //
XXratnml_u:5622: yathāyaṃ bhagavān buddhas tathā bhūyāsam ātmavit // Rm_13.241{271} //
XXratnml_u:5628: ity evaṃ manasā tena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:5629: matvā sa bhagavān buddho smitaṃ prāvirvyadhān mudā // Rm_13.244{274} //
XXratnml_u:5630: tadā tasya munīndrasya mukhāt paṃca surasmayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5631: nisṛtya triṣu lokeṣu bhāsayantaḥ samāsaran // Rm_13.245{275} //
XXratnml_u:5632: yāpi kāś cid adholoke prasṛtā narakeṣu tāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5634: tadā tābhiḥ parispṛṣṭāḥ sarve nairayikā janāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5635: mahatsaukhyaṃ samāsādya vismitāś caivam ālapat // Rm_13.247{277} //
XXratnml_u:5636: aho saukhyaṃ kathaṃ hy evam anyatra kiṃ gatā vayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5637: kasya puṇyānubhāvena kvāsmākaṃ jāyate sukhaṃ // Rm_13.248{278} //
XXratnml_u:5639: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ saṃpreṣya samadarśayat // Rm_13.249{279} //
XXratnml_u:5640: tatra taṃ nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
XXratnml_u:5641: vismitāḥ sahasaṃmīlya punar evaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_13.250{280} //
XXratnml_u:5643: nūnam asyānubhāvena saukhyaṃ no jāyate khalu // Rm_13.251{281} //
XXratnml_u:5644: iti saṃbhāṣya te sarve tasmin buddhe prasāditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5645: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ceti prāvadan // Rm_13.252{282} //
XXratnml_u:5648: evaṃ tā raśmayaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5649: sarvasatvān samuddhṛtya muneḥ pratyāyayuḥ punaḥ // Rm_13.254{284} //
XXratnml_u:5650: tathā yā raśmayaḥ kāścid upariṣṭāt prasāritāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5651: tāḥ sarvān devalokānāṃ avabhāsya samantataḥ // Rm_13.255{285} //
XXratnml_u:5653: evaṃ cāpi mahāśabdam udghuṣya samudācaran // Rm_13.256{286} //
XXratnml_u:5654: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmakaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5655: tad bhave sadgatiṃ hitvā saddharmaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_13.257{287} //
XXratnml_u:5657: dhunīta mṛtyusainyaṃ ca naḍāgāram iva dvipaḥ // Rm_13.258{288} //
XXratnml_u:5658: yo 'py asmin dharmavaineye hy apramattaś caret sadā /
XXratnml_u:5660: sa hitvā jātisaṃsāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_13.259{289} //
XXratnml_u:5661: ity evaṃ tan mahāśabdaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te surāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5663: tathā tā arciṣaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5664: punaḥ pratyāgatās tasya muner antikam āyayuḥ // Rm_13.261{291} //
XXratnml_u:5665: tatas tā arciṣaḥ sarvāḥ saṃmīlya samupāsthitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5666: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ traidham uṣṇīṣe 'ntardadhau muneḥ // Rm_13.262{292} //
XXratnml_u:5670: vinisṛtā diśaḥ sarvā bhāṣayanti samantataḥ // Rm_13.264{294} //
XXratnml_u:5671: nākāraṇaṃ jinā buddhā darśayanti smitaṃ kvacit /
XXratnml_u:5672: bhavatsmitaṃ samālokya sarve bhavanti vismitāḥ // Rm_13.265{295} //
XXratnml_u:5674: tad eṣāṃ saṃśayaṃ chetuṃ taddhetu samupādiśa // Rm_13.266{296} //
XXratnml_u:5675: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:5676: tāṃ ca sarvāṃ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathānandam abhāṣata // Rm_13.267{297} //
XXratnml_u:5678: saṃgheṣu śraddhayā bhaktyā satkṛtya bhajanaṃ kṛtaṃ // Rm_13.268{298} //
XXratnml_u:5680: kramād bodhicarīḥ pūrya daśabhūmīśvaro bhavan // Rm_13.269{299} //
XXratnml_u:5684: praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tena saṃbuddho 'yaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_13.271{301} //
XXratnml_u:5686: satkṛtya samupāśritya bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.272{302} //
XXratnml_u:5687: ye satvāḥ śraddhayā smṛtvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5688: durgatiṃ te na gachanti bhavanti bodhibhāginaḥ // Rm_13.273{303} //
XXratnml_u:5689: evaṃ matvā triratnānāṃ satkṛtya śraddhayā mudā /
XXratnml_u:5690: saṃsmṛtya śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhaktavyaṃ bodhivāṃchibhiḥ // Rm_13.274{304} //
XXratnml_u:5691: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvānaṃdaḥ sa moditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5692: sāṃghikaṃ saha lokaiś ca tatheti prābhyanaṃdata // Rm_13.275{305} //
XXratnml_u:5693: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai vaḍikāya subhāgine /
XXratnml_u:5694: datvāśīrvacanaṃ bhūyaḥ samāmaṃtrya tam abravīt // Rm_13.276{306} //
XXratnml_u:5696: vaḍika tvaṃ mahābhāga triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5697: bodhicaryyāṃ caran nityaṃ saṃbodhiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_13.277{307} //
XXratnml_u:5699: tathā ratnatrayaṃ smṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_13.278{308} //
XXratnml_u:5700: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa saṃghaiḥ sārddhaṃ samutthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5701: vaḍikaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya svavihāraṃ yayau tathā // Rm_13.279{309} //
XXratnml_u:5702: tathā sa vaḍiko nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5703: sadā lokahitaṃ kṛtvā bodhicaryāṃ samācarat // Rm_13.280{310} //
XXratnml_u:5704: etan me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
XXratnml_u:5705: tathā te kathyate rājaṃ śrutvā caivaṃ prakāśaya // Rm_13.281{311} //
XXratnml_u:5708: tathā te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatra maṃgalaṃ bhavet /
XXratnml_u:5709: kramād bodhicarīṃ pūrya saṃbodhim api cāpnuyāḥ // Rm_13.283{313} //
XXratnml_u:5710: iti matvā mahārāja prajāś cāpi prabodhayan /
XXratnml_u:5711: saddharme saṃpratisthāpya sarvathā trātum arhasi // Rm_13.284{314} //
XXratnml_u:5713: rājā tatheti vijñapya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_13.285{315} //
XXratnml_u:5714: śrutvāvadānaṃ vaḍikasya sādhor idaṃ narā ye 'bhyanumodayanti /
XXratnml_u:5715: sarve 'pi te lokahitānuraktā bhavanti bodhiguṇalābhikā hi //
XXratnml_u:5718: XIV Gāndharvikāvadāna athāśoko mahīpālaḥ śrotum anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5719: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_14.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:5720: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5721: tad yathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_14.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:5722: iti tena narendreṇa prārthitaṃ sa jinātmajaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5723: śrutvā taṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:5724: śṛṇu rājan mayākhyātaṃ yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5725: tathā śrūtvānumoditvā śubhe caritum arhasi // Rm_14.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:5726: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śrāvastyāṃ bahir āśrame /
XXratnml_u:5728: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ cailakair vratibhis tathā /
XXratnml_u:5729: bhikṣuṇībhis tathānyaiś cā mahāsātvair upāsakaiḥ // Rm_14.6{6} //
XXratnml_u:5733: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve satvā upagatāḥ // Rm_14.8{8} //
XXratnml_u:5737: garuḍāḥ kinnarendrāś ca tathānye 'pi samāgatāḥ // Rm_14.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:5739: yatayo yogino vijñās tathānye tīrthikā api // Rm_14.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:5741: amātyā maṃtriṇaś cāpi vaiśyāś cāpi prajādhipāḥ // Rm_14.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:5743: paurā jānapadā grāmyās tathā kārpaṭikā api // Rm_14.13{13} //
XXratnml_u:5744: evaṃ anye 'pi satvāś ca sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5745: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tad vihāre upāviśat // Rm_14.14{14} //
XXratnml_u:5746: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā samabhyarcya praṇamya ca /
XXratnml_u:5748: taṃ muṇīndraṃ samālokya śrotuṃ tad dharmadeśanāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5750: tathā tān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavāñ jinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5752: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve satvāḥ pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5756: śrāvastyāṃ puri jātāni samadāni pracerire // Rm_14.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:5757: tadā tāṃ samadān dṛṣṭvā gaṃdharvādhipateḥ sutaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5758: supriyo nāma tan mādam īrṣyayā hantum udyayau // Rm_14.20{20} //
XXratnml_u:5762: samudghoṣayamānaḥ ca svamatiṃ darśayan yayau // Rm_14.22{22} //
XXratnml_u:5764: samudghoṣayamānaś ca śrāvastīṃ sa upāviśat // Rm_14.23{23} //
XXratnml_u:5765: tatra taṃ samupāviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi paurikāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5766: śrutvā tad adbhutaṃ nādaṃ vismitāḥ samupācaran // Rm_14.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:5768: śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca sarvāṇi vismayaṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_14.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:5769: tada tāni ca sarvāṇi dṛṣṭvā paṃcaśatāny api /
XXratnml_u:5771: tataḥ sarve 'pi te tena sahavāde bhayānvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5772: nṛpater antikaṃ gatvā tat pravṛttiṃ nyavedayan // Rm_14.27{27} //
XXratnml_u:5773: jaya prabho vijānīyād yad vayaṃ samupāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5774: tad atra no bhayatrastāṃ trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_14.28{28} //
XXratnml_u:5776: nūnaṃ no madaghātāya vijetuṃ samupāgataḥ // Rm_14.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:5778: kriyatāṃ sahasāsmākam iti vijñāpanāṃ śṛṇu // Rm_14.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:5779: iti vijñāpitaṃ sarvais taiḥ śrutvā sa narādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5780: sarvāns tān samupāmaṃtrya pura evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:5782: bhaviṣyāmo 'tra kālajñāś caratu sa yathechayā // Rm_14.32{32} //
XXratnml_u:5784: tad vivādabhayātaṃkaṃ tyaktvā sarve prasedire // Rm_14.33{33} //
XXratnml_u:5785: tadā sa supriyas tatra dṛṣṭvā tān abhimānikān /
XXratnml_u:5788: tad anena sahātrāhaṃ vādaṃ kuryāṃ sabhāśraye // Rm_14.35{35} //
XXratnml_u:5789: ity evaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā supriyaḥ so 'bhimānikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5790: nṛpatiṃ tam upālabdhuṃ tat sabhāṃ samupācarat // Rm_14.36{36} //
XXratnml_u:5791: tatra sa nṛpatir dṛṣṭvā supriyaṃ tam upāgataṃ /
XXratnml_u:5793: svāgataṃ te bhavann atra tiṣṭhāsane prasīda me /
XXratnml_u:5794: kim arthe 'tra samāyāsi tad ādeṣṭuṃ hi me 'rhasi // Rm_14.38{38} //
XXratnml_u:5796: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā supriyaḥ sa sabhāsthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5797: nṛpatiṃ taṃ samālokya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_14.39{39} //
XXratnml_u:5798: śṛṇu rājan mayākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ yat te yaśo mahat /
XXratnml_u:5799: tad guṇān bhavato draṣṭum ihāhaṃ samupācare // Rm_14.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:5800: tan me darśaya rājendra gāndharvaguṇām ātmanaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5801: kas te sāstā gurur vāsti taṃ cāpi me pradarśaya // Rm_14.41{41} //
XXratnml_u:5802: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sa rājā pratibhāṇavān /
XXratnml_u:5803: supriyaṃ taṃ samālokya tathety evam abhāṣata // Rm_14.42{42} //
XXratnml_u:5804: sādhu paśya mahābhāga darśayisyāmi taṃ guruṃ /
XXratnml_u:5805: yo me śāstā mahābhijñaḥ sarvavidyāguṇādhipaḥ // Rm_14.43{43} //
XXratnml_u:5807: jetāraṇye mahodyāne nivaśati vṛṣaṃ diśan // Rm_14.44{44} //
XXratnml_u:5808: sādhu paśya mahābhāga taṃ guruṃ me hitārthadaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5809: tad ehi saha yāsyāma śāstāraṃ darśayāmi taṃ // Rm_14.45{45} //
XXratnml_u:5810: iti tena narendreṇa samākhyātaṃ sa supriyaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5811: śrutvā tatheti pramodya gantum abhāṣata // Rm_14.46{46} //
XXratnml_u:5812: sādhu rājan samichāmi śāstāraṃ tat pradarśaya /
XXratnml_u:5813: tena saha vivādāni kuryāṃ tatra nayāśu māṃ // Rm_14.47{47} //
XXratnml_u:5814: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ sa tatheti hi /
XXratnml_u:5815: supriyaṃ taṃ samādāya vihāre gantum aichata // Rm_14.48{48} //
XXratnml_u:5817: taiś ca paṃcaśatair anyair gāndharvikaiḥ sahācarat // Rm_14.49{49} //
XXratnml_u:5818: tasminn avasare buddho bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:5819: loke satvān samuddhartuṃ kṛpayā samapaśyata // Rm_14.50{50} //
XXratnml_u:5820: tadā tena nareśena sārddham evam upāgataṃ /
XXratnml_u:5821: supriyaṃ taṃ sa ālokya manasaiva vyacintayat // Rm_14.51{51} //
XXratnml_u:5822: aho vata sudhīr yā sā gandharvādhipanandanaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5825: matvā pañcaśikhaḥ so 'pi tathāgantuṃ samaichata // Rm_14.53{53} //
XXratnml_u:5828: tathā sa saṃkramaṃs tatra vihāre samupāviśan /
XXratnml_u:5829: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā tāṃ vīṇāṃ samupānayat // Rm_14.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:5830: tataḥ sa sugataṃ bhaktyā samabhyarcya prasannadhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:5831: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tat sabhāyām upāśrayat // Rm_14.56{56} //
XXratnml_u:5832: tadā sa supriyo 'py enaṃ dṛṣṭvā mānābhigarvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5833: tāṃ vīṇāṃ kvanayann agre 'nuśrāvituṃ samārabhat // Rm_14.57{57} //
XXratnml_u:5834: tatprakvāṇāt svarā sapta ekai viṃśati mūrchanāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5836: tadā sarve 'pi te lokāḥ śrutvā tat prakvaṇān mudā /
XXratnml_u:5837: nṛpatipramukhāś cāpi paraṃ vismayam āyajuḥ // Rm_14.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:5839: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃś cāpi tasya mānābhighātane /
XXratnml_u:5842: mūrchanāś ca tathā nānāvidhā niścāritās tathā // Rm_14.61{61} //
XXratnml_u:5843: tataḥ śabdāt samuccerur gāthā evaṃ pracodināḥ /
XXratnml_u:5844: tadyatheha bhave sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ // Rm_14.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:5845: idaṃ kāyaṃ ca vīṇāvad indriyāṇi svarānī ca /
XXratnml_u:5846: mūrchanā iva cittāni jñātvā bodhau samācara // Rm_14.63{63} //
XXratnml_u:5848: satyam etad iti jñātvā bodhicittaṃ pralehire // Rm_14.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:5849: tadā sa supriyo 'py evaṃ śrutvā matvānumoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5851: tato niryātya vīṇāṃ sa gandhakuṭyāṃ virāgitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5853: tadā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā supriyaḥ so 'numoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5854: kṛtāñjaliḥ puraḥ sthitvā pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_14.67{67} //
XXratnml_u:5855: vaṃde te caraṇau śāsta bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:5856: tan me 'trānugrahaṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_14.68{68} //
XXratnml_u:5857: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:5858: dṛṣṭvā tad āśayaṃ śuddhaṃ gaṃdharvaṃ taṃ tathāvadat // Rm_14.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:5860: pitror ājñāṃ samāsādya prehi dāsyāmi te vrataṃ // Rm_14.70{70} //
XXratnml_u:5861: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa supriyo mudā /
XXratnml_u:5862: tatheti taṃ muniṃ natvā sahasarddhyā gṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_14.71{71} //
XXratnml_u:5863: tatra sa sahasā prāpto natvā tau pitarau mudā /
XXratnml_u:5864: sāñjaliḥ purataḥ sthitvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_14.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:5865: śṛṇu me vāñchitaṃ tāta yadi te kṛpayā mayi /
XXratnml_u:5866: tan mamānugrahaṃ kṛtvā saddharme māṃ niyojaya // Rm_14.73{73} //
XXratnml_u:5867: ahaṃ hi saugataṃ dharmaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāñchāmi tad vrataṃ /
XXratnml_u:5868: tat pravrajyāṃ samāsādya prāptum ichāmi nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.74{74} //
XXratnml_u:5869: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ tad atrāpi na me ratiḥ /
XXratnml_u:5870: avaśyaṃ hi bhaven mṛtyuḥ sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām api // Rm_14.75{75} //
XXratnml_u:5871: evaṃ dṛṣṭvātra saṃsāre bhogyaṃ nechāmi niḥspṛhaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5872: tat pravrajyāvrataṃ dhṛtvā prāptum iche sunirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.76{76} //
XXratnml_u:5873: api cāsau munīndro hi sadātraiva na tiṣṭhati /
XXratnml_u:5874: buddhakāryaṃ samāpyaiva nirvṛtiṃ sarvathā vrajet // Rm_14.77{77} //
XXratnml_u:5875: kiṃ cātra sarvadā naivam utpatsyate munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:5876: kadā cid evam utpanno loke bodhiṃ samādiśet // Rm_14.78{78} //
XXratnml_u:5877: tathā ca durlabhaṃ janma sadgatau ca kṣaṇaṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:5879: dharmaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ sukhino 'pi hi /
XXratnml_u:5880: kṣaṇadhvansi śarīraṃ hi jīvitaṃ ca tṛṇāmbuvat // Rm_14.80{80} //
XXratnml_u:5882: dharmeṇa sadgatiṃ yāyāt saṃbodhim api prāpnuyāt /
XXratnml_u:5883: tat pravrajyācariṃ dhṛtvā prāptum iche 'tra nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.81{81} //
XXratnml_u:5884: tad ātra yadi vāṃ tāta kṛpāsti svātmaje mayi /
XXratnml_u:5885: sarvathānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.82{82} //
XXratnml_u:5886: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gandharvādhipaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:5887: suciraṃ taṃ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā snehād evam abhaṣata // Rm_14.83{83} //
XXratnml_u:5888: satyam evaṃ sutākhyātaṃ tathāpi me vacaḥ śṛṇu /
XXratnml_u:5889: pravrajyā duṣkarīcaryyā tat kathaṃ tvaṃ samācareḥ // Rm_14.84{84} //
XXratnml_u:5891: kāmabhogyasukhāraktas tat kathaṃ tad vrataṃ careḥ // Rm_14.85{85} //
XXratnml_u:5893: sarvān parigrahāns tyaktvā sadaikāntī vane vase // Rm_14.86{86} //
XXratnml_u:5895: bhuṃjīthās tat kathaṃ bhuktvā samādhiṃ saṃpradhāsyasi // Rm_14.87{87} //
XXratnml_u:5897: sahasā mā kṛthāś cittaṃ nivāraya samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.88{88} //
XXratnml_u:5899: vṛddhatve samupāśritya triratnaṃ tad vrataṃ cara // Rm_14.89{89} //
XXratnml_u:5900: tat tvaṃ yāvad yuvā gehe saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yathepsitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5901: vṛddhatve tad vrataṃ dhṛtvā triratnāni sadā bhaja // Rm_14.90{90} //
XXratnml_u:5902: tathā cet te bhavej janma sāphalyaṃ bhavacāraṇe /
XXratnml_u:5903: sukhaṃ bhuktvā vrataṃ dhṛtvā nirvṛtiṃ vā samāpnuyāḥ // Rm_14.91{91} //
XXratnml_u:5904: iti me vacanaṃ śrutvā matvaivaṃ tat prabodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5905: tāvad gṛhe sukhaṃ bhuktvā smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ vasa // Rm_14.92{92} //
XXratnml_u:5907: punas taṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhayann evam abravīt // Rm_14.93{93} //
XXratnml_u:5908: satyam evaṃ bhave tāta tathāpi vakṣyate mayā /
XXratnml_u:5909: tac chrutvāpi tvayā parijñāya vibudhyatāṃ // Rm_14.94{94} //
XXratnml_u:5910: satkule durlabhaṃ janma tatrāpi durlabhaṃ kṣaṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5911: durlabhaṃ sugatotpādaṃ durlabhaṃ tadvrataṃ bhave // Rm_14.95{95} //
XXratnml_u:5913: avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāptum iche 'tra nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_14.96{96} //
XXratnml_u:5914: tad atra kṛpayā mahyam anujñāṃ dātum arhasi /
XXratnml_u:5915: yūyaṃ cāpi hi tad dharmabhāṇaiḥ sadgatim āpsyatha // Rm_14.97{97} //
XXratnml_u:5916: iti hetoḥ pita tatra vilambaṃma kṛthā ciraṃ /
XXratnml_u:5917: sahasānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.98{98} //
XXratnml_u:5918: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gaṃdharvādhipaś cirāt /
XXratnml_u:5920: ayi supriya putra tvaṃ snehān mayā nivāryasa /
XXratnml_u:5921: yady ativāṃchase prāptuṃ nirvṛtiṃ tan samācara // Rm_14.100{100} //
XXratnml_u:5924: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cara nityaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.101{1} //
XXratnml_u:5926: pitroḥ pādān praṇatvaiva sahasā niryayau gṛhāt // Rm_14.102{2} //
XXratnml_u:5927: tataḥ sa sahasā gatvā vihāraṃ samupācarat /
XXratnml_u:5928: tatra prāpto munīndraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvaiva samupāviśat // Rm_14.103{3} //
XXratnml_u:5929: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ nātvā prāñjaliḥ pura āśrayan /
XXratnml_u:5932: tathānujñāṃ pituḥ prāpya prāgatāham ihādhunā // Rm_14.105{5} //
XXratnml_u:5933: tad atra bhavatāṃ śāstaḥ śaraṇaṃ samupāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:5934: brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmi tat pravrajyāṃ pradehi me // Rm_14.106{6} //
XXratnml_u:5935: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
XXratnml_u:5936: dṛṣṭvā tasyāśayaṃ śuddhaṃ punar eva samādiśat // Rm_14.107{7} //
XXratnml_u:5937: ehi supriya bhikṣo 'tra cara brahmacariṃ śivāṃ /
XXratnml_u:5938: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā samādhiṃ samupāśrayat // Rm_14.108{8} //
XXratnml_u:5940: paṃcagaṃḍamayaṃ dehaṃ jīvitaṃ ca trināmvuvat // Rm_14.109{9} //
XXratnml_u:5942: sarvakleśaripuñ jitvā sākṣād arhatpadaṃ yayau // Rm_14.110{10} //
XXratnml_u:5943: tataḥ supriyo bhikṣuḥ prāptābhijñaḥ kṛtī sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:5944: bhindan sarvam avidyāṅgaṃ nirvikalpo 'bhavad yatiḥ // Rm_14.111{11} //
XXratnml_u:5950: vaṃdyaḥ pūjyo 'bhinaṃdyaś ca mānanīyo bhavan babhau // Rm_14.114{14} //
XXratnml_u:5952: prālokya vismitāḥ sarve tatsabhāsthāḥ prasedire // Rm_14.115{15} //
XXratnml_u:5953: tadā sarve 'pi te lokā devā daityāś ca kinnarāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5954: yakṣāḥ siddhāś ca gaṃdharvā nāgāś ca rākṣasā api // Rm_14.116{16} //
XXratnml_u:5955: garuḍāś ca tathānye 'pi vidyādharāś ca sāpsarāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5956: sarve lokādhipāś cāpi triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_14.117{17} //
XXratnml_u:5959: tad dṛṣṭvā tāni pañcāpi gāṃdharvikaśatāni ca /
XXratnml_u:5961: ete sarve vayaṃ nīce karmaṇi parivarttikāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5963: yad asmābhiḥ purā puṇyaṃ kiṃ cid vāpi na sādhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:5964: tenāsyātra vayaṃ sarve duḥkhino nīcavṛttayaḥ // Rm_14.121{21} //
XXratnml_u:5965: tad asmābhir ayam śāstā munīśvaraḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5966: satkṛtya bhojanair vāpi pūjanīyo yathāvidhiḥ // Rm_14.122{22} //
XXratnml_u:5970: tataḥ krameṇa saṃprāpya bodhicaryyāṃ śubhāṃ carīṃ /
XXratnml_u:5971: carantas tadvipākaiś ca nirvṛtiṃ saṃlabhemahi // Rm_14.124{24} //
XXratnml_u:5972: iti matvā vayaṃ sarve vijñapya nṛpatiṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:5973: sasaṃghaṃ sugataṃ bhojyair arhāmahe samarcituṃ // Rm_14.125{25} //
XXratnml_u:5975: nṛpater vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ sahasā samupācaran // Rm_14.126{26} //
XXratnml_u:5976: tatra te samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpatiṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:5977: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.127{27} //
XXratnml_u:5978: jaya deva mahārāja lokān dharmeṇa pālaya /
XXratnml_u:5979: kiñcid vijñāpanāṃ karttuṃ vayam upāgatāḥ // Rm_14.128{28} //
XXratnml_u:5980: vijānīyād bhavān hy etat tathāpi prārthayāmahe /
XXratnml_u:5981: śrutvā no 'nugrahaṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā tat prasīdatu // Rm_14.129{29} //
XXratnml_u:5983: tat sasaṃghaṃ muniṃ bhojyaiḥ samichāmaḥ samarcituṃ // Rm_14.130{30} //
XXratnml_u:5984: tad anujñāṃ pradatvā naḥ kṛpayoddhartum arhasi /
XXratnml_u:5985: etad vijñāpanāṃ kurmas tat prasīda nṛpādhipa // Rm_14.131{31} //
XXratnml_u:5986: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā nṛpatiḥ so 'numoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:5987: tān sarvān samupāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_14.132{32} //
XXratnml_u:5989: tat tathā kriyatāṃ buddhe satkāraṃ śraddhayādarāt // Rm_14.133{33} //
XXratnml_u:5990: saṃbuddhe yat kṛtaṃ karma tat phalaṃ kṣiṇuyān na hi /
XXratnml_u:5991: kramād bodhicariṃ pūrya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_14.134{34} //
XXratnml_u:5992: tad atra sarvathā yūyaṃ sasaṃghaṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
XXratnml_u:5994: ity ādiṣṭam ḥ - ndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
XXratnml_u:5995: tatheti pratinaṃditvā nṛpaṃ natvā tato 'caran // Rm_14.136{36} //
XXratnml_u:5996: tatas te saṃmataṃ kṛtvā vihāre sahasā gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:5997: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.137{37} //
XXratnml_u:5998: bhagavaṃs tad vijānīyād yad arthaṃ samupāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6001: pūjayituṃ samichāmo satkartuṃ bhojanair api // Rm_14.139{39} //
XXratnml_u:6002: tad bhavāṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭvā kṛtvāsmākaṃ anugrahaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6003: pure śvaḥ sāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_14.140{40} //
XXratnml_u:6004: iti taiḥ prārthite sarvair bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:6007: bhūyas taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā svaṃ puraṃ sahasā yayuḥ // Rm_14.142{42} //
XXratnml_u:6008: tatra sarve 'pi te bhūmiṃ śodhayitvā samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6009: prajñapya svāsanāny evaṃ sāmagriṃ samasādhayan // Rm_14.143{43} //
XXratnml_u:6013: tatra taṃ sugataṃ sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ cāmaṃtrituṃ yayuḥ /
XXratnml_u:6016: saṃbuddhapramukhaṃ saṃghaṃ prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_14.146{46} //
XXratnml_u:6018: tad bhavān saṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ vijayituṃ samarhati // Rm_14.147{47} //
XXratnml_u:6019: iti taiḥ prārthite dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6022: sarveṣāṃ śubhatāṃ kṛtvā tat pure samupāviśat // Rm_14.149{49} //
XXratnml_u:6024: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kurvan tatpradeśe samācaran // Rm_14.150{50} //
XXratnml_u:6025: tatra pādyārgham ādāya krameṇa saha sāṃghikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6026: svāsane samupāviśya tasthau bhānur ivojvalan // Rm_14.151{51} //
XXratnml_u:6027: tadā taṃ śrīghanaṃ sarvasaṃghaṃ ca svāsane sthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6028: dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te harṣāt pūjayituṃ samārabhan // Rm_14.152{52} //
XXratnml_u:6029: tathā krameṇa saṃpūjya taṃ buddhapramukhaṃ gaṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6031: tatas te bhojanāṃte tatpātrāṇi vyapanīya ca /
XXratnml_u:6032: karādīñ chodhayitvā tad bhūmiṃ ca paryaśodhayan // Rm_14.154{54} //
XXratnml_u:6033: tataḥ pūgādikaṃ datvā punaḥ sarve 'pi te mudā /
XXratnml_u:6035: te ca gāṃdharvikāḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6038: upasthitya sasaṃghaṃ taṃ śrīghanaṃ samatoṣayat // Rm_14.157{57} //
XXratnml_u:6039: tada sa bhagavāṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ bhaktiprasādinīṃ /
XXratnml_u:6040: sarveṣāṃ śuddhacittāni vyamuñcat smitam uddhavāt // Rm_14.158{58} //
XXratnml_u:6042: sarvatra bhuvane gatvā pracerur amṛtāṃśuvat // Rm_14.159{59} //
XXratnml_u:6043: teṣāṃ ke cid adhogatvā narakeṣu samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6044: avabhāsya parispṛṣṭvā sarvatrāpi sukhaṃ daduḥ // Rm_14.160{60} //
XXratnml_u:6045: tadā te nārakīyās tat prabhāspṛṣṭāḥ sukhānvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6046: kim etad iti saṃdigdhāḥ saṃmīlyaivaṃ vabhāṣire // Rm_14.161{61} //
XXratnml_u:6047: aho nu jāyate saukhyam asmākaṃ sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6048: vatānyatra gatāḥ smo 'dya kasya puṇyānubhāvataḥ // Rm_14.162{62} //
XXratnml_u:6050: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ saṃpreṣayan samaṃtataḥ // Rm_14.163{63} //
XXratnml_u:6051: tatrā taṃ saugataṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te narakasthitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6054: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāya ca namas sadā /
XXratnml_u:6055: iti proktvā praṇatvā taccharaṇaṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_14.165{65} //
XXratnml_u:6057: sahasā svargatiṃ yātāḥ saddharme samudācaran // Rm_14.166{66} //
XXratnml_u:6058: evaṃ tān sarvasatvāṃś ca samuddhṛtya samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6059: sarve te 'py aṃśavo bhūyas saṃbuddhāntikam upācaran // Rm_14.167{67} //
XXratnml_u:6060: ke cid ūrddhvagatā yāvad akaniṣṭhaṃ samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6062: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6063: iti satyaṃ parijñāya triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_14.169{69} //
XXratnml_u:6065: dhunīta mārasainyāś ca naḍāgāraṃ yathā karī // Rm_14.170{70} //
XXratnml_u:6066: yo 'py asmin saugate dharme hy apramattaś caret sadā /
XXratnml_u:6067: sa tyaktvā janma saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_14.171{71} //
XXratnml_u:6068: iti saṃcodayantas tāṃ sārvān devāṃś ca sarvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6069: te sarve 'py aṃśavo bhāyaḥ sugatāntikam āyayuḥ // Rm_14.172{72} //
XXratnml_u:6070: tatas te 'py aṃśavaḥ sarve saṃmīlya saṃgatā muneḥ /
XXratnml_u:6073: kim etad iti saṃcintya sarve tasthuḥ śakautukāḥ // Rm_14.174{74} //
XXratnml_u:6075: utthāya sāñjalir natvā śāstāraṃ taṃ samabravīt // Rm_14.175{75} //
XXratnml_u:6076: bhagavans te mukhād bhāsiḥ paṃcavarṇā vinirgatā /
XXratnml_u:6077: avabhāsya diśaḥ sarvā ūrṇāyāṃ ca viśanti tāḥ // Rm_14.176{76} //
XXratnml_u:6079: taddhetuṃ śrotum ichanti tad upādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_14.177{77} //
XXratnml_u:6080: nāhetu hi smitaṃ buddhā darśayanti kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:6081: yad dhetau bhavatā śāstur hasitaṃ tat samādiśa // Rm_14.178{78} //
XXratnml_u:6083: tam ānaṃdaiḥ sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_14.179{79} //
XXratnml_u:6084: paśyānaṃda yad etair hi sarvai gāndharvikair api /
XXratnml_u:6085: mama sasāṃghikasyaivaṃ satkāraṃ prakṛtaṃ mudā // Rm_14.180{80} //
XXratnml_u:6087: kramād bodhicarīṃ prāptā niḥkleśā vimalāśayāḥ // Rm_14.181{81} //
XXratnml_u:6092: evam etāt samālokya yūyaṃ yadi samichatha /
XXratnml_u:6093: tathātra śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_14.184{84} //
XXratnml_u:6094: ye triratnaṃ sadā bhaktyā satkṛtyaivaṃ bhajanti te /
XXratnml_u:6095: vihāya durgatiṃ nityaṃ sadgatiṃ samavāpnuyuḥ // Rm_14.185{85} //
XXratnml_u:6097: iti matvātra saṃsāre yeṣāṃ vāṃchā sukhe śive /
XXratnml_u:6098: te satkṛtya triratneṣu śraddhayā bhajatāniśaṃ // Rm_14.186{86} //
XXratnml_u:6099: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve ca te janāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6100: satyam evaṃ pratijñāya triratnaṃ sarvadābhajan // Rm_14.187{87} //
XXratnml_u:6102: kṛtāñjalipuṭā natvā paprachus taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_14.188{88} //
XXratnml_u:6103: yad evaṃ bhagavann ebhiḥ satkāraṃ prakṛtaṃ mahat /
XXratnml_u:6104: tat te kena supuṇyena samyag ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_14.189{89} //
XXratnml_u:6105: evaṃ tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa jineśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:6106: sarvāns tāñ chrāvakān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_14.190{90} //
XXratnml_u:6107: śṛṇudhvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ puṇyaṃ yan mayā prakṛtaṃ purā /
XXratnml_u:6108: tad atra kathitaṃ śrutvā śraddhayābhyanumodata // Rm_14.191{91} //
XXratnml_u:6110: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ // Rm_14.192{92} //
XXratnml_u:6112: mārajil lokavid bharttā subhadro 'rhan hitaṃkaraḥ // Rm_14.193{93} //
XXratnml_u:6113: tadā sa bhagavān buddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ /
XXratnml_u:6114: carann anyāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_14.194{94} //
XXratnml_u:6115: tatra tasya narendrasya krīḍodyāne taror adhaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6116: praviśya svāsanāsīnas tasthau vahnir ivojvalan // Rm_14.195{95} //
XXratnml_u:6118: saṃgītaiḥ saha saṃrakto ramituṃ samupāviśat // Rm_14.196{96} //
XXratnml_u:6120: dṛṣṭvaiva sahasopetya natvā kṛtvā pradakṣiṇāṃ // Rm_14.197{97} //
XXratnml_u:6121: samādhisthaṃ tam ālokya taṣṭhau ciram upāśrayan /
XXratnml_u:6123: vādyamānaiḥ satair vādyair muniṃ prābodhayan nṛpaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6124: tataḥ sa sugato buddho samādheḥ śīghram utthitaḥ // Rm_14.199{99} //
XXratnml_u:6126: tadā taṃ nṛpatiṃ dṛṣṭvā sa saṃbuddhaḥ prabodhanaḥ // Rm_14.200{100} //
XXratnml_u:6128: ehi rājan mahāvāho svāgataṃ te mahīpate // Rm_14.201{1} //
XXratnml_u:6130: sadā dānaṃ pradatvātra śīlaṃ dhṛtvā samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.202{2} //
XXratnml_u:6132: bodhau cittaṃ samādhāya prajñāratnam upārjaya // Rm_14.203{3} //
XXratnml_u:6134: tatas te maṅgalaṃ nityam ihāmutre sadā bhavet // Rm_14.204{4} //
XXratnml_u:6136: iti matvā mahārāja saddharmaṃ samupāśrayan // Rm_14.205{5} //
XXratnml_u:6137: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā satkṛtya bhaja sarvadā /
XXratnml_u:6138: triratneṣu kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana // Rm_14.206{6} //
XXratnml_u:6140: sarvadā satphalāny eva sūte bodhiṃ samarpayet /
XXratnml_u:6141: iti matvā mahārāja triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_14.207{7} //
XXratnml_u:6143: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_14.208{8} //
XXratnml_u:6145: iti tenārhatādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sa bhūpatiḥ // Rm_14.209{9} //
XXratnml_u:6147: tataḥ sa mudito rājā taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ // Rm_14.210{10} //
XXratnml_u:6149: tataś ca bhojanānte sa nṛpatiḥ sāñjalir mudā /
XXratnml_u:6150: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ hṛdo vyadhāt // Rm_14.211{11} //
XXratnml_u:6152: samyag bodhiṃ samāgamya bhaveyaṃ sugato jinaḥ // Rm_14.212{12} //
XXratnml_u:6153: etat tena narendreṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:6154: matvā sa sugatas tasya tathāśīrvacanaṃ dadau // Rm_14.213{13} //
XXratnml_u:6155: jayo 'stu te sadā rājaṃ dharmeṇa pālaya prajāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6156: praṇidhānaṃ yathā bodhau tathā te siddhyatu dhruvaṃ // Rm_14.214{14} //
XXratnml_u:6157: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa tena śrutvā sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6158: muditaḥ sāñjalir natvā taṃ munīndraṃ samabravīt // Rm_14.215{15} //
XXratnml_u:6161: tad bhavān kṛpayā dṛṣṭyā sadā māṃ draṣṭum arhati /
XXratnml_u:6162: sarvadā bhavatām eva śaraṇe 'smi samāsthitaḥ // Rm_14.217{17} //
XXratnml_u:6163: iti saṃprārthanāṃ kṛtvā rājā sa sajano mudā /
XXratnml_u:6164: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya sānaṃdaḥ svapuraṃ yayau // Rm_14.218{18} //
XXratnml_u:6165: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6166: sarvatra bhadratāṃ kṛtvā svāśrame samupāyayau // Rm_14.219{19} //
XXratnml_u:6168: aham eva tadābhūvan nānyo draṣṭavya eva saḥ // Rm_14.220{20} //
XXratnml_u:6169: yan mayā śraddhayā tasya prabodhanasya tāyinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6172: etair gāndharvikair evaṃ satkāraḥ prakṛtādhunā // Rm_14.222{22} //
XXratnml_u:6174: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajanīyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_14.223{23} //
XXratnml_u:6175: yūyaṃ cāpi sadā nityaṃ śāstāraṃ sadguruṃ jinaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6177: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te bhikṣavo mudā /
XXratnml_u:6178: sarve tatheti vijñapya triratnāni sadābhajan // Rm_14.225{25} //
XXratnml_u:6179: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
XXratnml_u:6181: evaṃ rājaṃs tvayāpy evaṃ triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6182: saṃbuddhaśāsanaṃ dhṛtvā cara dharmaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_14.227{27} //
XXratnml_u:6184: prajāś cāpi tathā rājaṃ bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6186: tathā cet te sadā bhadraṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6187: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_14.229{29} //
XXratnml_u:6188: iti śāstrā samādeṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6190: gāṃdharvikānām avadānam etac chrutvānumodanti narā mudā ye /
XXratnml_u:6191: te sarva enaḥparimuktacittā bhuktvā sukhāny eva labhanti bodhiṃ /
XXratnml_u:6194: XV Sūkṣmatvacovadāna athāśoko mahīpālaḥ kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:6195: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_15.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:6196: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6197: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhasi // Rm_15.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:6198: iti saṃprārthite rājñā sa yatiḥ sugatātmajaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6199: aśokaṃ taṃ nṛpaṃ dṛṣṭvā punar evam upādiśat // Rm_15.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:6200: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6201: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvāpy evaṃ pramodaya // Rm_15.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:6202: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śākyasiṃho jagadguruḥ /
XXratnml_u:6204: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra sarve bhikṣugaṇā api /
XXratnml_u:6205: śrāvakāś cailakāś caiva sarva upāsakā api // Rm_15.6{6} //
XXratnml_u:6211: bhadradharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ // Rm_15.9{9} //
XXratnml_u:6216: rājāno rājaputrāś ca vaiśyā maṃtrijanā api /
XXratnml_u:6217: amātyāḥ śreṣṭhino bhaṭṭāḥ paurikāś ca gṛhādhipāḥ // Rm_15.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:6219: vaṇijaḥ śilpinaś cāpi grāmyāḥ kārpaṭikā api // Rm_15.13{13} //
XXratnml_u:6221: sarve dharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ vihāre samupāgatāḥ // Rm_15.14{14} //
XXratnml_u:6223: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya praṇatvā samupācaran // Rm_15.15{15} //
XXratnml_u:6224: tatra te samupāsṛtya sarve taṃ śrīghanaṃ muniṃ /
XXratnml_u:6226: tataḥ sarve 'pi te lokāḥ parivṛtya samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6228: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃs tān samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:6230: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te tridaśādayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6233: tasminn avasare tatra śrāvastyāṃ pauriko gṛhī /
XXratnml_u:6234: śreṣṭhī mahājanaḥ śrimāñ chrāddho bhadrāśayābhavat // Rm_15.20{20} //
XXratnml_u:6235: sa ekasmiṃ dine svasmin bhāṇḍālakoṣṭhake viśan /
XXratnml_u:6237: aho me jāyate saṃpad dīyatī saṃpravarddhitā /
XXratnml_u:6238: tathāpi varddhyate tṛṣṇā yataḥ saukhyaṃ na kiṃ cana // Rm_15.22{22} //
XXratnml_u:6239: yad ime caṃcalā bhogā jalacaṃdranibhā mama /
XXratnml_u:6241: tad atra kiṃ mano 'dyāpi tṛṣṇayākṛṣyate mama /
XXratnml_u:6242: yena carāmy ahaṃ loke duḥkhī bhavikalāśayaḥ // Rm_15.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:6243: tat kiṃ me saṃpadā sāraṃ yataḥ saukhyaṃ na vidyate /
XXratnml_u:6244: dharmārthe gocaraṃ naiva kevalaṃ madavṛddhaye // Rm_15.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:6245: madena varddhate mānaṃ mānāl loke pramādatā /
XXratnml_u:6246: pramādād dīpyate cerṣyā kopāgnir dīpyate tataḥ // Rm_15.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:6249: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayati durāśayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6254: narakeṣu bhraman nityaṃ duḥkhāny eva sadāśnuyāt // Rm_15.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:6255: yad vātrāpi ca saṃsāre jīvitam adhruvaṃ khalu /
XXratnml_u:6256: kṣaṇadhvaṃsi śarīraṃ ca sārveṣāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_15.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:6257: tad atrāham asārebhyo bhogebhyaḥ sāram uttamaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6258: saddharmaṃ samupādātuṃ yatnaṃ kuryāṃ samādarāt // Rm_15.32{32} //
XXratnml_u:6259: saddharmaṃ saugataṃ dharmam ity ākhyātaṃ purāvidaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6260: tad atra saugate kṣetre dānaṃ kurvīya sāṃprataṃ // Rm_15.33{33} //
XXratnml_u:6261: bauddhakṣetre kṛtaṃ dānaṃ bodhivījaṃ bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6262: etad evātra saṃsāre sādhanīyaṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_15.34{34} //
XXratnml_u:6263: dānena śuddhyate cittaṃ sucittaḥ sumatiṃ labhet /
XXratnml_u:6274: ity arhadbhir mahābhijñaiḥ samākhyātaṃ mayā śrutaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6275: tat saṃbuddhapadāṃ praptuṃ buddhaṃ bhajeya sāṃprataṃ // Rm_15.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:6277: tad buddhapramukhaṃ sarvasaṃghaṃ pūjeya sādaraṃ // Rm_15.41{41} //
XXratnml_u:6278: iti niścitya sa śrīmān gṛhasthaḥ saṃpramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6279: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghan taṃ pūjayituṃ samaichata // Rm_15.42{42} //
XXratnml_u:6282: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa gṛhasthaḥ pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6284: tataḥ sa sajano natvā sāñjaliḥ saṃpramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6285: munīndraṃ taṃ samālokya puraḥ sthitvaivam abravīt // Rm_15.45{45} //
XXratnml_u:6286: sarvajña bhagavaṃ chāstar bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:6289: pūjayituṃ samichāmi tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_15.47{47} //
XXratnml_u:6290: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:6291: tathāstv iti pratijñāya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_15.48{48} //
XXratnml_u:6292: tataḥ sa gṛhabhṛn matvā bhagavatādhyuvāsa taṃ /
XXratnml_u:6293: sāñjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā muditaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_15.49{49} //
XXratnml_u:6294: tatra sa svajanaiḥ svasmiṃ gṛhe margeṣu sarvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6300: tato 'nye dyur gṛhasthaḥ sa snātvā śuddhāṃvarāvṛtaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6301: saṃbuddhāmaṃtraṇaṃ kartuṃ vihāre sajano yayau // Rm_15.53{53} //
XXratnml_u:6302: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ sa purogataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6303: kṛtāñjalipuṭo natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_15.54{54} //
XXratnml_u:6305: tat sasaṃgho mamāvāse bhāvān āgantum arhati // Rm_15.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:6306: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6308: tatra sa bhagavān mārge kṛtvā bhadraṃ prabhāsayan /
XXratnml_u:6311: upadravāṇi sarvāṇi sahasā vilayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_15.58{58} //
XXratnml_u:6312: andhā rūpāṇi paśyantaḥ śṛṇvanto vadhirā ravān /
XXratnml_u:6313: hīnendriyāś ca ye te 'pi pratilabdhendriyā vavuḥ // Rm_15.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:6315: rogiṇo nīrujā āsan kuvelā rucirāmvarāḥ // Rm_15.60{60} //
XXratnml_u:6317: mūkā āsan pravaktāro jaḍāś cāpi suvāgminaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6319: ye ca caṇḍāśāyāḥ krūrās te 'py abhūvan dayālavaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6320: ye ca duṣṭā durācārās te santas samyamodyatāḥ // Rm_15.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:6322: ye śaṭhā vaṃcakāś cauras te āryāḥ satyavādinaḥ // Rm_15.63{63} //
XXratnml_u:6323: evaṃ ye duḥkhinaḥ satvās te sarve sukhino 'bhavan /
XXratnml_u:6324: evaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tatra kṛtvā bhadraṃ samantataḥ // Rm_15.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:6326: tatra tasya munīndrasya sa gṛhastho yathākramaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6327: pādyaṃ dadau sasaṃghasya sadārāḥ śucināmbunā // Rm_15.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:6328: tataḥ sa suprāsannātmā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:6329: prajñapte svāsane tatra yathākramaṃ nyaveśayat // Rm_15.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:6330: tatra te sāṃghikāḥ sarve saṃbuddhapramukhāḥ kramāt /
XXratnml_u:6333: tān sarvān sa gṛhī dṛṣṭvā yathāvidhi samarcayat // Rm_15.68{68} //
XXratnml_u:6334: tataḥ sa sajanaḥ śreṣṭhī svahastena sasāṃghikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6335: taṃ munīndraṃ sudhākalpair bhojanaiḥ samatarpayet // Rm_15.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:6336: tataḥ saṃtṛptitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:6337: apanīya sa pātrāṇi tad dhastādīn vyaśodhayat // Rm_15.70{70} //
XXratnml_u:6338: tataḥ sa sāñjalir natvā tān buddhapramukhān yatīn /
XXratnml_u:6339: puro nīcāsanāsīno dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayat // Rm_15.71{71} //
XXratnml_u:6340: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ gṛhaṣṭhaṃ subhāvinaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6342: ārogyam astu te nityaṃ gṛhapate sadā śivaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6343: bodhau cittaṃ samādhāya cara dharmaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.73{73} //
XXratnml_u:6344: dharmeṇa jīyate pāpaṃ niṣpāpaḥ sadgatiṃ vrajet /
XXratnml_u:6345: sadgatau satsukhāny eva bhuktvā saṃcarate sadā // Rm_15.74{74} //
XXratnml_u:6347: sudhiro guṇavān vijño bhavec chrīmān maharddhikaḥ // Rm_15.75{75} //
XXratnml_u:6348: dharmeṇa suciraṃ jīved ārogyaṃ ca sadā tanau /
XXratnml_u:6349: sarvatrāpi bhaven nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ // Rm_15.76{76} //
XXratnml_u:6350: dharmo na naśyate kvapi hriyate nāpi kena cit /
XXratnml_u:6351: kenāpi naśyate naiva cālayituṃ kadā cana // Rm_15.77{77} //
XXratnml_u:6352: nāgnibhir dahyate dharmaḥ klidyate nāpi codakaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6353: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate naiva kṣīyate nāpi bhūmiṣu // Rm_15.78{78} //
XXratnml_u:6355: dharmeṇa calate vāyur dharmeṇa vahate jalaḥ // Rm_15.79{79} //
XXratnml_u:6358: meghā dharmeṇa varṣāṇā bhūmiḥ śaṣyauṣadhībharāḥ // Rm_15.80{80} //
XXratnml_u:6361: dharmo na śīyate kvāpi dharmo na paribhūyate /
XXratnml_u:6362: sarvatra jayate dharmo dharmo hi śobhate sadā // Rm_15.82{82} //
XXratnml_u:6363: dharmahīnā na śobhante śrimanto guṇino 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:6364: dharmmiṣṭhā eva śobhante daridrā nirguṇā api // Rm_15.83{83} //
XXratnml_u:6368: mahāmbudhiṃ samuttīrya ratnāny api labhanti ca // Rm_15.85{85} //
XXratnml_u:6374: rājyakāryāṇi sarvāṇi sādhayanto jayanty arīn // Rm_15.88{88} //
XXratnml_u:6379: tathā dharmadharā eva yatayo yogino 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:6380: sarvakleśagaṇāñ jitvā labhanti paramaṃ padaṃ // Rm_15.91{91} //
XXratnml_u:6382: yathābhilaṣitāṃ siddhiṃ prāpya mokṣaṃ vrajanti ca // Rm_15.92{92} //
XXratnml_u:6385: tathā ca mānavāḥ sarve lokā dharmānusārataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6390: sukhāni suciraṃ bhuktvā pravasanti pramoditāḥ // Rm_15.96{96} //
XXratnml_u:6392: sarve satvāḥ sukhaprāptāḥ pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_15.97{97} //
XXratnml_u:6395: kim atra vahunoktena dharma eva jagatprabhuḥ /
XXratnml_u:6396: dharmeṇaiva sadā nityaṃ rakṣitaḥ pracarec chubhe // Rm_15.99{99} //
XXratnml_u:6397: ṣubhena siddhyate cittaṃ śuddhacittaḥ sudhīr bhavet /
XXratnml_u:6400: bodhicittaṃ samādhāya triratnāni sadā bhajet // Rm_15.101{1} //
XXratnml_u:6403: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bodhicaryāṃ vrataṃ caret // Rm_15.102{2} //
XXratnml_u:6404: tato māragaṇāñ jitvā pūrya pāramitāḥ kramāt /
XXratnml_u:6405: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_15.103{3} //
XXratnml_u:6408: mṛtyukāle vipattau ca dharmma evānugas suhṛt /
XXratnml_u:6409: tadā sarve tyajanty āśu ko 'pi naiva sahānugaḥ // Rm_15.105{5} //
XXratnml_u:6410: dharma eva tadā trātā sarvatrāpy anugaḥ suhṛt /
XXratnml_u:6411: tasmād dharmo mahāratnaṃ sādhanīyaṃ prayatnataḥ // Rm_15.106{6} //
XXratnml_u:6413: samādiśya kṣaṇaṃ tasthau tūṣṇībhūtvā samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.107{7} //
XXratnml_u:6414: tatas tasya munīndrasya pādau sa mudito gṛhī /
XXratnml_u:6415: praṇatvā manasā caivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ sāmadadhe // Rm_15.108{8} //
XXratnml_u:6417: pratyekāṃ bodhim āsādya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpnuyāt // Rm_15.109{9} //
XXratnml_u:6418: tataḥ sa suprasannāsyo gṛhasthaḥ sajano mudā /
XXratnml_u:6419: bhagavataṃ tam ālokya puras tasthau samāhitaḥ // Rm_15.110{10} //
XXratnml_u:6420: tadā sa bhagavāṃs tasya śrīmato hṛdaye sthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6424: tāsāṃ yā raśmayo yātā adholoke samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6425: tāḥ sarvanarakeṣv evam avabhyāsya samāsarat // Rm_15.113{13} //
XXratnml_u:6426: tadā tābhiḥ parispṛṣṭāḥ sarve te narakasthitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6430: aho citraṃ kim adyaivaṃ mahat saukhyaṃ prajāyate /
XXratnml_u:6431: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanto 'smāc cyutā anyatra cāgatāḥ // Rm_15.116{16} //
XXratnml_u:6432: yad asmākaṃ mahad duḥkhaṃ tat sarvaṃ śāmyate 'dhunā /
XXratnml_u:6433: saṃjāyate mahāsaukhyaṃ tad adbhutaṃ na manyate // Rm_15.117{17} //
XXratnml_u:6435: yasmād iyaṃ mahāraśmir avabhāsya prasaryati // Rm_15.118{18} //
XXratnml_u:6437: bhagavān nirmitaṃ buddhaṃ sarvatra tatra preṣayet // Rm_15.119{19} //
XXratnml_u:6438: tadā taṃ saugatiṃ mūrttiṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te mudā /
XXratnml_u:6439: aho citram iti proktvā vismitāś caivam abruvan // Rm_15.120{20} //
XXratnml_u:6440: nehaivetaś cyutāḥ sarve nāpy anyatra gatā vayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6441: ihaiva saṃsthitāḥ sarve narake pravasāmahe // Rm_15.121{21} //
XXratnml_u:6442: api tv ayaṃ mahān satvo 'pūrvadarśana āgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6443: nūnam asyānubhāvena saṃjāyante sukhāni naḥ // Rm_15.122{22} //
XXratnml_u:6444: tad asmiṃ sugatākare vayaṃ sarve prasāditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6445: upetya praṇatiṃ kṛtvā sarvathā saṃbhajemahi // Rm_15.123{23} //
XXratnml_u:6446: iti saṃbhāṣya sarve te nārakīyāḥ pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6449: namo buddhāya dharmāya saṃghāye ca namaḥ sadā /
XXratnml_u:6450: ity uktvā ca triratnānāṃ saṃsmṛtvā śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_15.125{25} //
XXratnml_u:6451: iti te nirmite tasmiṃ cittaṃ prasādya nirmalāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6453: tathā corddhagatā yās tāḥ kramāc cāturmahādhipān /
XXratnml_u:6454: samārabhya trayastriṃśān sarvāṃś cāpi surālayāt // Rm_15.127{27} //
XXratnml_u:6456: tathā cāpi samodghuṣya sarvān devān anodayan /
XXratnml_u:6457: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāraṃ duḥkham śūnyam anātmakaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6458: iti matvā śubhe nityaṃ caritavyaṃ sadāpi ca // Rm_15.129{28} //
XXratnml_u:6460: dhunīta mṛtyusainyāni naḍāgāraṃ karī yathā // Rm_15.130{29} //
XXratnml_u:6461: yo hy asmiṃ dharmavinaye hy apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXratnml_u:6462: tyaktvā janmātra saṃsāre duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati // Rm_15.131{30} //
XXratnml_u:6464: tac chraddhayā triratnāni bhajadhvaṃ sarvadādarāt // Rm_15.132{31} //
XXratnml_u:6465: etac chabdaṃ samākarṇya sarve devāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6466: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā prabhejire sadādṛtāḥ // Rm_15.133{32} //
XXratnml_u:6467: evaṃ tā raśmayaḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṃl lokāṃc chubhe vṛṣe /
XXratnml_u:6468: bodhayitvā pratisthāpya pratyāyayur muneḥ puraḥ // Rm_15.134{33} //
XXratnml_u:6469: tatra tā raśmayaḥ sarvāḥ piṇḍitās tasya tāyinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6470: tridhā pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā sūrṇāyāṃ nyaviśat punaḥ // Rm_15.135{34} //
XXratnml_u:6471: tad dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve lokās te samitisthitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6472: kiṃ dharmam ādiśed buddha iti saṃciṃtya tasthire // Rm_15.136{35} //
XXratnml_u:6474: puraḥ sthito munīndraṃ taṃ praṇatvā prārthayat tathā // Rm_15.137{36} //
XXratnml_u:6480: tad yad arthaṃ bhavān smitaṃ darśayati munīśvara /
XXratnml_u:6481: tad arthaṃ śrotum icchaṃti sarve lokā ime 'dhunā // Rm_15.140{39} //
XXratnml_u:6482: tad bhavāṃ yat samādeṣṭum ichati sāṃprataṃ mune /
XXratnml_u:6483: tad dharmaṃ samupādiśya prasādayatv imāṃ sabhāṃ // Rm_15.141{40} //
XXratnml_u:6484: iti tena vaśiṣyeṇa prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:6485: tam āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_15.142{41} //
XXratnml_u:6487: saṃbuddhā api te sarve darśayanti kadā cana // Rm_15.143{42} //
XXratnml_u:6488: yad arthe smitam ānaṃda darśitaṃ sāṃprataṃ mayā /
XXratnml_u:6490: tad arthaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇudhvaṃ samāhitāḥ // Rm_15.144{43} //
XXratnml_u:6491: paśyasi tvaṃ tadānaṃda śreṣṭhinānena yan mama /
XXratnml_u:6492: evaṃvidhaṃ sasaṃghasya satkāraṃ śraddhayā kṛtaṃ // Rm_15.145{44} //
XXratnml_u:6494: ayaṃ śrīmān mahāsatvo bodhisatvo bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_15.146{45} //
XXratnml_u:6496: sūkṣmatvag iti vikhyātaḥ pratyekabuddha ātmavit // Rm_15.147{46} //
XXratnml_u:6500: buddhakṣetre kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:6501: saṃbodhisatphalaṃ dadyān nānyad dharmaphalaṃ khalu // Rm_15.150{49} //
XXratnml_u:6503: matvā taccharaṇaṃ kṛtvā triratnaṃ bhajatādarāt // Rm_15.151{50} //
XXratnml_u:6505: te sadā sadgatiṃ yātāś caraṃti bodhisaṃvaraṃ // Rm_15.152{51} //
XXratnml_u:6506: ye dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā śrutvā bhajanti sādaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:6507: sarve te 'kleśino bhadrāḥ saṃprayānti jinālayaṃ // Rm_15.153{52} //
XXratnml_u:6508: ye saṃghe śaraṇaṃ gatvā bhajanti śraddhayā sadā /
XXratnml_u:6509: na te gacchanti duḥkhatvaṃ sadā yānti sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_15.154{53} //
XXratnml_u:6510: iti matvā tathā yūyaṃ sadā nityaṃ samāhitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6513: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyatha // Rm_15.156{55} //
XXratnml_u:6515: sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś ca saṃpramoditāḥ // Rm_15.157{56} //
XXratnml_u:6517: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ prabhejire samāhitāḥ // Rm_15.158{57} //
XXratnml_u:6518: so 'pi śreṣṭhī tathā śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ tadātmanaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6520: tataḥ prabhṛti sa śrīmāṃs triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6521: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ sadā bheje pramoditaḥ // Rm_15.160{59} //
XXratnml_u:6522: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā sasāṃghikaḥ samutthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6523: tathā sarvatra bhadrāṇi prakurvan svāśramaṃ yayau // Rm_15.161{60} //
XXratnml_u:6524: ity evaṃ guruṇākhyātaṃ tathā mayātra kathyate /
XXratnml_u:6525: tvam apy evaṃ mahārāja śrutvā dharmaṃ śubhe cara // Rm_15.162{61} //
XXratnml_u:6526: prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvayitvā prabodhayan /
XXratnml_u:6528: tathā te sarvadā nityaṃ maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6529: bhaven nūnaṃ mahārāja satyam etat prabudhyatāṃ // Rm_15.164{63} //
XXratnml_u:6531: paripūryya krameṇaivaṃ saṃbodhim api cāpsyai // Rm_15.165{64} //
XXratnml_u:6532: evaṃ satyaṃ parijñāya triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6533: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhaja bodhiṃ yadīchasi // Rm_15.166{65} //
XXratnml_u:6535: iti tenārhatā śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ niśamya saḥ /
XXratnml_u:6536: nṛpas tatheti saṃśrutya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_15.167{66} //
XXratnml_u:6537: sūkṣmatvaco 'vadānaṃ yat tad idaṃ ye narā mudā /
XXratnml_u:6538: satkṛtya śraddhayā bhaktyā śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti ca // Rm_15.168{67} //
XXratnml_u:6539: te sarve sadgatiṃ yātā bhuktvā saukhyāni sarvadā /
XXratnml_u:6543: XVI Pretikāvadāna athāśoko mahārājaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:6544: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar eva samabravīt // Rm_16.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:6545: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6546: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhasi // Rm_16.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:6547: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena rājñā sa yatir ātmavit /
XXratnml_u:6548: tam aśokaṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_16.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:6549: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6550: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvānumodanāṃ kuru // Rm_16.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:6551: purā sa bhagavān buddhaḥ śākyasiṃho jagadguruḥ /
XXratnml_u:6552: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_16.5{5} //
XXratnml_u:6565: ṛṣayo brahmaṇāś cāpi yatayo yogino 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:6566: rājāno rājaputrāś ca maṃtriṇo 'pi ca // Rm_16.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:6568: vaṇijaḥ śilpinaś cāpi gṛhasthāḥ paurikā janāḥ // Rm_16.13{13} //
XXratnml_u:6569: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi kārpaṭikāś ca nairgamāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6571: tatra sarve 'pi te lokā vihāre samupāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6572: taṃ munīndraṃ samāsīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā natvā pramoditāḥ // Rm_16.15{15} //
XXratnml_u:6574: natvā sāñjalayaḥ sarve parivṛtya samaṃtataḥ // Rm_16.16{16} //
XXratnml_u:6576: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya samātasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_16.17{17} //
XXratnml_u:6577: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:6579: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā lokāḥ sarve 'pi te mudā /
XXratnml_u:6589: vibhramanti sadā kvāpi kiñci sthitiṃ na lebhire // Rm_16.23{23} //
XXratnml_u:6591: āyuṣmān saugato bhikṣur mahābhijño dayānvitaḥ // Rm_16.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:6593: rājagṛhe pure piṇḍaṃ yācituṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:6594: tatra yatiḥ sa tāṃ pretāṃ sarvān vibhramato 'mvare /
XXratnml_u:6595: dṛṣṭvene ka iti dhyātvā paśyañ janair upācaran // Rm_16.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:6596: te sarve pretakāś cāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ bhikṣum āgataṃ /
XXratnml_u:6597: sahasopetya natvāgre rudanta etad abruvan // Rm_16.27{27} //
XXratnml_u:6599: tad asmākaṃ hitaṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā trātum arhati // Rm_16.28{28} //
XXratnml_u:6600: vayaṃ rājagṛhe jātāḥ paurāḥ paṃcaśatāny api /
XXratnml_u:6602: tadā vayam ime sarve gṛhasthāḥ śreṣṭhino narāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6606: naiva kiñ cit tadā dānam adadmahi kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:6607: arthinam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā prākuṣyāmahi roṣitāḥ // Rm_16.32{32} //
XXratnml_u:6608: paradattāny api śrutvā dṛṣṭvā cāpi praroṣitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6610: saugatā api cārhantaḥ pretā iveyam āgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6612: tata ete vayaṃ sarve kālaṃ kṛtvā ca sāṃprataṃ /
XXratnml_u:6614: iti bhadanta vijñāya gatvā rājagṛhe bhavān /
XXratnml_u:6619: asmannāmnā prakarttavyaṃ praṇāmam api sadguro // Rm_16.38{38} //
XXratnml_u:6622: bhavatā kārayitavyā ity asmāsu kṛpāṃ kuru // Rm_16.39{39} //
XXratnml_u:6623: yathāsmākam itaḥ pretalokā muktir bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6624: tathāsmāsu bhavāmc chāstā kṛpayā kartum arhāti // Rm_16.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:6625: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ sarvaiḥ sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:6626: śrutvā tatheti saṃśrutya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_16.41{41} //
XXratnml_u:6627: tatas tān pretikān sarvān sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6628: samālokya samāśvāsya punar etat samabravīt // Rm_16.42{42} //
XXratnml_u:6629: tatra yūyaṃ ca sarva śvaḥ pravṛtte saṃghabhojane /
XXratnml_u:6630: sasaṃghaṃ śrīghanaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāyāta samādarāt // Rm_16.43{43} //
XXratnml_u:6631: iti tenārhātādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te pretakā api /
XXratnml_u:6632: tatheti hi pratijñāya praṇatvā taṃ vane yayuḥ // Rm_16.44{44} //
XXratnml_u:6633: tataḥ sa saugato bhikṣur maudgalyo yatir ātmavit /
XXratnml_u:6634: gatvā rājagṛhe teṣāṃ jñātīnāṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.45{45} //
XXratnml_u:6635: tatra sarvatra teṣāṃ tat jñātīnāṃ bhavaneṣu sa /
XXratnml_u:6636: gatvā teṣāṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ sarvam evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_16.46{46} //
XXratnml_u:6637: tataḥ sa tatra sarvāṃs tāṃ jñātīn āhūya sādaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:6638: teṣāṃ pretagater muktihetor evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_16.47{'47} //
XXratnml_u:6639: śṛṇuta bho mahābhāgya yūyaṃ sarve samāhitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6643: nāpi dānaṃ pradattaṃ taiḥ kasmai ci kvāpi kiṃ cana /
XXratnml_u:6644: paradattāny api śrutvā dṛṣṭvā vā paryabhāṣyata // Rm_16.50{50} //
XXratnml_u:6645: arhanto bhikṣavo vā tair yācakāś ca gṛhāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6648: ity arhato yatī cāpi dṛṣṭvaiva te 'bhyanindayan // Rm_16.52{52} //
XXratnml_u:6652: saṃbuddhaśāsane dānaṃ kartum ichāmy ahaṃ khalu // Rm_16.54{54} //
XXratnml_u:6654: tadā tat pāpamuktās te sarve yāyur divaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_16.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:6655: tad atra śraddhayā yūyaṃ yathāśakti mayārthitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6657: saṃghabhojye pravṛtte 'tra sarve te pretikā api /
XXratnml_u:6658: draṣṭuṃ samāgamiṣyanti yūyaṃ cāgaṃtum arhatha // Rm_16.57{57} //
XXratnml_u:6659: ity uktvā prārthite tena maudgalyena dayālunā /
XXratnml_u:6660: śrutvā taj jātayaḥ sarve vismayāṃ samupāyayuḥ // Rm_16.58{58} //
XXratnml_u:6661: tatas te vismitāḥ sarve tat pretagatimuktaye /
XXratnml_u:6663: tat bhojyasāmagrīṃ śraddhayā dātum icchire // Rm_16.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:6664: ke cit tasmai suvarṇāni ke cid ratnāni saṃdaduḥ /
XXratnml_u:6665: ke cid ropyādi dhātūṃś ca dravyāni vividhāni cā // Rm_16.60{60} //
XXratnml_u:6666: taṇḍulāni daduḥ ke cid dadur dhānyāni ke cana /
XXratnml_u:6667: ke cid daduḥ kalāyāṃś ca godhūmāṃś ca yavān api // Rm_16.61{61} //
XXratnml_u:6669: mudgāṃś cāpi tathānyāṃś ca sarvān vrīhin daduḥ pare // Rm_16.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:6673: surasāni supathyāni pradaduś cāpare mudā // Rm_16.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:6675: śunṭhīś ca pippirīś cāpi maricāni dadur mudā // Rm_16.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:6676: hiṅguṃ ca jīrakāṃś cānye viḍarkasaiṃdhavādi ca /
XXratnml_u:6677: anye ghṛtāni tailāni pradaduḥ śraddhayā mudā // Rm_16.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:6678: śaktūṃś ca piṣṭakāṃś cānyamodakāṃś ca dadur mudā /
XXratnml_u:6679: tathā dadhīni dugdhāni madhuni ca guḍāni ca // Rm_16.67{67} //
XXratnml_u:6680: tathānye sarkarāś cāpi pradaduḥ śraddhayā mudā /
XXratnml_u:6681: tathauṣadhāni pathyāni pācakāni daduḥ pare // Rm_16.68{68} //
XXratnml_u:6684: sarve te jñātayas teṣāṃ saṃghabhokṣyāya saṃdaduḥ // Rm_16.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:6685: evaṃ te sarvavastūni datvā sarve pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6686: sāṃjalayaḥ praṇatvā taṃ maudgalyaṃ yatim ūcire // Rm_16.70{70} //
XXratnml_u:6690: tān pretān samupāyātān sarvān draṣṭuṃ sabāndhavāḥ // Rm_16.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:6691: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā tatheti sa prabodhayan /
XXratnml_u:6692: tāni dravyāni sarvāṇi gṛhītvā svāśrame yayau // Rm_16.73{73} //
XXratnml_u:6693: tataḥ sa bhikṣur āyuṣmān vihāre samupācaran /
XXratnml_u:6694: dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā sāñjaliḥ samupāśrayan // Rm_16.74{73} //
XXratnml_u:6695: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ maudgalyam upasthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6697: kaṃ cit te kuśalaṃ vatsa kuto 'trāsi samāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6698: lokeṣu kiṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ tan pracakṣva mahāmate // Rm_16.76{75} //
XXratnml_u:6699: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:6700: bhagavantaṃ tam ānatvā sāñjalir etad abravīt // Rm_16.77{76} //
XXratnml_u:6701: bhagavan kṛpayā śāstaḥ sarvatra kauśalaṃ mama /
XXratnml_u:6702: rājagṛhe pure piṃḍaṃ yācituṃ samupācaran // Rm_16.78{77} //
XXratnml_u:6703: tatra mārge vanopānte paṃca pretaśatāny api /
XXratnml_u:6704: dṛṣṭvā māṃ samupasṛtya praṇatvaitad vadanti vai // Rm_16.79{78} //
XXratnml_u:6705: bhadanta tad vijānīyā yad vayaṃ pretikā ime /
XXratnml_u:6706: sarve rājagṛhe jātā gṛhasthāḥ paurikāḥ khalu // Rm_16.80{79} //
XXratnml_u:6711: jñātīnām api sarveṣāṃ karmaplotiṃ nivedya hi // Rm_16.82{81} //
XXratnml_u:6719: bodhimārge pratisthāpya pātum arhati sarvadā // Rm_16.86{85} //
XXratnml_u:6720: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā tathā rājagṛhe gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6721: tad jñātīnāṃ puras teṣāṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ nivedya ca // Rm_16.87{86} //
XXratnml_u:6724: iti me prārthanāṃ kṛtvā bhavāṃ chāstā jagadguruḥ /
XXratnml_u:6725: tad adhivāsanāṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā tān samuddhara // Rm_16.89{88} //
XXratnml_u:6726: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:6731: sāñjalis taṃ munīndraṃ ca praṇatvaitat samabravīt // Rm_16.92{91} //
XXratnml_u:6733: tat sarvasāṃghikaiḥ sārddhaṃ sahasāgaṃtum arhati // Rm_16.93{92} //
XXratnml_u:6734: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:6735: bhikṣuṃ prāha samāhūya gaṇḍīm ākoṭyatām iti // Rm_16.94{93} //
XXratnml_u:6736: tadādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā bhikṣus tatheti saḥ /
XXratnml_u:6737: āśrutya sahasādāya gaṇḍīm ākoṭayat tadā // Rm_16.95{94} //
XXratnml_u:6738: tad gaṇḍīśabdam ākarṇya sarve te sāṃghikā api /
XXratnml_u:6740: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra svāsane samupāviśat /
XXratnml_u:6741: sarve te sāṃghikāś cāpi kramāt svasvāsane 'viśan // Rm_16.97{96} //
XXratnml_u:6742: tatas tad jñātayaḥ sarve tatrānye paurikā api /
XXratnml_u:6743: tān pretān draṣṭum āyātā upatasthuḥ sakautukāḥ // Rm_16.98{97} //
XXratnml_u:6744: tadā te pretikāḥ sarve prakṣiptāḥ karmavāyubhiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6745: bahulokāntare dure yātās tasthur vimohitāḥ // Rm_16.99{98} //
XXratnml_u:6746: tadā sa yatir ālokya sarvasaṃghān samāsthitān /
XXratnml_u:6747: tadjñātibandhuvargāṃś ca pretān draṣṭuṃ samācarat // Rm_16.100{99} //
XXratnml_u:6748: tatra pretān adṛṣṭvā sa maudgalyo vismitāśayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6749: kiṃ te 'tra nāgatā veti samantato vyalokayat // Rm_16.101{100} //
