XXratnml_u:6751: vilokayan sa sarvatra nādrakṣīt tāṃ samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6752: sa saṃdigdhaḥ punas tatra samyagdṛṣṭyā vyalokayat // Rm_16.102{1} //
XXratnml_u:6753: sarvatrāpi sa tāṃ pretān adṛṣṭvā vismayānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6755: tatrāpi ca sa sarvatra naiva kaṃ cid apaśyate /
XXratnml_u:6758: tatrāpi tān adṛṣṭvā sa narakeṣu samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6759: divyena cakṣuṣā paśyan na ca tatrāpy apaśyata // Rm_16.105{4} //
XXratnml_u:6761: sa divyacakṣuṣā paśyaṃs tatrāpi nābhyapaśyata // Rm_16.106{5} //
XXratnml_u:6762: tatrāpi tān adṛṣṭvā sa maudgalyo vismayānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6766: tatra sa purato gatvā śāstāraṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:6769: mayā na dṛśyate kaś cit te pretāḥ kvādhunā gatāḥ // Rm_16.110{9} //
XXratnml_u:6770: teṣāṃ nāmnā bhavatpūjāṃ karttum etat prasādhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6771: yad atra nāgatāḥ kecit tat te pretā gatāḥ kuha // Rm_16.111{10} //
XXratnml_u:6772: dṛśyante na mayā kvāpi sarvatrāpi samīkṣyate /
XXratnml_u:6773: eko 'pi nāgato hy atra kva gatās te 'dhunā khalu // Rm_16.112{11} //
XXratnml_u:6774: tan me cittaṃ prasaṃdigdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā śāstā bhavān sudṛk /
XXratnml_u:6775: teṣāṃ gatiṃ samākhyāya saṃbodhayitum arhati // Rm_16.113{12} //
XXratnml_u:6776: iti saṃprārthite tena maudgalyena sa sarvavit /
XXratnml_u:6777: bhagavāṃs taṃ samālokya maudgalyam etad abravīt // Rm_16.114{13} //
XXratnml_u:6778: maudgalya mā kṛthā yatnaṃ khedam evābhipatsyase /
XXratnml_u:6779: gatās te pretikāḥ sarve sudūrabhuvane 'dhunā // Rm_16.115{14} //
XXratnml_u:6781: adṛśye viṣaye yātāḥ preritāḥ karmavāyubhiḥ // Rm_16.116{15} //
XXratnml_u:6782: yadi sarvāṃ ca tāṃ draṣṭuṃ vāṃchasi tvam ihāśritaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6783: sarvāṃs tāṃ darśayiṣyāmi paśya buddhānubhāvatāṃ // Rm_16.117{16} //
XXratnml_u:6784: tad atra tvaṃ samādāya gaṇḍīm ākoṭaya drutaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6785: oṃ namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyakambuddhāya // tadyathā //
XXratnml_u:6786: oṃ puṇye puṇye mahāpuṇye aparimitapuṇye aparimitapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacite
XXratnml_u:6787: oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhe dharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvaviśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā
XXratnml_u:6790: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sa pratibodhitaḥ // Rm_16.119{18} //
XXratnml_u:6791: sahasā tat sabhāmadhye gaṇḍīm ākoṭayat tathā /
XXratnml_u:6792: tad gaṇḍīśabdam ākarṇya sarve te pretikā api /
XXratnml_u:6795: tatra sarve 'pi te pretā dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:6797: kramāt tāṃ sarvasaṃghāṃś ca praṇatvā te pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6798: sarve 'py ekāntam āśritya paśyanta upatasthire // Rm_16.122{21} //
XXratnml_u:6799: tatra tad jñātayaḥ sarve paurikāś cāpare 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:6800: tān pretān samupāsīnān dṛṣṭvā tasthuḥ sakautukāḥ // Rm_16.123{22} //
XXratnml_u:6801: evaṃ sarve 'pi te pretāḥ svasvajñātīn upasthitān /
XXratnml_u:6802: bhātrādīn bandhuvargāṃś ca dṛṣṭvaivam upatasthire // Rm_16.124{23} //
XXratnml_u:6803: tataḥ so 'rhan mahābhijño maudgalyas tān upasthitān /
XXratnml_u:6804: pretān sarvān samālokya natvāhaivaṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_16.125{24} //
XXratnml_u:6805: bhagavan nātha sarvajña te pretāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6806: tad eṣāṃ bhagavāṃ cchāstānugrahaṃ karttum arhati // Rm_16.126{25} //
XXratnml_u:6808: sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ samabhyarcya bhojayan samatoṣayat // Rm_16.127{26} //
XXratnml_u:6809: tataḥ sa sarvasaṃghaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃtṛptikaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:6812: datvā kṣamārthanāṃ kṛtvā prārthayat sa munīśvaraṃ // Rm_16.129{28} //
XXratnml_u:6813: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavāṃ chāstā sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6814: dakṣiṇādeśanām ebhyaḥ pretebhyaḥ kartum arhati // Rm_16.130{29} //
XXratnml_u:6815: iti saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā sarve te pretikā mudā /
XXratnml_u:6816: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā sādaram upatasthire // Rm_16.131{30} //
XXratnml_u:6817: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghas tān upasthitān /
XXratnml_u:6818: dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vidadhe śubhāṃ // Rm_16.132{31} //
XXratnml_u:6819: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretān anugachatu /
XXratnml_u:6820: uttiṣṭhantaḥ prayānty ete sarve pretāḥ surālayaṃ // Rm_16.133{21} //
XXratnml_u:6821: ity ādiśya punas tatra bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:6827: duḥkhāny eva bhave nityaṃ puṇye matiḥ kathaṃ caret // Rm_16.137{25} //
XXratnml_u:6828: vinā puṇyamatiṃ jantuḥ saddharme katham ācaret /
XXratnml_u:6829: vinā saddharmabhāvena sadgatiṃ katham āpnuyāt // Rm_16.138{26} //
XXratnml_u:6831: tiryakṣu narakeṣv eva bhraman duḥkhāny avāpnuyāt // Rm_16.139{27} //
XXratnml_u:6832: tad atra mānuṣe janmaprāptair yatnena mānavaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6833: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ śrotavyaṃ sadvṛṣaṃ mudā // Rm_16.140{28} //
XXratnml_u:6835: etat puṇyavipākena sadgurau sarvadā bhajet // Rm_16.141{29} //
XXratnml_u:6839: tatra sukhāni saṃbhuktvā saṃcareta śubhe sadā // Rm_16.143{31} //
XXratnml_u:6842: dānena varddhyate lakṣmīr lakṣmīmāṃ cchobhate pumān /
XXratnml_u:6845: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhajed bhaktyā sadādarāt // Rm_16.146{34} //
XXratnml_u:6847: bodhicitte hi labdhe hi bodhisatvo bhavet kṛtī // Rm_16.147{35} //
XXratnml_u:6849: paripūrya mahāsatvas trividhāṃ bodhim āpnuyāt // Rm_16.148{36} //
XXratnml_u:6851: qsākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_16.149{37} //
XXratnml_u:6852: evaṃ vijñāya martyena karttavyaṃ dānam arthine /
XXratnml_u:6853: dānena sadgatiṃ yāyād adātā durgatiṃ vrajet // Rm_16.150{38} //
XXratnml_u:6854: durgatiṣu sadā bhuktvā duḥkhāni vividhāṃ sa /
XXratnml_u:6855: sarvadā duḥkhasaṃkliṣṭaḥ pāpeṣv evārataś caret // Rm_16.151{39} //
XXratnml_u:6857: nirato hy aviśaṃkena saṃcareta pramādataḥ // Rm_16.152{40} //
XXratnml_u:6858: tataḥ so hy atipāpiṣṭhaḥ saddharmanindakaḥ kudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:6859: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayen nāstikaḥ śaṭhaḥ // Rm_16.153{41} //
XXratnml_u:6861: ghoreṣu narakeṣv eva gatvā bhraman sadā vaset // Rm_16.154{42} //
XXratnml_u:6862: sadāpi narakeṣv evaṃ bhramatas tasya duḥkhinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6863: kaścin naiva samuddhartuṃ śaknuyāt saugatād ṛte // Rm_16.155{43} //
XXratnml_u:6864: yāvan na smarate buddhaṃ tāvat sa narake vaset /
XXratnml_u:6865: yad eva smarate buddhaṃ tadā syāc chuddhitāśayaḥ // Rm_16.156{44} //
XXratnml_u:6866: tadā taṃ kṛpayā buddho dṛṣṭvā bauddhena cakṣuṣā /
XXratnml_u:6867: puṇyakareṇa saṃspṛṣṭvā samuddhared araṃ tataḥ // Rm_16.157{45} //
XXratnml_u:6868: tatas taṃ pāpinaṃ bauddhā dharmāmbubhir viśodhya ca /
XXratnml_u:6871: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā saddharma eva prācaret // Rm_16.159{47} //
XXratnml_u:6873: kramāt pāramitāḥ sarvā pūrayituṃ samudyamet // Rm_16.160{48} //
XXratnml_u:6875: bodhisatvo mahāsatvo buddhātmajo bhaved api // Rm_16.161{49} //
XXratnml_u:6877: trividhāṃ bodhim āsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_16.162{50} //
XXratnml_u:6878: evaṃ matvā sadā nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6879: saddharmaṃ samupāśritya caradhvaṃ mānavā mudā // Rm_16.163{51} //
XXratnml_u:6880: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te brāhmaṇādayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6882: sarve lokā parijñāya dṛṣṭasatyās tathācaran // Rm_16.164{52} //
XXratnml_u:6883: tathā sarve 'pi te pretāḥ śrutvā tad dharmadeśanāṃ /
XXratnml_u:6884: mudā taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā śuddhātmānas tato 'caran // Rm_16.165{53} //
XXratnml_u:6885: tatas tad jñātayaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sakautukāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6886: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā svasvālayaṃ yayur mudā // Rm_16.166{54} //
XXratnml_u:6887: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhaḥ samutthāya saṣāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:6890: śāstāraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ svam āśramaṃ samāśrayat // Rm_16.168{56} //
XXratnml_u:6892: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tataś cyutā divaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_16.169{57} //
XXratnml_u:6896: kutaś cyutāḥ kuhāyāmaḥ karmaṇā kena vā vayaṃ // Rm_16.171{59} //
XXratnml_u:6899: bhavanto yad vayaṃ sarve pretā buddhānubhāvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6905: etat satyaṃ parijñāya tasya śāstur jagadguroḥ /
XXratnml_u:6906: punaḥ sarve vayaṃ gatvā satkṛtya prabhajemahi // Rm_16.176{64} //
XXratnml_u:6907: iti saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā sarve te pretapūrvakāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6911: sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ bhābhir avabhāsya samantataḥ // Rm_16.178{66} //
XXratnml_u:6912: vihāre samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:6914: tatra divyopacārais taiḥ pūjāṃgais taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:6915: sarve 'pi te samabhyarcya satkṛtya śraddhayābhajan // Rm_16.180{68} //
XXratnml_u:6918: atha sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:6920: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te pretapūrvakāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6921: devaputrāś ca dharmāṇāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ pralebhire // Rm_16.183{71} //
XXratnml_u:6923: śāstāraṃ taṃ punar natvā samālokyaitad abruvan // Rm_16.184{72} //
XXratnml_u:6926: pretalokāt paricyutvā svarge yātāḥ sma sāṃprataṃ // Rm_16.185{73} //
XXratnml_u:6929: tat kṛpālo yatas tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
XXratnml_u:6931: tad bhavaddarśanaṃ prāpya pītvā dharmāmṛtāny api /
XXratnml_u:6932: muditāḥ śraddhayā bhaktyā triratnaṃ saṃbhajāmahe // Rm_16.188{76} //
XXratnml_u:6934: bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ kartuṃ bhūyaḥ prāyāmahe vayaṃ // Rm_16.189{77} //
XXratnml_u:6936: āryadharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā saṃtuṣṭiṃ na labhāmahe // Rm_16.190{78} //
XXratnml_u:6937: tad vayaṃ bhavatām evaṃ sarvadā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6938: satkṛtya samupāsṛtya bhaktum ichāmahe punaḥ // Rm_16.191{79} //
XXratnml_u:6939: tad bhavān kṛpayāsmā kaṃ kṛtvānugraham ābhavaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6940: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya sarvadā trātum arhati // Rm_16.192{80} //
XXratnml_u:6943: jñānacakṣuś ca saṃprāptaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ māyāmayaṃ bhavaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6944: āryamārgaś ca saṃprāptaḥ prāptā ca nirvṛtiśrutiḥ // Rm_16.194{82} //
XXratnml_u:6945: dhanyā ime vayaṃ sarve yad bhavaccharaṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6947: dhanyās te puruṣāḥ sarve ye buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6948: sadā dharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā kārāṃ kurvanti śāsane // Rm_16.196{84} //
XXratnml_u:6950: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya tiṣṭhatu sarvadā sukhaṃ // Rm_16.197{85} //
XXratnml_u:6951: iti prabhākhya sarve te devaputrāḥ pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6952: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvā ca suprasannā divaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_16.198{86} //
XXratnml_u:6953: tatra sarve 'pi te devās triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6956: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ śiṣyaṃ samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_16.200{88} //
XXratnml_u:6957: sādhu maudgalya saṃvṛttaṃ saphalaṃ te kṛpāmate /
XXratnml_u:6958: yat tvayā prakṛtaṃ kāyaṃ vaiyāvṛttaṃ suśobhitaṃ // Rm_16.201{89} //
XXratnml_u:6959: yannāmnā bhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapūjā kṛtā tvayā /
XXratnml_u:6960: te sarve devalokeṣu samutpannāḥ pratisthitāḥ // Rm_16.202{90} //
XXratnml_u:6962: teṣāṃ bhadrāśayaṃ dṛṣṭvā saddharmo deśito mayā // Rm_16.203{91} //
XXratnml_u:6963: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā te sarve 'pi pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6964: dṛṣṭasatyāḥ prakrāntāś ca gachanti tridaśālaye // Rm_16.204{92} //
XXratnml_u:6965: tatra svarge 'pi te sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6967: yannāmnā yat kṛtaṃ karma tat phalaṃ te prabhuṃjate /
XXratnml_u:6969: evaṃ lokahitaṃ kartuṃ karttavyaṃ puṇyasādhanaṃ // Rm_16.206{94} //
XXratnml_u:6970: evaṃ lokahitaṃ kṛtvā prakurvanti śubhāni ye /
XXratnml_u:6971: te pumāṃso mahāsatvā bodhisatvā jinātmajāḥ // Rm_16.207{95} //
XXratnml_u:6972: evaṃ vijñāya lokānāṃ hitaṃ kartuṃ samudyataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6974: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6975: satyam iti pratijñāya prābhyanandat prabodhitaḥ // Rm_16.209{97} //
XXratnml_u:6976: tataḥ so 'rhan mahābhijñas tac chāstrādiṣṭam ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:6977: tad jñātīnāṃ purogatvā sarvam evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_16.210{98} //
XXratnml_u:6978: te 'pi ca jñātayaḥ sarve tenārhatā niveditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6979: śrutvā satyam iti jñātvā prāmodyaṃ pratilebhire // Rm_16.211{99} //
XXratnml_u:6980: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:6981: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ prabhejire samādarāt // Rm_16.212{100} //
XXratnml_u:6982: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā narādhipa /
XXratnml_u:6985: triratnabhajanaṃ lokaiḥ kārayituṃ tvam arhasi // Rm_16.214{2} //
XXratnml_u:6986: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bhaven nūnaṃ samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:6988: iti matvā mahārāja lokān sarvān prabodhayan /
XXratnml_u:6989: pratiṣṭhāpya śubhe dharme pālayasva samāhitaḥ // Rm_16.216{4} //
XXratnml_u:6990: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvāśokaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:6992: pretāvadānaṃ manujā idaṃ ye śṛṇvanti ye cāpi niśāmayanti /
XXratnml_u:6993: te sarva evaṃ pratilabdhapuṇyā bhuktvā sukhāni pracaranti loke //
XXratnml_u:6997: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evaṃ abhāṣata // Rm_17.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:6998: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:6999: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_17.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:7000: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan yatiḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:7001: upagupto nareṃdrāṃ taṃ samalokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:7002: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7003: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā cāpy anumodaya // Rm_17.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:7005: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ sāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_17.5{5} //
XXratnml_u:7007: vihāre śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhikṣubhiś cailakair api // Rm_17.6{6} //
XXratnml_u:7012: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ sarve lokāḥ samāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7015: garuḍā vidyādharāś cāpi sarve te saṃpracerire // Rm_17.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:7016: tataḥ sarve 'pi te tatra puraskṛtya samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7017: parivṛtya sasaṃghaṃ tam upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_17.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:7018: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:7020: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te saṃpramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7024: tatra tāṃ bhagavān dṛṣṭvā matvā janmāntaraprasūṃ /
XXratnml_u:7025: ānaṃdaṃ samupāmaṃtrya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.15{15} //
XXratnml_u:7027: bhagavāṃs tṛṣito mātas tad ambu dīyatām iti // Rm_17.16{16} //
XXratnml_u:7029: sahasā samupāśritya tāṃ vṛddhām evam abravīt // Rm_17.17{17} //
XXratnml_u:7030: mātar me bhagavāñ chāstā tṛṣito 'yam ihādhunā /
XXratnml_u:7031: tat pānīyaṃ pradatvā me mahaddharmam avāpnuhi // Rm_17.18{18} //
XXratnml_u:7033: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena śrutvā sā sthavirā satī /
XXratnml_u:7034: tam ānandaṃ samālokya muditaivam abhāṣata // Rm_17.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:7036: svayam eva samānīya dāsyāmi vrajatāṃ bhavān // Rm_17.20{20} //
XXratnml_u:7037: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa ānaṃdaḥ prabodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7038: upetyaivaṃ samākhyāya śāstuḥ pura upāśrayat // Rm_17.21{21} //
XXratnml_u:7039: tadā sā sahasā kṛtvā ghaṭaṃ śuddhāmbupūritaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7041: tatra sā samupāśritya prādrākṣīt taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:7044: jaṃgamam iva ratnābhaṃ saumyaṃ samantabhadrakaṃ // Rm_17.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:7046: stanābhyāṃ praśrutās tasyāḥ kṣīradhārā niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:7048: putra putreti soktvā taṃ pariṣvektum upācarat // Rm_17.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:7049: tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve evaṃ tāṃ samupadrutāṃ /
XXratnml_u:7051: tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavāṃ chastā sarvāṃs tāṃ sāṃghikān api /
XXratnml_u:7052: sahasā samupāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_17.28{28} //
XXratnml_u:7053: mā bhikṣava imāṃ vṛddhāṃ dhārāyatātra muñcata /
XXratnml_u:7054: paṃcajanmaśatāny eṣā mātā me bhūyataḥ purā // Rm_17.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:7056: samāliṃgatum īchantī mama gātre pradhāvati // Rm_17.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:7057: yady atraiṣā nivāryyete gātra me śleṣmaṇād api /
XXratnml_u:7058: idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kamṭhād asyāḥ kṣaret kṣaṇāt // Rm_17.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:7061: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7062: tāṃ śāstuḥ pūrvaprasūṃ matvā vyavatasthuḥ savismayāḥ // Rm_17.33{33} //
XXratnml_u:7063: tatkṣaṇād urddhavāhuḥ sā samīkṣya taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:7064: sahasā saṃpradhāvitvā samāliṃgya namac ciraṃ // Rm_17.34{34} //
XXratnml_u:7065: tataś cirāt samutthāya sā vṛddhā sāñjalir mudā /
XXratnml_u:7066: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya puras tasthau samāhitā // Rm_17.35{35} //
XXratnml_u:7067: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ puraḥ samupāsthitāṃ /
XXratnml_u:7069: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sa vṛddhāpi kacaṃgalā /
XXratnml_u:7074: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā gāthā imā abhāṣata // Rm_17.39{39} //
XXratnml_u:7077: tat kṛtaṃ bhavatā me 'tra cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇaṃ // Rm_17.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:7078: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge mokṣaṃ ca sāṃprataṃ /
XXratnml_u:7081: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dātum arhati sāṃprataṃ bhavān // Rm_17.42{42} //
XXratnml_u:7084: ity arthitaṃ tayā śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:7086: yadi śraddhāsti te mātaḥ pravrajyāsadhane khalu /
XXratnml_u:7087: bharttur anujñāṃ samāsādya prāgacha cara saṃvaraṃ // Rm_17.45{44} //
XXratnml_u:7088: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā saṃpramoditā /
XXratnml_u:7089: tathā hīti pratijñāya muniṃ natvā tato 'carat // Rm_17.46{45} //
XXratnml_u:7090: tatra sā sahasā gehe gatvā taṃ svāminaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:7091: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā puraḥ sthitvaivam abravīt // Rm_17.47{46} //
XXratnml_u:7092: svāmi cchṛṇv adbhutaṃ vakṣye yad adyāhaṃ jalārthinī /
XXratnml_u:7093: ghaṭaṃ dhṛtvā vahir deśe kūpāntikam upācare // Rm_17.48{47} //
XXratnml_u:7096: tato 'haṃ sahasā śuddhaiḥ pūrayitvā jalair ghaṭaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7097: dhṛtvā svayaṃ pradātuṃ tat sabhāyām upasaṃcare // Rm_17.50{49} //
XXratnml_u:7098: tatra tam śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ me snehamohitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7099: kṣāradhārā stanābhyāṃ ca saṃpraśrutā niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.51{50} //
XXratnml_u:7100: tatrāhaṃ sneharāgāṃdhā svātmajam iva taṃ muniṃ /
XXratnml_u:7102: evaṃ mām abhidhāvantīṃ dṛṣṭvā te sāṃghikā api /
XXratnml_u:7103: sarve pradhātum ichantaḥ pradhāvanti samutthitāḥ // Rm_17.53{52} //
XXratnml_u:7104: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān evam utthitān /
XXratnml_u:7105: sahasā samupāmaṃtrya pura evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_17.54{53} //
XXratnml_u:7106: mā imāṃ sarvathā yūyaṃ nivārayitum arhatha /
XXratnml_u:7107: yan mameyaṃ puṇyaṃ ca śatajanmaprasū kila // Rm_17.55{54} //
XXratnml_u:7110: yady atreṣātra dhāryyeta purato me vimūrchitā /
XXratnml_u:7111: uṣṇaṃ rudhiram utsṛjya mṛtyuṃ yāyān na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_17.57{56} //
XXratnml_u:7112: etac chāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te sāṃghikās tathā /
XXratnml_u:7113: prabodhitāḥ praṇatvā māṃ svasvāsane samāśritāḥ // Rm_17.58{57} //
XXratnml_u:7114: evaṃ tena munīndreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya tat /
XXratnml_u:7115: sarvaṃ prabudhyamānāhaṃ purāvṛttaṃ smarāmi hi // Rm_17.59{58} //
XXratnml_u:7118: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatiṣṭhāmi sādaraṃ // Rm_17.60{59} //
XXratnml_u:7119: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā mām evaṃ samupasthitāṃ /
XXratnml_u:7122: bhūyo 'pi tad rasāsvādatṛṣitaṃ pātum ichate // Rm_17.62{61} //
XXratnml_u:7130: vihāre samupāsīnāḥ pradṛśyante mayā prabho // Rm_17.66{65} //
XXratnml_u:7131: tat sabhāgaṃ cariṃ prāptuṃ pravrajyāvratam ichyate /
XXratnml_u:7132: tad atra kṛpayā bharttas tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_17.67{66} //
XXratnml_u:7134: sāścaryastambhitas tasthau paśyaṃs tām eva niścalaḥ // Rm_17.68{67} //
XXratnml_u:7135: tataḥ sa suciraṃ bhāryāṃ tām evam abhilokayan /
XXratnml_u:7136: viyogaśaṃkayā trastaḥ śanair evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.69{68} //
XXratnml_u:7137: are nāri pramūdhāsi kim evaṃ tvaṃ prabhāṣase /
XXratnml_u:7138: katham evaṃ tvayākhyātaṃ ko 'tra satyaṃ pratīṣyati // Rm_17.70{69} //
XXratnml_u:7142: munīndro mārajid arhan ṣaḍabhijñas tathāgataḥ // Rm_17.72{71} //
XXratnml_u:7146: śaraṇyo mānanīyo hi vandyaḥ pūjyo bhavaty api // Rm_17.74{73} //
XXratnml_u:7148: dāsī paravatī preṣyā kṛpaṇā duḥkṛtākṛtiḥ // Rm_17.75{74} //
XXratnml_u:7149: katham evaṃvidhāyās te garbhe jāto 'py asau mahān /
XXratnml_u:7152: adhunā bodhim āsādya saṃbuddho 'yaṃ bhavaty api // Rm_17.77{76} //
XXratnml_u:7154: adyāpīdṛgavasthā hi kiṃ cit saukhyaṃ na vidyate // Rm_17.78{77} //
XXratnml_u:7155: tad atra mā vadaivaṃ ca tathoktvā naiva śobhase /
XXratnml_u:7156: kas tavaitad vacaḥ śrutvā supratītaḥ pramāṇayet // Rm_17.79{78} //
XXratnml_u:7158: vamitvā rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ tvaṃ nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ vrajeḥ // Rm_17.80{79} //
XXratnml_u:7160: tvam api ca tathā nūnaṃ narake na vrajeḥ kathaṃ // Rm_17.81{80} //
XXratnml_u:7162: narakeṣu sadā nityaṃ duḥkhāni vividhāni vai /
XXratnml_u:7164: iti bharttroditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhā strī kacaṃgalā /
XXratnml_u:7166: tadā sā sucireṇaiva saṃprāpya cetanāṃ tataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7167: bharttāraṃ taṃ punar dṛṣṭvā bodhayitum abhāṣata // Rm_17.84{83} //
XXratnml_u:7168: svāminn atra prasīda tvaṃ mām evaṃ vada sarvathā /
XXratnml_u:7169: satyam etan mayā proktaṃ na mithyeti prakalpaya // Rm_17.85{84} //
XXratnml_u:7170: yadi mithyāvacaḥ syān me tenāhaṃ narake vraje /
XXratnml_u:7171: atha me vacanaṃ satyam atrāhaṃ sadgatiṃ vraje // Rm_17.86{85} //
XXratnml_u:7172: tenātrobhayathāpy eva viyogaṃ nau bhavet khalu /
XXratnml_u:7173: sarveṣām api jaṃtūnām avaśyaṃ maraṇaṃ bhave // Rm_17.87{86} //
XXratnml_u:7175: yatra na vidyate dharmmaṃ tatra kiṃ sukhatāpi ca // Rm_17.88{87} //
XXratnml_u:7177: dharmaṃ vinā kim etair naḥ kevalaṃ duḥkhatāptaye // Rm_17.89{88} //
XXratnml_u:7179: sarvān parigrahān tyaktvā pravrajanti jināśrame // Rm_17.90{89} //
XXratnml_u:7181: saddharmasādhanaṃ karttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ prabho // Rm_17.91{90} //
XXratnml_u:7183: etatpuṇyavibhāgena tvaṃ cāpi sadgatiṃ vrajeḥ // Rm_17.92{91} //
XXratnml_u:7185: akasmāt mṛtyunāghrāte tadā kathaṃ nivāraye // Rm_17.93{92} //
XXratnml_u:7186: kiyat kālaṃ ca jīveyaṃ vṛddhāhaṃ jirṇitendriyā /
XXratnml_u:7187: iti matvātra māṃ naivaṃ nivārayitum arhasi // Rm_17.94{93} //
XXratnml_u:7188: kiṃ cāhaṃ jaratī vṛddhā tat te kiṃ snehatā mayi /
XXratnml_u:7189: vṛddhayā durbalāṅgātra kārye kiṃ nu prayojanaṃ // Rm_17.95{94} //
XXratnml_u:7191: tat kiṃ te sneharāgeṇa vṛddhāyā mayi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.96{95} //
XXratnml_u:7193: avaśyaṃ mṛtyur atrāvāṃ samākramya grasiṣyati // Rm_17.97{96} //
XXratnml_u:7194: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tvaṃ cāpi kiṃ kariṣyasi /
XXratnml_u:7195: śocitveva niṣatsyāmi tvam apy evaṃ niṣatsyasi // Rm_17.98{97} //
XXratnml_u:7196: avaśyam atra saṃsāre bhāvi bhāvā phalanty api /
XXratnml_u:7197: kasyāpi bhūyate nātra bhāvi bhāvānyathā kvacit // Rm_17.99{98} //
XXratnml_u:7199: yātā yānti ca yāsyaṃti dehaṃ tyaktvā yamālayaṃ // Rm_17.100{99} //
XXratnml_u:7201: dharmiṇaḥ sadgatiṃ yātāḥ pāpino durgatiṃ gatāḥ // Rm_17.101{100} //
XXratnml_u:7203: sasukhāni ca duḥkhāni bhuktvā bhramanti sarvadā // Rm_17.102{1} //
XXratnml_u:7206: dharmam evātra saṃsāre karttavyaṃ yatnataḥ sadā // Rm_17.103{2} //
XXratnml_u:7208: iti buddhaiḥ samākhyātaṃ tvayāpy etac chrutaṃ na kiṃ // Rm_17.104{3} //
XXratnml_u:7209: tasmād ahaṃ munīndrasya śāsane śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7210: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dharttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ prabho // Rm_17.105{4} //
XXratnml_u:7212: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāṃ // Rm_17.106{5} //
XXratnml_u:7213: etad dharmavibhāgena tvaṃ cāpi sadgatiṃ vrajeḥ /
XXratnml_u:7214: iti matvā tathā svāmiṃs tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_17.107{6} //
XXratnml_u:7215: tvam atra svagṛhe sthitvā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7216: yāvaj jīvaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktvā śubhe cara sadādarāt // Rm_17.108{7} //
XXratnml_u:7217: etatpuṇyavipākena tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ sudhīr bhaveḥ /
XXratnml_u:7218: tatas te saugate dharme vāṃchā jāyeta cetasi // Rm_17.109{8} //
XXratnml_u:7219: tatas tvaṃ śraddhayā gatvā saṃbuddhaśāsane svayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7220: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ prāpya sākṣād arhatvam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_17.110{9} //
XXratnml_u:7221: iti matvā bhavān svāmin saddharmaṃ yadi vāñchati /
XXratnml_u:7222: tat pravrajyāvratānujñāṃ mahyaṃ pradātum arhati // Rm_17.111{10} //
XXratnml_u:7223: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sa daridraḥ prabodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7224: tāṃ bhāryāṃ suciraṃ dṛṣṭvā śanair evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.112{11} //
XXratnml_u:7225: hā priye katham eva tvaṃ māṃ vihātuṃ samichasi /
XXratnml_u:7226: kim atrāhaṃ vadiṣyāmi tvayaivaṃ pratibhāṣate // Rm_17.113{12} //
XXratnml_u:7227: yadi te 'sti mano dhairyyaṃ kṛtvā śraddhānvitāśrayā /
XXratnml_u:7228: pravraja saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cara satyasamāhitā // Rm_17.114{13} //
XXratnml_u:7229: iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā sā vṛddhāpi kacaṃgalā /
XXratnml_u:7230: bharttāraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ tato 'carat pramoditā // Rm_17.115{14} //
XXratnml_u:7231: tataḥ sā sahasā gatvā tatrāśrame upāgatā /
XXratnml_u:7232: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya purataḥ samupācarat // Rm_17.116{15} //
XXratnml_u:7233: tatra tat purato gatvā sāñjaliḥ sā pramoditā /
XXratnml_u:7234: munīndraṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_17.117{16} //
XXratnml_u:7235: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:7236: tad bhavāṃ kṛtvā kṛpayā mahyaṃ pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_17.118{17} //
XXratnml_u:7237: tayeti prārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:7238: savyena pāṇinā tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ śirasi spṛśan // Rm_17.119{18} //
XXratnml_u:7239: ehi mataś cara brahmacārikāṃ tvaṃ samāhitā /
XXratnml_u:7240: ity uktvā tāṃ samāgṛhya sāṃghike punar abravīt // Rm_17.120{19} //
XXratnml_u:7241: gacha māta prajāpatyā gautamyāḥ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
XXratnml_u:7242: sārhantī bhikṣuṇīmātā pravrajyāṃ te pradāsyati // Rm_17.121{20} //
XXratnml_u:7243: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā pratinaṃditā /
XXratnml_u:7244: tathety āśrutya śāstāraṃ taṃ praṇatvā tato 'carat // Rm_17.122{21} //
XXratnml_u:7245: tatra sā samupāsṛtya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ gautamīṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:7247: upetya sāṃjalir natvā pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_17.123{22} //
XXratnml_u:7248: mātar atra samāyāmi bhavatyāḥ śaraṇaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:7249: tad bhavantī jaganmātā pravrajyāṃ pradadātu me // Rm_17.124{23} //
XXratnml_u:7251: hastena śirasi spṛṣṭvā sāṃghikatāṃ samagrahīt // Rm_17.125{24} //
XXratnml_u:7256: tataḥ sā bhikṣuṇī śāstu gautamyāś ca prasādataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7263: sākṣād arhatpadaṃ prāpya vabhūva brahmacāriṇī // Rm_17.131{32} //
XXratnml_u:7269: vaṃdyā pūjyābhimānyā ca vabhūva sā subhāṣiṇī // Rm_17.134{35} //
XXratnml_u:7270: yadā sa bhagavañ chāstā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7272: tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kacaṃgalā subhāṣiṇī /
XXratnml_u:7274: tac chrutvā bhagavāṃs tatra tayā sūtrāṃtadeśite /
XXratnml_u:7275: sarvāns tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.137{38} //
XXratnml_u:7278: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7279: savismayā munīndraṃ taṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_17.139{40} //
XXratnml_u:7280: bhagavann anayā karmaṃ kiṃ prakṛtaṃ purākṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7281: imān sarvān sabhāsīnān prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_17.140{41} //
XXratnml_u:7283: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya bhavati brahmacāriṇī // Rm_17.141{42} //
XXratnml_u:7284: kiṃ vānayā purākarma kṛtaṃ kutra kadā kathaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7286: kiṃcāpi prakṛtaṃ karmaṃ purānayā kadā kathaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7287: yenātra paścime garbhāvāse na dhārito bhavān // Rm_17.143{44} //
XXratnml_u:7288: etat sarvaiḥ parijñāya bhagavānn asyāḥ purākṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7289: imān sarvān sabhāsīnān prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_17.144{45} //
XXratnml_u:7291: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:7292: sarvāṃs tān sāṃghikān dṛṣṭvā samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.145{46} //
XXratnml_u:7293: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad yat kṛtaṃ purānayā /
XXratnml_u:7294: tat tat sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi yuṣmākaṃ cittabodhane // Rm_17.146{47} //
XXratnml_u:7296: paṃcajanmaśatāny eṣā janany āsīn niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.147{48} //
XXratnml_u:7297: tadā me dadato dānam antarāyaḥ kṛto 'nayā /
XXratnml_u:7298: tenādyāpi daridreyaṃ durbhagā ca bhavaty api // Rm_17.148{49} //
XXratnml_u:7299: pravrajyāyai tadai caiṣā vahudhā prārthitā mayā /
XXratnml_u:7300: naivānujñāṃ dadau mahyaṃ vighnam eva vyadhād dhaṭhāt // Rm_17.149{50} //
XXratnml_u:7302: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ prāptā carati mama śāsane // Rm_17.150{51} //
XXratnml_u:7303: yadi naiṣā tadā dānaṃ vighnā mamākariṣyati /
XXratnml_u:7304: naiṣādhunā daridrātra bhavati hi kadā cana // Rm_17.151{52} //
XXratnml_u:7305: pravrajyāyāṃ ca me vighnaṃ yadi naiṣākariṣyata /
XXratnml_u:7306: acariṣyad vrataṃ vālye na tu vṛddhātra sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.152{53} //
XXratnml_u:7307: yan mamaivaṃ kṛtaṃ vighnaṃ dāne vrate tadānayā /
XXratnml_u:7308: tenādhunā daridraiṣā vṛddhā vrataṃ caraty api // Rm_17.153{54} //
XXratnml_u:7309: yat tadā sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cit prakṛtaṃ nānayā purā /
XXratnml_u:7310: tenāhaṃ paścime garbhāvāse 'dhunā na dhāritaḥ // Rm_17.154{55} //
XXratnml_u:7312: tenāhaṃ paścime garbhāvāse tayātra dhāritaḥ // Rm_17.155{56} //
XXratnml_u:7313: bhūyo 'py eṣā purā tatra vāraṇasyāṃ dvijātmajāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7316: śāsane śaraṇaṃ gatvā pravrajitācarad vrataṃ // Rm_17.157{58} //
XXratnml_u:7319: tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kiñcit kāryārtharoṣitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7320: sarvās tā bhikṣuṇīr dāsīvādena paryabhāṣata // Rm_17.159{60} //
XXratnml_u:7323: yac cānayā tadā tatra vidyābhyāsīkṛtaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:7325: yac cāpy esā tadā tatra sūtrāntaṃ samupādiśat /
XXratnml_u:7326: tena sūtrāntavaktānām agrā bhavati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_17.162{63} //
XXratnml_u:7327: evaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ sarve manyadhvaṃ karmasaṃbhavaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7328: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca saṃsāre bhramatāṃ sarvadehināṃ // Rm_17.163{64} //
XXratnml_u:7329: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaivaṃ bhujyate phalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7330: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karmaṃ kvāpi kadā cana // Rm_17.164{65} //
XXratnml_u:7331: nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ klidyate nodakair api /
XXratnml_u:7332: vāyubhiḥ śuṣyate naiva kṣīyate na ca bhūmiṣu // Rm_17.165{66} //
XXratnml_u:7334: ahyathāpi bhaven naiva vipāke karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7335: yad uptaṃ bhūtale bījaṃ tad eva sūyate phalaṃ // Rm_17.166{67} //
XXratnml_u:7336: anyathā na bhavet kvāpi kṛtaṃ karmaṃ phalaṃ bhave /
XXratnml_u:7337: śubhasya karmaṇaḥ pāke śubhataiva sadā bhave // Rm_17.167{68} //
XXratnml_u:7339: evaṃ vijñāya kṛṣṇāni vihāya miśritāni ca // Rm_17.168{69} //
XXratnml_u:7340: śubha eva sadāpy atra caritavyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7341: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāyāt kṛṣṇena durgatiṃ sadā // Rm_17.169{70} //
XXratnml_u:7342: miśritena tathohe ca gatīr yāyād bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7344: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_17.170{71} //
XXratnml_u:7345: ye bhajanti sadā buddhaṃ na te gacchanti durgatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:7346: sarvadā sadgatau bhadraṃ kṛtvā yānti jinālayaṃ // Rm_17.171{72} //
XXratnml_u:7347: ye śṛṇvanti sadā dharmmaṃ na yānti te 'pi durgatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:7348: sarvadā bhadrasaukhyāni bhuktvā yānti sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_17.172{73} //
XXratnml_u:7349: dānaṃ dadanti ye saṃghe te 'pi na yānti durgatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:7350: sarvadā śubhasaukhyāni bhuktvā yānti jināśrayaṃ // Rm_17.173{74} //
XXratnml_u:7351: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7352: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajadhvaṃ samupāsthitāḥ // Rm_17.174{75} //
XXratnml_u:7361: jitvā māragaṇāñ cāpi prāpya saṃbodhim uttamāṃ /
XXratnml_u:7362: sarvatra dharmasotkṛtvā tato nirvṛtim āyayuḥ // Rm_17.179{80} //
XXratnml_u:7364: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āgatāḥ // Rm_17.180{81} //
XXratnml_u:7366: puṇyair bodhiṃ samāsādya gacheyur nirvṛtiṃ tathā // Rm_17.181{82} //
XXratnml_u:7368: puṇyair evaṃ kramād bodhiṃ prāpya yāsyanti nirvṛtiṃ // Rm_17.182{83} //
XXratnml_u:7371: tathāham api sarvatra kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat /
XXratnml_u:7372: sarvān bodhau niyojyaivaṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtiṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_17.184{85} //
XXratnml_u:7373: evaṃ ye ye bhajanty atra triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7374: te te sarve 'pi saṃbodhiṃ prāpya nirvṛtim āyayuḥ // Rm_17.185{86} //
XXratnml_u:7377: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracaradhvaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_17.186{87} //
XXratnml_u:7379: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtiṃ samavāpsyatha // Rm_17.187{88} //
XXratnml_u:7380: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te janāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7381: sāṃghikāś ca tathety uktvā prābhyanaṃdat prabodhitāḥ // Rm_17.188{89} //
XXratnml_u:7382: tadā tatra janāḥ sarve triratnaśaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7386: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
XXratnml_u:7387: śrutvā rājans tvam apy evaṃ triratnaṃ bhaja sarvadā // Rm_17.191{92} //
XXratnml_u:7388: prajāś cāpi tathā dharmaṃ śrāvayitvā prabodhayan /
XXratnml_u:7390: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7391: kramāt pāramitā pūrya bodhiṃ cāpi samāpsyasi // Rm_17.193{94} //
XXratnml_u:7393: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandan sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_17.194{95} //
XXratnml_u:7394: kacaṃgalāyā avadānam etac chṛṇvanti ye śrāvayatīha yaś ca /
XXratnml_u:7395: vihāya pāpaṃ khalu te 'pi sarve bhuktvā sukhāny eva sugatiṃ vrajanti //
XXratnml_u:7398: XVIII Dhanikāvadāna athāśoko mahīpālaḥ kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:7399: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_18.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:7400: bhadanta śrotum icchāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7401: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_18.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:7402: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7403: upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_18.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:7404: śṛṇu rājan samādhāya yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7407: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_18.5{5} //
XXratnml_u:7408: bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ sārddhaṃ bhikṣuṇībhiś ca cailakaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7414: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ tatra sarve samāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7417: garuḍā nāgarājāś ca vidyādharāś ca dānavāḥ // Rm_18.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:7419: brahmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā bhūpā rājāno 'pi narādhipāḥ // Rm_18.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:7420: tathā rājakumārāś ca vaiśyā maṃtrijanā api /
XXratnml_u:7421: gṛhasthāḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ paurāḥ sārthavāhā mahājanāḥ // Rm_18.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:7423: grāmyā jānapadāś cāpi tathā kārpaṭikā api // Rm_18.13{13} //
XXratnml_u:7425: sarve te samupāyātās tatrādrākṣus tam īśvaraṃ // Rm_18.14{14} //
XXratnml_u:7427: śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya sarve te samupāśritāḥ // Rm_18.15{15} //
XXratnml_u:7430: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_18.16{16} //
XXratnml_u:7431: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:7435: tadā te dharmavaiśeṣyaṃ matvā pratinanaṃdire // Rm_18.18{18} //
XXratnml_u:7436: tadā tatra mahāpūryyāṃ vaiśālyāṃ pauriko mahān /
XXratnml_u:7437: gṛhastho dhaniko nāma śrīmān sarvaguṇī sudhīḥ // Rm_18.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:7441: tanayaś ca vaṃdānyākhyaḥ satyavatyabhidhā snuṣā // Rm_18.21{21} //
XXratnml_u:7442: tadā tatra dvijā sarve bhaktimanto jagadguroḥ /
XXratnml_u:7443: pūjānimaṃtraṇe cakruḥ samayaṃ saṃmatās tathā // Rm_18.22{22} //
XXratnml_u:7447: ato nimaṃtraṇīyo 'tra sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya nānyathā // Rm_18.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:7448: ekaś cet kurute dravyamadād asya nimaṃtraṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7450: tadā sa dhaniko 'jñātvā samayaṃ tais tathā kṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7451: svayam eva munīndraṃ taṃ pūjayituṃ samichata // Rm_18.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:7453: svayaṃ nimaṃtraṇaṃ karttuṃ sasaṃghasya muner yayau // Rm_18.27{27} //
XXratnml_u:7454: tatra sa samupāsṛtya natvā taṃ śrīghanaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:7455: sasaṃghaṃ tat puraḥ sthitvā prārthayad eva sāṃjaliḥ // Rm_18.28{28} //
XXratnml_u:7457: pūjayituṃ samichāmi paśyan me 'nugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_18.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:7458: iti saṃprārthitaṃ tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:7459: tathā hīti pratiśrutvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_18.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:7460: tadā te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya samupāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7461: bhagavataś caraṇau natvā cakrur bhojyanimaṃtraṇaṃ // Rm_18.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:7462: tac chrutvā bhagavān prāha tān dṛṣṭvā bhaktimānasān /
XXratnml_u:7463: pūrvam eva sasaṃghāham anenodya nimaṃtritaḥ // Rm_18.32{32} //
XXratnml_u:7464: etad ākarṇya sarve te brāhmaṇā bheditāśayāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7465: paraṃ pratīkṣyamānāś ca śanaiḥ svasvagṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_18.33{33} //
XXratnml_u:7467: muditas taṃ muniṃ natvā sahasā svagṛhaṃ yayau // Rm_18.34{34} //
XXratnml_u:7468: tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā vāṃdhaveṣṭajanais saha /
XXratnml_u:7471: ratnadhvajair vitānaiś ca sa patākair amaṇḍayat // Rm_18.36{36} //
XXratnml_u:7475: tataḥ sa prātar utthāya snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7478: sāñjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_18.39{39} //
XXratnml_u:7480: tat sasaṃgho mamāvāse vijayituṃ samarhasi // Rm_18.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:7481: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7483: tatra sa bhagavān mārge kṛtvā bhadraṃ samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7486: dṛṣṭvā vaiśālikāḥ lokāḥ sarve 'pi samapūjayan // Rm_18.43{43} //
XXratnml_u:7488: bhāsayan bhadratāṃ kṛtvā saṃghaiḥ saha samācarat // Rm_18.44{44} //
XXratnml_u:7489: tatra tasya gṛhe gatvā sasaṃghaḥ sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:7490: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svāsane samupāśrayat // Rm_18.45{45} //
XXratnml_u:7491: tatas te sāṃghikāś cāpi sarve tatra yathākramaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7492: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svasvāsane samāśrayan // Rm_18.46{46} //
XXratnml_u:7493: tataḥ sa dhaniko dṛṣṭvā sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:7497: tadbhojyaṃ surasaṃ bhuktvā bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7498: amṛtair iva saṃtuṣṭas tṛptiṃ yayau pramoditaḥ // Rm_18.49{49} //
XXratnml_u:7499: asaṃghaiḥ taṃ muniṃ tṛptaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dhaniko mudā /
XXratnml_u:7502: buddhapramukhasaṃghebhyo muditaḥ sa svayaṃ dadau // Rm_18.51{51} //
XXratnml_u:7503: tataḥ sa harṣito natvā taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7504: purataḥ sāñjaliḥ sthitvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_18.52{52} //
XXratnml_u:7505: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7506: bhaktyaiva bhajanaṃ kurve tat kṣamasvāparādhatāṃ // Rm_18.53{53} //
XXratnml_u:7507: sadaivaṃ kṛpayā dṛṣṭya paśyan bhavān sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7508: mamānugraham ādhāya trātum arhati sarvathā // Rm_18.54{54} //
XXratnml_u:7510: dhanikaṃ taṃ samālokya naṃdayann evam ādiśat // Rm_18.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:7511: gṛhapate sadā nityam ārogyam astu vo dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7512: bodhipraṇidhisiddhiś ca bhūyād bhadraṃ ca sarvadā // Rm_18.56{56} //
XXratnml_u:7513: tatas tasya priyā bhāryā śīlavaty anumoditā /
XXratnml_u:7514: sāñjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā prārthayat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_18.57{57} //
XXratnml_u:7515: bhagavan nātha sarvajña śvaś cātra bhavatām ahaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7517: pūjāṃ kartuṃ samicche tad anugrahītum arhati // Rm_18.58{58} //
XXratnml_u:7518: tayeti prārthite dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa tad āśayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7520: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā samutthāya sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7521: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kṛtvā svāśrame ca samāśrayat // Rm_18.60{60} //
XXratnml_u:7523: sādhitvā sarvasāmagrīṃ sā dūtaṃ preṣayan munau // Rm_18.61{61} //
XXratnml_u:7524: sa dūtaḥ sahasā gatvā vihare taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:7525: sasaṃghaṃ sāṃjalir natvā punar evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_18.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:7527: tat sasaṃgho bhavāṃs tatra sahasāgantum arhati // Rm_18.63{63} //
XXratnml_u:7528: tataḥ sa bhagavānn evaṃ bhadraṃ kṛtvā sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7529: dhanikasya gṛhe gatvā pādyaṃ gṛhyāsane 'viśat // Rm_18.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:7531: dṛṣṭvā śīlavatī sātha yathāvidhi samarcayat // Rm_18.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:7532: tataś ca sā muditā sarvaṃ saṃghaṃ buddhādikaṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:7535: datvā tāmvurapūgādiṃ natvā sā samupāśrayat // Rm_18.67{67} //
XXratnml_u:7536: tataḥ sa bhagavān tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7537: samutthāya tataś caivaṃ svavihāre samāśrayat // Rm_18.68{68} //
XXratnml_u:7539: tat paredyu vihāraṃ taṃ gatvā natvā nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_18.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:7540: bhagavānn api tasyaivaṃ dṛṣṭvā śraddhānvitaṃ manaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7542: tataḥ sas taṃ muniṃ natvā svagṛhaṃ sahasāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7545: vihāre samupāsṛtya natvaivaṃ munim abravīt // Rm_18.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:7547: tat saṃgho bhavān gehe mamāgantuṃ samarhati // Rm_18.73{73} //
XXratnml_u:7548: tataḥ sasaṃgha utthāya bhagavān sa tathācarat /
XXratnml_u:7549: tadgṛhe pādyam ādāya tatrāsane samāśrayat // Rm_18.74{74} //
XXratnml_u:7553: datvā pūgādikaṃ natvā purataḥ samupāśrayat // Rm_18.76{76} //
XXratnml_u:7554: punaḥ sa sāṃjalir natvā prakṛtvā ca kṣamārthanāṃ /
XXratnml_u:7555: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ munīndraṃ tam saṃdṛṣṭvaivaṃ samupāśrayat // Rm_18.77{77} //
XXratnml_u:7556: tadā tasya snuṣā cāpi satyavatī pramoditā /
XXratnml_u:7557: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ praṇatvaivaṃ nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_18.78{78} //
XXratnml_u:7559: bhagavānn api tasyāś ca dṛṣṭva śraddhānvitaṃ manaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7560: tatheti pratimoditvā tuṣṇībhūtvā radhāṃ vyadhāt // Rm_18.79{79} //
XXratnml_u:7561: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasmai datvāśiṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7562: tathā kṛtvā śubhaṃ loke gatvāśrame samāśrayat // Rm_18.80{80} //
XXratnml_u:7563: tataḥ sāpi tathā prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtā /
XXratnml_u:7564: dūtenāpi munīndraṃ taṃ sasaṃghaṃ samacodayat // Rm_18.81{81} //
XXratnml_u:7565: tathā sa bhagavāṃś cāpi sasāṃghikaḥ samutthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7566: pracaran bhadratāṃ kṛtvā tasyā gehe samāviśat // Rm_18.82{82} //
XXratnml_u:7567: tatra pādyārgham ādāya bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7568: śubhāsane samāsīnas tasthau tatra prabhāsayan // Rm_18.83{83} //
XXratnml_u:7570: yathāvidhi samabhyarcya tathā bhojyair atoṣayat // Rm_18.84{84} //
XXratnml_u:7571: tātas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ samīkṣya sā /
XXratnml_u:7573: tataḥ pūgādikaṃ datvā prārthayitvā kṣamāṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:7574: sasaṃghaṃ taṃ muniṃ natvā sā sāñjalir upāśrayat // Rm_18.86{86} //
XXratnml_u:7575: tathā sa bhagavāṃs tasyai datvāśīṣaṃ sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7576: tato vihāyasā gatvā svāśrame ca samāśrayat // Rm_18.87{87} //
XXratnml_u:7577: tathā sa dhaniko bhaktyā bhagavantaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7580: sasaṃgho bhagavānn evaṃ divyabhogair nimaṃtritaḥ // Rm_18.89{90} //
XXratnml_u:7581: tac chrutvā tad dvijāḥ sarve vaiśālikāḥ prajā api /
XXratnml_u:7583: tatas te saṃmataṃ kṛtvā sarve viprāḥ sapaurikāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7584: dhanikāya puraṃ kruddhāś cakrur nikāsanodyamaṃ // Rm_18.91{92} //
XXratnml_u:7585: evaṃ tat samataṃ jñātvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:7586: dhanikaṃ taṃ samāhūya pura evam upādiśat // Rm_18.92{93} //
XXratnml_u:7587: sādho gṛhapate sarve ime vaiśālikā dvijāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7588: kruddhās te saṃghabhojye 'tra hy alabdhāvasarā mama // Rm_18.93{94} //
XXratnml_u:7589: tad atra tvaṃ kṣamāṃ kṛtvā dvijān sarvān prabodhaya /
XXratnml_u:7590: kṛtvātra vinayaṃ dharme prasādayitum arhasi // Rm_18.94{95} //
XXratnml_u:7591: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa dhanikas tathā /
XXratnml_u:7592: ity āśrutya dvijān sarvān samupetyaivam abravīt // Rm_18.95{96} //
XXratnml_u:7593: bhavanto na mayā jñātaṃ bhavatāṃ kopakāraṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7594: tad atra me samākhyāta yad arthe kupyate 'dhunā // Rm_18.96{97} //
XXratnml_u:7595: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve te brāhmaṇā /
XXratnml_u:7598: dhanikaṃ taṃ samāmaṃtrya bodhayituṃ samabravīt // Rm_18.98{99} //
XXratnml_u:7601: tathā tat te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā tat pratibudhyatāṃ // Rm_18.99{100} //
XXratnml_u:7605: ato nimaṃtraṇīyo 'tra sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya nānyathā // Rm_18.101{2} //
XXratnml_u:7606: ekaś cet kurute vittamadād asya nimaṃtraṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7608: ity asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ sādho samayaṃ sarvasaṃmataṃ /
XXratnml_u:7609: tad vilaṃghya tvayaikena śāstuḥ pūjā kṛtā sadā // Rm_18.103{4} //
XXratnml_u:7610: etad dheto ime sārve brāhmaṇā ruṣitās tathā /
XXratnml_u:7612: kiṃ cāpi bhagavān atra sarvadā sthāsyate na hi /
XXratnml_u:7613: tat sarve bhagavatpūjāṃ kartuṃ vāṃchanti sāṃprataṃ // Rm_18.105{6} //
XXratnml_u:7614: yac cāyaṃ bhagavāñ chāstā dharmarājo munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:7617: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya caraty ayaṃ samaṃtataḥ // Rm_18.107{8} //
XXratnml_u:7621: dātum arhasi sarveṣām api puṇyapravṛddhaye // Rm_18.109{10} //
XXratnml_u:7622: eka eva tvaṃ evaṃ tu mā kṛthā bhajanaṃ sadā /
XXratnml_u:7623: sarvaiḥ saṃbhūya te sāstuḥ karttavyaṃ bhajanaṃ sadā // Rm_18.110{11} //
XXratnml_u:7624: iti tenoditam śrutvā dhanikaḥ sa vivodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7625: brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ samālokya praṇatvaivam abhāṣata // Rm_18.111{12} //
XXratnml_u:7626: mayā na jñāyate hy evaṃ bhavadbhiḥ samayaṃ kṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7627: tad atra me 'parādhatvaṃ kṣantum arhanti sarvathā // Rm_18.112{13} //
XXratnml_u:7628: yadi vo vidyate śraddhā triratnabhajane sadā /
XXratnml_u:7629: kurudhvaṃ sarvadāpy atra saṃbuddhabhajanaṃ khalu // Rm_18.113{14} //
XXratnml_u:7630: yadā na vidyate pūjā saṃbuddhe 'smin sasāṃghike /
XXratnml_u:7632: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi te dvijāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7633: satyam iti parijñāya vabhūvus tat prasāditāḥ // Rm_18.115{16} //
XXratnml_u:7634: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saha paurikaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7636: tatra te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve sametya saha paurikaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7637: sāñjalayo munīndraṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_18.117{18} //
XXratnml_u:7638: bhagavan nātha sarvajña trimāsyaṃ bhavatāṃ sadā /
XXratnml_u:7639: satkāraṃ kartum ichāma tvadanujñāṃ dadātu naḥ // Rm_18.118{19} //
XXratnml_u:7640: iti taiḥ prārthite sarvair dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
XXratnml_u:7644: matvā sapaurikā natvā taṃ muṇiṃ svapure 'caran // Rm_18.120{21} //
XXratnml_u:7645: tatra te paurikā viprāḥ śodhayitvā samamṭataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7646: bhojyakṣatre dhvajair uccair vitānaiḥ paryaśobhayan // Rm_18.121{22} //
XXratnml_u:7648: kṛtvā sarve 'pi te lokā mahotsāhaṃ pracakrire // Rm_18.122{23} //
XXratnml_u:7649: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ prātaḥ snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7650: tatrāśrame sametyaivaṃ natvā taṃ prārthayan muniṃ // Rm_18.123{24} //
XXratnml_u:7652: tat sasaṃgho bhavāṃs tatra pure āgantum arhati // Rm_18.124{25} //
XXratnml_u:7653: tataḥ sa bhagavān buddhaḥ sasaṃghaś cīvarāvṛtaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7655: tatra mārgeṣu sarvatra bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7656: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kṛtvā pracaraṃs tatpure 'viśat // Rm_18.126{27} //
XXratnml_u:7657: tatra sa bhagavān kṣetre suśodhite sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7658: tad dattaṃ pādyam ādāya svāsane samupāśrayat // Rm_18.127{28} //
XXratnml_u:7660: tatas taṃ sugataṃ tṛptaṃ saṃghaṃ cāpi vilokyate // Rm_18.128{29} //
XXratnml_u:7661: tat pātrāṇy upanītvā tad dhastādīkaṃ vyaśodhayat /
XXratnml_u:7663: datvā kṣamārthanaṃ kṛtvā taṃ sasaṃghaṃ praṇemire /
XXratnml_u:7664: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve paurāś cāpi pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7665: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātim upātasthuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_18.130{31} //
XXratnml_u:7666: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā sarvāṃs tān samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:7668: tato bhadrāśiṣaṃ datvā bhagavān saha saṃghikaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7669: bhāsayaṃ bhadratāṃ kurvan gatvā svāśramam āśrayat // Rm_18.132{33} //
XXratnml_u:7670: evaṃ vaiśālikā lokās te traimāsyaṃ niraṃtaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:7672: tato 'nte dhanikaś cāpi patnī putraḥ snuṣāpi ca /
XXratnml_u:7674: bhagavānn api tathā tebhyo datvā śubhāśiṣaṃ tataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7675: samutthāya sasaṃghaś ca gatvāśrame samāśrayat // Rm_18.135{36} //
XXratnml_u:7679: sarvalokahitaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śubhe sadā // Rm_18.137{38} //
XXratnml_u:7680: tad dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve bhikṣavaḥ samupāśritāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7681: bhagavantaṃ praṇatvaivaṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_18.138{39} //
XXratnml_u:7682: bhagavan kiṃ purānena dhanikena vṛṣaṃ kṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7683: kutra kathaṃ kadaitan naḥ sarvam ākhyātum arhati // Rm_18.139{40} //
XXratnml_u:7685: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:7686: sarvāns tāṃ saṃghikān dṛṣṭvā tadaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_18.140{41} //
XXratnml_u:7687: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anena vṛṣaṃ kṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7688: tat patnyā ca putreṇa snuṣayā ca tad ucyate // Rm_18.141{42} //
XXratnml_u:7690: durbhikṣakṣapite kāle parāṃ durgatim āgataḥ // Rm_18.142{43} //
XXratnml_u:7692: pāṭalokhyā snuṣā ceti vabhūvus tasya saṃmatāḥ // Rm_18.143{44} //
XXratnml_u:7694: udyāne sāyam āgatya pratyekabuddha āśrayet // Rm_18.144{45} //
XXratnml_u:7695: te sarve ekavastrā hi paryyāyena nṛpālaye /
XXratnml_u:7696: datvā puṣpāṇi prāyātāḥ svabhavane niṣīdire // Rm_18.145{46} //
XXratnml_u:7697: tadā sa ca gṛhasthās te tatrodāne jvalat prabhāṃ /
XXratnml_u:7698: dṛṣṭvā kiṃ mahojvālam udyāne iti vismitāḥ // Rm_18.146{47} //
XXratnml_u:7700: sarvagatāḥ samīkṣantaḥ dadṛśus taṃ prabhāsayaṃ // Rm_18.147{48} //
XXratnml_u:7701: tatra te samupāśritya dṛṣṭvā taṃ dhyānasaṃsthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7702: sāñjalayaḥ praṇatvaiva muditā svagṛhaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_18.148{49} //
XXratnml_u:7704: nirddhanās tad vyathāṃ prāpu lūnapakṣāḥ khagā iva // Rm_18.149{50} //
XXratnml_u:7705: tadā sa mālikas tasmai pūjāṃ kartuṃ samutsukaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7706: tad dravyaṃ svagṛhe samyag anviṣya samalokayat // Rm_18.150{51} //
XXratnml_u:7707: tatra gṛhe sa sarvatra samanviṣya samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7708: kañci mātram api dravyam alabdhaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_18.151{52} //
XXratnml_u:7709: aho mayā purā pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ kiṃ yato 'dhunā /
XXratnml_u:7710: akiṃcanyo daridro 'smi kim atra jīvitena me // Rm_18.152{53} //
XXratnml_u:7711: yato na vidyate dravyaṃ kiṃ cid api gṛhe mama /
XXratnml_u:7712: tat kena kariṣyāmi pūjām asya mahātmanaḥ // Rm_18.153{54} //
XXratnml_u:7714: pratyekabuddha ātmajo dhyātvā tiṣṭhati bhāsayan // Rm_18.154{55} //
XXratnml_u:7715: tad asya sugatasyātra karttavyā satkṛtir mayā /
XXratnml_u:7716: kadāyaṃ puri ramyatra samāgachet svayaṃ punaḥ // Rm_18.155{56} //
XXratnml_u:7717: tat prātaḥ śūnyapātreṇa gached ito mamātmavit /
XXratnml_u:7718: tan mamātra bhave śūnyam iva janmāpi nisphalaṃ // Rm_18.156{57} //
XXratnml_u:7719: yato mānyo 'bhipūjyo yaṃ pūjyate na kathaṃ cana /
XXratnml_u:7720: tatra kiṃ jāyate bhadraṃ puṇyaṃ vāsya kathaṃ kutaḥ // Rm_18.157{58} //
XXratnml_u:7721: puṇyaṃ vinātra saṃsāre kiṃ sāraṃ janma nisphalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7722: bhuktvāpi kiṃ sukhāny atra suciraṃ jīvite nanu // Rm_18.158{59} //
XXratnml_u:7723: puṇyārthe jīvitaṃ janma tad atra yadi naśyati /
XXratnml_u:7724: kim eva jīvitenāpi janmanā pāpasādhinā // Rm_18.159{60} //
XXratnml_u:7725: tan mṛtyur me varaṃ hy atra na mithyācirajīvitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7726: avaśyam eva saṃsāre sarvatra maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_18.160{61} //
XXratnml_u:7727: kim evaṃ dehapuṣṭena bhuktvā duḥkhāṃ sarvadā /
XXratnml_u:7728: tat kenāpi pradānena pūjayeyam imaṃ jinaṃ // Rm_18.161{62} //
XXratnml_u:7730: puṇyena sadgatiṃ yāyāṃ pāpena durgatiṃ sadā /
XXratnml_u:7731: tat pāpaṃ parityaktuṃ puṇyaṃ prāptu yateya hi // Rm_18.162{63} //
XXratnml_u:7732: yady atra pūjyate nāyaṃ drakṣyate ca kadā kuha /
XXratnml_u:7733: buddhapūjāṃ vinā bhadre puṇyaṃ ca lapsyate kutaḥ // Rm_18.163{64} //
XXratnml_u:7734: yāvan na prāpyate puṇyaṃ tāvad durgaticāraṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7735: tasmāt puṇyaṃ prayatnena karttavyaṃ sukhatāptaye // Rm_18.164{65} //
XXratnml_u:7736: tad atra śraddhayā kiṃcin mātreṇāpi svavastunā /
XXratnml_u:7739: bhāryāṃ putraṃ snuṣāṃ cāpi samāmaṃtryaivam abravīt // Rm_18.166{67} //
XXratnml_u:7740: aye priye snuṣe putra yūyaṃ śṛṇuta madvacaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7741: yad atra kartum ichāmi tatra yūyaṃ prasādataḥ // Rm_18.167{68} //
XXratnml_u:7742: yad atrāyaṃ mahābhijñaḥ svayam eva samāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7743: asmākaṃ gṛhe dravyaṃ kiñcit mātraṃ na vidyate // Rm_18.168{69} //
XXratnml_u:7744: tat kenātra kariṣyāmaḥ pūjām asya mahātmanaḥ // Rm_18.169{69!} //
XXratnml_u:7745: yadi na pūjyate 'smābhiḥ sugato 'yaṃ munir yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7746: tadā puṇyaṃ vayaṃ kutra lapsyāmahe kadā kathaṃ // Rm_18.170{70} //
XXratnml_u:7747: puṇyaṃ vinātra saṃsāre nisphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7748: tad vayaṃ puṇyato prāptuṃ yatema sarvathā vayaṃ // Rm_18.171{71} //
XXratnml_u:7749: puṇyena sadgatiṃ prāpya pāpena durgatiṃ sadā /
XXratnml_u:7750: tat sadgatisukhaprāptyai puṇyaṃ kurvīmahi dhruvaṃ // Rm_18.172{72} //
XXratnml_u:7752: anenāpy enam āchādya prabhajamahi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_18.173{73} //
XXratnml_u:7754: etat me vacanaṃ śrutvābhyanumoditum arhatha // Rm_18.174{74} //
XXratnml_u:7755: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā patnī putraḥ snuṣāpi te /
XXratnml_u:7756: sarve 'py abhyanumoditvā tathā kurv iti procire // Rm_18.175{76!} //
XXratnml_u:7757: ity etat samayaṃ kṛtvā sarve te śraddhayānvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7758: gatvā tenaikavastreṇa taṃ prāchādya samārcayan // Rm_18.176{77} //
XXratnml_u:7759: tatas te muditāḥ sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭā muneḥ /
XXratnml_u:7760: tasya pādau praṇatvaivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ pracakrire // Rm_18.177{78} //
XXratnml_u:7763: śāstāraṃ sugataṃ buddhaṃ samārādhya sadā bhave /
XXratnml_u:7765: iti tair muditaiḥ sarvaiḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:7766: viditvā sa mahāvijñas tathāstv iti samādiśat // Rm_18.180{81} //
XXratnml_u:7767: tatas tesāṃ manoharṣaṃ kṛtvā sa sugato muniḥ /
XXratnml_u:7768: tata uḍḍīya pakṣīva bhāsayan svāśrame yayau // Rm_18.181{82} //
XXratnml_u:7769: tad dṛṣṭvā te nanditāḥ sarve buddhadharmānuśaṃsinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7770: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracerire sukhaṃ sadā // Rm_18.182{83} //
XXratnml_u:7775: bhavanty alaghvyāḥ saṃkalpaiḥ saṃpadaḥ satvaśālināṃ // Rm_18.184{85} //
XXratnml_u:7776: buddhakṣetreṣu yat karma sukṛtaṃ duḥkṛtaṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:7777: mahattaratvam āsādya phalaty eva sadā bhave // Rm_18.185{86} //
XXratnml_u:7778: iti matvātra saṃsāre karttavyaṃ sukṛtaṃ sadā /
XXratnml_u:7780: iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7782: tac chrutvā brāhmaṇās te 'pi tatpuṇyavismitā mudā /
XXratnml_u:7784: tathā te brāhmaṇāś cāpi sarve 'pi paurikās tathā /
XXratnml_u:7786: helārpitaṃ ratnadhanaṃ tṛṇāgraṃ śraddhāvatīrṇaṃ tṛṇam apy anarghaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7787: anekaśobhānubhavaṃ hi cittaṃ cittaṃ nimittaṃ śubhasaṃbhavānāṃ //
XXratnml_u:7788: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
XXratnml_u:7789: śrutvāpy evaṃ mahārāja karttavyaṃ sukṛtaṃ sadā // Rm_18.191{92} //
XXratnml_u:7791: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_18.192{94} //
XXratnml_u:7793: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_18.193{95} //
XXratnml_u:7794: idaṃ narā ye dhanikāvadānaṃ śṛṇvanti ye cāpi niśāmayanti /
XXratnml_u:7795: sukhāni bhuktvā sa śubhe sadā te sarve 'pi śamyānti jinālayan te /
XXratnml_u:7798: XIX Raivatāvadāna athāśoko narendraḥ sa kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:7799: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_19.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:7800: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7801: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭum ca me 'rhati // Rm_19.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:7802: iti sāṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhaṃ mahāmatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7803: upagupto narendraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_19.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:7804: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7805: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvaivaṃ paribudhyatāṃ // Rm_19.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:7806: krauryeṇa dvirasanāḥ śuciveṣṭitānāṃ mithyāpavādaviṣamaṃ viṣam utsṛjanti /
XXratnml_u:7813: dhenuvatsā vane naṣṭā vabhūvur yūthanirgatāḥ // Rm_19.8{8} //
XXratnml_u:7814: tadā sa brāhmaṇo dṛṣṭvā taṃ duṣṭāśitaśaṃkitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7815: sarvatrāpi samanviṣṭā tatrāpy anveṣituṃ yayau // Rm_19.9{9} //
XXratnml_u:7817: dhūmaṃ sa dvija ālokya vatsapākam amanyata // Rm_19.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:7818: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ sārddhaṃ svajanaiḥ śastrapāṇibhiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7819: tad draṣṭuṃ śailam āruhya sahasāgāt tadantike // Rm_19.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:7820: tatra taṃ raivataṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dvija ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:7822: tad dṛṣṭvā śaṃkitaś cāsau vinayān samupāsaran /
XXratnml_u:7823: kim etat kriyate bhikṣor iti taṃ paryapṛchata // Rm_19.13{13} //
XXratnml_u:7824: iti pṛṣṭe dvijenāsau raivato bhikṣur ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:7825: tatra cīvararāgo 'yam iti taṃ dvijam abravīt // Rm_19.14{14} //
XXratnml_u:7828: sukhaṃ duḥkhatvam ānāti śuklam apy eti kālatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:7829: vidhau vidhuratāṃ yāte dharmo 'py āyāty adharmatāṃ // Rm_19.16{16} //
XXratnml_u:7833: doṣaḥ samunmiṣati yāty aguṇaḥ prakāśaṃ kāryaṃ viparyayam upeti viśīryate dhīḥ // Rm_19.18{18}
XXratnml_u:7834: puṃsāṃ purāvihitaḥ duḥkṛtapākakāle ke ke na nāma nipatanti mahābhighātāḥ
XXratnml_u:7835: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇo 'py atra kumbhe kim iti śaṃkitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7838: apaśyan sa dvijaḥ kumbhe māṃsapiṇḍaṃ supakvitaiḥ // Rm_19.21{21} //
XXratnml_u:7841: aho vata sadācāraḥ sthito 'yaṃ vijane vane /
XXratnml_u:7842: yasyedṛśāni karmāṇi na kasyacid iha paśyati // Rm_19.23{23} //
XXratnml_u:7845: ity ukte tena sākṣepaṃ sa raivato 'py aciṃtayat /
XXratnml_u:7846: doṣe pratyakṣalakṣyasmin kiṃ bravīmi niruttaraḥ // Rm_19.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:7847: mama daivāya ghāto 'yam ity ukte ko 'numanyate /
XXratnml_u:7849: upasthitaṃ sahe sarvaṃ maunam ālambya kevalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7850: ayaṃ me niḥpratīkāraḥ salilād agnidutthitaḥ // Rm_19.27{27} //
XXratnml_u:7851: doṣe guṇātiśayam āśu guṇe 'pi doṣaṃ paiyūṣadhāmni viṣam apy amṛtaṃ viṣe ca
XXratnml_u:7852: saṃdarśayaty aniśam adbhutarūpam eva kālendrajālikāvadhūr bhavitavyeyaṃ //
XXratnml_u:7853: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā raivataḥ sa mahāmatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7855: iti dhyānaṃ samālambya sthitaṃ taṃ raivataṃ muniṃ /
XXratnml_u:7857: are re durmate bhikṣo kiṃ atra durjane vane /
XXratnml_u:7858: sthitvevaṃ dāruṇaṃ pāpaṃ sādhayitvā niṣīdasi // Rm_19.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:7859: are pāpiṣṭha bhāṣasva yad arthe vālakāṃ vṛṣaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7860: hatvātra pacyate māṃsa tvayātmano pareṇa vā // Rm_19.32{32} //
XXratnml_u:7861: pareṇāpi hataṃ dṛṣṭvā tat pāpaiḥ parilipyase /
XXratnml_u:7862: tat tvayā vṛṣabhī hatvā kathaṃ pāpair na dahyase // Rm_19.33{33} //
XXratnml_u:7863: dhig dhik tvām atra rebhikṣo saṃbuddhaśāsane yataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7864: pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā nirjane vana āśrayan // Rm_19.34{34} //
XXratnml_u:7866: are re śrūyate kiṃ na tvayā saṃbuddhabhāṣitaṃ // Rm_19.35{35} //
XXratnml_u:7867: atha śrutvāpi te tatra śraddhā na vidyate khalu /
XXratnml_u:7868: kim evaṃ pātakaṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ caran // Rm_19.36{36} //
XXratnml_u:7872: adattaṃ kasya cid dravyaṃ gṛhīyān na kathaṃ cana /
XXratnml_u:7875: kāmabhogam adharmeṇa naiva bhuṃjyāt kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:7876: mṛṣāvādaṃ kadāpy atra naiva brūyāt kathaṃ cana // Rm_19.40{39} //
XXratnml_u:7877: pāruṣyavacanaṃ cāpi naiva brūyāt kathaṃ cana /
XXratnml_u:7878: paiśunyavacanaṃ vāpi vaden na kasya cit puraḥ // Rm_19.41{40} //
XXratnml_u:7879: saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ ca na pravadet kasya cid api /
XXratnml_u:7880: vyāpādaṃ kasya cic cāpi bhāvayen na kathaṃ cana // Rm_19.42{41} //
XXratnml_u:7881: abhidhyāṃ ca tathā naiva ciṃtayet kasya cid api // Rm_19.43{42} //
XXratnml_u:7882: mithyādṛṣṭiṃ sadā kvāpi bhāvayen na kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:7883: etāni daśapāpānāṃ mūlāni sarvathā tyajet // Rm_19.44{43} //
XXratnml_u:7885: te sarve kleśasaṃtaptā bhramanti duḥkhino bhave // Rm_19.45{44} //
XXratnml_u:7887: duḥkhāny eva sadā bhuktvā narakeṣu bhramanti te // Rm_19.46{45} //
XXratnml_u:7888: iti matvātra saṃsāre tyaktvaitāni daśāpi hi /
XXratnml_u:7889: santo nityam śubheṣv eva pracaranti samāhitāḥ // Rm_19.47{46} //
XXratnml_u:7890: śubhena sadgatiṃ yānti papina durgatiṃ sadā /
XXratnml_u:7891: ity ākhyātaṃ jinaiḥ sarvaiḥ kiṃ naitac chrūyate tvayā // Rm_19.48{47} //
XXratnml_u:7892: katham etad avajñāya pravrajitas tvam ācareḥ /
XXratnml_u:7893: dhik te cittaṃ yad evaṃ me govatsaṃ bhoktum ichati // Rm_19.49{48} //
XXratnml_u:7901: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya brahmacaryaṃ samācaret // Rm_19.53{52} //
XXratnml_u:7902: evaṃ pravrajito bhikṣuś caran nityaṃ suśīlabhṛt /
XXratnml_u:7903: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāt // Rm_19.54{53} //
XXratnml_u:7905: kṛtvātra nirjane bhuktvā carase mlechacārikāṃ // Rm_19.55{54} //
XXratnml_u:7906: hā vatātra vinaṣṭo 'si yad etat pātakānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7907: sahasā narake gatvā ciraṃ duḥkhāni bhokṣyasi // Rm_19.56{55} //
XXratnml_u:7908: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ purā janmāntare kathaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7909: yad atra saugate dharmaṃ prāpto 'py evaṃ durāśayaḥ // Rm_19.57{56} //
XXratnml_u:7912: tathā te śuddhite kāye maṃgalaṃ ca bhavet kramāt /
XXratnml_u:7913: pariśuddhas trikāyaś ca pravrajyāsaṃvaraṃ cara // Rm_19.59{58} //
XXratnml_u:7914: tadā tvaṃ sarvathā jitvā kleśān māragaṇānn api /
XXratnml_u:7915: sākṣād arhatvam āsādya brahmacārī bhaviṣyati // Rm_19.60{59} //
XXratnml_u:7918: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya nirvṛtipadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_19.61{60} //
XXratnml_u:7919: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā raivataḥ sa prabodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7920: tathāpi maunam ādhāya tathau daivābhyanusmaran // Rm_19.62{61} //
XXratnml_u:7921: evaṃ sthitaṃ tam ālokya brāhmaṇaḥ sa ruṣānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7922: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpy enaṃ paribhāṣyābhyanindayat // Rm_19.63{62} //
XXratnml_u:7923: evaṃ dvidhā tridhāpy ukte brāhmaṇena sa raivataḥ /
XXratnml_u:7925: svadaivacintayas tasya maunāt sa brāhmaṇo ruṣā /
XXratnml_u:7926: raivataṃ tāṃ katākṣeṇa dṛṣṭvainaṃ paryabhāṣata // Rm_19.65{64} //
XXratnml_u:7927: are re durmate bhikṣo kim evaṃ tiṣṭhase 'dhunā /
XXratnml_u:7928: uttiṣṭhātra pravaṃdhitva nayāmi tvāṃ nṛpāntike // Rm_19.66{65} //
XXratnml_u:7929: evaṃ tenodite 'py eva sthitaḥ sa raivato yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7930: kiṃ cin naivāvaden maunam evālambya nyaṣīdata // Rm_19.67{66} //
XXratnml_u:7931: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇas tasya maunād atiprakopitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7932: murddhni pāpam iva sthūlaṃ laguḍaṃ marpayātayat // Rm_19.68{67} //
XXratnml_u:7935: tathāsthitaṃ taṃ munim ātmavidyaṃ daivaṃ smaraṃtaṃ hy akṛtāparādhaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7936: nināya paścātkṛtavāhudaṃḍaṃ sadas tadā naṃdanabhūmibhartuḥ // Rm_19.70{69}
XXratnml_u:7937: tathāsthitaṃ tam ālokya sa dvijaḥ pratiroṣitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7938: raktākṣaṃ raivataṃ vaddhvā sahasānayan nṛpāntike // Rm_19.71{70} //
XXratnml_u:7939: tatra sa brāhmaṇo nītvā taṃ rājñaḥ sthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7941: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ krūras tasya bhikṣo savistaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:7942: sarvavṛttāṃtam ākhyāya taṃ nṛpaṃ paryakopayat // Rm_19.73{72} //
XXratnml_u:7943: tad vatsamāṃsam ālokya nṛpatiḥ sa prakopitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7944: raivataṃ taṃ yatiṃ vaddhvā cakre kārāgṛhātithiṃ // Rm_19.74{73} //
XXratnml_u:7946: jānāti kasya kaḥ śuddhiṃ citrākāreṣv asākṣiṣu // Rm_19.75{74} //
XXratnml_u:7947: tatra sa vaṃdhanāgāre vaṃdhito 'pi sa sanmatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:7950: kāle na visnito rājā tad vicāre 'pi nāsmarat // Rm_19.77{76} //
XXratnml_u:7951: tadānyasmin dine tatra te vatsāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7952: mātṛbhiḥ saha saṃsaktās tṛṇaṃ bhuktvā niṣedire // Rm_19.78{77!} //
XXratnml_u:7953: tān vatsān mātṛsaṃsaktān sarvān ālokya sa dvijaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7954: vismitaḥ punar ālokya paśyann evaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_19.79{78} //
XXratnml_u:7955: aho vatsā ime sarve kutra gatvādhunāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7958: hā mamātra mahatpāpo jāyate sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7959: yan mayā sahasā bhikṣor asamīkṣyāparādhyate // Rm_19.81{80} //
XXratnml_u:7960: yathā bhikṣor ghaṭe mānsaṃ dṛṣṭvaiṣām iti cintayat /
XXratnml_u:7961: caurāyam iti taṃ bhikṣuṃ paryabhāṣaṃ ruṣābhṛtaṃ // Rm_19.82{81} //
XXratnml_u:7963: vaddhvā taṃ sahasā rājñaḥ puro 'tra samupānayaṃ // Rm_19.83{82} //
XXratnml_u:7966: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi vatsāḥ sarve ihāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:7967: aparādhā yater neti vadeya sāṃprataṃ kathaṃ // Rm_19.85{84} //
XXratnml_u:7968: yady avakṣyaṃ tathā rājā tadā me kupito nṛpaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7969: sarvasvam apahṛtvāpi prāhariṣyate mām iha // Rm_19.86{85} //
XXratnml_u:7970: atha yadi bhayād rājño nāvadiṣyaṃs tathā kvacit /
XXratnml_u:7971: nūnaṃ taṃ yatim arhantam api rājā haniṣyate // Rm_19.87{86} //
XXratnml_u:7974: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi yatropāyaṃ na vidyate /
XXratnml_u:7975: sarvathāhaṃ vinaṣṭo 'smi vrajeya śaraṇaṃ kuha // Rm_19.89{88} //
XXratnml_u:7976: yad imaṃ saugataṃ bhikṣum arhantaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:7977: anaparādhinaṃ hatvā kathaṃ pāpair na lepsyate // Rm_19.90{89} //
XXratnml_u:7978: etair hi pātakair ghorair ahaṃ rājā janā ime /
XXratnml_u:7979: sarve vatsyāmahe 'vīcau bhuktvā duḥkhāni sarvadā // Rm_19.91{90} //
XXratnml_u:7980: hā me daivād yateś cāpi nirjane vasato 'pi yat /
XXratnml_u:7982: avaśyaṃ bhāvino bhāvā bhavanty eva na cānyathā /
XXratnml_u:7983: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi bhikṣur vā kiṃ kariṣyati // Rm_19.93{92} //
XXratnml_u:7985: atha mamaiva daivena tad iti manyate na hi // Rm_19.94{93} //
XXratnml_u:7986: tad atra kiṃ vadeyāhaṃ daivaṃ hi sarvakarmakṛti /
XXratnml_u:7987: iti mamārho 'py asya dūṣaṇaṃ nātra vidyate // Rm_19.95{94} //
XXratnml_u:7988: tathapy etat pravṛttir na vaktavyaṃ kasya cid api /
XXratnml_u:7989: na gaṃtavyaṃ vahiḥ kvāpi sthātavyaṃ svagṛhe sadā // Rm_19.96{95} //
XXratnml_u:7990: kadā cit skhalitā buddhir vāṇī ca vismṛtasya me /
XXratnml_u:7991: etad dhi pātakaṃ ghoraṃ samācakṣata kutra cit // Rm_19.97{96} //
XXratnml_u:7993: bhratsyamānaḥ kathaṃ loke cariṣye duṣṭajaṃtuvat // Rm_19.98{97} //
XXratnml_u:7994: iti dhyātvā viniścitya brāhmaṇaḥ sa viṣāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:7995: kasyāpy etat pravṛttāṃtaṃ noce daurjanyalajjayā // Rm_19.99{98} //
XXratnml_u:7996: tat pātakāgnisaṃtaptaḥ smṛtvārhantaṃ tam eva saḥ /
XXratnml_u:7997: prāyaścittavrataṃ kurvann iva tasthau gṛhāśritaḥ // Rm_19.100{99} //
XXratnml_u:8001: atha dvādaśavarṣānte tac chiṣyāḥ sarva āgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:8002: tat pravṛttiṃ samākarṇya vismitās te 'bhavaṃs tadā // Rm_19.102{1} //
XXratnml_u:8003: tataḥ sarve 'pi te śiṣyāḥ saṃmīlya nṛpateḥ puraḥ /
XXratnml_u:8005: ārogyam astu te rājan lokān dharmeṇa pālaya /
XXratnml_u:8006: yadarthe vayam āyāmas tatra bhavān prasīdatu // Rm_19.104{3} //
XXratnml_u:8007: yad asmākaṃ gurur bhikṣur aparādhaṃ vinā kathaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8008: bhavatā vaṃdhanāgāre sthāpitas tad vicāraya // Rm_19.105{4} //
XXratnml_u:8009: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvais tac chiṣyaiḥ prārthite tadā /
XXratnml_u:8010: vyomavāṇī tathākhyāya narendraṃ taṃ vyabodhayat // Rm_19.106{5} //
XXratnml_u:8011: tat khavāṇiṃ samākarṇya nṛpaḥ sa paribodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8012: tac chiṣyaiḥ sārito bhikṣuṃ taṃ mumocāśu vaṃdhanāt // Rm_19.107{6} //
XXratnml_u:8014: prāptabhijño 'pi yat prāpa krūrakleśadaśāṃ tathā // Rm_19.108{7} //
XXratnml_u:8015: taṃ yatiṃ nirgataṃ dṛṣṭvā sa rājābhyānutāpitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8016: ninindā mandapuṇyatvaṃ pramādād dhatam ātmanaḥ // Rm_19.109{8} //
XXratnml_u:8017: tadā sa nṛpati rājā sahasā tasya pādayoḥ /
XXratnml_u:8018: sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā samutthāyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.110{9} //
XXratnml_u:8019: bhadanto vicāryaiva pramadā yad bhavān mayā /
XXratnml_u:8020: sthāpito vaṃdhane tan me 'parādhaṃ kṣaṃtum arhati // Rm_19.111{10} //
XXratnml_u:8021: vismṛtā me sahāyāṃ ca parijñātā na kena cit /
XXratnml_u:8022: daṇḍaḥ patati śuddheṣu prāptaḥ pāpe mahīpatau // Rm_19.112{11} //
XXratnml_u:8024: raivataḥ sa nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.113{12} //
XXratnml_u:8025: rājan na te 'parādhatvaṃ mamaitat karmajaṃ phalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8026: tad atra mā kṛthāḥ kheṭaṃ saugata ātmavidyutaṃ // Rm_19.114{13} //
XXratnml_u:8027: tatas taṃ yatim arhantaṃ sa rājā sahasādarāt /
XXratnml_u:8029: tadaitad vṛttim ākarṇya brāhmaṇaḥ sa tvarānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8030: āgatya tat sabhāmadhye dattāśīḥ samupācarat // Rm_19.116{15} //
XXratnml_u:8031: tatra sa samupāsṛtya rājñe datvā jayāśiṣāṃ /
XXratnml_u:8032: taṃ yatiṃ sāñjalir natvā prārthayan vinayāt kṣamāṃ // Rm_19.117{16} //
XXratnml_u:8034: tan me 'parādhatāṃ kṣaṃtum arhati sarvathā bhavān // Rm_19.118{17} //
XXratnml_u:8035: ity ukte tena vipreṇa raivataḥ sa viśuddhadhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:8036: brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ viṣaṇṇāsyaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.119{18} //
XXratnml_u:8037: na manyur vidyate vipra na tvayāpakṛtaṃ mayi /
XXratnml_u:8038: mamaiva daivayā kena māṃsībhūtaṃ hi cīvaraṃ // Rm_19.120{19} //
XXratnml_u:8040: tenātra kiṃ vadiṣyāmi daivā hi valavān bhave // Rm_19.121{20} //
XXratnml_u:8043: tan mamopanataṃ pāke svakarmasadṛśaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_19.122{21} //
XXratnml_u:8044: yat sautkaṇṭhatayaiva sarvavipadaḥ kurvanti kaṇṭhagrahaṃ sarvāṅgaprasabhopabhogasubhagāḥ kliśyanti yat saṃpadaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8045: yat svāchaṃdyasukhāspadaṃ viharaṇaṃ dīrghaṃ ca yad vaṃdhanaṃ tat puṃsāṃ nijakarmapākaśavalaṃ saṃsāravallīphalaṃ // Rm_19.123{22} //
XXratnml_u:8046: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā naṃdaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:8047: vismitaḥ kautukāc caivaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ yatim abravīt // Rm_19.124{23} //
XXratnml_u:8048: tavāpi sumate kasya phalam etat kukarmaṇaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8049: kiṃ purā prakṛtaṃ karman tat samākhyātum arhati // Rm_19.125{24} //
XXratnml_u:8050: iti pṛṣṭe narendreṇa raivataḥ sa sudhir yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:8051: taṃ nareṃdraṃ samālokya bodhayituṃ tathāvadat // Rm_19.126{25} //
XXratnml_u:8052: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yan mayā prakṛtaṃ purā /
XXratnml_u:8056: kadā cit sa vane gatvā hatvā govatsam ātmanā /
XXratnml_u:8057: tad vatsamāṃsam ādāya sahasā tato viniryayau // Rm_19.129{28} //
XXratnml_u:8059: dṛṣṭvā taṃ māṃsabhārārttaṃ kopāt samabhidudruvuḥ // Rm_19.130{29} //
XXratnml_u:8060: tatra sa kutha ālokya tān sarvān samupadrutān /
XXratnml_u:8063: upanikṣipya tan māṃsaṃ tatraikānte nyalīyata // Rm_19.132{31} //
XXratnml_u:8065: tatra pratyekabuddhaṃ tam ālokya samupācaran // Rm_19.133{32} //
XXratnml_u:8066: tatra sa kutha āgatya teṣāṃ gorakṣiṇāṃ puraḥ /
XXratnml_u:8067: gomāṃsaṃ darśayitvā taṃ caurāyam ity adarśayat // Rm_19.134{33} //
XXratnml_u:8068: tatra te gobhṛtaḥ sarve gomāṃsaṃ tan muneḥ puraḥ /
XXratnml_u:8069: dṛṣṭvaiva sahasā kopāt taṃ munim abhyaghātayat // Rm_19.135{34} //
XXratnml_u:8070: vadhyo 'yam iti taṃ vadhvā gopālās te prakopitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:8072: tataḥ sa kutha ākarṇya taṃ yatiṃ vaṃdhane dhṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8074: hā mayā pāpināpy evaṃ sādhyate pātakāni ca /
XXratnml_u:8075: avaśyaṃ vahnināvīcau kuṃhbhyāṃ pakṣye rataṃś ciraṃ // Rm_19.138{37} //
XXratnml_u:8076: yad ayaṃ nirjane dhyāto pratyekabuddha ātmavit /
XXratnml_u:8077: caurāyam iti saṃdarśya vaṃdhane sthāpitomayā // Rm_19.139{38} //
XXratnml_u:8079: tīvraduḥkhāgnisaṃtapta ante māṃ svakṛte phalaṃ // Rm_19.140{39} //
XXratnml_u:8080: hā mayaivaṃ mahāghoraṃ pātakaṃ durdhiyā kṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8081: kadā tat pātakān mukto vrajeyaṃ sadgatiṃ kathaṃ // Rm_19.141{40} //
XXratnml_u:8083: hā sarvajña namas tubhyaṃ paśya mām atipāpinaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8084: bhavānn eva jagattrātā tan me 'pi trātum arhati // Rm_19.142{41} //
XXratnml_u:8086: tad vimuktyām upāyaṃ me kṛpayā dātum arhati // Rm_19.143{42} //
XXratnml_u:8087: iti kuthaḥ sa cāṇḍālaḥ smṛtvā saṃbuddham ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:8090: sahasā tata utthāya tadantike upācarat // Rm_19.145{44} //
XXratnml_u:8091: tatra sa samupāsṛtya tesāṃ gorakṣiṇaṃ puraḥ /
XXratnml_u:8093: bhavanto 'tra mayā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ tat pratidekṣyate /
XXratnml_u:8094: tad bhavaṃtaḥ samākarṇya kṣaṃtum arhaṃti sarvathā // Rm_19.147{46} //
XXratnml_u:8095: asya pratyekabuddhasya hy aparādho na vidyate /
XXratnml_u:8096: tatra mayātiduṣṭena cauro 'yam iti darśitaḥ // Rm_19.148{47} //
XXratnml_u:8097: tad atra mucyatām eṣa pratyekasugato muniḥ /
XXratnml_u:8098: satkṛtyābhyarcya piṃḍena mānanīyo hi sarvadā // Rm_19.149{48} //
XXratnml_u:8099: atraitat pātakaṃ nāsya mamaiva mastake pacet /
XXratnml_u:8100: tad aham eva vadhyo 'tra tad ayaṃ mucyatāṃ yatiḥ // Rm_19.150{49} //
XXratnml_u:8101: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā sarve gorakṣiṇo 'pi te /
XXratnml_u:8102: ruṣṭās taṃ sahasā vaddhvā paryyākhyāyātyatāḍayat // Rm_19.151{50} //
XXratnml_u:8103: tat tāḍanaravaṃ śrutvā sa pratyekajinaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:8104: gopālāṃs tān samāmaṃtrya punar evaṃ samādiśat // Rm_19.152{51} //
XXratnml_u:8106: kṣamā hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ tat kurvantu kṣamām iha // Rm_19.153{52} //
XXratnml_u:8108: kiṃ daivaṃ nihataṃ hatvā yuṣmākaṃ setsyate phalaṃ // Rm_19.154{53} //
XXratnml_u:8110: tad asyāpy aparādho 'tra nāstīty eṣa vimucyatāṃ // Rm_19.155{54} //
XXratnml_u:8112: tatheti pratibuddhitvā tat kopaṃ mumucus tadā // Rm_19.156{55} //
XXratnml_u:8113: atha te gobhṛtaḥ sarve śrutvā tasya muner vacaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8114: sahasā vinatiṃ kṛtvā vaṃdhanāt taṃ vyamuṃcayat // Rm_19.157{56} //
XXratnml_u:8115: tatas te gobhṛtaḥ sarve taṃ pratyekamuniṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:8118: tad aparādhasaṃtaptāḥ prārthayann evam ādarāt // Rm_19.159{58} //
XXratnml_u:8120: tenāsmākaṃ kṣamāṃ kartum arhaty atra bhavān api // Rm_19.160{59} //
XXratnml_u:8121: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa pratyekajinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8122: tān sarvān gobhṛto dṛṣṭvā samāśvāsyaivam abravīt // Rm_19.161{60} //
XXratnml_u:8123: bhavanto mā viṣīdantu dūṣaṇaṃ vā na vidyate /
XXratnml_u:8124: etad vṛttiṃ vijānāmi saugatā hi bhavārthavit // Rm_19.162{61} //
XXratnml_u:8126: ity ādiśya sa sarvajñaḥ pratyekabuddha utthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8127: tata ākāśa utplutya svāśramaṃ gate āśrayan // Rm_19.163{62} //
XXratnml_u:8128: tad dṛṣṭvā te janāḥ sarve gopālāḥ prativismitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:8129: tam eva sugataṃ smṛtvā saddharme sarvadācaran // Rm_19.164{63} //
XXratnml_u:8131: tatpāpair narakeṣv evaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhāni bhuktavān // Rm_19.165{64} //
XXratnml_u:8133: tad asyātrāparādhaṃ na mamaitad daivayogataḥ // Rm_19.166{65} //
XXratnml_u:8135: saṃsāre 'tra sadā puṇyaṃ karttavyaṃ satsukhārthibhiḥ // Rm_19.167{66} //
XXratnml_u:8137: puṇyaṃ vinā na siddhyante kṛtakarmāṇi sarvathā // Rm_19.168{67} //
XXratnml_u:8138: puṇyena jāyate svarge puṇyena yānti sadgatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:8139: puṇyena sarvadā bhadraṃ kṛtvā yāṃti jinālayaṃ // Rm_19.169{68} //
XXratnml_u:8144: sarve te puṇyakarttāra iti jñeyā narādhipa /
XXratnml_u:8145: puṇyena śuddhyate cittaṃ śuddhāśayo bhavet sudhīḥ // Rm_19.172{71} //
XXratnml_u:8146: subuddhiḥ sarvadā nityaṃ śubheṣv eva samācaret /
XXratnml_u:8152: dānaṃ kṛtvā sadā saukhyaṃ bhuktyā nityaṃ śubhe caret /
XXratnml_u:8164: sarvasatvahitaṃ kṛtvā śubhe nityaṃ samācaret // Rm_19.181{80} //
XXratnml_u:8166: sarveṣāṃ maṃgalaṃ kṛtvā bhadracaryāṃ samācaret // Rm_19.182{81} //
XXratnml_u:8168: sarvamārān vinirjitya cared bodhivrataṃ sadā // Rm_19.183{82} //
XXratnml_u:8172: tataḥ sarvatra lokeṣu kṛtvā bhadrāṇi sarvadā /
XXratnml_u:8175: satvān bodhau pratisthāpya kṛtvā dharmamayaṃ jagat // Rm_19.186{85} //
XXratnml_u:8177: nirvṛta ālayalīno mahābuddho bhaved dhruvaṃ // Rm_19.187{86} //
XXratnml_u:8179: yadīchasi tathā puṇyam eva karttavyam ābhavaiḥ // Rm_19.188{87} //
XXratnml_u:8183: puṇyāny evātra saṃsāre karttavyāni hi sarvadā // Rm_19.190{89} //
XXratnml_u:8184: pāpena sarvadāpy evaṃ durgatīṣv eva saṃgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:8187: sarve te pāpakarttāra iti buddhaiḥ prakathyate // Rm_19.192{91} //
XXratnml_u:8188: iti matvā mahārāja sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
XXratnml_u:8189: hitvā pāpānurāgatvaṃ saddharmaṃ cinu sādaraṃ // Rm_19.193{92} //
XXratnml_u:8190: saddharmaṃ saugataṃ dharmaṃ yal lokaṃ hitasādhanaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8191: tenātra sarvadharmāṇāṃ pravaram agram ucyate // Rm_19.194{93} //
XXratnml_u:8193: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajasva samupasthitaḥ // Rm_19.195{94} //
XXratnml_u:8194: triratne yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ śubhaṃ vāpy aśubhaṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:8195: tat phalam aprameyam asaṃkhyeya mahattaraṃ // Rm_19.196{95} //
XXratnml_u:8197: jagad dharmamayaṃ kṛtvā niḥkleśā parinirvṛtāḥ // Rm_19.197{96} //
XXratnml_u:8198: evaṃ vijñāya bhūmīndra hitvā pāparatiṃ sadā /
XXratnml_u:8199: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā cara nityaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_19.198{97} //
XXratnml_u:8200: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva kvāpi karma śubhāśubhaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8201: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karmaṃ tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ // Rm_19.199{98} //
XXratnml_u:8202: nāgnibhir dahyate karmaṃ dahyate deha eva hi /
XXratnml_u:8203: nodakaiḥ klidyate karmaṃ klidyate tanur eva ca // Rm_19.200{99} //
XXratnml_u:8205: na kṣītau kṣīyate karmaṃ kṣīyate tanur eva hi // Rm_19.201{100} //
XXratnml_u:8206: anyathāpi bhaven naiva vipāke karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8207: yathaiva yat kṛtaṃ yena tenaiva bhujyate tathā // Rm_19.202{1} //
XXratnml_u:8208: kṛṣṇasya karmaṇaḥ pāke duḥkhataiva sadā bhave /
XXratnml_u:8209: śubhasya sukhatā nityaṃ miśritasyobhayaṃ tathā // Rm_19.203{2} //
XXratnml_u:8211: bhuktvā sarvatra saṃsāre bhramanti sarvajaṃtavaḥ // Rm_19.204{3} //
XXratnml_u:8212: evaṃ matvā mahārāja kṛṣṇāni miśritāni ca /
XXratnml_u:8213: vihāyātra śobheṣv eva caritavyaṃ sadā bhave // Rm_19.205{4} //
XXratnml_u:8216: tatheti prativijñapya sajanaḥ prābhya naṃdataḥ // Rm_19.206{5} //
XXratnml_u:8217: tataḥ sa nṛpatir bhūyo raivataṃ taṃ mahāmatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:8218: sucīvaraiḥ samāchādya sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ vyadhāt // Rm_19.207{6} //
XXratnml_u:8219: punar utthāya bhūpālas tam arhantaṃ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
XXratnml_u:8220: praṇatvā vinayaṃ kurvan kramāc ca prārthayat tathā // Rm_19.208{7} //
XXratnml_u:8222: sarvadā darśanaṃ datvānugrahaṃ kartum arhasi // Rm_19.209{8} //
XXratnml_u:8223: ity ukte 'nena bhūpena raivataḥ sa prasāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8224: haṃsarāja ivāplutya bhāsayan khe samāyayau // Rm_19.210{9} //
XXratnml_u:8226: lokaiḥ saṃdṛśyamāno 'sau dhyātvā tasthau samujvalan // Rm_19.211{10} //
XXratnml_u:8227: tatas tair bhikṣubhiḥ śiṣyaiḥ samanvitaḥ prabhāsayan /
XXratnml_u:8228: tathākāśāś caraṃ gatvā svāśrame samupāśrayan // Rm_19.212{11} //
XXratnml_u:8229: tad dṛṣṭvā sa nṛpo lokaiḥ sahātivismayānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8230: triratnabhajanaṃ kurvan pracacāra sadā mudā // Rm_19.213{12} //
XXratnml_u:8232: alaṃkṛtaḥ sādhujanaḥ khalena nighnīkṛto 'pi na vikāram eti //
XXratnml_u:8234: tan nānyasyāparādhatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ kena cit kva cit // Rm_19.215{14} //
XXratnml_u:8235: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ tathātra kathyate mayā /
XXratnml_u:8236: iti matvā mahārāja sadā dharme samācara // Rm_19.216{15} //
XXratnml_u:8237: prajāś cāpi tathā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
XXratnml_u:8239: tathā te maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ sarvaṃ cāpi bhavet sadā /
XXratnml_u:8240: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_19.218{17} //
XXratnml_u:8242: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ bhajasvātra samāhitaḥ // Rm_19.219{18} //
XXratnml_u:8244: tathā hīti pratijñapya prābhyanandat sapārṣadaḥ // Rm_19.220{19} //
XXratnml_u:8245: satkṛtyedaṃ narā ye kalimatidaraṇaṃ raivatasyāvadanaṃ śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti pramuditamanaso bhaktiśraddhāprasannāḥ /
XXratnml_u:8246: te sarve 'py evam atra vimalasumanasaḥ sarvadā satsukhāni bhuktvā kṛtvā subhadraṃ jinavaranilaye saṃprayānti pramodāṃ // Rm_19.221{20} //
XXratnml_u:8249: XX Mahiṣāvadāna atha sa pārthivo 'sokaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:8250: upaguptaṃ guruṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_20.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:8251: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8252: tadyathā guruṇākhyātaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_20.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:8253: iti saṃprārthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan mahāmatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:8254: upagupto nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_20.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:8255: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8256: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi sarve lokaprabodhane // Rm_20.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:8258: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_20.5{5} //
XXratnml_u:8260: puraikasamaye sārddhaṃ bhikṣubhiḥ śrāvakaiḥ saha // Rm_20.6{6} //
XXratnml_u:8264: sarve lokādhipaiś cāpi dānavendraiḥ śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_20.8{8} //
XXratnml_u:8266: grahai vidyādharaiś cāpi tathānyaiś ca vṛṣārthibhiḥ // Rm_20.9{9} //
XXratnml_u:8270: tathā ca kośale rāṣṭre varaṃ dharmam upādiśat // Rm_20.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:8272: tatrānyasmin vane prāpto bhagavān sa sasāṃghikaḥ // Rm_20.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:8273: sarvatra maṃgalaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śanaiḥ kramāt /
XXratnml_u:8274: tatrārāṇye mahān yūtho mahiṣīṇāṃ samācarat // Rm_20.13{13} //
XXratnml_u:8279: tadaikasmin dine tatra bhagavān sa sasaṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8280: pracaraṃs tatpradeśe taṃ mahiṣīyutham aikṣata // Rm_20.16{16} //
XXratnml_u:8281: tadā te mahiṣīpālā taṃ munīṃdraṃ sasaṃghikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8282: samupāyātam ālokya dūrād evam aghoṣayan // Rm_20.17{17} //
XXratnml_u:8284: asty atra mahiṣo duṣṭas tat sahasā carānyata // Rm_20.18{18} //
XXratnml_u:8286: iti taiḥ śabditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:8287: sasaṃghaḥ samupāśritya tāṃ dṛṣṭvaivam ahhāṣata // Rm_20.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:8288: alpotsukābhavatv atra bhagavantaḥ kiṃ kuto bhayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8290: tadā sa mahiṣo duṣṭas taṃ munīndraṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8291: dūrād dṛṣṭvā samutthāya pradudrāva tadantike // Rm_20.21{21} //
XXratnml_u:8292: tatra tadgaṃdham āghrāya dṛṣṭvā taṃ raktacīvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:8293: ruṣā lāṃgūlam unnāmya saṃmukhaḥ prābhyadhāvata // Rm_20.22{22} //
XXratnml_u:8297: ubhayoḥ pārśvayos tasya sthāpito bhīmanisvanau // Rm_20.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:8299: upariṣṭāt pratiṣṭhāpya darśitā tasya bhītaye // Rm_20.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:8300: tatra sa mahiṣo 'drākṣīt tān siṃhān pṛṣṭhasaṃsthitān /
XXratnml_u:8301: pārśvayor ubhayor agniskaṃdhaur uparitāṃ śilāṃ // Rm_20.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:8302: evaṃ sa mahiṣo duṣṭo mahābhayam upasthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8304: tatra sa trasito dṛṣṭvā parāyituṃ caturdiśaḥ /
XXratnml_u:8305: samantato bhayād vignas tasthau trāṇanirāśrayaḥ // Rm_20.28{28} //
XXratnml_u:8307: upetya caraṇau natvā śaraṇaṃ samupāyayau // Rm_20.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:8309: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ālokya tasthau 'trāṇāśrayo puraḥ // Rm_20.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:8310: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā mahiṣyaṃ tam upasthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8311: śaraṇāgatam ālokya dharmam evam upādiśat // Rm_20.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:8313: sarvadharmā anātmanaḥ śāntaṃ nirvāṇam eva hi // Rm_20.32{32} //
XXratnml_u:8314: iti dharmaravam śrutvā sa tat puṇyānubhāvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:8316: evaṃ taṃ ruditaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān sa munīśvara /
XXratnml_u:8320: sādhu prasādyatāṃ cittaṃ mayi kāruṇike jine /
XXratnml_u:8321: tiryagyoniṃ virāgyeha tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // Rm_20.36{26} //
XXratnml_u:8322: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa mahiṣas tadā /
XXratnml_u:8323: sarvaṃ smṛtvā purāvṛttaṃ manasaivaṃ vyaciṃtayat // Rm_20.37{27} //
XXratnml_u:8325: krodhāgninā svayaṃ dagdhā saṃtāpare 'pi tāpitā // Rm_20.38{28} //
XXratnml_u:8329: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi tiryakjātir ihādhunā /
XXratnml_u:8330: kiṃ mamānena kāyena duḥkhe pāpānusādhinā // Rm_20.40{30} //
XXratnml_u:8331: yatra puṇyaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti tatra kiṃ jīvitena me /
XXratnml_u:8332: varam evādya me mṛtyur na tv evaṃ cirajīvitaṃ // Rm_20.41{31} //
XXratnml_u:8333: avaśyaṃ mṛtyum āpnuyāṃ sarveṣāṃ maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:8334: tad atra me śarīre kā snehatā jīvite 'pi vā // Rm_20.42{32} //
XXratnml_u:8335: dhik kāyaṃ jīvitaṃ cāpi yena puṇyaṃ na sādhyate /
XXratnml_u:8336: puṇyam eva bhave sāraṃ sarvatra satsukhapradaṃ // Rm_20.43{33} //
XXratnml_u:8338: sarvaṃ vihāya gaṃtavyaṃ puṇyām ekaṃ tadānugaḥ // Rm_20.44{34} //
XXratnml_u:8339: puṇyam eva jaganmitraṃ puṇyam eva sadānugaḥ /
