XXratnml_u:11479: sa pretya dravyavān bhūtvā bhūyo bhavati nirdhanaḥ // Rm_28.138{4} //
XXratnml_u:11480: yo na harttā na dātā ca na cātikṛpaṇo naraḥ /
XXratnml_u:11481: kṛtsnena mahatā dravyaṃ sthiraṃ sa labhate dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.139{5} //
XXratnml_u:11482: na harttā yaḥ parasvānāṃ tyāgavān vītamatsaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:11483: ahāryaṃ vipulaṃ vittam iṣṭam ca labhate naraḥ // Rm_28.140{6} //
XXratnml_u:11485: sukhī ca sa labhen nityaṃ yo dadātīha bhojanaṃ // Rm_28.141{7} //
XXratnml_u:11486: salajjo rūpavān bhogī suchāyaḥ prāṇināṃ priyaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11487: sa bhaved vastralābhī ca yo vāsānsi prayachati // Rm_28.142{8} //
XXratnml_u:11489: prāsādāḥ sarvakāmāś ca jāyante tasya dehinaḥ // Rm_28.143{9} //
XXratnml_u:11491: bhavanti sukhino nityaṃ yānāni ca labhanti te // Rm_28.144{10} //
XXratnml_u:11493: sukhinas tyaktasaṃtāpā niḥpipāsā bhavanti te // Rm_28.145{11} //
XXratnml_u:11495: samṛddhitaḥ sa syād ārāmaṃ yaḥ prayachati // Rm_28.146{12} //
XXratnml_u:11502: balavān varṇavān bhogī dīrghāyuḥ sa bhaven naraḥ // Rm_28.149{15} //
XXratnml_u:11505: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyam abhayaṃ vacanaṃ priyaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11506: yad yad evepsitaṃ śaktyā dātavyaṃ tat tad arthinaḥ // Rm_28.151{17} //
XXratnml_u:11507: kleśayitvā dadātīha svakārthaṃ vā ha yena vā /
XXratnml_u:11508: yaśaḥsaukhyābhilākhād vā sa kliṣṭaṃ labhate phalaṃ // Rm_28.152{18} //
XXratnml_u:11510: parārthaṃ yo dadātīha so 'kliṣṭaṃ phalam aśnute // Rm_28.153{19} //
XXratnml_u:11512: tena tena prakāreṇa tat sarvam upatiṣṭhate // Rm_28.154{20} //
XXratnml_u:11516: dānaṃ hi sarvasaukhyānām ananyat kāraṇaṃ mataṃ // Rm_28.156{22} //
XXratnml_u:11518: svebhyo 'py adeśakālau ca varjayet puṃstvam archati // Rm_28.157{23} //
XXratnml_u:11519: paradāreṣu saṃsaktaṃ cittaṃ yo na niyachati /
XXratnml_u:11520: anaṃgeṣu cakṣyeta sa pumāṃ strītvam archati // Rm_28.158{24} //
XXratnml_u:11522: puṃstvam ākāṃkṣate nityaṃ sā nārī naratāṃ vrajet // Rm_28.159{25} //
XXratnml_u:11524: tejasvī sadguṇaḥ śrīmān devair api sa lakṣyate // Rm_28.160{26} //
XXratnml_u:11526: jāyate satyavādī ca yaśaḥsaukhyānvitaḥ pumān // Rm_28.161{27} //
XXratnml_u:11527: bhinnānām api satvānāṃ bhedaṃ naiva karoti yaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11529: yas tv ājñāṃ kurute nityaṃ gurūṇāṃ hṛṣṭamānasaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11530: hitāhitābhidhāyī ca sa syād ādeyavākkṛtī // Rm_28.163{29} //
XXratnml_u:11532: bhavanti sukhinaḥ saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ datvā ca duḥkhinaḥ // Rm_28.164{30} //
XXratnml_u:11534: kubjavāmanatāṃ yānti ye ca rūpābhimāninaḥ // Rm_28.165{31} //
XXratnml_u:11537: duḥkham pāpasya puṇyasya sukhaṃ miśrasya miśritaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11538: sarvaṃ sādṛśyaniḥsyandam abhyuhyaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ // Rm_28.167{33} //
XXratnml_u:11541: kalipriyaḥ pradātā ca sa bhaved asureśvaraḥ // Rm_28.168{1} //
XXratnml_u:11544: nātmanā yaḥ sukhākāṃkṣī na ca kṛvyeta parigrahaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11545: grahāṇām agraṇī cāsau mahārājikatāṃ vrajet // Rm_28.169{1} //
XXratnml_u:11547: hṛṣyame yo na kalahais tridaśeṣu sa jāyate // Rm_28.170{2} //
XXratnml_u:11548: na vigrahe ratā naiva kalahe hṛṣṭamānasāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11549: ekāntakuśalodyuktā ye ca moyāpagās tu te // Rm_28.171{3} //
XXratnml_u:11551: ye parihṛṣṇāś ca narās te tuṣitopagāḥ // Rm_28.172{4} //
XXratnml_u:11555: guṇādhikāś ca ye yānti paranirmitatāṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_28.174{6} //
XXratnml_u:11556: śīlena svargam āpnoti dhyānena ca viśeṣataḥ /
XXratnml_u:11558: śubhāśubhaphalaṃ karma yad etat kathitaṃ sphuṭaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11559: śubhena labhyate saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ tv aśubhasaṃbhavaṃ // Rm_28.176{8} //
XXratnml_u:11560: mṛtyur vyādhir jarā caiva cintanīyam idaṃ trayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11561: viprayogā priyaiḥ sārddhaṃ karmaṇāṃ ca svakaṃ phalaṃ // Rm_28.177{9} //
XXratnml_u:11562: evaṃ virāgam āpnoti viviktaḥ puṇyam archati /
XXratnml_u:11563: pāpaṃ ca nārjayed evaṃ tac ca saṃkṣepataḥ śṛṇu // Rm_28.178{10} //
XXratnml_u:11565: puṇyaṃ viparyayāt pāpabhuktam eva munīśvaraiḥ // Rm_28.179{11} //
XXratnml_u:11568: saṃbodhidharmam ādhāya caritavyaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_28.180{1} //
XXratnml_u:11571: evaṃ vijñāya rājendra sadā bhadraṃ yadīchasi /
XXratnml_u:11572: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bhaja nityaṃ samādarāt // Rm_28.182{3} //
XXratnml_u:11574: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_28.183{4} //
XXratnml_u:11575: iti tena munīndreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya saḥ /
XXratnml_u:11577: tataḥ sa nṛpatī rājā samutthāya kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
XXratnml_u:11578: bhagavantam ānatvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_28.185{6} //
XXratnml_u:11579: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:11580: saṃbodhivratam ādhāya prechāmi carituṃ sadā // Rm_28.186{7} //
XXratnml_u:11582: tan me 'nugrahatāṃ kṛtvā pravrajyāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_28.187{8} //
XXratnml_u:11583: iti saṃprārthite tena rājñā sa bhagavān sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:11584: tasya rājño manaḥśuddhaṃ vijñāyaivam upādiśat // Rm_28.188{9} //
XXratnml_u:11585: sādhu rājan mahābhāga yadīchasi śubhāṃ gatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:11586: ehi cara samādhāya cara me śāsane vrataṃ // Rm_28.189{10} //
XXratnml_u:11587: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau pāṇinā tac chiraḥ spṛśan /
XXratnml_u:11589: saṃbuddhe śāsane dharme taṃ nareṃdraṃ samagrahīt // Rm_28.190{11} //
XXratnml_u:11590: ehīti tena śāstrokte nṛpatiḥ sa prabodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11592: tataḥ sa bhūpatiś cāpi virakto bhogyanispṛhaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11596: tataḥ sa brahmavid yogī traidhātuvāsinām api /
XXratnml_u:11599: utthāya sāṃjalir natvā prārthyat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.195{16} //
XXratnml_u:11600: bhagavan nātha sarvajña kṛpayā me prasīdatu /
XXratnml_u:11601: traimāsyaṃ bhaktum ichāmi tat kurutām anugrahaṃ // Rm_28.196{17} //
XXratnml_u:11602: iti saṃprārthite rājñā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:11603: nṛpatiṃ taṃ samālokya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_28.197{18} //
XXratnml_u:11609: āchādya sāṃjalir natvā praṇidhānaṃ mudā vyadhāt // Rm_28.200{21} //
XXratnml_u:11611: saddharmabhāskaraḥ śāstā saṃbuddho 'rhaṃ bhaveya hi // Rm_28.201{22} //
XXratnml_u:11612: evaṃ tena narendreṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:11613: matvā sa bhagavān smitaṃ prāmuñcac chubharociṣaṃ // Rm_28.202{23} //
XXratnml_u:11618: tadā te vismitāḥ sarve nārakīyāḥ pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11619: kim evaṃ jāyate saukhyam iti dhyātvā niṣedire // Rm_28.205{26} //
XXratnml_u:11621: manāṃsi paribodhārthaṃ praiṣayat tatra nairmitaṃ // Rm_28.206{27} //
XXratnml_u:11622: tadā te nārakāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:11623: upetya praṇatiṃ kṛtvā prābhajañ charaṇaṃ gatāḥ // Rm_28.207{28} //
XXratnml_u:11624: tatas tat puṇyaliptās te sarve vimuktapāpakāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11626: tatas tā raśmayaḥ sarvā avabhāsya samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:11628: gāthāghoṣaiś ca sarvatra sarvān devān pramodinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11629: bodhayitvā śubhe dharme pratiṣṭhāpya pacerire // Rm_28.210{31} //
XXratnml_u:11630: tatas tā raśmayaḥ sarvā piṇḍībhūtā muneḥ puraḥ /
XXratnml_u:11634: śāstā kim ādiśed dharmam iti dhyātvā niṣedire // Rm_28.212{33} //
XXratnml_u:11636: upetya sāṃjalir natvā prārthayet taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_28.213{34} //
XXratnml_u:11637: bhagavan hetunā kena smitaṃ muṃcati sāṃprataṃ /
XXratnml_u:11638: nāhetvapratyayaṃ smitaṃ na muṃcaṃti munīśvarāḥ // Rm_28.214{35} //
XXratnml_u:11639: tad yadarthe bhavān smitaṃ muṃcatīme sabhājanāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11640: śrotum ichaṃti sarve tad artham ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_28.215{36} //
XXratnml_u:11641: ity ānaṃdoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
XXratnml_u:11642: sarvāṃl lokān samālokya tam ānaṃdaṃ samabravīt // Rm_28.216{37} //
XXratnml_u:11643: evam eva sadānaṃda sarve buddhā munīśvarāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11644: nāhetupratyayaṃ smitaṃ vimuṃcanti kadā cana // Rm_28.217{38} //
XXratnml_u:11646: satkṛtya śraddhayāsmākaṃ traimāsyaṃ bhajate mudā // Rm_28.218{39} //
XXratnml_u:11648: kramāt pāramitāḥ sarvāḥ paripūrya balānvitaḥ // Rm_28.219{40} //
XXratnml_u:11650: bodhim āsādya sarvajñas tathāgato munīśvaraḥ // Rm_28.220{41} //
XXratnml_u:11652: vijayo nāma saṃbuddho bhaviṣyati bhavāntare // Rm_28.221{42} //
XXratnml_u:11656: saṃbodhivāñchibhir lokaiś caritavyaṃ śubhe mudā // Rm_28.223{44} //
XXratnml_u:11658: sarve lokās tathety uktvā prābhyanandan prasāditāḥ // Rm_28.224{45} //
XXratnml_u:11660: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracacāra śubhe sadā // Rm_28.225{46} //
XXratnml_u:11663: iti me guruṇākhyātaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathā 'dhunā /
XXratnml_u:11664: kathyate 'tra tvayāpy evaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_28.227{48} //
XXratnml_u:11666: bodhimārge pratiṣṭhāpya pālanīyāḥ sadā tvayā // Rm_28.228{49} //
XXratnml_u:11667: tathā te sarvadā bhadraṃ sarvatrāpi bhaved dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11668: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_28.229{50} //
XXratnml_u:11671: rājño pāñcālayor yan munikathitam idaṃ tat prasiddhāvadānaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11672: śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayā ye prasannāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11674: kṛtvā lokeṣu bhaddraṃ munivaranilaye saṃprayānti pramodāḥ // Rm_28.231{52}
XXratnml_u:11678: XXIX Upapādukāvadāna athāśoko mahīpālaḥ samupetya kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
XXratnml_u:11679: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:11680: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11681: tadyathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathākhyātuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_29.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:11682: iti saṃprarthitaṃ rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan mahāmatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:11683: upagupto nareṃdraṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:11684: sādhu śṛṇu maharāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11685: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi śrutvā cāpy anumodaya // Rm_29.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:11687: sarvajñaḥ sugataḥ śāstā dharmarājo vināyakaḥ // Rm_29.5{5} //
XXratnml_u:11690: tatra sa bhagavān gatvā suramye naṃdane vane /
XXratnml_u:11692: tatra śakrādayo devāḥ sarve taṃ sadguṇākaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:11694: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve devāḥ pramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11700: tadā sā jananī mātā māyādevī samāgatā /
XXratnml_u:11701: tam ātmajaṃ jagannāthaṃ saṃdṛṣṭvā samupācarat // Rm_29.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:11702: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā mātaraṃ tāṃ samāgatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:11704: svāgataṃ kuśalaṃ mātar ārogyam astu te sadā /
XXratnml_u:11705: tvatmukhaṃ draṣṭum āyāmi tat prasāditum arhasi // Rm_29.14{14} //
XXratnml_u:11707: upadikṣyāmi saddharmaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva samāhitā // Rm_29.15{15} //
XXratnml_u:11708: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā jananī satī /
XXratnml_u:11709: māyādevī samālokya tam ātmajaṃ samavrāvīt // Rm_29.16{16} //
XXratnml_u:11710: prāyāmi te mukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ kuśalaṃ te sadātmaja /
XXratnml_u:11711: tan mamānugrahārthena dharmam ādeṣṭum arhasi // Rm_29.17{17} //
XXratnml_u:11712: ity uktvā sā satī māyādevī mātā jagadguroḥ /
XXratnml_u:11714: tataḥ śakrādayo devāḥ sarve te saṃpraharṣitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11716: pūjāṃgais taṃ jagannāthaṃ māyādevīṃ ca prārcayan // Rm_29.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:11717: tataḥ pādāns tayor natvā kṛtvā ca tripradakṣiṇaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11718: parivṛtya puraskṛtvā dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_29.20{20} //
XXratnml_u:11719: tatas ta bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān devān samupasthitān /
XXratnml_u:11721: tataś ca bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ devānāṃ sukhamāninaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11723: anityaṃ khalu saṃsāre duḥkhaṃ śūnyaṃ hy anātmakaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11724: kāme kiṃcit sukhaṃ nātra kleśasaṃghe samākule // Rm_29.23{23} //
XXratnml_u:11725: iti matvātra saṃsāre sadā saukhyaṃ yadīchatha /
XXratnml_u:11726: bodhicaryāvrataṃ dhṛtvā saṃcaradhvaṃ sadā śubhaṃ // Rm_29.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:11730: sa samyag bodhim āsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyati // Rm_29.26{25} //
XXratnml_u:11731: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre sarve yūyaṃ samāhitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11733: ye triratnaṃ bhajanty atra na te gachaṃti durgatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:11734: sadā sadgatisaṃyātāḥ kramād bodhim avāpnuyuḥ // Rm_29.28{27} //
XXratnml_u:11735: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi te 'marāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11736: satyam eva parijñāya prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_29.29{28} //
XXratnml_u:11738: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.30{29} //
XXratnml_u:11740: saddharmaṃ naḥ samādiśya bhavan vihartum arhati // Rm_29.31{30} //
XXratnml_u:11741: vayaṃ sarve surā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11742: saddharmaṃ sarvadākarṇya cariṣyāmaḥ śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_29.32{31} //
XXratnml_u:11744: upetya sāṃjalir natvā bhagavantaṃ tam abravīt // Rm_29.33{32} //
XXratnml_u:11745: dhanyo 'si yat tvayā putra pratijñātaṃ yathāpurā /
XXratnml_u:11746: tathā tvaṃ pūryate sarvaṃ sarvārthasiddhir astu te // Rm_29.34{33} //
XXratnml_u:11749: iti mātrārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa jagadguruḥ /
XXratnml_u:11750: jananīṃ tāṃ sabhāṃ cāpi samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.36{35} //
XXratnml_u:11752: sarveṣām api satvānāṃ hitārthe 'haṃ jino bhave // Rm_29.37{36} //
XXratnml_u:11753: tad atra sarvadā naivaṃ tiṣṭheyaṃ tridaśaiḥ saha /
XXratnml_u:11754: varṣā māsatrayaṃ sthātum ichāmi dharmam ādiśan // Rm_29.38{37} //
XXratnml_u:11755: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā jananī mudā /
XXratnml_u:11756: tathāstv iti prabhāṣitvā prābhyanaṃdat prabodhitā // Rm_29.39{38} //
XXratnml_u:11757: tathā sa bhagavāns tatra bodhicaryāṃ prakāśayan /
XXratnml_u:11758: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya tasthau māsatrayaṃ divi // Rm_29.40{39} //
XXratnml_u:11761: satkṛtya śraddhayā nityaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā prabhejire // Rm_29.41{40} //
XXratnml_u:11762: tadā tatra sadā svarge maṃgalaṃ nirupadravaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11764: tasmiṃś cā samaye tatra srāvastyā vahir āśrame /
XXratnml_u:11765: jetodyāne vihāre sa maudgalyāyana āśrayat // Rm_29.43{42} //
XXratnml_u:11766: tadā te sāṃghikāḥ sarve taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ yatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:11767: vihāre saṃsthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmaṃ śrotuṃ samīchire // Rm_29.44{43} //
XXratnml_u:11768: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś cānye 'pi sajjanāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11769: tat saddharmadeśanāṃ śrotuṃ muditāḥ samupācaran // Rm_29.45{44} //
XXratnml_u:11770: tatra sarve 'pi te lokās taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ guruṃ /
XXratnml_u:11771: samabhyarcya samānamya dharmaṃ śrotu]m upāśrayan // Rm_29.46{45} //
XXratnml_u:11772: tān dṛṣṭvā samupāsīnān sa maudgalyo jinātmajaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11774: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāś ca sāṃghikāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11776: atha te bhikṣavaḥ sarve kṛtāṃjaliḥ puṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:11777: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ natvā paprachur evam ādarāt // Rm_29.49{48} //
XXratnml_u:11779: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya viharati na manyate // Rm_29.50{49} //
XXratnml_u:11780: tad asmākaṃ manānsy atra bhagavāñ chāstā yataḥ sthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11781: tat satyaṃ samupādiśya prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_29.51{50} //
XXratnml_u:11782: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa maudgalyāyanaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:11783: sarvāns tān saṃghikān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_29.52{51} //
XXratnml_u:11784: śrutaṃ mayā bhavanto 'sau bhagavāñ chāstā 'dhunā divi /
XXratnml_u:11785: tato mātuḥ surāṇāṃ cā tiṣṭhate dharmam ādiśat // Rm_29.53{52} //
XXratnml_u:11787: atra lokahitaṃ kartum avataret svayaṃ khalu // Rm_29.54{53} //
XXratnml_u:11788: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā te sāṃghikā janāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11790: sadā te sāṃghikās tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
XXratnml_u:11792: tato varṣātrimāsānte sarve te sāṃghikā janāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11793: api taṃ maudgalyam ānatvā prārthayad evam ādarāt // Rm_29.57{56} //
XXratnml_u:11795: draṣṭum ichāmahe śāstuḥ saddharmaṃ tṛṣitā vayaṃ // Rm_29.58{57} //
XXratnml_u:11796: ciradṛṣṭo yad asmābhir bhagavāṃ sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:11797: tad asyāgramunīndrasya darśanaṃ dātum arhati // Rm_29.59{58} //
XXratnml_u:11799: gatvā svarge munīndrasya sahasā samupakramet // Rm_29.60{59} //
XXratnml_u:11800: tatra gatvā bhavāc chāstur munīndrasya jagadguroḥ /
XXratnml_u:11801: asmākaṃ vacanaiś cāpi vaṃdatāṃ caraṇāmbujau // Rm_29.61{60} //
XXratnml_u:11803: dehe ca kauśalaṃ saukhyaṃ pṛchatāṃ vacanaiś ca naḥ /
XXratnml_u:11804: evaṃ cāpi puraḥ śāstur nivedituṃ samarhati // Rm_29.62{61} //
XXratnml_u:11805: bhagavaṃ nātha sarvajña te jāmbūdvīpikā narāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11807: yad bhavān sarvasatvānāṃ hitaṃ kartuṃ samudyataḥ /
XXratnml_u:11808: tad bhagavān manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmam ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_29.64{63} //
XXratnml_u:11809: narāḥ svarge samāgaṃtuṃ śaknuvanti na ke cana /
XXratnml_u:11810: devās tu sarvalokeṣu pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_29.65{64} //
XXratnml_u:11813: vayaṃ sarve sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11814: satkṛtya śraddhayā dharmmaṃ śrutvā saṃprabhajemahi // Rm_29.67{66} //
XXratnml_u:11815: evaṃ śāstar mahāvijña gatvā tatra surālaye /
XXratnml_u:11817: iti taiḥ prārthitaiḥ śrutvā sa maudgalyo mahārddhimān /
XXratnml_u:11818: evam iti pratijñāya tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_29.69{68} //
XXratnml_u:11819: atha te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokāś cāpi mahātmanā /
XXratnml_u:11820: tenādhivāsitaṃ matvā muditāḥ svasvālayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.70{69} //
XXratnml_u:11822: svarge gaṃtuṃ samādhāya samādhiṃ vidadhe kṣaṇaṃ // Rm_29.71{70} //
XXratnml_u:11823: tataḥ sa ṛddhivīryeṇa suparṇa iva khe 'gamat /
XXratnml_u:11824: bhāsayan sahasā gatvā divi śāstur upācarat // Rm_29.72{71} //
XXratnml_u:11825: tatra taṃ samupāyātaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān mudā /
XXratnml_u:11826: svāgataṃ prehi maudgalya niṣīdeti samabravīt // Rm_29.73{72} //
XXratnml_u:11827: ity ādiṣṭe munīndreṇa sa maudgalyaḥ pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11828: sāñjaliḥ pādayoḥ śāstuḥ praṇatvaivaṃ samabravīt // Rm_29.74{73} //
XXratnml_u:11829: bhagavan nātha sarvajña prāgato 'haṃ mudā divi /
XXratnml_u:11830: bhavatāṃ darśanaṃ kartuṃ tat prasīda dayānidhe // Rm_29.75{74} //
XXratnml_u:11831: kaccit te kuśalaṃ śāstaḥ kiñcid vādhāpi naiva hi /
XXratnml_u:11832: yātrā sukhaṃ valaṃ vīryaṃ kaccit kāye na cānyathā // Rm_29.76{75} //
XXratnml_u:11834: tathāpi bhagavann atra vijñāpayeya sarvathā // Rm_29.77{76} //
XXratnml_u:11835: bhavatāṃ sāṃghikaiḥ sarvair lokaiś cāpi mahājanaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:11836: bhavantaṃ draṣṭum ichadbhiḥ preṣito 'ham ihāgataḥ // Rm_29.78{77} //
XXratnml_u:11837: te sarve sāṃghikā lokā bhavatāṃ caraṇāmbuje /
XXratnml_u:11838: vandanti kauśalaṃ kāye paripṛchanti cādarāt // Rm_29.79{78} //
XXratnml_u:11839: evaṃ cāpi vadante te sarve lokāś ca sāṃghikāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11842: tat tathātra manuṣyāṇāṃ dharmam ādeṣṭum arhati // Rm_29.81{80} //
XXratnml_u:11843: tataḥ svarge samāgaṃtuṃ śaknuvanti na ke cana /
XXratnml_u:11844: devās tu sarvalokeṣu pracaranti yathechayā // Rm_29.82{81} //
XXratnml_u:11848: vayaṃ sarve sadā nityaṃ bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11849: satkṛtya śraddhayā dharmaṃ śrutvā saṃprabhajemahi // Rm_29.84{83} //
XXratnml_u:11850: evam asmadvacobhis tvaṃ gatvā tatra surālaye /
XXratnml_u:11853: bhavatāṃ vijñāpanāṃ kartuṃ sahasā samupācare // Rm_29.86{85} //
XXratnml_u:11855: saddharmaṃ samupādeṣṭuṃ bhuvy eva tarttum arhati // Rm_29.87{86} //
XXratnml_u:11856: iti tenārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:11857: taṃ maudgalyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_29.88{87} //
XXratnml_u:11858: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra sarve śakrādayo 'marāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11861: parivṛtya puraskṛtya dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_29.90{89} //
XXratnml_u:11862: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvan samupāśritān /
XXratnml_u:11864: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve śakrādayo 'pi te /
XXratnml_u:11866: tat samīkṣya sa maudgalyaḥ kiñcid vihasito mudā /
XXratnml_u:11867: bhagavaṃtaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_29.93{92} //
XXratnml_u:11870: atha sa bhagavāṃs tasya maudgalyasya mahāmateḥ /
XXratnml_u:11871: manaścintitam ājñāya taṃ maudgalyaṃ samabravīt // Rm_29.95{94} //
XXratnml_u:11872: na me maudgalya satkāravaṃdhitaṃ bhavate manaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11873: api tv ahaṃ yathechāmi tathā sarvaṃ samṛddhyati // Rm_29.96{95} //
XXratnml_u:11874: āyāntv ihāmarāḥ sarve iti mayā yadecchyate /
XXratnml_u:11875: tadā sarva ime devā āgachaṃti samaṃtataḥ // Rm_29.97{96} //
XXratnml_u:11876: gachantu ca surāḥ sarve iti mayā yadehyate /
XXratnml_u:11877: tadā sarva ime devā gachaṃti ca svam ālayaṃ // Rm_29.98{97} //
XXratnml_u:11879: tathātra sarvakāryāṇi siddhyaṃte hi sadā tadā // Rm_29.99{98} //
XXratnml_u:11880: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā maudgalya ātmavit /
XXratnml_u:11881: śāstuḥ pādāmbujau natvā sāṃjaliḥ samupāśrayat // Rm_29.100{99} //
XXratnml_u:11882: tataḥ sabhāṃ surāṃ kīrṇāṃ sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:11883: tāra sarvāṃ saṃnirīkṣyaivaṃ bhagavantam abhāṣata // Rm_29.101{100} //
XXratnml_u:11885: nūnam ime surāḥ sarve saṃbuddhapadalābhinaḥ // Rm_29.102{1} //
XXratnml_u:11886: santi hy asyāṃ sabhāyāṃ ye saṃbuddhe saṃprasāditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11888: santi dharme prasannā ye āryaśīlaiḥ samanvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11893: iti maudgalyasaṃproktaṃ śrutvā sa bhagavāṃs tathā /
XXratnml_u:11895: evam etad dhi maudgalya vicitreyaṃ mahāsabhā /
XXratnml_u:11896: surendrapramukhā devā yatra santi pramoditāḥ // Rm_29.107{6} //
XXratnml_u:11903: evaṃ śāstrā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā devādhipo 'pi saḥ /
XXratnml_u:11904: bhagavaṃtaṃ samālokya maudgalyaṃ ca tathābravīt // Rm_29.111{10} //
XXratnml_u:11907: santi buddhe prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11909: saṃti dharme prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11911: santi dharme prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11913: saṃti saṃghe prasannā ye śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11916: maudgalyaṃ śrīghanaṃ cāpi śakraṃ caikṣyaivam abravīt // Rm_29.117{16} //
XXratnml_u:11919: santi saṃghe prasannā ye satkṛtya prabhajanti te /
XXratnml_u:11921: santi dharme prasannā ye bhajanti śraddhayā mudā /
XXratnml_u:11923: santi buddhe prasannā ye bhajaṃti śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11926: munīndraśakradevaiś ca śrutvā sarve surā mudā // Rm_29.122{21} //
XXratnml_u:11928: tatra sarve 'pi te devās triratnabhajanodyatāḥ // Rm_29.123{22} //
XXratnml_u:11930: tatas tāṃ śrīghanaṃ nātvā maudgalyaṃ ca prasāditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:11931: te śakrādayo devāḥ sarve svasvālayāṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.125{24} //
XXratnml_u:11933: bhagavantaṃ tam ānamya sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_29.126{25} //
XXratnml_u:11936: atra sarve surā bhadraiś caranti bodhimānasāḥ // Rm_29.127{26} //
XXratnml_u:11937: tat tatrāpi manuṣyāṇāṃ hitāya bhagavān api /
XXratnml_u:11940: bhagavāṃs taṃ mahāsatvaṃ maudgalyam evam ādiśat // Rm_29.129{28} //
XXratnml_u:11944: sāṃkāśe nagare hy āpajjure vana udumvare // Rm_29.131{30} //
XXratnml_u:11945: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā maudgalya ātmavit /
XXratnml_u:11946: tatheti prativijñapya tathā kartuṃ samaichata // Rm_29.132{31} //
XXratnml_u:11947: atha sa ṛddhimān yogī maudgalyāyana ātmavit /
XXratnml_u:11948: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā samādhiṃ vidadhe tadā // Rm_29.133{32} //
XXratnml_u:11950: kṣaṇāt pakṣī yathākāśāj jambudvīpam avātarat // Rm_29.134{33} //
XXratnml_u:11954: matvā te sāṃghikāḥ sarve muditāḥ samupācaran // Rm_29.136{35} //
XXratnml_u:11955: tac chrutvā muditāḥ sarve lokāś cāpi nṛpādayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:11958: dṛṣṭvā sarve 'pi te natvā parivṛtyopatasthire // Rm_29.138{37} //
XXratnml_u:11959: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve maudgalyaṃ taṃ maharddhikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:11960: kṛtāṃjalipuṭā natvā paprachur evam ādarāt // Rm_29.139{38} //
XXratnml_u:11962: kutra sa bhagavān dharmam ādiśaṃs tiṣṭhate divi // Rm_29.140{39} //
XXratnml_u:11963: kadā sa bhagavāṃc chāstā svargād iha samācaret /
XXratnml_u:11964: kathaṃ cāpi samākhyāti tat sarvaṃ samupādiśa // Rm_29.141{40} //
XXratnml_u:11965: iti taiḥ prārthitaṃ śrutvā sa maudgalyāyano yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:11966: tāṃ sarvān saṃghikāl lokāṃś cāpi dṛṣṭvaivam abravīt // Rm_29.142{41} //
XXratnml_u:11967: bhavantaḥ kuśalaṃ śāstu munīndrasya mamāpi ca /
XXratnml_u:11968: yuṣmākam api nāmno 'ham avandaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_29.143{42} //
XXratnml_u:11970: mātuḥ sa bhagavān dharmam ādiśaṃs tiṣṭhate divi // Rm_29.144{43} //
XXratnml_u:11971: yathā yuṣmābhir ākhyātaṃ tathā niveditaṃ mayā /
XXratnml_u:11972: śrutvā sa bhagavāṃc chāstā mamaivaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_29.145{44} //
XXratnml_u:11976: etad yūyaṃ parijñāya prābhyanandata sāṃprataṃ // Rm_29.147{46} //
XXratnml_u:11977: iti tenārhatākhyātaṃ śrutvā te saṃghikā mudā /
XXratnml_u:11978: sevaṃ nṛpādi lokāś ca prābhyanandan pramoditāḥ // Rm_29.148{47} //
XXratnml_u:11980: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve lokā bhūpādayo 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:11982: tadā sa bhagavāṃs tatra svarge sendrān surān api /
XXratnml_u:11983: mātaraṃ samupāmaṃtrya pura evam upādiśat // Rm_29.150{49} //
XXratnml_u:11984: mātaḥ sendrādi devāś ca yūyaṃ sarve samādarāt /
XXratnml_u:11985: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracaradhvaṃ sadā śubhe // Rm_29.151{50} //
XXratnml_u:11987: nṛṇām api hitārthena gantum ichāmi nānyathā // Rm_29.152{51} //
XXratnml_u:11988: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sarve sendrāḥ surā api /
XXratnml_u:11989: mātāpi sāṃjalir natvā prārthayat taṃ munīśvaraṃ // Rm_29.153{52} //
XXratnml_u:11990: bhagavan nātha sarvajña ko 'smākaṃ dharmam ādiśet /
XXratnml_u:11991: tad atra kṛpayā dharmam ādeṣṭuṃ sthātum arhati // Rm_29.154{53} //
XXratnml_u:11992: iti taiḥ prārthite bhūyo bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:11993: mātaraṃ tān surān sarvān dṛṣṭvaivaṃ ca samādiśat // Rm_29.155{54} //
XXratnml_u:11994: mātar nāhaṃ sadaikatra tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmam ādiśan /
XXratnml_u:11996: tan mātar aham ālokya martyānāṃ hitakāmpayā /
XXratnml_u:11998: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā mātā surā api /
XXratnml_u:11999: sendrāḥ sarve 'pi te śāstuḥ pādāmbuje praṇemire // Rm_29.158{57} //
XXratnml_u:12000: tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve mātāpi tasya tāyinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12001: tridhā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya natvā svasvālayaṃ yayuḥ // Rm_29.159{58} //
XXratnml_u:12002: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra devālaye samāhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12003: tat samādhiṃ samādhāya kṣaṇād antarhito 'carat // Rm_29.160{59} //
XXratnml_u:12004: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra jambudvīpe prabhāsayan /
XXratnml_u:12009: sarve te sāṃghikā lokā bhūpādayo 'py upācaran // Rm_29.163{62} //
XXratnml_u:12010: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ natvā sarve te saṃpramoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12013: daityā vidyādharā nāgā garuḍāḥ siddhādayo 'pi ca // Rm_29.165{64} //
XXratnml_u:12017: devādi sarvalokāṃś ca bhojayituṃ nyamaṃtrayat // Rm_29.167{66} //
XXratnml_u:12018: bhagavān api devādi lokāḥ sarve prasāditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12023: tathāsanāṃ vastrāṇi divyāni rucirāni ca // Rm_29.170{69} //
XXratnml_u:12028: bhagavaṃtaṃ sasaṃghaṃ taṃ natvaivaṃ prārthayan mudā // Rm_29.172{71} //
XXratnml_u:12030: tat sasaṃgho bhavān atra svasvāsane niṣīdatu // Rm_29.173{72} //
XXratnml_u:12031: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra pādyaṃ gṛhya sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12033: tathā devādi lokāś ca sarvasvasvāsaneṣu tat /
XXratnml_u:12036: dṛṣṭvā sa mudito bhikṣur yathāvidhiṃ samarcayat // Rm_29.176{75} //
XXratnml_u:12038: tān buddhapramukhān sarvan yathechaiḥ samatoṣayat // Rm_29.177{76} //
XXratnml_u:12040: tad divyabhojanaṃ bhuktvā vismitās tṛptim āyayuḥ // Rm_29.178{77} //
XXratnml_u:12041: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ālokya sarvāns tān saṃpratoṣitān /
XXratnml_u:12044: tān buddhapramukhān sarvān saṃmoditān akārayat // Rm_29.180{79} //
XXratnml_u:12046: sasāṃghikaṃ munīndraṃ taṃ natvā tatpura āśrayat // Rm_29.181{80} //
XXratnml_u:12047: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya bhikṣor matvā śubhāśayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12048: āryasatyaṃ samārabhya dideśa dharmam uttamaṃ // Rm_29.182{81} //
XXratnml_u:12059: bhagavaṃtaṃ tam ānamya paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_29.188{87} //
XXratnml_u:12060: bhagavan kiṃ purānena bhikṣuṇā sukṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12061: yenopapāduko 'rhaṃ ca bhavaty ayaṃ mahāsudhīḥ // Rm_29.189{88} //
XXratnml_u:12062: yac cāpy asya yater bhikṣoḥ prārthitaṃ tat samṛdhyati /
XXratnml_u:12063: etat sarvaṃ samākhyāya sarvān asmān prabodhaya // Rm_29.190{89} //
XXratnml_u:12064: evaṃ tair bhikṣubhiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12065: tān sarvān sāṃghikāl lokān samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_29.191{90} //
XXratnml_u:12069: purāsīn bhagavān buddho vipaścī nāma sarvavit /
XXratnml_u:12076: anyasmin mahodyāne varṣāsu vyaharans tadā // Rm_29.196{95} //
XXratnml_u:12079: tatas te bhikṣavas sarve catvāras tatprasādhanāt /
XXratnml_u:12083: tān arhato mahābhijñān dṛṣṭvā sa paṃcamo yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:12084: muditas taccaraṇān natvā praṇidhānaṃ tathā vyadhāt // Rm_29.200{99} //
XXratnml_u:12085: yad etebhir mamāgamya sākṣād arhattvam āgataṃ /
XXratnml_u:12088: tat tathā sarvam apy eva sarvatrāpi samṛddhyatu // Rm_29.202{1} //
XXratnml_u:12090: ayam eva mahābhijño bhavati hīti manyatāṃ // Rm_29.203{2} //
XXratnml_u:12091: punar api bhavaty atra yenāyam upapādukaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12092: tat karmaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuta yūyam ādarāt // Rm_29.204{3} //
XXratnml_u:12093: purāsīd bhagavān buddhaḥ kāśyapo nāma sarvavit /
XXratnml_u:12094: arhan nātho jagacchāstā dharmarājas tathāgataḥ // Rm_29.205{4} //
XXratnml_u:12097: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra vārāṇasyaṃ gṛhādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12098: āsīt tasya priyā bhāryyā garbhiṇī garbhapīḍitā // Rm_29.207{6} //
XXratnml_u:12100: tasyā ārttaravaṃ śrutvā sa bharttā karuṇārditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12102: hā duḥkhaṃ garbbhapīḍāsyā jāyate kiṃ kariṣyate /
XXratnml_u:12103: evaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi saṃsāre rogiṇāṃ bhavacāriṇāṃ // Rm_29.209{8} //
XXratnml_u:12104: mātur evaṃ mahad duḥkhaṃ garbbhasthasya śiśor na kiṃ /
XXratnml_u:12105: etad duḥkham ahaṃ soḍhuṃ na śaknuyāṃ kathaṃ cana // Rm_29.210{9} //
XXratnml_u:12106: tad atra kāśyapasyāhaṃ śāsane śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12107: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā careyaṃ saṃvṛtiṃ sadā // Rm_29.211{10} //
XXratnml_u:12108: iti niścitya sa śreṣṭhī gatvā kāśyapaśāsane /
XXratnml_u:12109: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cacāra saṃvṛtiṃ sadā // Rm_29.212{11} //
XXratnml_u:12110: tataḥ kāle samāghrāte śreṣṭhī sa parikheditaḥ /

XXratnml_u:12391: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokāḥ prabodhitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12393: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra śrāvastye yo gṛhādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12394: āḍhyo mahādhanaḥ śrāddhaḥ śrīmāñc chrīdopamaḥ kṛtī // Rm_31.22{22} //
XXratnml_u:12395: sa tadā tatra saṃbuddhaṃ śrīghanaṃ taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:12396: draṣṭuṃ jetāśrame ramye vihāre samupācarat // Rm_31.23{23} //
XXratnml_u:12398: dṛṣṭvā sa muditaḥ śreṣṭhī praṇatvā samupācarat // Rm_31.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:12400: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pātuṃ purataḥ samupāśrayat // Rm_31.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:12401: taṃ dṛṣṭvā samupāsīnaṃ bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12402: matvā tasyāśayaṃ śuddham āryasatyam upādiśat // Rm_31.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:12405: tatra sa suprasannātmā śreṣṭhī mudā samutthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12406: sāṃjalis taṃ muniṃ natvā pravrajyāṃ samayācata // Rm_31.28{28} //
XXratnml_u:12407: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ vraje /
XXratnml_u:12408: tat pravrajyāṃ vrataṃ mahyaṃ kṛpayā dātum arhati // Rm_31.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:12409: iti saṃprārthite tena dṛṣṭvā sa bhagavān muniḥ /
XXratnml_u:12411: yadi śrāddhāsti te vatsa saugataśāsane vrate /
XXratnml_u:12412: ehi cara samādhāya brahmacaryaṃ vratottamaṃ // Rm_31.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:12413: ity uktvā sa jagacchāstā savyahastena tac chiraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12414: saṃspṛṣṭvā śāsane bauddhe śreṣṭhinaṃ taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_31.32{32} //
XXratnml_u:12415: tatra pravrajitas tena munīndreṇa sa muṇḍitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12417: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ātmajño lābhī lokābhipūjitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12419: tallabdhaṃ saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ sa saha brahmacāribhiḥ /
XXratnml_u:12420: saṃvibhāgaṃ guroḥ kiṃcid apy akarot kadā cana // Rm_31.35{35} //
XXratnml_u:12422: svayam eva prabhuṃjānaḥ kiṃcin naiva dadau kvacit // Rm_31.36{36} //
XXratnml_u:12424: tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ smṛtvā nitaḥ pretālayaṃ yayau // Rm_31.37{37} //
XXratnml_u:12425: pretībhūto 'pi sa smṛtvā tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ punaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12426: svakoṣṭhālaya āgatya tasthau svāsana āśrayan // Rm_31.38{38} //
XXratnml_u:12427: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve tatkoṣṭhe taṃ mṛtakaṃ yatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:12428: dṛṣṭvā gaṇḍīṃ parāhatya saṃskārtuṃ vidhi cārcayan // Rm_31.39{39} //
XXratnml_u:12430: tataḥ pratyāgatāḥ sarve tat koṣṭhadvāram āyayuḥ // Rm_31.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:12432: pratyaveksitum ālabdhās taṃ pretaṃ samapaśyata // Rm_31.41{41} //
XXratnml_u:12434: taṃ pretaṃ vikṛtaṃ pātraṃ dhṛtaṃ cīvaraprāvṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12435: dṛṣṭvā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve samudvignā vicerire // Rm_31.42{42} //
XXratnml_u:12436: tatas te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhagavataḥ purogatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12439: sa lokodvejanārthaṃ ca tad deśaṃ samupācarat // Rm_31.44{44} //
XXratnml_u:12440: tatrāsau preta ārāt taṃ bhagavaṃtam upāgataṃ /
XXratnml_u:12443: ratnāṃgam iva bhadrāṃśaṃ dadarśa śrīghanaṃ muniṃ // Rm_31.46{46} //
XXratnml_u:12445: prarudan sāṃjalir natvā tasthau prasāditāśayaḥ // Rm_31.47{47} //
XXratnml_u:12446: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā taṃ pretaṃ saṃprasāditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12449: pātracīvaram ādhāya caritaṃ saṃvaraṃ vṛthā // Rm_31.49{49} //
XXratnml_u:12451: kim idānīṃ ruditvātra svakṛtaṃ paribhuktavān // Rm_31.50{50} //
XXratnml_u:12452: sādhv atra sāṃprataṃ cittaṃ prasādaya mamāntike /
XXratnml_u:12453: asmāc cāpi pariṣkāradravyāc cittaṃ virāgaya // Rm_31.51{51} //
XXratnml_u:12454: mā haivetaḥ punaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā yāsyasi nairaye /
XXratnml_u:12455: tat saṃghe śaraṇaṃ gaccha tena tvaṃ sadgatiṃ vraje // Rm_31.52{52} //
XXratnml_u:12456: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa preta utthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12457: sa pātracīvaraṃ dravyaṃ saṃghebhyo nirayātayat // Rm_31.53{53} //
XXratnml_u:12459: nipatya svakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ dideśa sāṃjalir mudā // Rm_31.54{54} //
XXratnml_u:12460: bhagavan nātha sarvajña yat pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ mayā /
XXratnml_u:12462: tat sarvaṃ sāṃprataṃ śāstar darśayāmi bhavatpuraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12463: tat kṣamasvāparādhaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān guruḥ // Rm_31.56{56} //
XXratnml_u:12464: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa kṛpānvitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12465: tat pretaṃ sudṛśālokya samapaśyac ciraṃ mudā // Rm_31.57{57} //
XXratnml_u:12468: etaddānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat puṇyaṃ tvam avāpnuyāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12469: uttiṣṭha kṣipram etasmāt pretalokāt sudāruṇāt // Rm_31.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:12470: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā pretaḥ sa moditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12472: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya pretasya śubhasādhanaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12473: saddharmaṃ samupādiśya sasaṃghaḥ svāśraye yathā // Rm_31.61{61} //
XXratnml_u:12474: tathā sa preta ākarṇya saddharmaṃ taj jinoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12475: triratnaśaraṇaṃ kṛtvā bheje nityaṃ prabodhitaḥ // Rm_31.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:12476: tataḥ kāle samāghrātaḥ ca preto jvaradāhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12478: triratnasmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā mṛto yayau yamālayaṃ // Rm_31.63{63} //
XXratnml_u:12480: yamena preritas tasmāt pretamaharddhike yāyau // Rm_31.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:12481: tatrāpi sa samutpanne vismitas taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:12482: smṛtvā nityaṃ sadā bheje śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:12483: tataḥ so cintayed evaṃ kutaḥ kutrāham āgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12484: kena puṇyānubhāvena mahatsaukhyaṃ labhe nv iti // Rm_31.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:12486: triratnasmaraṇāt puṇyād iti mene sa puṇyabhāk // Rm_31.67{67} //
XXratnml_u:12489: aho mayā sukhaṃ labdhaṃ tat saṃbuddhaprasādataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12490: tad idāniṃ munīṃdraṃ taṃ draṣṭum arhāmi sarvathā // Rm_31.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:12491: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā so 'pi pretamaharddhikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12496: vihāre śrīghanaṃ draṣṭuṃ muditaḥ samudācarat // Rm_31.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:12497: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvānaṃditaḥ sa kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
XXratnml_u:12499: tatas taṃ sugataṃ nāthaṃ samabhyarcya pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12500: natvā sa sāṃjalir dharmaṃ śrotum ekāṃta āśrayat // Rm_31.74{74} //
XXratnml_u:12501: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tasya dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ viśodhitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12502: bodhicaryāṃ samārabhya saddharmam evam ādiśat // Rm_31.75{75} //
XXratnml_u:12504: vakṣyāmy etat parijñāya samādhāya śubhe cara // Rm_31.76{76} //
XXratnml_u:12505: yaḥ pumān atra saṃsāre satsaukhyaṃ sarvadechati /
XXratnml_u:12506: sa ādau śraddhayā bhaktyā triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.77{77} //
XXratnml_u:12509: itthaṃ kṛtaṃ pradānaṃ yat tad vipāke mahat phalaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12510: kramād vṛddhitaraṃ yāyān na kṣiṇuyāt kadā cana // Rm_31.79{79} //
XXratnml_u:12512: śāstā dharmādhipo rājā bodhisatvaḥ sudhīr bhavet // Rm_31.80{80} //
XXratnml_u:12514: triratnabhajaṇaṃ kṛtvā dadyād dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_31.81{81} //
XXratnml_u:12516: suśīlasaṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā triratnaṃ sarvadā bhajan // Rm_31.82{82} //
XXratnml_u:12518: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaṃ sarvadā bhajan // Rm_31.83{83} //
XXratnml_u:12527: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ // Rm_31.87{87} //
XXratnml_u:12535: tatrāpi śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnabhajano rataḥ // Rm_31.91{84} //
XXratnml_u:12553: tatpuṇyair bodhisaṃprāpto dharmarājo jino bhavet // Rm_31.100{93} //
XXratnml_u:12554: tataḥ sa sugataḥ śāstā jagannātho vināyakaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12557: sarvasatvāñ chubhe sthāpya nirvṛtaḥ saugatiṃ vrajet // Rm_31.102{95} //
XXratnml_u:12558: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre ya ichati śivāṃ gatiṃ /
XXratnml_u:12559: sa evaṃ śraddhayā nityaṃ triratnabhajanodyataḥ // Rm_31.103{96} //
XXratnml_u:12561: tataḥ kramāt sa tatpuṇyaiḥ sarvāḥ pāramitā api // Rm_31.104{97} //
XXratnml_u:12563: iti matvā śubhe nityaṃ caritavyaṃ śubhārthibhiḥ // Rm_31.105{98} //
XXratnml_u:12564: śubhena sadgatiṃ yāyā pāpena durgatīṃ vrajet /
XXratnml_u:12565: pāpas tu jāyate lobhāt mātsaryamalināśrayāt // Rm_31.106{99} //
XXratnml_u:12566: vopakārāṃ sukhecho 'pi na kiṃ cit sukham āpnuyāt /
XXratnml_u:12571: saṃbodhipraṇidhiṃ kṛtvā caren nityaṃ susaṃvare // Rm_31.108{1} //
XXratnml_u:12575: śivāṃ bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāt // Rm_31.110{3} //
XXratnml_u:12576: evaṃ tvaṃ vā parijñāya triratnaśaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12577: bodhicittaṃ samādhāya cara nityaṃ susaṃvare // Rm_31.111{4} //
XXratnml_u:12578: tathā te sarvadā bhadraṃ bhaven nityaṃ samantataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12579: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_31.112{5} //
XXratnml_u:12580: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa paribodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12581: tatheti hi pratiśrutvā prābhyanaṃdat prasāditaḥ // Rm_31.113{6} //
XXratnml_u:12582: tataḥ sa taṃ jagannāthaṃ praṇatvā sāṃjalir mudā /
XXratnml_u:12585: triratnaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracaran sarvadā mudā // Rm_31.115{8} //
XXratnml_u:12586: tad rātrau tatprabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavo vismayānvitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12587: sarve te prātar utthāya natvāpṛchan munīśvaraṃ // Rm_31.116{9} //
XXratnml_u:12588: bhagavan nātha sarvajña ko 'dya rātrāv ihāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12589: etad vṛttaṃ samākhyāya sarvān naḥ paribodhaya // Rm_31.117{10} //
XXratnml_u:12590: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ pṛṣṭe bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12591: tān sarvān sāṃghikān dṛṣṭvā bodhayitum upādiśat // Rm_31.118{11} //
XXratnml_u:12592: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yo 'dya rātrāv ihāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12593: etat sarvaṃ pravṛttāṃtaṃ pravakṣyāmi suvistaraṃ // Rm_31.119{12} //
XXratnml_u:12594: yo 'sau śreṣṭhī mahāśrāddhaḥ saugate śāsane mudā /
XXratnml_u:12595: śraddhayā pravrajitvātra brahmacaryaṃ mudā caran // Rm_31.120{13} //
XXratnml_u:12597: labdhadravyaṃ na kasmai cid dadau kiñcit kadā cana // Rm_31.121{14} //
XXratnml_u:12598: kevalaṃ saṃcayaṃ kṛtvā koṣṭhāgāre nidhāya tat /
XXratnml_u:12599: guptīkṛtvā prayatnena vyabhajan naiva kiṃ cana // Rm_31.122{15} //
XXratnml_u:12600: tataḥ kāle samāghrāte dhyātvā tad dravyasaṃcayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12603: punaḥ pratyāgatas tatra svālaye saṃnyaṣīdata // Rm_31.124{17} //
XXratnml_u:12604: tatra taṃ saṃsthitaṃ pretaṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ samupācaran /
XXratnml_u:12607: sa pātracīvaraṃ sarvaṃ taddravyaṃ nirayātayat // Rm_31.126{19} //
XXratnml_u:12610: tatra sa suprasannātmā smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:12611: matsaddharmāmṛtaṃ pātum iha rātrau samāgataḥ // Rm_31.128{21} //
XXratnml_u:12615: yo 'yaṃ śreṣṭhī na cānyo hi rātrāv iha samāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12616: yat sa mṛto 'bhavat pretas mātsaryaduritāśrayāt // Rm_31.130{23} //
XXratnml_u:12618: mātsaryaṃ hi trilokeṣu pāpamūlaṃ nigadyate // Rm_31.131{24} //
XXratnml_u:12620: mātsaryaṃ sumaduṣṭaṃ ripuṃ jayata sarvathā // Rm_31.132{25} //
XXratnml_u:12621: mātsaryaṃ jīyate yair hi samuddhṛtya svamānasāt /
XXratnml_u:12622: te eva mānino vīrāḥ śūrāḥ prājñā vicakṣaṇāḥ // Rm_31.133{26} //
XXratnml_u:12623: ye ca jetuṃ na mātsaryaṃ śaknuvaṃti kathaṃ cana /
XXratnml_u:12624: kiṃ te śūrā vijetāro virā na kleśabhojinaḥ // Rm_31.134{27} //
XXratnml_u:12625: yeṣāṃ na jāyate citte mātsaryan duḥkṛtākaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:12626: te eva sukhino virā jayinaḥ kleśaghātakāḥ // Rm_31.135{28} //
XXratnml_u:12627: yāvan na jīyate citte mātsaryaṃ duritāśayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12628: tāvat kiṃ te suvīrā vā kṣaṇāt kleśānucāriṇaḥ // Rm_31.136{29} //
XXratnml_u:12629: ye ca kleśavaśā vīrā na te dhīrā vicakṣaṇāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12630: kṣaṇāt kiṃ cin nimitteti careyur vikṛtāśayāḥ // Rm_31.137{30} //
XXratnml_u:12632: duṣṭāḥ krodhāgnisaṃdagdhāḥ saṃpaśyeyur na kiṃ cana // Rm_31.138{31} //
XXratnml_u:12633: tatas te 'ndhā ivāloke careyur na ca satpathe /
XXratnml_u:12634: kumārga eva saṃraktāḥ pracareyuḥ pramāditāḥ // Rm_31.139{32} //
XXratnml_u:12638: vighnaṃ kartuṃ samudyogaṃ kuryur nityaṃ samāhitāḥ // Rm_31.141{34} //
XXratnml_u:12639: tatas te pāpino duṣṭā unmattā iva tāyinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12640: svayaṃ naṣṭāḥ parāṃś cāpi nāśayeyuḥ pravaṃcakāḥ // Rm_31.142{35} //
XXratnml_u:12647: tatra yamo mahārājā dṛṣṭvā taṃ duritāśayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12649: tatra tair yamadūtās tāṃ gṛhītvā sahasā balāt /
XXratnml_u:12651: tatra te daivabhogyāṃ bhuktvā bhoktuṃ samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12652: coditā yamadūtaiś ca bhrameyur narakeṣv api // Rm_31.148{41} //
XXratnml_u:12655: evaṃ te daivabhogyāṃ bhuktvā tathā ciraṃ sadā /
XXratnml_u:12657: narakān narake gatvā duḥkhāny evāśnuyu vabha // Rm_31.150{43} //
XXratnml_u:12660: tadā tān sugatān dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā saṃpracoditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12662: tatra te sukhasaṃpannāḥ smṛtvā ratnatrayaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:12663: sarvadā śaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pracareyuḥ samāhitāḥ // Rm_31.153{46} //
XXratnml_u:12665: śraddhayā satkṛtiṃ kṛtvā śṛṇuyur dharmam ādarāt // Rm_31.154{47} //
XXratnml_u:12667: bodhicittaṃ samāsādya prakuryu dānam ādarāt // Rm_31.155{48} //
XXratnml_u:12669: sarvasatvahitaṃ kṛtvā sādhayeyuḥ śubhāṃ cariṃ // Rm_31.156{49} //
XXratnml_u:12671: tatas te vimalātmāno dhyātvā yogasamāhitāḥ // Rm_31.157{50} //
XXratnml_u:12673: tato māragaṇāṃ jitvā pariśuddhās trimaṇḍalāḥ // Rm_31.158{51} //
XXratnml_u:12675: evaṃ matvātra saṃsāre mātsaryaṃ mūlam enasāṃ /
XXratnml_u:12677: tato vo maṃgalaṃ nityaṃ bhaved bhave samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12678: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpsyatha // Rm_31.161{54} //
XXratnml_u:12679: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā te sāṃghikā mudā /
XXratnml_u:12681: iti me guruṇādiṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ mayā tathocyate /
XXratnml_u:12682: evaṃ tvaṃ nṛpa mātsaryyaṃ tyaktvā cara śubhe sadā // Rm_31.163{56} //
XXratnml_u:12683: prajāś cāpi tvayā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12684: bodhicaryāśayāḥ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpyāḥ śubhe sadā // Rm_31.164{57} //
XXratnml_u:12685: evaṃ te sarvadā bhadraṃ bhaved bhave samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12686: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_31.165{58} //
XXratnml_u:12689: pretībhūtāvadānaṃ duritahṛtamataiḥ śreṣṭhino lobhino ye śṛṇvaṃti śravayaṃti pramuditamanasaḥ śraddhayedaṃ manuṣyāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12690: mātsaryaṃ te vihāya trimaṇiśaraṇagāḥ sarvasatvānurāgā dānaṃ datvā prasannāḥ satataśubhacarā yānti buddhālayaṃ te // Rm_31.167{60} //
XXratnml_u:12693: XXXII Virūpāvadāna athāśoko maharājaḥ kṛtāṃjalipuṭo mudā /
XXratnml_u:12694: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā prārthayec caivam ādarāt // Rm_32.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:12695: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12696: tad yathā guruṇādiṣṭaṃ tathādeṣṭuṃ ca me 'rhati // Rm_32.2{2} //
XXratnml_u:12697: iti saṃprārthite rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:12698: tam aśokaṃ mahārājaṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:12699: sādhu śṛṇu mahārāja yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12700: tathāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi tava dharmapravṛddhaye // Rm_32.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:12701: tad yathaivaṃ puraikasmin samaye sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12707: tatra te bhikṣavaḥ sarve bhikṣuṇyo 'pi samāgatāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12708: yatinaś cailakāś caivam upāsakā upāsikāḥ // Rm_32.8{8} //
XXratnml_u:12710: nirgranthās tīrthikāś cāpi tāpasāś ca maharṣayaḥ // Rm_32.9{9} //
XXratnml_u:12712: daityā yakṣāś ca gaṃdharvāḥ kinnarāś cāpi rākṣasāḥ // Rm_32.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:12713: siddhā vidyādharāś cāpi nāgāś ca garuḍā api /
XXratnml_u:12714: sādhyā grahāḥ satārāś ca vasavaś cāpsarogaṇāḥ // Rm_32.11{11} //
XXratnml_u:12716: vaiśyāś ca maṃtriṇo 'mātyāḥ śreṣṭhinaś ca mahājanāḥ // Rm_32.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:12717: gṛhasthā vaṇijaḥ sārthavāhāś ca dhanino 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:12718: śilpinaḥ paurikāś cāpi jānapadāś ca nairgamāḥ // Rm_32.13{13} //
XXratnml_u:12720: sarve te samupāgatya vihāre samupāviśan // Rm_32.14{14} //
XXratnml_u:12721: tatra taṃ śrīghanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te saṃprasāditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12723: tatra sarve 'pi te lokāḥ samabhyarcya yathākramaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12724: taṃ munīndraṃ praṇatvaiva dharmaṃ śrotum upāśrayan // Rm_32.16{16} //
XXratnml_u:12725: tataḥ sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tān sarvān samupāśritān /
XXratnml_u:12727: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve te tridaśādayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12728: lokāḥ satyam iti jñātvā prābhyanandan prabodhitāḥ // Rm_32.18{18} //
XXratnml_u:12730: tasminn avasare tatra śrāvastyāḥ pauriko gṛhī /
XXratnml_u:12731: āsīn mahādhanaḥ śrīmāñ chṛdopamo mahājanaḥ // Rm_32.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:12733: kāṃtāṃ bhāryyāṃ samānīya samyakvyūhe yathāvidhiḥ // Rm_32.20{20} //
XXratnml_u:12734: tataḥ sa kāmasaṃraktaḥ sukāminyā tayā saha /
XXratnml_u:12735: yathechayā sukhaṃ bhuktvā reme nityaṃ pracoditaḥ // Rm_32.21{21} //
XXratnml_u:12737: samaye sā satī bhārya garbhitābhūt kṛśāṃgikā // Rm_32.22{22} //
XXratnml_u:12740: dṛṣṭvā taṃ dārakaṃ mātā bhinnāśayā viṣeditāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12741: kiṃ īdṛg ātmajenāpi dhig mām iti vyaciṃtayat // Rm_32.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:12742: tataḥ sa janakaḥ śrutvā taṃ jātaṃ vikṛtāśrayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12743: virūpaṃ durbhagākāram ity evaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_32.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:12744: aho kiṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ janmāṃtare purā mayā /
XXratnml_u:12745: yenāyaṃ durbhagākāro virūpo jāyate sutaḥ // Rm_32.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:12746: tad atra kiṃ mayopāyaṃ karttavyaṃ nāpi manyate /
XXratnml_u:12747: dhig māṃ yena sute jāte lajjayā me sukhaṃ hṛtaṃ // Rm_32.27{27} //
XXratnml_u:12748: tathāpi kiṃ kariṣyāmi daivāt me jāyate hy ayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12749: tad virūpo 'pi putro 'yaṃ pālanīyo mayātmajaḥ // Rm_32.28{28} //
XXratnml_u:12750: iti bhartroditaṃ śrutvā sā bhāryyāpy evam abravīt /
XXratnml_u:12751: yad ābhyāṃ prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tatphalaṃ bhujyate khalu // Rm_32.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:12752: yad abhāvi na tad bhogyaṃ bhāvi cen na tad anyathā /
XXratnml_u:12753: sarvatra bhāvino bhogyaṃ bhuṃjate sarvajaṃtavaḥ // Rm_32.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:12754: tad atrāham imaṃ bālaṃ pālayeyaṃ prayatnataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12755: ity uktvā sā vibhinnāsyā nārī tasthau pralajjitā // Rm_32.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:12756: taṃ virūpaṃ sutaṃ jātaṃ vīkṣya sa janako 'pi ca /
XXratnml_u:12758: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ manyate na bhavāṃtare /
XXratnml_u:12759: yato 'yaṃ dārako jāto virūpo durbhagākṛtiḥ // Rm_32.33{33} //
XXratnml_u:12760: tathāpi kiṃ kariṣyāmi daivān no jāyate hy ayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12761: daivabhogyaṃ prabhoktavyaṃ sarvair api hi jaṃtubhiḥ // Rm_32.34{34} //
XXratnml_u:12763: tad ayaṃ svātmajo bālaḥ pālanīyotmayā mayā // Rm_32.35{35} //
XXratnml_u:12764: iti dhyātvā pitā so 'thadṛṣṭvā tasya śiśor mukhaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12766: tato jñātīn samāhūya kṛtvā jātimahaṃ sa ca /
XXratnml_u:12767: pitāsya nāma vikhyāte kuruteti samabravīt // Rm_32.37{37} //
XXratnml_u:12768: tatas te jñātayaḥ sarve saṃkṛtvā samataṃ tathā /
XXratnml_u:12769: tad gṛhasthaṃ samāmaṃtrya pura evam upādiśan // Rm_32.38{38} //
XXratnml_u:12770: gṛhapate virūpo 'yaṃ putro yat tava jāyate /
XXratnml_u:12771: tasmād bhavatun āmnāyaṃ prasiddho bālako bhuvi // Rm_32.39{39} //
XXratnml_u:12773: tataḥ snehād virūpo 'sau mātrā yatnena pālitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12774: krāmāt puṣṭo vivṛddhābhūd hradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_32.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:12775: tadā yadā kumāratvaṃ prāptaḥ sa vikṛtāśrayaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12776: svarūpaṃ darppaṇe dṛṣṭvā virūpo lajjito 'bhavat // Rm_32.41{41} //
XXratnml_u:12779: hā mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenāhaṃ duritākṛtiḥ /
XXratnml_u:12780: kiṃ mamānena kāyena mṛtyuṃ me 'tra varaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_32.43{43} //
XXratnml_u:12781: kiṃ kariṣye virūpo 'haṃ kva yāsyāmi durākṛtiḥ /
XXratnml_u:12782: kiṃ mamānena jīvena kevalaṃ duḥkhabhoginā // Rm_32.44{44} //
XXratnml_u:12783: tad atrāhaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktvā vanodyāne samāśrayan /
XXratnml_u:12784: saṃbuddhaṃ sugataṃ dhyātvā mṛtyuṃ gaccheya muktaye // Rm_32.45{45} //
XXratnml_u:12785: avaśyam eva sarveṣāṃ jaṃtūnaṃ maraṇaṃ bhave /
XXratnml_u:12786: tan mamedṛg virūpo 'smin śarīre jīvite spṛhā // Rm_32.46{46} //
XXratnml_u:12787: yady atrāhaṃ ciraṃ jīvī nindito duḥkham āpnuyāṃ /
XXratnml_u:12788: tad buddhaṃ sugataṃ dhyātvā tiṣṭheyaṃ prāṇamuktaye // Rm_32.47{47} //
XXratnml_u:12789: tat saṃbuddhaṃ jinaṃ dhyātvā mṛto 'haṃ yadi sāṃprataṃ /
XXratnml_u:12790: tat puṇyaḥ paritātmā sugatiṃ gacheya sarvathā // Rm_32.48{48} //
XXratnml_u:12791: ye buddhaṃ sugataṃ smṛtvā gachanti mṛtyum ātmanā /
XXratnml_u:12792: durgatiṃ te na gachanti samyānty eva sukhāvatīṃ // Rm_32.49{49} //
XXratnml_u:12793: tasmāt te sudhiyaḥ santaḥ tyaktvā yāyāt kulaṃ gṛhaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12794: saṃbuddhasmaraṇaṃ dhyātvā tiṣṭhanti nirjane vane // Rm_32.50{50} //
XXratnml_u:12795: tathāhaṃ tat samālokya saṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12796: samādhāya sadā smṛtvā vaseyaṃ vijane vane // Rm_32.51{51} //
XXratnml_u:12797: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā virūpaḥ sa prasannadhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:12798: sa saṃpadaṃ gṛhaṃ tyaktvā jīrṇodyānaṃ samāśrayat // Rm_32.52{52} //
XXratnml_u:12801: tadā sa bhagavāñ chāstā taṃ tathā sthitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12804: tatrodyāne virūpaṃ taṃ paśyan bhāsvān upācarat // Rm_32.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:12806: vismitas taṃ samāyātaṃ sasāṃghikam apaśyata // Rm_32.56{56} //
XXratnml_u:12807: taṃ munīṃdraṃ samālokya virūpaḥ sa vimohitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12809: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā virūpaṃ taṃ parāyitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12811: tathā nirudhyamānaḥ sa virūpas tena śāsinā /
XXratnml_u:12812: parāyituṃ prayatnena na śaśāka kathaṃ cana // Rm_32.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:12815: tatra sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā nilīnaṃ lajjayāsane /
XXratnml_u:12818: tataḥ sa bhagavañ chāstā tat samādheḥ samutthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12819: svayaṃ virūpam ātmānaṃ nirmāya vikṛtāśrayaṃ // Rm_32.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:12823: sa virūpaḥ samālokya harṣita evam abravīt // Rm_32.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:12824: svāgataṃ bho sahāye hi kutra gantum ihāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12826: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa virūpadhṛk /
XXratnml_u:12827: tvāṃ draṣṭum ihāyāmi proktveti samupāśrayet // Rm_32.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:12828: tatra sthitaḥ kathāṃ kṛtvā bhagavān sa virūpadhṛk /
XXratnml_u:12830: tat pradattaṃ prabhuktvānnaṃ sa virūpaḥ sa moditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12832: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ chāstā dṛṣṭvā taṃ saṃpramoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12833: svarūpeṇa sthitas tatra vyarājat saṃprabhāsayan // Rm_32.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:12835: sa virūpaḥ samālokya vismitaś caivam abravīt // Rm_32.70{70} //
XXratnml_u:12836: aho kathaṃ bhavaty evam abhirūpataro bhavān /
XXratnml_u:12837: kasya puṇyavipākān tad vaktum arhati me puraḥ // Rm_32.71{71} //
XXratnml_u:12838: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12839: bodhayituṃ virūpaṃ taṃ samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:12842: tasyā eva prabhāvena bhavāmy ahaṃ śubheṃdriyaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12844: ity ādiśya munīndraḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra śubhāsane /
XXratnml_u:12846: tatas te sāṃghikāḥ sarve saumyarūpāḥ śubheṃdriyāḥ /
XXratnml_u:12849: dṛṣṭvā taṃ sugataṃ matvā babhūva vismayānvitaḥ // Rm_32.77{77} //
XXratnml_u:12850: aho bhāgya mayā labdhaṃ mahatpuṇyam ihādhunā /
XXratnml_u:12851: yan mamārthe munīndro 'yaṃ sasāṃghika upāgataḥ // Rm_32.78{78} //
XXratnml_u:12854: tad aham asya munīndrasya śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12855: satkṛtya saugataṃ dharmaṃ śrotum arhe samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.80{80} //
XXratnml_u:12856: ity evaṃ manasā dhyātvā virūpaḥ sa pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12857: upetya sāṃjalir natvā taṃ munīndram upāśrayat // Rm_32.81{81} //
XXratnml_u:12864: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau vavande sa kṛtāṃjaliḥ // Rm_32.84{84} //
XXratnml_u:12865: tataḥ utthāya taṃ nāthaṃ bhagavaṃtaṃ sasāṃghikaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12866: samālokya prasannātmā prārthayat sa samādarāt // Rm_32.85{85} //
XXratnml_u:12868: prādurbhūtātra me lakṣmī bhavāmi yātisuṃdaraḥ // Rm_32.86{86} //
XXratnml_u:12869: tad etan mahad āścaryaṃ dṛṣṭvā me rocate manaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12870: bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitvā carituṃ saṃvaraṃ sadā // Rm_32.87{87} //
XXratnml_u:12871: tad atra bhagavan nātha kṛpayā buddhaśāsane /
XXratnml_u:12872: anvāhṛtya śubhe dharme niyoktuṃ māṃ samarhati // Rm_32.88{88} //
XXratnml_u:12874: pravrajya saṃvaraṃ dhṛtvā cariṣye 'tra samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.89{89} //
XXratnml_u:12875: iti tat saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12876: tasya śuddhāśayam ālokya samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.90{90} //
XXratnml_u:12877: yadi vāṃchāsti te vatsa carituṃ saugataṃ vrataṃ /
XXratnml_u:12878: pitur ājñāṃ samāsādya prāgacha dāsyate tadā // Rm_32.91{91} //
XXratnml_u:12879: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sa pratiharṣitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12880: mudā tasya muneḥ pādau praṇatvaiva tato 'carat // Rm_32.92{92} //
XXratnml_u:12881: tatra sa svagṛhe gatvā pādau pituḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ /
XXratnml_u:12882: praṇatvā purataḥ sthitvā prāvadad evam ādarāt // Rm_32.93{93} //
XXratnml_u:12884: parṇakuṭyāṃ samāsīno dhyatvā vasāmi yogavit // Rm_32.94{94} //
XXratnml_u:12885: tatra sa bhagavān buddhaḥ sasaṃghaḥ svayam āgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12887: tad dattam amṛtaṃ bhuktvā bhavāmi suṃdarākṛtiḥ /
XXratnml_u:12888: lakṣmīś cāpi samudbhūtā mamaivaṃ jāyate śubhaṃ // Rm_32.96{96} //
XXratnml_u:12890: nānyathā hīti vijñāya prasīda sugate sadā // Rm_32.97{97} //
XXratnml_u:12891: evam etat mahaccitraṃ dṛṣṭvā me saṃprasāditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12892: mano 'dya śāsane bauddhe carituṃ rocate vrataṃ // Rm_32.98{98} //
XXratnml_u:12894: tad atra kṛpayā tāta tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_32.99{99} //
XXratnml_u:12896: tatra ca sarvadā saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yāyāj jinālayaṃ // Rm_32.100{100} //
XXratnml_u:12897: iti matvā prasīdātra mā kuruṣva mano 'nyathā /
XXratnml_u:12898: śraddhayānugrahaṃ kṛtvā tad anujñāṃ pradehi me // Rm_32.101{1} //
XXratnml_u:12899: iti saṃprārthitaṃ śrutvā sa gṛhasthaḥ savismayaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12900: pitā taṃ svātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā sucirād evam abravīt // Rm_32.102{2} //
XXratnml_u:12901: aho hi bhāgyavān putra puṇyavāñchābhi sāṃprataṃ /
XXratnml_u:12902: yato 'sau kṛpayopetya buddhat tvām abhirakṣati // Rm_32.103{3} //
XXratnml_u:12903: tat te 'sti yadi vāñchati carituṃ saugataṃ vrataṃ /
XXratnml_u:12904: taṃ buddhaśaraṇaṃ gatvā vrataṃ cara samāhitaḥ // Rm_32.104{4} //
XXratnml_u:12906: iti pitroditaṃ śrutvā sa virūpaḥ prasāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12907: pādau pitroḥ praṇatvaiva sahasā prācarad gṛhāt // Rm_32.105{5} //
XXratnml_u:12908: tato jetāśrame gatvā sa virūpaḥ pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12909: pādau tasya muner natvā prārthayed evam ādarāt // Rm_32.106{6} //
XXratnml_u:12911: tad bhavān kṛpayā mahyaṃ saṃvaraṃ dātum arhati // Rm_32.107{7} //
XXratnml_u:12912: iti saṃprārthite tena bhagavāṃs tasya mastake /
XXratnml_u:12913: savyahastena saṃspṛṣṭvā śāsane taṃ samagrahīt // Rm_32.108{8} //
XXratnml_u:12914: tatra sa vrājitaḥ sāstrā virūpo muṇḍito 'pi saḥ /
XXratnml_u:12916: tataḥ sa bhikṣur ātmajñaḥ saṃyamī vijiteṃdriyaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12920: sarvakleśagaṇāñ jitvā sākṣād arhatvam āptavān // Rm_32.112{11} //
XXratnml_u:12924: mānyaḥ pūjyo 'bhivandyo 'bhūd brahmacarī sa yogavit // Rm_32.114{13} //
XXratnml_u:12925: tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā taṃ yatim uttamaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12926: vismitās taṃ muniṃ natvā paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_32.115{14} //
XXratnml_u:12927: bhagavann arhatānena kiṃ karma prakṛtaṃ purā /
XXratnml_u:12929: yac cāyaṃ bhagavāc chāsta bhavatā saṃprasāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12930: lakṣmīvān abhirūpaś ca bhavati sadguṇārataḥ // Rm_32.117{16} //
XXratnml_u:12931: yac cāyaṃ śāsane bauddhe śraddhayā śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12933: tad asya sarvavṛttāṃtaṃ yad anena purākṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12934: suvistaraṃ samākhyāya sarvān naḥ paribodhaya // Rm_32.119{18} //
XXratnml_u:12935: iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12936: sarvāṃs tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samālokyaivam ādiśat // Rm_32.120{19} //
XXratnml_u:12937: śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad anena purākṛtaṃ /
XXratnml_u:12938: tat sarvaiḥ karma vakṣyāmi sarvalokaprabodhane // Rm_32.121{20} //
XXratnml_u:12941: sa bhagavāñ jagannāthaḥ kṛtvā bhadraṃ samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12942: sarvatra saugataṃ dharmam upadeṣṭum upācarat // Rm_32.123{22} //
XXratnml_u:12943: evaṃ sarvatra lokeṣu sasāṃghikaḥ sa mārajit /
XXratnml_u:12947: tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sarve lokaḥ prabodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12948: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā pracerire śubhe sadā // Rm_32.126{25} //
XXratnml_u:12950: tatra sa bhagavān puṣyo buddhadṛṣṭya samaṃtataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12951: loke paśyan hitaṃ kartuṃ dadarśa dvau jinātmajau // Rm_32.127{26} //
XXratnml_u:12952: ekaḥ śākyamunir nāma maitreyaś cāparaḥ sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:12953: tasmin kāle ubhav etau bodhisatvau jinātmajau // Rm_32.128{27} //
XXratnml_u:12955: tasya śāstuś ca vaineyāḥ satvā na paripācitāḥ // Rm_32.129{28} //
XXratnml_u:12956: śākyamunes tu vaineyāḥ paripakvā na saṃtatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:12957: evaṃ sa sugataḥ puṣyo dṛṣṭvaivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_32.130{29} //
XXratnml_u:12960: iti vicintya puṣyaḥ sa tathāgataḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12961: himavaṃtaṃ giriṃ gatvā pracakrāma prabhāsayan // Rm_32.132{31} //
XXratnml_u:12962: tatra ratnaguhāyāṃ sa praviśya sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:12964: tasmiṃś ca samaye tatra śākyamuniḥ sa sanmatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:12966: tatra ratnaguhāyāṃ taṃ puṣyaṃ tathāgataṃ muniṃ /
XXratnml_u:12972: tatra taṃ sugataṃ dṛṣṭvā śākyamuniḥ sa moditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12973: sahasā sāṃjalir natvā pūjāṃgainārcayan mudā // Rm_32.138{37} //
XXratnml_u:12974: tataḥ sa ekapādena sthitvā saptaniśāṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:12975: sāṃjaliḥ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā tuṣṭāva gāthayānayā // Rm_32.139{38} //
XXratnml_u:12976: na divi bhuvi vā nāsmil loke na vaiśravaṇālaye /
XXratnml_u:12977: na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā // Rm_32.140{39} //
XXratnml_u:12980: etayo gāthayā stutvā taṃ puṣyaṃ sugataṃ muniṃ /
XXratnml_u:12981: sa śākyamunir utsāhāt saptarātriṃ mudā bhajan // Rm_32.142{41} //
XXratnml_u:12983: paristutas tam ālokya śākyamunim abhāṣata // Rm_32.143{42} //
XXratnml_u:12984: sādhu sādhu mahāsatva tvam evaṃ yat samudyataḥ /
XXratnml_u:12987: kramāt pāramitāḥ pūrya saṃbodhiṃ samavāpnuyāḥ // Rm_32.145{44} //
XXratnml_u:12988: ity ādiśya munīndro 'sau puṣyo dharmādhipo jinaḥ /
XXratnml_u:12991: tasya puṣyasya sadbhaktya śaraṇasthaḥ sadābhajat // Rm_32.147{46} //
XXratnml_u:12992: tatra tasmin sthite buddhe devī guhānivāsinī /
XXratnml_u:12994: tadguhāyāṃ praveṣṭum 'sau na śaśāka kathaṃ cana // Rm_32.148{47} //
XXratnml_u:12996: bhūtvā taṃ sugataṃ puṣyaṃ dhyānālīnam abhīṣapat // Rm_32.149{48} //
XXratnml_u:12998: kiñcit tasya muneś cittaṃ cārayituṃ śaśāka na // Rm_32.150{49} //
XXratnml_u:13000: svarūpeṇaiva taṃ draṣṭuṃ praṇatā samupācarat // Rm_32.151{50} //
XXratnml_u:13001: tatra taṃ sugataṃ puṣyaṃ tathāgatam munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:13006: iti dhyātvā surūpeṇa tadantikam upācarat // Rm_32.154{53} //
XXratnml_u:13007: tatra sā sāṃjalir natvā pādau tasya muneḥ puraḥ /
XXratnml_u:13008: sthitvā kṣamārthanāṃ karttuṃ prārthayad evam ānatā // Rm_32.155{54} //
XXratnml_u:13009: bhagavan nātha sarvajña yan mayā prakṛtaṃ tvayi /
XXratnml_u:13010: tat kṣamasva jagannātha kṣāntidharmādhipo 'si hi // Rm_32.156{55} //
XXratnml_u:13011: tad atrāhaṃ jagacchāstar bhavatāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā /
XXratnml_u:13012: sarvadā samupāśritya bhajeyaṃ śraddhayā mudā // Rm_32.157{56} //
XXratnml_u:13013: yad atra te sasaṃghasya yathāvidhi samarcituṃ /
XXratnml_u:13014: ichāmy ahaṃ jagannātha tad adhyuṣitum arhati // Rm_32.158{57} //
XXratnml_u:13015: iti tenārthite puṣyo bhagavān sa munīśvaraḥ /
XXratnml_u:13016: tāṃ viśuddhāśayāṃ dṛṣṭvā tūṣṇībhūtvādhyuvāsa tat // Rm_32.159{58} //
XXratnml_u:13019: tataḥ sā muditopetya pūjāṃgais taṃ munīśvaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:13020: abhyarcya bhojanair divyaiḥ sasaṃghaṃ samatoṣayat // Rm_32.161{60} //
XXratnml_u:13021: tataḥ sā bhojanānte 'pi praṇatvā sāñjalir mudā /
XXratnml_u:13022: bhūtvā kṣamāpayitvā ca prārthayad evam ānatā // Rm_32.162{61} //
XXratnml_u:13023: bhagavan nātha sarvajña bhavatāṃ śaraṇe sthitā /
XXratnml_u:13025: tat kṣamasva jagannātha yan mayāpakṛtaṃ vṛthā /
XXratnml_u:13026: prasīdatu bhavāñ chāstā saṃbuddho hi kṣamākaraḥ // Rm_32.164{63} //
XXratnml_u:13027: iti tayārthitaṃ śrutvā puṣyaḥ sa bhagavān muniḥ /
XXratnml_u:13028: devatāṃ tāṃ samālokya saddharmaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_32.165{64} //
XXratnml_u:13030: dharmeṇa rakṣitā loke sarvatrāpi sukhī bhavet // Rm_32.166{65} //
XXratnml_u:13031: tad ādau śraddhayā dharmaṃ śrotavyaṃ saugataṃ varaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13032: tatas triratnam abhyarcya dātavyaṃ dānam arthine // Rm_32.167{66} //
XXratnml_u:13041: dharmaṃ śrutvā sadā dānaṃ prakarttavyaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_32.171{70} //
XXratnml_u:13042: tvaṃ cāpy evaṃ sadā saukhyaṃ yadīchasi śubhānvitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13043: triratnaṃ bhajanaṃ kṛtvā kuru dānaṃ yathepsitaṃ // Rm_32.172{71} //
XXratnml_u:13046: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sā devatā mudā /
XXratnml_u:13048: tataḥ sa sugataḥ puṣyas tathāgataḥ sasāṃghikaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13050: eṣa hy ayaṃ virūpo 'sau devatā yā guhāśritā /
XXratnml_u:13051: yuṣmābhiḥ satyam eveti manyatāṃ nānyathā khalu // Rm_32.176{75} //
XXratnml_u:13053: triratnabhajanaṃ kṛtvā caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_32.177{76} //
XXratnml_u:13054: śubhasya karmaṇaḥ pāke śubhataivaṃ sadā bhave /
XXratnml_u:13055: kṛṣṇasya duḥkhataivaṃ hi miśritasyāpi miśritaṃ // Rm_32.178{77} //
XXratnml_u:13056: abhuktaṃ kṣīyate naiva karma kvāpi kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:13057: yenaiva yat kṛtaṃ karma tenaiva bhujyate phalaṃ // Rm_32.179{78} //
XXratnml_u:13058: nāgnibhir dahyate karma klidyate nāpi codakaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:13059: śuṣyate vāyubhir naiva kṣīyate ca na bhūmiṣu // Rm_32.180{79} //
XXratnml_u:13060: nānyathāpi bhave naiva karma kvāpi kathaṃ cana /
XXratnml_u:13061: yad yathā prakṛtaṃ karmaṃ tat tathaiva kuled dhruvaṃ // Rm_32.181{80} //
XXratnml_u:13062: yad asau devatā tatra guhāśritā durāśayā /
XXratnml_u:13063: vikṛtāṅgā virūpākṣā bhūtvā puṣyaṃ vyabhīṣapat // Rm_32.182{81} //
XXratnml_u:13065: vikṛtāṅgo virūpākṣo babhūvāyaṃ bhave sadā // Rm_32.183{82} //
XXratnml_u:13067: vibhransyo durbhagākāro bhavaty atrāpi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_32.184{83} //
XXratnml_u:13069: tasya puṣyasya buddhasya prasannā śaraṇaṃ gatā // Rm_32.185{84} //
XXratnml_u:13070: śraddhayā bhojanair divyaiḥ satkṛtya prābhajan mudā /
XXratnml_u:13074: iti yūyaṃ parijñāya caradhvaṃ sarvadā śubhe /
XXratnml_u:13075: tato bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyuḥ // Rm_32.188{87} //
XXratnml_u:13076: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa sarve te sāṃghikā api /
XXratnml_u:13077: śrutvānumoditāḥ satyam ity uktvā parimenire // Rm_32.189{88} //
XXratnml_u:13079: tvayāpy evaṃ mahārāja caritavyaṃ śubhe sadā // Rm_32.190{89} //
XXratnml_u:13080: prajāś cāpi tathā rājan bodhayitvā prayatnataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13082: tena te sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatrāpi śubhaṃ bhavet /
XXratnml_u:13084: kramād bodhiṃ samāsādya saṃbuddhapadam āpnuyāḥ // Rm_32.192{91} //
XXratnml_u:13086: tathā hīti pratijñāya prābhyanandat prabodhitaḥ // Rm_32.193{92} //
XXratnml_u:13087: śāstrādiṣṭaṃ prasannā idam api manuja ye virūpāvadānaṃ śṛṇvanti śrāvayanti pramuditamanaso ye ca puṇyābhirāgāḥ /
XXratnml_u:13088: sarve te śrīsametāḥ sakalaguṇadharāḥ satsukhāni prabhuktvā saṃbuddhabhaktiraktāḥ sugatavaragṛhe saṃprayānti pramodaṃ // Rm_32.194{93}
XXratnml_u:13091: XXXIṃ Kṣemāvadāna athāśoko mahārājaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ puraḥ sthitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13092: upaguptaṃ yatiṃ natvā punar evam abhāṣata // Rm_33.1{1} //
XXratnml_u:13093: bhadanta śrotum ichāmi punar anyat subhāṣitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13095: iti saṃprārthite rājñā śrutvā so 'rhan sudhīr yatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:13096: aśokaṃ taṃ mahīpālaṃ samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_33.3{3} //
XXratnml_u:13097: śṛṇu rājan mahābhāga yathā me guruṇoditaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13098: tathāhaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi tava dharmavivṛddhaye // Rm_33.4{4} //
XXratnml_u:13100: prasenajid iti khyāto mahārājā mahīpatiḥ // Rm_33.5{5} //
XXratnml_u:13105: tatra sa kṣatriyo rājā prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13110: vadhvā kāṣṭapaṭaṃ tatra prāvatasthe pure yathā // Rm_33.10{10} //
XXratnml_u:13111: tac chrutvā brahmadatto 'pi kṣatriyo bhūpatir nṛpaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13114: vaijayantīṃ samucchrāya nadyā tīram upācarat // Rm_33.12{12} //
XXratnml_u:13116: vadhvā kāṣṭapaṭaṃ tatra saṃtasthe nagare yathā // Rm_33.13{13} //
XXratnml_u:13117: tatra sa bhūpatī rājā brahmadatto narādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13119: tadā sa mahiṣī rājñā saha krīḍāratā satī /
XXratnml_u:13121: tathā tasmin kṣaṇe so 'pi prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13122: mahiṣyā saha saṃraktaḥ prareme paricārayan // Rm_33.16{16} //
XXratnml_u:13129: sā sūta samaye putraṃ divyāṃśam atisuṃdaraṃ // Rm_33.19{19} //
XXratnml_u:13130: tac chrutvā sa bhūpālo brahmadattaḥ pramoditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13131: sahasopetya taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā na tṛptim āyayau // Rm_33.20{20} //
XXratnml_u:13132: tasminn eva dine tasya prasenajin mahīpateḥ /
XXratnml_u:13133: bhāryāpi samaye sūta sutāṃ divyātisuṃdarīṃ // Rm_33.21{21} //
XXratnml_u:13136: tac chrutvā sa mahīpālaḥ prasenajit prasāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13138: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa nareṃdro 'pi me vabhūva samāgataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13139: tām eva suciraṃ paśyann avatasthe suniścalaḥ // Rm_33.24{24} //
XXratnml_u:13140: tayor apy ubhayo rājñoḥ skaṃdhācārāḥ pravarttitāḥ /
XXratnml_u:13141: ye nityaṃ tatpravṛttāṃtaṃ svaprabhor upahārakāḥ // Rm_33.25{25} //
XXratnml_u:13143: putro jāta iti śrutvā parijñāya prasedire // Rm_33.26{26} //
XXratnml_u:13145: kṛtāṃjalipuṭo natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayan // Rm_33.27{27} //
XXratnml_u:13146: jaya deva mahārāja śṛṇu tatra pravarttitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13147: brahmadattasya bhūpasya putro jāto 'dhunā khalu // Rm_33.28{28} //
XXratnml_u:13149: tat tvayā saha saṃvaṃdhaṃ kṛtvā sa svapuraṃ vrajet // Rm_33.29{29} //
XXratnml_u:13150: tat prasīda mahārāja mā vibhaiṣīḥ śubhaṃ bhavet /
XXratnml_u:13151: tena saṃdhiṃ bhavān kṛtvā viharatāṃ yathāsukhaṃ // Rm_33.30{30} //
XXratnml_u:13152: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā sa prasenajin narādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13153: satyam etad iti jñātvā prasasāda 'viśaṃkitaḥ // Rm_33.31{31} //
XXratnml_u:13155: te prasenajitaḥ putrī jāteti śuśruvus tadā // Rm_33.32{31} //
XXratnml_u:13156: tatas te sahasā tatra brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
XXratnml_u:13158: jaya deva mahārāja śṛṇu tatra pravarttitaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13163: tena sahātra saṃvaṃdhaṃ karttum arhati sarvathā // Rm_33.36{36} //
XXratnml_u:13164: iti taiḥ kathitaṃ śrutvā brahmadatto narādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13165: bhadram iti parijñāya tatraivaṃ samaciṃtayat // Rm_33.37{37} //
XXratnml_u:13166: aho citra mahotsāho bhadram ekasmin divase yataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13167: jāto me 'tra suto bhadras tasyāpi jāyate sutā // Rm_33.38{38} //
XXratnml_u:13168: tat tāṃ bhadrāṃ ramākārāṃ taṃ prasenajitam ādarat /
XXratnml_u:13169: prārthayitvātra putrāya sandhiṃ kṛtvā carevahi // Rm_33.39{39} //
XXratnml_u:13170: iti niścitya sa brahmadatto rājā prasāditaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13172: sujanaṃ dūtam āmaṃtrya pura evaṃ samabravīt // Rm_33.40{40} //
XXratnml_u:13173: gacha dūta mahīpālaṃ taṃ prasenajitam ādarāt /
XXratnml_u:13176: bhavatā saha saṃvaṃdhaṃ karttum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_33.42{42} //
XXratnml_u:13177: yad ekasmin dine jātau dārakāv āvayor api /
XXratnml_u:13178: sutā te bhadrikā khyātā mama putro 'pi bhadrikaḥ // Rm_33.43{43} //
XXratnml_u:13179: tad etayor hi saṃvaṃdhaṃ karttum arhāvahe dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13180: tad bhavān mama putrāya svātmajāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_33.44{44} //
XXratnml_u:13182: vairotsargo bhaven nūnaṃ prītisaṃdhir na bhetsyati // Rm_33.45{45} //
XXratnml_u:13184: nirītikaṃ śubhotsāhaṃ bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_33.46{46} //
XXratnml_u:13185: iti me vacasā rājā prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13186: prārthanīyas tvayā sādho gachāstu te sumaṃgalaṃ // Rm_33.47{47} //
XXratnml_u:13187: ity ādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā dūtaḥ sa bodhitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13188: tathety uktvā nṛpaṃ natvā samutthāya tato 'carat // Rm_33.48{48} //
XXratnml_u:13189: tatra sa sahasā gatvā taṃ prasenajitaṃ nṛpaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13190: upetya sāṃjalir natvā purastha evam abravīt // Rm_33.49{49} //
XXratnml_u:13192: tadarthaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi bhavāṃ śrotuṃ samarhati // Rm_33.50{50} //
XXratnml_u:13194: pṛchati sarvadā nityaṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api // Rm_33.51{51} //
XXratnml_u:13195: punar evaṃ sa bhūpālo brahmadatto bravīty api /
XXratnml_u:13196: bhavatā saha saṃvaṃdhaṃ kartum ichāmi sāṃprataṃ // Rm_33.52{52} //
XXratnml_u:13197: yad ekasmin dine jātau dārakāv āvayor iha /
XXratnml_u:13198: sutā te bhadrikā khyāto mama putro 'pi bhadrikaḥ // Rm_33.53{53} //
XXratnml_u:13199: tad etayor hi saṃvaṃdhaṃ kartum arhāmahe dhruvaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13200: tad bhavān mama putrāya svātmajāṃ dātum arhati // Rm_33.54{54} //
XXratnml_u:13202: vairotsargo bhaven nūnaṃ prītisaṃdhir na bhetsyate // Rm_33.55{55} //
XXratnml_u:13204: nirītikaṃ śubhotsāhaṃ bhaved eva na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_33.56{56} //
XXratnml_u:13205: iti me vacasā rājā prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13206: prārthanīyas tvayā sādho gachāstu tvaṃ samāhitaḥ // Rm_33.57{57} //
XXratnml_u:13208: preṣito 'haṃ mahārāja bhavatām aṃtike khalu // Rm_33.58{58} //
XXratnml_u:13210: bhavān api tathā kartum arhaty edan na nānyathā // Rm_33.59{59} //
XXratnml_u:13211: evaṃ hi bhavatāṃ bhadraṃ yāvājjīvaṃ sukhaiḥ sadā /
XXratnml_u:13212: sarvatra maṅgalotsāhaṃ bhaven nūnaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // Rm_33.60{60} //
XXratnml_u:13213: tad bhavān api rājendra brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
XXratnml_u:13214: putrāya svātmajāṃ bhadrāṃ saṃpradātum ihārhati // Rm_33.61{61} //
XXratnml_u:13216: iti tena samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sa kośalādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13217: tuṣṇībhūtvā kṣaṇaṃ tatra manasaivaṃ vyaciṃtayet // Rm_33.62{62} //
XXratnml_u:13218: aho me jāyate kṣemaṃ yad asau kṣatriyādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13219: vairaṃ vihāya saṃvandhaṃ karttum ichati sāṃprataṃ // Rm_33.63{63} //
XXratnml_u:13220: tad ahaṃ tena bhūpena yathādiṣṭaṃ tathā 'dhunā /
XXratnml_u:13221: datvaināṃ svātmajāṃ bhadrāṃ saṃdhiṃ kuryāṃ śubhāptaye // Rm_33.64{64} //
XXratnml_u:13222: evaṃ kṛte sadā kṣemaṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api /
XXratnml_u:13223: mama tasyāpi bhūpasya bhaven nūnaṃ na cānyathā // Rm_33.65{65} //
XXratnml_u:13224: iti dhyātvā viniścitya prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13225: taṃ dūtaṃ samupāmaṃtrya samālokyaivam abravīt // Rm_33.66{66} //
XXratnml_u:13227: ājñāṃ śirasā dhṛtivā kariṣyāmi sadāpy ahaṃ // Rm_33.67{67} //
XXratnml_u:13228: evaṃ me vacasā sādho sarvam etat suvistaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:13229: samākhyāya narendraṃ taṃ prasādayitum arhasi // Rm_33.68{68} //
XXratnml_u:13230: iti tena narendreṇa samākhyātaṃ niśamya saḥ /
XXratnml_u:13231: dūtas tatheti vijñapya prābhyanandat prasāditaḥ // Rm_33.69{69} //
XXratnml_u:13232: tataḥ sa dūtas taṃ bhūpaṃ kośalādhipatiṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:13233: natvā dṛṣṭvā samāmaṃtrya tato 'carat pramoditaḥ // Rm_33.70{70} //
XXratnml_u:13234: tataḥ sa sahasā gatvā brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
XXratnml_u:13235: upetya sāṃjaliḥ pādau praṇatvevam abhāṣata // Rm_33.71{71} //
XXratnml_u:13236: jaya deva mahārāja diṣṭyā varddhasva sāṃprataṃ /
XXratnml_u:13237: yathābhilaṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tat siddham iti manyatāṃ // Rm_33.72{72} //
XXratnml_u:13238: tad yathā bhavatādiṣṭaṃ tathā vijñāpitaṃ mayā /
XXratnml_u:13241: sarvadā te bhaved bhadraṃ sarvatra viṣayeṣv api // Rm_33.74{74} //
XXratnml_u:13242: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:13244: tataḥ sa bhūpatī rājā brahmadatto mahotsavaiḥ /
XXratnml_u:13246: tataḥ saṃprasthito lokaiḥ stūyamānaḥ surair api /
XXratnml_u:13247: pracaran sahasā tatra svapuraṃ samupāyayau // Rm_33.77{77} //
XXratnml_u:13251: pracaran sa nṛpo tatra śrāvastyāṃ samupācarat // Rm_33.79{79} //
XXratnml_u:13252: tatra svanagare prāptaḥ prasenajit sa kauśalaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13254: tāṃ bhadarikāṃ sutāṃ dṛṣṭvā suprasannāśayo mudā /
XXratnml_u:13255: aho kṣemaṃ prajātaṃ me ity evaṃ muhur abravīt // Rm_33.81{81} //
XXratnml_u:13256: tatas tasyāḥ sutāyāḥ sa kṛtvā jātimahaṃ mudā /
XXratnml_u:13257: sarvañ jñātīn samāhūya pura evam upādiśat // Rm_33.82{82} //
XXratnml_u:13259: bhadantaḥ śrūyatām asyā bhadrāyā duhitur mama /
XXratnml_u:13262: saṃpaśyañ jñātayas tatra saṃmīlyaivaṃ samabruvan // Rm_33.84{84} //
XXratnml_u:13263: yasmin dine prajāteyaṃ tasminn eva dine yataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13264: kṣemaṃ no jāyate tasmāt kṣemābhidhā bhavantv iyaṃ // Rm_33.85{85} //
XXratnml_u:13265: iti te jñātayaḥ sarve kṛtvaivaṃ saṃmataṃ tataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13266: kauśalendraṃ tam āmaṃtrya praṇatvaivaṃ samabruvan // Rm_33.86{86} //
XXratnml_u:13267: śṛṇu rājan yad asmākam abhiprāyaṃ pracakṣyate /
XXratnml_u:13268: tad asyā nāmadheyaṃ karotu bhuvi viśrutaṃ // Rm_33.87{87} //
XXratnml_u:13269: yasmin dine prajāteyaṃ kṣemaṃ bhavati sarvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13270: tenāsyā kriyatāṃ nāma kṣemeti viśrutaṃ bhuvi // Rm_33.88{88} //
XXratnml_u:13271: tathā tair gaditaṃ śrutvā rājā sa janako mudā /
XXratnml_u:13272: tasyāḥ putryās tathā nāma kṣemeti prārthitaṃ vyadhāt // Rm_33.89{89} //
XXratnml_u:13274: paripuṣṭā pravṛddhābhūd dhradastham iva paṃkajaṃ // Rm_33.90{90} //
XXratnml_u:13275: tathā sa brahmadatto 'pi rājā svāntargṛhe gataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13276: taṃ putrāṃ muhur ālokya prābhyanaṃdat pramoditaḥ // Rm_33.91{91} //
XXratnml_u:13277: tatra tasya śiśo rājā kṛtvā jātimahaṃ pitā /
XXratnml_u:13278: sarvāñ jñātīn samāhūya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_33.92{92} //
XXratnml_u:13281: ity ādiṣṭaṃ narendreṇa śrutvā te jñātayo mudā /
XXratnml_u:13282: sarve 'py ekatra saṃgamya mithar evaṃ samabruvan // Rm_33.94{94} //
XXratnml_u:13283: yad ayaṃ jātamātro 'pi kṣemaṃ karoti sarvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13284: tathāsya bhavatu kṣemaṃkara ity āhvayaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_33.95{95} //
XXratnml_u:13285: iti te jñātayaḥ sarve brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
XXratnml_u:13287: śṛṇu rājan yad asmābhir nāmāsya kriyate śiśoḥ /
XXratnml_u:13288: tan nāma kṣemasaṃpannaṃ prathayatu bhāvān bhuvi // Rm_33.97{97} //
XXratnml_u:13289: yad ayaṃ jātamātro 'pi kṣemaṃ karoti sarvataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13291: etat taiḥ kathitam śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:13292: tad eva nāme putrasya tasyākarot pravisṛtaṃ // Rm_33.99{99} //
XXratnml_u:13294: paripuṣṭaḥ pravṛddho 'bhūd dhradasthaṃ kamalaṃ yathā // Rm_33.100{100} //
XXratnml_u:13295: tataḥ kramāt kumāratvam āptavān sa nṛpātmajaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13296: gurūṇāṃ samupāśritya lipī kramād aśikṣat // Rm_33.101{1} //
XXratnml_u:13298: sarvaśāstrakalāsv ādi vidyāparaṃ yayau laghu // Rm_33.102{2} //
XXratnml_u:13299: tataḥ sa daharaḥ kāntaḥ kumāro ratilālitaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13301: savayeḥsacivaiḥ sārddhaṃ reme pure paribhraman // Rm_33.103{3} //
XXratnml_u:13302: tadā sa dārikā kṣemā prasenajitsutāpi ca /
XXratnml_u:13304: tataḥ sā bhadrikā kanyā sumatir guṇalālasāḥ /
XXratnml_u:13305: gurūṇāṃ samupāśritya kramāl lipir aśikṣata // Rm_33.105{5} //
XXratnml_u:13308: tadā sā bhāvinī kṣemā svasakhībhiḥ samanvitā /
XXratnml_u:13311: tāṃ kṣemāṃ suṃdarīṃ draṣṭuṃ samaichad ratilālasaḥ // Rm_33.108{8} //
XXratnml_u:13312: tataḥ sa dūtam āhūya bodhayitvā prasādayan /
XXratnml_u:13313: datvā suratnamālāṃ taṃ kṣemāyāḥ preṣayet svayaṃ // Rm_33.109{9} //
XXratnml_u:13314: tataḥ sa dūta ādāya tāṃ mālāṃ sahasā caran /
XXratnml_u:13315: śrāvastyāḥ puri saṃprāptaḥ kṣemāyāḥ sadane 'carat // Rm_33.110{10} //
XXratnml_u:13316: tatra sa dūta ālokya sakhīm ekām upāgatāṃ /
XXratnml_u:13317: tām upetya samāmaṃtrya suguptam evam abravīt // Rm_33.111{11} //
XXratnml_u:13319: ratnamālāṃ tvam ādāya bhadre tasyai samarpaya // Rm_33.112{12} //
XXratnml_u:13320: ity uktvā ratnamālāṃ tāṃ kṣemāsakhīkare rahaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13321: datvā sa dūta āmaṃtrya sahasā svapuraṃ yayau // Rm_33.113{13} //
XXratnml_u:13322: tatra sāpi sakhī tasyāḥ kṣemāyāḥ purato gatā /
XXratnml_u:13323: prābhṛtaṃ tam upasthāpya rahasy evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_33.114{14} //
XXratnml_u:13324: ayi bhadram imaṃ paśya prahitaṃ svāminā tava /
XXratnml_u:13325: tad idaṃ tvaṃ samāśliṣya patim iva vibhāvaya // Rm_33.115{15} //
XXratnml_u:13326: iti tayoditaṃ śrutvā sā kṣemā lajjitāśayā /
XXratnml_u:13328: tataḥ sā kanyakā kṣemā tāṃ sakhīṃ purataḥ sthitāṃ /
XXratnml_u:13329: sucirāt samupārabhya hartsayanty evam abravīt // Rm_33.117{17} //
XXratnml_u:13330: are re kiṃ vadasy evaṃ svāmī me kātra vidyate /
XXratnml_u:13331: nilajje vada tat kena prahitaṃ prābhṛtaṃ tava // Rm_33.118{18} //
XXratnml_u:13332: ity uktaṃ sā sakhī śrutvā kṣemāyā durituḥ prabhoḥ /
XXratnml_u:13334: evaṃ sakhyā samākhyātaṃ śrutvā sā nṛpanaṃdinī /
XXratnml_u:13336: tata utthāya sā kṣemā kanyāpi sahasā pituḥ /
XXratnml_u:13337: upetya caraṇau natvā sāṃjalir evam abravīt // Rm_33.121{21} //
XXratnml_u:13338: tāta kāmārthinī nāham api tu sadguṇārthinī /
XXratnml_u:13339: sadguṇāṃ sādhayiṣyāmi tad anujñāṃ dadātu me // Rm_33.122{22} //
XXratnml_u:13340: yad ahaṃ śāsane bauddhe pravrajitvā samāhita /
XXratnml_u:13341: brahmacaryaṃ samādhāya prechāmi carituṃ prabho // Rm_33.123{23} //
XXratnml_u:13343: anujñāṃ saṃpradatv me sarvathānugrahaṃ kuru // Rm_33.124{24} //
XXratnml_u:13345: ity arthitaṃ tayā putryā śrutvā sa kośalādhipaḥ /
XXratnml_u:13346: tāṃ kumārīṃ samālokya tasthau saṃdigdhamānasaḥ // Rm_33.125{25} //
XXratnml_u:13347: tataḥ sa janako rājā tāṃ kṣemāṃ svātmajāṃ priyāṃ /
XXratnml_u:13349: naivaṃ putri mayā kartuṃ śakyate tat kṣamasva me /
XXratnml_u:13350: yat te janmani me rāṣṭre kṣemam evaṃ prajāyate // Rm_33.127{27} //
XXratnml_u:13353: tad yathā me pratijñātaṃ vacanaṃ pūrayātmaje /
XXratnml_u:13354: mā kṛthāḥ sarvathā kṣeme pravrajyāsādhane mama // Rm_33.129{29} //
XXratnml_u:13355: yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ kariṣye na tad anyathā /
XXratnml_u:13356: matveti me vacaḥ śrutvā kuladharme carātmaje // Rm_33.130{30} //
XXratnml_u:13357: evaṃ pitroditaṃ śrutvā sā kṣemā prahatāśayā /
XXratnml_u:13358: utthāya svālaye gatvā tūṣṇībhūtā nyaṣīdata // Rm_33.131{31} //
XXratnml_u:13359: tadā sa janako rājā dūtam āhūya sādaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:13360: sarvam etat pravṛttāṃtaṃ samākhyāyaivam abravīt // Rm_33.132{32} //
XXratnml_u:13362: pura etat pravṛttāṃtaṃ nivedyaivaṃ prabodhaya // Rm_33.133{33} //
XXratnml_u:13363: yad iyaṃ me sutā kṣemā pravrajituṃ samichati /
XXratnml_u:13364: tad imāṃ sahasāgatvā bhavān ādātum arhati // Rm_33.134{34} //
XXratnml_u:13365: iti rājñā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā puraḥ sa sādaraṃ /
XXratnml_u:13366: tatheti saṃpratijñāya praṇatvā taṃ tato 'carat // Rm_33.135{35} //
XXratnml_u:13367: tatra sa sahasā gatvā brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
XXratnml_u:13368: upetya sāṃjalir natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_33.136{36} //
XXratnml_u:13370: kośalendreṇa tad bhavāṃ śṛṇotv evaṃ bravīti saḥ // Rm_33.137{37} //
XXratnml_u:13371: yad iyaṃ me sutā kṣemā pravrajituṃ samichati /
XXratnml_u:13372: tad imāṃ sahasāgatvā bhavān āhartum arhati // Rm_33.138{38} //
XXratnml_u:13373: yathā mayā pratijñātaṃ karttuṃ na śakyate 'nyathā /
XXratnml_u:13374: tad ahaṃ te kumārāya dāsyāmi svātmajām imāṃ // Rm_33.139{39} //
XXratnml_u:13376: preṣito 'ham iti jñātvā tat tatrāgaṃtum arhati // Rm_33.140{40} //
XXratnml_u:13377: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā brahmadattaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:13378: taṃ dūtaṃ sahasāmaṃtrya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_33.141{41} //
XXratnml_u:13380: yat tat kṛtyaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ karttavyam iti kathyatāṃ // Rm_33.142{42} //
XXratnml_u:13382: natvā tatheti vijñapya samutthāya tato 'carat // Rm_33.143{43} //
XXratnml_u:13383: tatra sa sahasā gatvā svapuraṃ samupācaran /
XXratnml_u:13384: nṛpatiṃ sāṃjalir natvā pura evaṃ nyavedayat // Rm_33.144{44} //
XXratnml_u:13386: tathā vijñāpitaṃ sarvaṃ tad uktaṃ yācyate śṛṇu // Rm_33.145{45} //
XXratnml_u:13389: tad yat kṛtyaṃ hi tat sarvaṃ sādhayituṃ tvam arhasi // Rm_33.146{46} //
XXratnml_u:13391: iti satyaṃ parijñāya sarvaṃ kṛtyaṃ prakāraya // Rm_33.147{47} //
XXratnml_u:13392: iti tenoditaṃ śrutvā prasenajit sa bhūpatiḥ /
XXratnml_u:13394: tadaitat sarvavṛttāṃtaṃ śrutvā cā dārikā sudhīḥ /
XXratnml_u:13396: hā kiṃ mayātra karttavyaṃ vivāhāṃ me bhave yataḥ /
XXratnml_u:13398: kāmā hi garhyate sadbhi varṇyate saugataṃ vrataṃ /
XXratnml_u:13399: tad atra kiṃ kariṣyāmi yan me na gocaraṃ vrate // Rm_33.151{51} //
XXratnml_u:13400: dhig janma tasya saṃsāre yasya na gocaraṃ vrate /
XXratnml_u:13401: vrataṃ vinātra kiṃ sāraṃ kāmabhogyai guṇair api // Rm_33.152{52} //
XXratnml_u:13402: tad atra kva gamiṣyāmi nimagnā kāmapaṃkile /
XXratnml_u:13403: ko me trātā bhaved atra saṃbuddhād aparaḥ kṛtī // Rm_33.153{53} //
XXratnml_u:13404: tad atra taṃ jagannāthaṃ sarvajñaṃ sarvatāyinaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13405: saṃsmṛtvā śaraṇaṃ gatvā prārthaye sādhunādarāt // Rm_33.154{54} //
XXratnml_u:13407: kṛpayā māṃ samālokya buddhavrate niyojayet // Rm_33.155{55} //
XXratnml_u:13408: yadi me daivayogena vrataṃ naiva labheya hi /
XXratnml_u:13409: saṃbuddhaśaraṇodbhūtaṃ puṇyaṃ tu labhyate dhruvaṃ // Rm_33.156{56} //
XXratnml_u:13410: saṃbuddhasmṛtijaṃ puṇyaṃ na kṣiṇoti kadā cana /
XXratnml_u:13411: saṃbuddhasaṃvaraṃ dadyād iti prajñair nigadyate // Rm_33.157{57} //
XXratnml_u:13412: tad ahaṃ taṃ jagannāthaṃ smṛtvātra maraṇaṃ varaṃ /
XXratnml_u:13413: na tu kāmaviṣaṃ bhokṣye bhojye puṇyāmṛtaṃ dhruvaṃ // Rm_33.158{58} //
XXratnml_u:13414: iti niścitya sā kṣemā snātvā śuddhāmvarāvṛtā /
XXratnml_u:13415: śaraṇapṛṣṭham āruhya abhavad dinmukhā sthitā // Rm_33.159{59} //
